Localization.Gloss: 亞拔他（yà bá tā），《思》阿巴革達。一名太監；亞哈隨魯（薛西斯）王的隨從。Abagtha

Terms.Localization: eunuch; servant of king Ahasuerus (Xerxes)

Localization.Gloss: 蘆葦，蒲草。高而直的植物，生長在河流和沼澤；用來製造輕巧的小船。papyrus, reeds

Terms.Localization: tall straight plant, growing in rivers and marshes (Arundo donax or Cyperus papyrus); used for making light boats

Localization.Gloss: 食槽，飼料槽。木制或石材造成的長形容器，常用來給家畜放食物。manger, crib, feed trough

Terms.Localization: long open container; made of wood or stone; for feeding domestic animals

Localization.Gloss: 西瓜。一種清甜多汁的水果，是埃及尼羅河沿岸一種蔓生植物的果實，很受人們喜愛，可作食物、飲料和藥用，包括其種子。melon

Terms.Localization: sweet, juicy fruit, produced by a trailing plant (Citrullus vulgaris) cultivated in Egypt along the river Nile; much appreciated, used for food, drink, and medicine, including the seeds

Localization.Gloss: 《現》亞比雅（yà bǐ yǎ），《和》亞比（yà bǐ），《思》阿彼雅。撒迦利雅的女兒，亞哈斯的妻子，猶大王希西家的母親。Abi

Terms.Localization: daughter of Zechariah; wife of Ahaz; mother of Hezekiah; also known as Abijah

Localization.Gloss: 亞比以謝族（yà bǐ yǐ xiè zú），《思》阿彼厄則爾。瑪拿西的後裔，其宗族進入迦南地時承受產業。Abiezrite

Terms.Localization: member of clan of Abiezer

Localization.Gloss: 《現》亞比‧亞本（yà bǐ-yà běn），《和》亞比亞本（yà bǐ yà běn），《思》阿彼巴耳。亞拉巴人，大衞的三十勇士之一。Abi-Albon

Terms.Localization: warrior in time of king David; also known as Abiel

Localization.Gloss: 亞別（yà bié），《思》阿彼耳。便雅憫支派人，基士與尼珥的父親，掃羅的祖父。Abiel

Terms.Localization: father of Kish and Ner, grandfather of king Saul and Abner; from the tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞比（yà bǐ），《思》阿彼巴耳。亞拉巴人，大衞的勇士之一。Abiel

Terms.Localization: warrior in the time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亞比亞撒（yà bǐ yà sā），《思》阿彼雅撒夫。利未支派人，可拉的兒子。Abiasaph

Terms.Localization: son of Korah, from the tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 《現》愛比該（ài bĭ gāi），《和》亞比該（yà bǐ gāi），《思》阿彼蓋耳。迦密族富人拿八的妻子，後來嫁給大衛。Abigail

Terms.Localization: wife of Nabal and later David; spelled Abigal on three occasions

Localization.Gloss: 《現》愛比該（ài bĭ gāi），《和》亞比該（yà bǐ gāi），《思》阿彼蓋耳。拿轄的女兒，大衞王的妹子，亞瑪撒的母親。「拿轄」可能是大衞的父親耶西（Jesse）的別稱。Abigail

Terms.Localization: daughter of Nahash, sister of David, wife of Jether the Ishmaelite, mother of Amasa

Localization.Gloss: 亞比但（yà bǐ dàn），《思》阿彼丹。基多尼的兒子，摩西在曠野調查人口數目時的便雅憫支派的首領，他也在會幕建成時代表其支派獻祭。Abidan

Terms.Localization: son of Gideoni; chief from the tribe of Benjamin at the time of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 亞比大（yà bǐ dà），《思》阿彼達。米甸的兒子，亞伯拉罕與基土拉的子孫。Abida

Terms.Localization: son of Midian, son of Keturah, wife of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 亞比雅（yà bǐ yǎ），《思》阿彼雅。便雅憫支派比結之子。Abijah

Terms.Localization: son of Becher from the tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 《和》亞比雅（yà bǐ yǎ）。 希斯崙的妻子。Abijah

Terms.Localization: wife of Hezron

Localization.Gloss: 亞比亞（yà bǐ yà），《思》阿彼雅。撒母耳的兒子，與哥哥約珥一同在別是巴作士師。Abijah

Terms.Localization: son of Samuel

Localization.Gloss: 亞比雅（yà bǐ yǎ），《思》阿彼雅。利未支派人，大衞時代在聖殿供職的第八班次祭司首領。Abijah

Terms.Localization: priest, in charge of a division of priests in the time of David, from the tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亞比雅（yà bǐ yǎ），《思》阿彼雅。羅波安的兒子，繼羅波安登位的南國猶大第二任君王（公元前913-911/10）；又名亞比央。Abijah

Terms.Localization: son of Rehoboam; king of Judah (913-911/10); also known as Abijam

Localization.Gloss: 亞比雅（yà bǐ yǎ），《思》阿彼雅。耶羅波安的兒子，患病而死。Abijah

Terms.Localization: son of Jeroboam

Localization.Gloss: 亞比雅（yà bǐ yǎ），《思》阿彼雅。撒迦利雅的女兒，亞哈斯的妻子，猶大王希西家的母親。Abijah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Zechariah, wife of Ahaz, mother of Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 亞比雅（yà bǐ yǎ），《思》阿彼雅。被擄後的祭司家族的兩位成員，也可能是指兩個族名。Abijah

Terms.Localization: priest in the time after exile from the tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亞比雅（yà bǐ yǎ），《思》阿彼雅。羅波安的兒子，繼羅波安登位的南國猶大第二任君王（公元前913-911/10）。Abijah

Terms.Localization: son of Rehoboam; king of Judah (913-911/10); name also spelled Abijah and also known as Abijam

Localization.Gloss: 亞比戶（yà bǐ hù），《思》阿彼胡。以色列大祭司亞倫的次子，擔任祭司的職分，因與拿答獻上凡火而被神降火燒死。Abihu

Terms.Localization: son of Aaron, priest from the tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亞比忽（yà bǐ hū），《思》厄胡得。便雅憫支派人，比拉的兒子。Abihud

Terms.Localization: son of Bela from tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞比孩（yà bǐ hái），《思》阿彼海耳。猶大支派耶拉篾的後裔亞比述的妻子。Abihail

Terms.Localization: wife of Abishur, descendant of Jerahmeel, tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亞比孩（yà bǐ hái），《思》阿彼海耳。猶大王羅波安的妻子，耶西兒子以利押的女兒。Abihail

Terms.Localization: daughter of Eliab, son of Jesse

Localization.Gloss: 亞比亥（yà bǐ hài），《思》阿彼海耳。以色列人在曠野時，利未支派米拉利族領袖蘇列的父親。Abihail

Terms.Localization: father of Zuriel from tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亞比孩（yà bǐ hái），《思》阿彼海耳。迦得支派戶利的兒子。Abihail

Terms.Localization: son of Huri from tribe of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 《現》亞比亥（yà bǐ hài），《和》亞比孩（yà bǐ hái），《思》阿彼海耳。便雅憫支派人，以斯帖的父親。Abihail

Terms.Localization: father of Esther from tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞比突（yà bǐ tū），《思》阿彼突布。便雅憫支派人，沙哈連的兒子。Abitub

Terms.Localization: son of Shaharaim from tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞比她（yà bǐ tā），《思》阿彼塔耳。大衛的妻子，示法提雅的母親。Abital

Terms.Localization: wife of David, mother of Shephatiah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》亞比雅（yà bĭ yǎ），《和》亞比央（yà bǐ yāng），《思》阿彼雅。羅波安的兒子，繼羅波安登位的南國猶大第二任君王（公元前913-911/10）。Abijam

Terms.Localization: son of Rehoboam; king of Judah (913-911/10); also known as Abijah

Localization.Gloss: 亞比瑪利（yà bǐ mǎ lì），《思》阿彼瑪耳。閃的後裔，法勒的兄弟約坍的兒子。Abimael

Terms.Localization: son of Joktan, descendant of Shem

Localization.Gloss: 亞比米勒（yà bǐ mǐ lè），《思》阿彼默肋客。基拉耳地的國王，亞伯拉罕曾騙他說撒拉是妹妹。Abimelech

Terms.Localization: king of Gerar

Localization.Gloss: 亞比米勒（yà bǐ mǐ lè），《思》阿彼默肋客。士師基甸的兒子，他殺死兄弟，被立為示劍王（公元前1129-1126）。Abimelech

Terms.Localization: son of Gideon; king of Shechem (1129-1126)

Localization.Gloss: 亞希米勒（yà xī mǐ lè），《思》阿希默肋客。利未支派人，亞比亞他的兒子，擔任祭司的職分。Abimelech

Terms.Localization: son of Abiathar; priest from tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亞比米勒（yà bǐ mǐ lè），《思》阿彼默肋客。即非利士人的迦特王「亞吉」。Abimelech

Terms.Localization: Achish, king of Gath?

Localization.Gloss: 亞比拿達（yà bǐ ná dá），《思》阿彼納達布。基列耶琳人，非利士人歸還耶和華的約櫃時曾將約櫃置放在他的家中，由他兒子以利亞撒看守約櫃。Abinadab

Terms.Localization: man from Kiriath Jearim

Localization.Gloss: 亞比拿達（yà bǐ ná dá），《思》阿彼納達布。猶大支派人，耶西的第二子，大衞的兄長。Abinadab

Terms.Localization: son of Jesse; brother of David, from tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亞比拿達（yà bǐ ná dá），《思》阿彼納達布。便雅憫支派人，掃羅王的兒子。Abinadab

Terms.Localization: son of king Saul from tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞比挪菴（yà bǐ nuó ān），《思》阿彼諾罕。協助女士師底波拉作戰的巴拉的父親。Abinoam

Terms.Localization: father of Barak

Localization.Gloss: 以比雅撒（yǐ bǐ yǎ sā），《思》厄貝雅撒夫／阿彼雅撒夫。利未兒子哥轄的後裔，以利加拿的兒子，亞惜的父親，希幔的先祖。Ebiasaph

Terms.Localization: son of Elkanah, descendant of Kohath, father of Assir, ancestor of Heman, from tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亞比以謝／亞比以謝族（yà bǐ yǐ xiè (zú)），《思》阿彼厄責爾。哈摩利吉的兒子；瑪拿西的後裔，其宗族進入迦南地時承受產業，民數記的拼寫譯作「伊以謝」和「伊以謝族」（Jeezer）。Abiezer

Terms.Localization: son of Hammolecheth, ancestor of clan from tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 亞比以謝（yà bǐ yǐ xiè），《思》阿彼厄則爾。便雅憫支派的亞拿突人，大衞的三十勇士之一，是九月第九班的班長。Abiezer

Terms.Localization: man from Anatoth, commander in army of king David

Localization.Gloss: 公牛；壯牛；壯馬。公馬，主要用來運載士兵和拉動戰車；字面意思：有能者（見［2］）；用於動物時，可以指戰馬或公牛。上下文通常（但不總是）會提供線索、表明所指是哪一種動物。明確指公牛的經文有：詩50:13、68:31；耶50:11也可能指公牛，雖然有些譯本（RSV，TEV，NIV和NAB）譯為“stallions”（公馬）。bull; stallion

Terms.Localization: male bovine; male horse, mainly used for carrying soldiers and drawing chariots; literally means mighty one (see [2]); when used of animals it may refer to war-horses or to bulls. The context usually, but not always, gives the clue as to which sense is meant. The contexts in which bulls are meant unambiguously are PSA 50:13; 68:31; and probably JER 50:11, although there RSV, TEV, NIV, and NAB translate the word as “stallions”.

Localization.Gloss: 有勢力的人；大能者；勇士。有權勢或有力量的人，與權力、力量、侵略、戰爭有關。mighty one

Terms.Localization: a powerful being, associated with power, strength, aggression, warfare

Localization.Gloss: 大能者。上帝的頭銜，強調他的大能和他作為雅各及其後裔的上帝的專屬性；常常和「雅各的」或「以色列的」連用。mighty one

Terms.Localization: title for Yhwh, stressing his power and exclusivity as the God of Jacob and his descendants; always in combination with "of Jacob" or "of Israel"

Localization.Gloss: 意志堅強；勇敢；頑固。字面意思：心中有力的人決心追求目標，這或是勇敢的表現，或是固執的表現。strong-willed, brave, stubborn

Terms.Localization: literally, mighty of heart person determined to pursue goals, either a sign of bravery or stubbornness

Localization.Gloss: 亞比蘭（yà bǐ lán），《思》阿彼蘭。呂便支派以利押的兒子，與可拉等人聯合攻擊摩西，煽動羣眾叛亂，最後被地吞沒而死。Abiram

Terms.Localization: man, son of Eliab, from tribe of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 亞比蘭（yà bǐ lán），《思》阿彼蘭。伯特利人希伊勒的長子。Abiram

Terms.Localization: son of Hiel

Localization.Gloss: 《現》雅比莎（yǎ bĭ shā），《和》亞比煞（yà bĭ shā），《思》阿彼沙格。書念地的美貌童女，大衞王年老時的侍妾。Abishag

Terms.Localization: concubine of David

Localization.Gloss: 亞比書（yà bǐ shū），《思》阿彼叔亞。利未支派人，亞倫的曾孫，非尼哈的兒子，擔任大祭司的職分。Abishua

Terms.Localization: son of Phinehas; high priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亞比書（yà bǐ shū），《思》阿彼叔亞。便雅憫支派人，便雅憫的曾孫，比拉的兒子。Abishua

Terms.Localization: son of Bela; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞比述（yà bǐ shù），《思》阿彼叔爾。猶大支派人，耶拉篾的後裔，沙買的兒子。Abishur

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亞比篩（yà bǐ shāi），《思》阿彼瑟。洗魯雅的兒子，約押的兄弟，大衞的外甥。他是大衞勇士的首領，曾經建立顯赫的戰功。Abishai

Terms.Localization: son of Zeruiah, sister of David; warrior; also known as Abshai

Localization.Gloss: 押沙龍（yā shā lóng），《思》阿貝沙隆。羅波安的妻子瑪迦的父親。Absalom; Abishalom

Terms.Localization: father of Maakah, wife of Rehoboam; also known as Absalom

Localization.Gloss: 亞比亞他（yà bǐ yà tā），《思》厄貝雅塔爾／厄彼雅塔爾。亞希米勒的兒子，亞倫和以利的後裔；大衛時期的祭司。Abiathar

Terms.Localization: son of Ahimelech; priest in the time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 《現》亞伯（yà bó），《和》亞比拉（yà bǐ lā），《思》阿貝耳。拿弗他利境內，上加利利一設防的邊城。可能是「伯瑪迦的亞比拉」（即「亞伯伯瑪迦」〔Abel-Beth-Maachah〕）的縮寫，也許與「亞伯瑪音」為同一地點。Abel

Terms.Localization: town in the territory of Naphtali; short name for Abel-Beth-Maacah; also known as Abel-Maim

Localization.Gloss: 《現》亞伯‧伯‧瑪迦（yà bó-bó-mǎ jiā），《和》伯‧瑪迦的亞比拉（bó-mǎ jiā de yà bǐ lā），亞伯‧伯‧瑪迦（yà bó-bó-mǎ jiā），《思》貝特瑪阿加的阿貝耳，阿貝耳貝特瑪阿加。拿弗他利的一座城；也稱為亞比拉和亞伯瑪音。Abel-Beth-Maacah

Terms.Localization: town in Naphtali; also known as Abel and Abel-Maim

Localization.Gloss: 《現》什亭谷（shí tíng gǔ），《和》亞伯‧什亭（yà bó-shí tíng），《思》阿貝耳史廷。約旦河東的一城鎮，位於摩押平原，以色列人出埃及後安營之地。Abel-Shittim

Terms.Localization: town; east of the Jordan river

Localization.Gloss: 亞備勒‧基拉明（yà bèi lè-jī lā míng），《思》阿貝耳革辣明。亞捫境內的城鎮或鄉村，耶弗他殺敗亞捫人的地方之一，位於現今約旦首都安曼以南不遠之處。Abel-Keramim

Terms.Localization: town or village in Ammon

Localization.Gloss: 亞伯‧米何拉（yà bó-mǐ hé lā），《思》阿貝耳默曷拉。基列地一城鎮，位於伯善南面，所羅門所建的十二行政區之一，是先知以利沙的家鄉。Abel-Meholah

Terms.Localization: town in Gilead

Localization.Gloss: 《現》亞伯‧伯‧瑪迦（yà bó-bó-mǎ jiā），《和》亞伯‧瑪音（yà bó-mǎ yīn），《思》阿貝耳瑪因。拿弗他利境內一城鎮，亞蘭王便哈達所攻破的以色列城鎮之一。Abel-Maim

Terms.Localization: town in Naphtali; also known as Abel-Beth-Maacah and Abel

Localization.Gloss: 亞伯‧麥西（yà bó-mài xī），《思》阿貝耳米茲辣殷。雅各死後他的兒子們在此地為父痛哭，即「亞達的禾場」，位於約旦河以東，死海之北。Abel-Mizraim

Terms.Localization: a location east of the Jordan

Localization.Gloss: 法碼。各種不同大小和重量的石頭，通常標上重量，用在天平上已確定所售產品的價格。stone weight

Terms.Localization: stones of various sizes and weights, usually marked with their weights, used on balance scales to determine the price of produce being sold

Localization.Gloss: 寶石。小物件的總稱，包含各種因美麗和稀有而被認為珍貴的石頭；用作飾物或裝飾品；與尊貴、威嚴和榮耀關聯。precious stone

Terms.Localization: generic term for small object consisting of a variety of stone that is considered precious because of its beauty and scarcity; used as ornament or decoration; associated with honor, majesty, and glory

Localization.Gloss: 吕便之子波罕的磐石（lǚ biàn zhī zǐ bō hǎn de pán shí），《思》勒烏本人波罕的磐石。猶大和便雅憫的分界標記。Stone of Bohan the son of Reuben

Terms.Localization: a mark of division between Judah and Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 《現》蛇岩（shé yán），《和》瑣希列磐石（suǒ xī liè pán shí），《思》左赫肋特磐石。「蛇岩」：位於隱‧羅結附近的標記或地質特徵。Serpent’s Stone; Stone of Zoheleth

Terms.Localization: serpent’s stone: marker or geological feature located near En-rogel

Localization.Gloss: 以便以謝（yǐ biàn yǐ xiè），《思》厄本厄則爾。「幫助之石」：位於示羅和亞弗之間的一塊石頭，由撒母耳豎立作為紀念碑。Ebenezer

Terms.Localization: stone of help: memorial stone located between Shiloh and Aphek

Localization.Gloss: 製作陶器的輪子，拉坯輪。扁平石輪，下方有尖狀凸起物，用來插進一塊固定底石的凹口，作為轉動的軸心；陶匠使用這種輪子來製作陶器。pottery wheel

Terms.Localization: flat, horizontal wheel made of stone, with a pointed projection on the underside; this projection sat in an indentation on a stationary lower stone and served as an axis around which the upper stone turned; used by a potter for making pottery

Localization.Gloss: 產凳。埃及地所用的接生工具，由兩塊扁平的石頭組成；產婦生產時會坐或跪在其上。birthstool

Terms.Localization: set of two flat objects, made of stone and used in Egypt, on which a woman used to sit or kneel while giving birth

Localization.Gloss: 押尼珥（yā ní ěr），《思》阿貝乃爾。便雅憫人尼珥的兒子，掃羅的堂兄弟與元帥。Abner

Terms.Localization: army commander of Saul, son of Ner from the tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞別（yà bié），《思》厄貝茲。以薩迦支派屬地的城鎮之一。Ebez

Terms.Localization: town in territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 以比讚（yǐ bǐ zàn），《思》依貝贊。伯利恆人，繼耶弗他之後，擔任以色列人的士師七年。Ibzan

Terms.Localization: judge of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 亞伯拉罕（yà bó lā hǎn），《思》亞巴郎。以色列人的先祖，他拉的兒子，原名「亞伯蘭」。他生於吾珥，遷居至迦南。神重申與他所立之約時，給他改名為「亞伯拉罕」。Abraham

Terms.Localization: son of Terah; ancestor of Israel; also known as Abram

Localization.Gloss: 亞伯蘭（yà bó lán），《思》亞巴郎。以色列人的先祖，他拉的兒子，後來被神改名為「亞伯拉罕」。Abram

Terms.Localization: son of Terah; ancestor of Israel; later known as Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 押沙龍（yā shā lóng），《思》阿貝沙隆。大衞和瑪迦的兒子。Absalom

Terms.Localization: son of David

Localization.Gloss: 押沙龍（yā shā lóng），《思》阿貝沙隆。羅波安的妻子瑪迦的父親。Absalom

Terms.Localization: father of Maacah, who was wife of Rehoboam; also known as Abishalom

Localization.Gloss: 阿伯（ā bó），《思》敖波特。位於以東，在出埃及的路線上，以色列人在曠野的營地之一。Oboth

Terms.Localization: location in Edom along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 亞基（yà jī），《思》厄拉。哈拉人，大衞的勇士沙瑪的父親。Agee

Terms.Localization: father of Shammah, warrior, time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亞甲（yà jiǎ），《思》阿加格。摩西時代一亞瑪力王的名字。這個名字可能是亞瑪力君王的尊稱。Agag

Terms.Localization: man

Localization.Gloss: 亞甲（yà jiǎ），《思》阿加格。掃羅時代一亞瑪力王的名字。這個名字可能是亞瑪力君王的尊稱。Agag

Terms.Localization: king of Amalek

Localization.Gloss: 《現》亞甲人 (yà jiǎ rén)，《和》亞甲族（yà jiǎ zú）《思》阿加格人。亞甲的後裔；猶太人的仇敵哈曼所屬的民族，所指不詳。猶太傳統常將民族敵人歸為亞瑪力族一類（亞甲是亞瑪力族君王的尊稱），因此這名稱可能是指該族為猶太人的敵人。Agagite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Agag

Localization.Gloss: 核桃，堅果；杏樹。核桃樹；樹冠寛闊，葉子鮮綠色呈橢圓，好作遮陽或乘涼之用，還散發出宜人的香味；生長可供食用的堅果，果實由厚外皮包裹，這外皮可以製造一種褐色染料。walnut

Terms.Localization: walnut tree (Juglans regia); has a broad crown and fresh green oval leaves which offer welcome shade and an agreeable fragrance; produces edible nuts, covered by a thick rind which yields a brown dye; other uses include oil, tannin (for leather processing), and wood for furniture.

Localization.Gloss: 亞古珥（yà gǔ ěr），《思》阿古爾。雅基的兒子，是個智者，《箴言》的作者或輯錄者之一。Agur

Terms.Localization: a wise man, son of Jakeh

Localization.Gloss: 以基蓮（yǐ jī lián），《思》厄革拉因。摩押的城鎮之一。Eglaim

Terms.Localization: town in Moab

Localization.Gloss: 燈草，蘆葦。莖部柔軟的植物，沒有葉子，高度 1 米或以下；生在在河邊或沼澤地（有多個品種）；燃燒時產生大量煙霧；可以用來製作繩索、墊子、籃子、墻和房屋的隔離物。rush, bulrush

Terms.Localization: plant with flexible stalks, no leaves, a meter (3 feet) or less in height; grows in or by rivers and marshes (various species of Scirpus and Juncus); produces much smoke when burning; used for making rope, mats, baskets, and walls and partitions of homes

Localization.Gloss: 亞德別（yà dé bié），《思》阿德貝耳。以實瑪利的兒子。Adbeel

Terms.Localization: son of Ishmael

Localization.Gloss: 哈達（hā dá），《思》哈達得。大衞時代的以東王后裔，後來成為所羅門的敵人。Hadad

Terms.Localization: son or descendant of king of Edom; usually known as Hadad

Localization.Gloss: 易多（yì duō），《思》依多。以斯拉時期的利未支派人，迦西斐雅的首領。Iddo

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Levi; time of Ezra

Localization.Gloss: 以東（yǐ dōng），《思》厄東。民族，地；以掃及其後裔。Edom

Terms.Localization: people, land; Esau and descendants of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 以東人（yǐ dōng rén），《思》厄東人。以東的後裔或以東地的居民。Edomite

Terms.Localization: descendant or inhabitant of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 亞頓（yà dùn），《思》阿丹。巴比倫迦勒底一城鎮，首批從此地回歸耶路撒冷的人不能證明其宗族譜系是否為以色列人。Addon

Terms.Localization: town in Chaldea

Localization.Gloss: 主，主人，物主。權力在另一個人之上並作其僱主或君主的人。lord, master, owner

Terms.Localization: man who is in a position of authority over someone else as that person's legal owner, employer, or sovereign

Localization.Gloss: 亞多萊音（yà duō lái yīn），《思》阿多蘭。猶大王羅波安所修築的堅固城之一，位於希伯崙的西南方。Adoraim

Terms.Localization: town in Judah

Localization.Gloss: 巨大；大能；威武；強盛；高大；大有威力；尊貴；威嚴；壯麗；榮美。因某人或某物的美麗、巨大、力量或地位而引起驚歎、敬畏和尊敬。mighty, majestic, noble

Terms.Localization: inspiring awe and respect because of one's beauty, size, strength, or status

Localization.Gloss: 貴族；領導者；君王。做領導的人，或是在社群裡，或是在軍隊中。noble, leader, officer

Terms.Localization: person in a position of leadership, either within the community or within the army

Localization.Gloss: 亞大利雅（yà dà lì yǎ），《思》阿達里達。哈曼的兒子之一。Adalia

Terms.Localization: son of Haman

Localization.Gloss: 染紅。用漂染方式使物件變成紅色。to be dyed red

Terms.Localization: to give something a red color by dying it

Localization.Gloss: 亞當（yà dāng），《思》亞當。人類的始祖，希伯來文意思是「人類」。他是神所創造的第一個人；夏娃的丈夫，該隱、亞伯、塞特的父親。Adam

Terms.Localization: first man, husband of Eve, father of Cain, Abel, and Seth

Localization.Gloss: 亞當城（yà dāng chéng），《思》阿當城。位於約旦河附近，靠近撒拉但的一個地點；在約旦河與雅博河的交匯之處，即現代的達米耶廢丘（Telled-Dâmiyeh）。Adam

Terms.Localization: location near the river Jordan near Zarethan

Localization.Gloss: 人；人類；世人。人類，作為個體或生物的一個種類；與生命的有限性關聯。man, human; humankind; human being(s)

Terms.Localization: human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; associated with mortality

Localization.Gloss: 紅寶石；紅瑪瑙。紅色的（半）寶石，可能是紅寶石或紅瑪瑙。ruby; carnelian

Terms.Localization: (semi-)precious stone of a red color, possibly ruby or carnelian

Localization.Gloss: 押瑪（yā mǎ），《思》阿德瑪。迦南地某個平原的五座城之一，位置不詳，所多瑪和蛾摩拉也在該平原上；可能沉入今日死海的東南隅。Admah

Terms.Localization: one of the 5 cities in the plain which included Sodom and Gomorrah

Localization.Gloss: 亞大瑪（yà dà mǎ），《思》阿達瑪。拿弗他利支派的境內一堅固城鎮，位置不詳。Adamah

Terms.Localization: fortified town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 亞大米‧尼吉（yà dà mǐ-ní jí），《思》阿達米乃刻布。拿弗他利支派屬地的城鎮，位於基尼烈城的西南方，加利利湖的附近。Adami Nekeb

Terms.Localization: town in Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 《現》亞都冥隘口（yà dōu míng ài kǒu），《和》亞都冥坡（yà dōu míng pō），《思》阿杜明（山坡）。從耶路撒冷往耶利哥途中的一段陡峻的下坡道路，位於猶大支派地業的北界，便雅憫支派地業的南界。Adummim

Terms.Localization: ascent, pass; between Jerusalem and Jericho

Localization.Gloss: 押瑪他（yā mǎ tā），《思》阿德瑪達。亞哈隨魯王時代，波斯和瑪代的七個顧問之一。Admatha

Terms.Localization: adviser to Ahasuerus

Localization.Gloss: 押但（yā dàn），《思》阿丹。巴比倫迦勒底一城鎮，首批從此地回歸耶路撒冷的人不能證明其宗族譜系是否為以色列人。Addan

Terms.Localization: town in Chaldea

Localization.Gloss: 主；主人（僅指上帝）。稱呼上帝為主人和主的方式。Lord, Master (only to refer to God)

Terms.Localization: way of addressing God as one's master and lord

Localization.Gloss: 亞多尼‧比色（yà duō ní-bǐ sè），《思》阿多尼貝則克。士師時期，巴勒斯坦南部比色城的王。Adoni-Bezek

Terms.Localization: king of Bezek; time of the Judges

Localization.Gloss: 亞多尼‧洗德（yà duō ní-xǐ dé），《思》阿多尼責德克。耶路撒冷的亞摩利王，聯合四個迦南王與以色列人爭戰，被約書亞殺死。Adoni-Zedek

Terms.Localization: king of Jerusalem; time of Joshua

Localization.Gloss: 亞多尼雅（yà duō ní yǎ），《思》阿多尼雅。大衞的第四個兒子。Adonijah

Terms.Localization: son of David

Localization.Gloss: 亞多尼雅（yà duō ní yǎ），《思》阿多尼雅。被擄歸回隨同尼希米簽約遵守神律法的人之一，在以斯拉記中稱為「亞多尼干」（Adonikam）。Adonijah

Terms.Localization: man; time of Nehemiah

Localization.Gloss: 亞多尼雅（yà duō ní yǎ），《思》阿多尼雅。大衞的第四個兒子。Adonijah

Terms.Localization: son of David

Localization.Gloss: 亞多尼雅（yà duō ní yǎ），《思》阿多尼雅。利未支派人，受命於猶大王約沙法往各城去教訓百姓。Adonijah

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king Jehoshaphat

Localization.Gloss: 亞多尼干（yà duō ní gān），《思》阿多尼干。被擄歸回的猶太人族長之一。Adonikam

Terms.Localization: family head; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 亞多尼蘭（yà duō ní lán），《思》阿多尼蘭。亞比大的兒子，他是大衞、所羅門、羅波安統治期間， 在以色列王室中掌管苦役的主管。Adoniram

Terms.Localization: son of Abda; official; time of kings David, Solomon, and Rehoboam

Localization.Gloss: 亞達珥（yà dá ěr），《思》阿達爾。猶大支派屬地南方邊境的城鎮，位於別是巴的西南方，即「哈薩亞達」（Hazar-addar）。Adar

Terms.Localization: town in Judah; also known as Hazar-Addar

Localization.Gloss: 亞大（yà dà），《思》阿達爾。便雅憫支派人，便雅憫的孫子，比拉的兒子。Adar

Terms.Localization: son of Bela; tribe of Benjamin; also referred to as Ard

Localization.Gloss: 亞多蘭（yà duō lán），《思》阿多蘭。亞比大的兒子，他是大衞、所羅門、羅波安統治期間， 在以色列王室中掌管苦役的主管。「亞多尼蘭」的縮略拼寫方式。Adoram

Terms.Localization: son of Abda; official; time of kings David and Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 亞得米勒（yà dé mǐ lè），《思》阿德辣默肋客。西法瓦音人所敬拜的神。Adrammelech

Terms.Localization: god of Sepharvaim

Localization.Gloss: 亞得米勒（yà dé mǐ lè），《思》阿德辣默肋客。亞述王西拿基立的兒子，與兄弟沙利色一同殺害父親。Adrammelech

Terms.Localization: son of Sennacherib, king of Assyria

Localization.Gloss: 以得來（yǐ dé lái），《思》厄德勒。巴珊王噩住的京城，位於基列的拉末東北。後來歸瑪拿西支派。Edrei

Terms.Localization: town; Bashan, Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 以得來（yǐ dé lái），《思》厄德勒。拿弗他利支派屬地的堅固城，可能在加利利地的北部。Edrei

Terms.Localization: fortified town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 愛。感受對某人、某物或某個行為的感情。love

Terms.Localization: to experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

Localization.Gloss: 愛；愛情；喜好。對某人、某物或某個行為的感情。love

Terms.Localization: a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

Localization.Gloss: 阿轄（ā xiá），《思》敖哈得。西緬的兒子之一。Ohad

Terms.Localization: son of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 亞哈瓦（yà hā wǎ），《思》阿哈瓦。地點及河流，位於巴比倫迦勒底地區，不少被擄的猶太人居於此河的附近，確實位置不詳。Ahava

Terms.Localization: location and river; Chaldea

Localization.Gloss: 以笏（yǐ hù），《思》厄胡得。便雅憫支派人，基拉的兒子，以色列的士師（主前1316-1236年在位）。Ehud

Terms.Localization: judge of Israel (1316-1236)

Localization.Gloss: 以忽（yǐ hū），《思》厄胡得。便雅憫的後裔，比勒罕的兒子。Ehud

Terms.Localization: son of Bilhan; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 阿黑（ā hēi），《思》敖赫耳。猶大支派米書蘭的兒子，所羅巴伯的後裔。Ohel

Terms.Localization: son of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 會幕；聖幕。摩西為了與耶和華會面而搭建的聖會幕，在出33:7有所描述；用來安置約櫃和進行宗教活動，包括求問耶和華和獻祭。tent of meeting

Terms.Localization: sacred tent set up by Moses for meeting with the Lord, described in EXO 33.7; used for housing the ark of the covenant and for religious activity, including consulting the Lord and bringing offerings

Localization.Gloss: 阿荷拉（ā hé lā），《思》敖曷拉。一名女性，《以西結書》用此名象征撒瑪利亞；意思是「她的帳幕」。Oholah

Terms.Localization: woman; symbol of Samaria

Localization.Gloss: 沉香。一種珍貴的香料，沉香木分泌的濃郁樹脂；沉香木是一種高大的樹木，高度可達36米，產於東南亞及印度北部；這種芳香的樹脂可用作香料及香膏。aloes

Terms.Localization: aromatic resin, from the Aquilaria agallocha (eaglewood), a large tree which may reach a height of 36 m.; native to south-east Asia and northern India; the fragrant resin is used in incense and perfumes.

Localization.Gloss: 亞何利亞伯（yà hé lì yà bó），《思》敖曷里雅布。但支派人，亞希撒抹的兒子，被摩西差派協助比撒列建造會幕的一個工匠。Oholiab

Terms.Localization: son of Ahisamach; craftsman working on tabernacle; tribe of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 阿荷利巴（ā hé lì bā），《思》敖曷里巴。一名女性，《以西結書》用此名象征耶路撒冷；意思是「我的帳幕在她裡面」。Oholibah

Terms.Localization: woman; symbol of Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 阿何利巴瑪（ā hé lì bā mǎ），《思》敖曷里巴瑪。亞拿的女兒，以掃的妻子之一。Oholibamah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Anah; wife of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 《現》阿何利巴瑪（ā hé lì bā mǎ），《和》阿何利巴瑪／亞何利巴瑪（yà hé lì bā mǎ），《思》敖曷里巴瑪。以東的族長之一。Oholibamah

Terms.Localization: chief of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 沉香。芳香樹脂，來自沉香樹，一種高大的樹，可生長至 36 米高；原產自東南亞和印度北部；這種芳香樹脂可用作香料和香水。aloes

Terms.Localization: aromatic resin, from the Aquilaria agallocha (eaglewood), a large tree which may reach a height of 36 m.; native to south-east Asia and northern India; the fragrant resin is used in incense and perfumes.

Localization.Gloss: 亞倫（yà lún），《思》亞郎。利未支派暗蘭和約基別的兒子，摩西的哥哥，協助摩西帶領以色列人出埃及。在曠野建立會幕後，他成為以色列的首任大祭司。Aaron

Terms.Localization: brother of Moses; first high priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 烏益（wū yì），《思》約厄耳。巴尼的子孫，聽從以斯拉勸告休棄外邦妻子的以色列人之一。Uel

Terms.Localization: descendant of Bani; time of Ezra

Localization.Gloss: 靈媒，交鬼的，招魂的，通靈者。能與死人的靈魂進行溝通對話的人。spirit; necromancy, necromancer

Terms.Localization: one experienced in communication with the spirits of the dead; or, spirit of the dead

Localization.Gloss: 阿比勒（ā bǐ lè），《思》敖彼耳。以實瑪利人，大衛時期的官長之一。Obil

Terms.Localization: official; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 烏賽（wū sài），《思》烏齋。尼希米時期巴拉的父親。Uzai

Terms.Localization: father of Palal; time of Nehemiah

Localization.Gloss: 烏薩人（wū sà rén），《思》烏匝耳。約坦的兒子；閃的第五代孫烏薩及其後裔的族名。Uzal

Terms.Localization: son of Joktan; descendant of Shem

Localization.Gloss: 有禍了，禍哉；完了；糟了，慘了，哀哉。感嘆語，表達悲痛和沮喪。woe

Terms.Localization: exclamation expressing grief and dismay

Localization.Gloss: 以未（yǐ wèi），《思》厄威。米甸的五王之一。Evi

Terms.Localization: king of Midian

Localization.Gloss: 愚妄，愚昧，愚蠢；無知。愚蠢的人，因為他不敬畏上帝，不願聽取勸告，多言多語，以及不能隱藏自己的脾氣。fool

Terms.Localization: person who is regarded as foolish, because of his lack of fear of God, unwillingness to listen to advice, talking too much, and being unable to conceal his temper

Localization.Gloss: 以未‧米羅達（yǐ wèi-mǐ luó dá），《思》厄威耳默洛達客。尼布甲尼撒的兒子，巴比倫新王朝君王（公元前562-560年在位）。Evil-Merodach

Terms.Localization: king of Babylon

Localization.Gloss: 烏萊河（wū lái hé），《思》烏來河。河流；位於波斯。Ulai

Terms.Localization: river; Persia

Localization.Gloss: 愚昧，愚蠢，毫無價值，一無是處。愚蠢的，因為不敬畏上帝，不願聽取勸告，多言多語，以及不能隱藏自己的脾氣。foolish, worthless, good-for-nothing

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being foolish, because of lack of fear of God, unwillingness to listen to advice, talking too much, and being unable to conceal one's temper

Localization.Gloss: 烏蘭（wū lán），《思》烏藍。瑪拿西支派人，毗利施的兒子之一。Ulam

Terms.Localization: son of Peresh; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 烏蘭（wū lán），《思》烏藍。以設的長子，便雅憫家族的族長之一。Ulam

Terms.Localization: son of Eshek; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 愚昧；愚蠢；愚妄；愚蒙。被視為愚蠢的狀態，因為不敬畏上帝，不願聽取勸告，多言多語，以及不能隱藏自己的脾氣。foolishness, folly

Terms.Localization: state of being regarded as foolish, because of lack of fear of God, unwillingness to listen to advice, talking too much, and being unable to conceal one's temper

Localization.Gloss: 阿抹（ā mǒ），《思》敖瑪爾。以利法的兒子，以掃的孫子，以東的族長之一。Omar

Terms.Localization: son of Eliphaz, son of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 奸惡／毒害／邪惡／罪惡。極大的罪惡和道德敗壞，這是某些人的特質，表現在他們的思想、說話和行為中。mischief, evil

Terms.Localization: great wickedness and depravity, as a trait of certain human beings, which is expressed in thoughts, words, and actions

Localization.Gloss: 《現》安（城）（ān (chéng)）／希利坡里（城）（xī lì pō lǐ (chéng)），《和》安（城）（ān (chéng)）／亞文（yà wén），《思》翁（城）。埃及重要古城之一，位於現今開羅的東北。On

Terms.Localization: town; Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 安（ān），《思》翁。呂便支派比勒的兒子。On

Terms.Localization: son of Peleth; tribe of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 阿挪（ā nuó），《思》敖諾。便雅憫人沙麥所建的城鎮，位於約帕以東。Ono

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 阿南（ā nán），《思》敖南。西珥的孫子，朔巴第五子，以東地何利人的祖先。Onam

Terms.Localization: son of Shobal, son of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 阿南（ā nán），《思》敖南。猶大支派人，耶拉蔑的兒子。Onam

Terms.Localization: son of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 俄南（é nán），《思》敖難。猶大的兒子。Onan

Terms.Localization: son of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 烏法（wū fǎ），《思》敖非爾。盛產黃金之地。Uphaz

Terms.Localization: land

Localization.Gloss: 阿斐（ā fěi）／俄斐（é fěi），《思》敖非爾。閃的第五代孫，約坍的兒子及其後裔的族名和所居之地。Ophir

Terms.Localization: son of Joktan; descendant of Shem; land

Localization.Gloss: 車輪；石磙；碌碡。用來脫粒的車輪（把穀物和稻草分開）；גִּלְגַּל עֲגָלָה。cart wheel

Terms.Localization: wheel of cart used for threshing (separating the grain from the straw); גִּלְגַּל עֲגָלָה

Localization.Gloss: 吾珥（wú ěr），《思》烏爾。古代美索不達米亞南部蘇米爾的重要城市，位於幼發拉底河下游，亞伯拉罕的原居地。Ur

Terms.Localization: town; Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 吾珥（wú ěr），《思》烏爾。大衞的勇士以利法勒的父親。Ur

Terms.Localization: father of Eliphal, warrior, time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 畜欄；牛棚；羊圈。穀倉裡餵飼牲畜的地方；或：戶外飼養家畜的地方，通常是永久性的半圓形圍封區域；一般位於房子附近或裡面；אֻרְוָה。stall; animal pen

Terms.Localization: (part of a) barn where animals are fed; or, place where domesticated animals are fed outside, often a permanent semi-circular enclosure; usually located near or inside the house; אֻרְוָה

Localization.Gloss: 烏利（wū lì），《思》烏黎。猶大支派人，戶珥的兒子，比撒列的父親。Uri

Terms.Localization: father of Bezalel

Localization.Gloss: 烏利（wū lì），《思》烏黎。所羅門的官吏基別的父親。Uri

Terms.Localization: father of Geber, district governor; time of Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 烏利（wū lì），《思》烏黎。利未支派人，聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的聖殿守門者。Uri

Terms.Localization: gatekeeper; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 烏列（wū liè），《思》烏黎耳。利未支派哥轄的後裔，大衞時期一個族長，他哈的兒子。Uriel

Terms.Localization: son of Tahath; descendant of Kohath; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 烏列（wū liè），《思》烏黎耳。基比亞人，羅波安的妻子米該亞的父親。Uriel

Terms.Localization: father of Micaiah, wife of Rehoboam

Localization.Gloss: 烏利亞（wū lì yà），《思》烏黎雅。赫人，大衞忠心的勇士，拔示巴的丈夫。Uriah

Terms.Localization: Hittite; warrior; husband of Bathsheba; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 烏利亞（wū lì yà），《思》烏黎雅。猶大王亞哈斯時期的祭司。Uriah

Terms.Localization: priest; time of king Ahaz

Localization.Gloss: 烏利亞（wū lì yà），《思》烏黎雅／烏利雅。被擄歸回後的祭司，米利末的父親。Uriah

Terms.Localization: father of Meremoth, priest, after exile

Localization.Gloss: 烏利亞（wū lì yà），《思》烏黎雅。以斯拉向眾人宣讀律法時，站在他右邊的利未人。Uriah

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Levi; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 烏利亞（wū lì yà），《思》烏黎雅。示瑪雅的兒子；先知；耶利米時期的人。Uriah

Terms.Localization: son of Shemaiah; prophet; time of Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 神蹟。神明的超自然行為，由神明親自施行或由別人以他的名義施行，目的是展示他的能力和偉大。miraculous sign; miracle

Terms.Localization: supernatural act of a deity, performed by the deity himself or in his name in order to assert his power and greatness

Localization.Gloss: 旗號；標幟。代表和標識一群人的物件；形式可以是一面旗幟，或是一塊金屬板或木板，上面往往刻有圖像（如鷹或獅子）；固定在一根杆子上以便於攜帶；用於軍事和宗教場合。sign, standard, banner

Terms.Localization: object that represents and identifies a group of people; in the form of a flag or a metal or wooden board, often with an image (such as an eagle or lion); attached to a pole so that it can be carried; used in both military and religious contexts.

Localization.Gloss: 記號；證據，紀念品。物件或事件，用來提醒人某事曾經發生，或用來確認某事將會發生。sign, souvenir

Terms.Localization: object or event that is a reminder of something that has happened or a confirmation of something that is yet to happen

Localization.Gloss: 伊斯拜（yī sī bài），《思》厄次拜。大衞的勇士拿萊的父親。Ezbai

Terms.Localization: father of Naarai, warrior, time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 牛膝草。一種根部和莖部像灌木的植物，莖很硬而強韌，多分枝，枝子是毛茸茸的，高50 至 80 釐米；在猶太人的潔淨禮儀中用作刷子。hyssop, marjoram

Terms.Localization: plant with a shrub-like base and stems which are stiff, many-branched, hairy, and strong, 50-80 cm tall; Origanum syriacum or Majorana syriaca; used by the Jews in the ritual purification process as a sprinkling brush.

Localization.Gloss: 《現》象徵，《和》紀念。作為紀念或象征的部分；在壇上的所獻的素祭部分，以提醒人們一切都屬於上帝。memorial or token portion

Terms.Localization: memorial or token portion; the part of the grain offering that is burnt on the altar as a reminder that all of it belongs to the Lord

Localization.Gloss: 烏羨‧舍伊拉（wū xiàn-shè yī lā），《思》烏曾舍厄辣。以法蓮的女兒舍伊拉所建築的地方，在上伯和崙與下伯和崙附近。Uzzen-Sheerah

Terms.Localization: town; built by Sheerah, daughter of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 亞斯納‧他泊（yà sī nà-tā bó），《思》阿次諾特大博爾。拿弗他利支派屬地的城鎮之一，位於他泊山之東麓。Aznoth-Tabor

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 阿斯尼（ā sī ní），《思》敖次尼。迦得的兒子，也叫「以斯本」。Ozni

Terms.Localization: son of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 阿斯尼（族）（ā sī ní (zú)），《思》敖次尼（家族）。迦得支派阿斯尼的後裔。Oznite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Ozni; tribe of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 亞散尼（yà sàn ní），《思》阿匝尼雅。被擄歸回時期利未支派人耶書亞的父親，耶書亞是隨同尼希米簽約遵守上帝律法的人之一。Azaniah

Terms.Localization: father of Jeshua, Levite, after exile

Localization.Gloss: 本地人／當地出生、屬於該地的人。native

Terms.Localization: a person who belongs to a particular place by birth

Localization.Gloss: 以斯拉人（yǐ sī lā rén），《思》則辣黑人。猶大支派謝拉的後裔。Ezrahite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Zerah; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 豺。發出悲鳴聲的動物；比狐狸大、黃褐色像狗的野生動物，生活在廢墟和荒無人煙的地方；與死亡、破壞和毀滅關聯。jackal

Terms.Localization: howling creature that produces mournful sounds, probably the jackal (Canis aureus), a yellowish brown dog-like wild animal larger than the fox, found among ruins and in desolate areas; associated with death, destruction, and devastation

Localization.Gloss: 亞哈（yà hā），《思》阿哈布。北國以色列的君王（約公元前874/73-853年在位），暗利之子。Ahab

Terms.Localization: son of Omri; king of Israel (874/73-853)

Localization.Gloss: 亞哈（yà hā），《思》阿哈布。哥賴雅的兒子，耶利米時代的假先知，因說假預言而被耶利米譴責。Ahab

Terms.Localization: false prophet; time of Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 亞哈（yà hā），《思》阿哈布。哥賴雅的兒子，耶利米時代的假先知。Ahab

Terms.Localization: false prophet; time of Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 亞辦（yà bàn），《思》阿赫班。猶大支派人，耶拉篾的後裔，亞比述的兒子。Ahban

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》蘆葦，《和》蘆荻。生長在尼羅河沿岸、牛吃的一種草。reeds

Terms.Localization: type of grass found on the borders of the Nile, eaten by cattle

Localization.Gloss: 以忽（yǐ hū），《思》厄胡得。便雅憫支派人，乃幔、亞希亞、基拉的父親。Ehud

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞何亞（yà hé yà），《思》阿曷亞。便雅憫支派比拉的兒子。Ahoah

Terms.Localization: son of Bela; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞合人（yà hé rén）／亞哈希人（yà hā xī rén），《思》阿曷亞人。便雅憫支派亞合的後裔。Ahohite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Ahoah; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞戶買（yà hù mǎi），《思》阿胡買。猶大支派雅哈的兒子。Ahumai

Terms.Localization: son of Jahath; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亞哈斯（yà hā sī），《思》阿哈次。猶大王約坦的兒子，南國猶大的君王（約在公元前732/31-716/5年在位）。Ahaz

Terms.Localization: son of Jotam; king of Judah (732/31-716/15)

Localization.Gloss: 亞哈斯（yà hā sī），《思》阿哈茲。便雅憫支派人，掃羅王的曾孫，米迦的兒子。Ahaz

Terms.Localization: son of Micah; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞哈賽（yà hā sài），《思》阿赫齋。米實利末的兒子，亞瑪帥（馬賽）的先祖；耶路撒冷的祭司。Ahzai

Terms.Localization: son of Meshillemoth (Meshillemith); ancestor of Amashsai (Maasai), priest

Localization.Gloss: 亞哈謝（yà hā xiè），《思》阿哈齊雅。北國以色列的君王（約公元前853-852），亞哈的兒子。Ahaziah

Terms.Localization: son of Ahab; king of Israel (853-852)

Localization.Gloss: 亞哈謝（yà hā xiè），《思》阿哈齊雅。南國猶大的君王（公元前841），約蘭的兒子，是亞哈家的女婿。Ahaziah

Terms.Localization: son of Joram; king of Judah (841)

Localization.Gloss: 亞哈謝（yà hā xiè），《思》阿哈齊雅。北國以色列的君王（約公元前853-852），亞哈的兒子。Ahaziah

Terms.Localization: son of Ahab; king of Israel (853-852)

Localization.Gloss: 亞哈謝（yà hā xiè），《思》阿哈齊雅。南國猶大的君王（公元前841），約蘭的兒子，是亞哈家的女婿。Ahaziah

Terms.Localization: son of Joram; king of Judah (841)

Localization.Gloss: 亞戶撒（yà hù sā），《思》阿胡倉。猶大支派亞施戶的兒子。Ahuzzam

Terms.Localization: son of Ashhur; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亞戶撒（yà hù sā），《思》阿胡匝特。基拉耳王亞比米勒的顧問，曾與以撒訂盟。Ahuzzath

Terms.Localization: adviser to Abimelech

Localization.Gloss: 以希（yǐ xī），《思》厄希。便雅憫的兒子之一。Ehi

Terms.Localization: son of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞希（yà xī），《思》阿希。迦得支派人，押比疊的兒子。Ahi

Terms.Localization: son of Abdiel; tribe of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 亞希（yà xī），《思》的譯名在經文中沒有出現。亞設支派人，朔默的兒子。Ahi

Terms.Localization: son of Shemer; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 亞希暗（yà xī àn），《思》阿希揚。大衞的三十勇士之一，是哈拉人沙甲（沙拉）的兒子。Ahiam

Terms.Localization: son of Sachar, Sharar; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亞希亞（yà xī yà），《思》阿希雅。以利的後裔，亞希突的兒子，掃羅時代的祭司，可能是挪伯的祭司亞希米勒的別名。Ahijah

Terms.Localization: son of Ahitub; descendant of Eli; priest

Localization.Gloss: 亞希亞（yà xī yà），《思》阿希雅。示沙的兒子，所羅門的書記。Ahijah

Terms.Localization: son of Shisha; secretary of king Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 亞希雅（yà xī yǎ），《思》阿希雅。示羅的先知，預言耶羅波安將會成為十支派的君王。Ahijah

Terms.Localization: prophet; time of king Jeroboam

Localization.Gloss: 亞希雅（yà xī yǎ），《思》阿希雅。以色列王巴沙的父親。Ahijah

Terms.Localization: father of Baasha, king of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 亞希雅（yà xī yǎ），《思》阿希雅。猶大支派人，耶拉篾的兒子。Ahijah

Terms.Localization: son of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亞希亞（yà xī yà），《思》阿希雅。便雅憫支派以忽的兒子，被擄到瑪拿轄。Ahijah

Terms.Localization: son of Ehud; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞希雅（yà xī yǎ），《思》阿希雅。大衞的勇士之一。Ahijah

Terms.Localization: warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亞希雅（yà xī yǎ），《思》的譯名在經文中沒有出現。利未支派人，大衛時代掌管聖殿府庫的人。Ahijah

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亞希雅（yà xī yǎ），《思》阿希雅。被擄歸回后的以色列人首領之一，隨同尼希米簽約遵守神律法的人。Ahijah

Terms.Localization: chief; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 亞希雅（yà xī yǎ），《思》阿希雅。示羅的先知，預言耶羅波安將會成為十支派的君王。Ahijah

Terms.Localization: prophet; time of Jeroboam

Localization.Gloss: 亞希忽（yà xī hū），《思》阿希胡得。示羅米的兒子，亞設支派的首領之一。摩西揀選他協助把迦南地分給以色列人。Ahihud

Terms.Localization: son of Shelomi; chief; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 亞希約（yà xī yuē），《思》阿希約。亞比拿達的兒子，烏撒的兄弟。Ahio

Terms.Localization: son of Abinadab

Localization.Gloss: 亞希約（yà xī yuē），《思》厄耳帕耳。便雅憫支派族長比利亞的兒子，以利巴力的孫子。Ahio

Terms.Localization: son of Beria; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞希約（yà xī yuē），《思》阿希約。便雅憫支派人，耶利的後裔之一。Ahio

Terms.Localization: son of Jeiel; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞希忽（yà xī hū），《思》阿希胡得。便雅憫支派人，基拉的兒子。Ahihud

Terms.Localization: son of Gera; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞希突（yà xī tū），《思》阿希突布。利未支派人，擔任祭司的職分。以利的孫子，非尼哈的兒子，以迦博的兄弟。Ahitub

Terms.Localization: son of Phinehas; priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亞希突（yà xī tū），《思》阿希突布。亞瑪利雅的兒子，撒督的父親，亞希瑪斯的祖父；大祭司；利未支派人。Ahitub

Terms.Localization: son of Amariah; high priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亞希突（yà xī tū），《思》阿希突布。亞瑪利雅的兒子，撒督的父親，亞希瑪斯的祖父；大祭司；利未支派人。Ahitub

Terms.Localization: son of Amariah; high priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亞希突（yà xī tū），《思》阿希突布。利未支派人，擔任祭司的職分，聖殿總管希勒家的先祖。Ahitub

Terms.Localization: priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亞希律（yà xī lǜ），《思》阿希路得。大衞和所羅門的史官約沙法的父親。Ahilud

Terms.Localization: father of Jehoshapat, recorder; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 亞希律（yà xī lǜ），《思》阿希路得。所羅門時期一地區總督巴拿的父親。Ahilud

Terms.Localization: father of Baana, district governor; time of Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 亞希摩（yà xī mó），《思》阿希摩特。利未支派人，哥轄的後裔，以利加拿的兒子，撒母耳的先祖。Ahimoth

Terms.Localization: son of Elkanah; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亞希米勒（yà xī mǐ lè），《思》阿希默肋客。大衛時期挪伯的祭司，亞希突的兒子，亞比亞他的父親。Ahimelech

Terms.Localization: son of Ahitub; father of Abiathar; priest; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亞希米勒（yà xī mǐ lè），《思》阿希默肋客。赫人，大衛時期的勇士之一，大衞逃避掃羅而藏身於曠野時的同伴。Ahimelech

Terms.Localization: Hittite; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亞希米勒（yà xī mǐ lè），《思》阿希默肋客。亞比亞他的兒子，與撒督同為大衞時代的祭司。Ahimelech

Terms.Localization: son of Abiathar; priest; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亞希幔（yà xī màn），《思》阿希曼。巨人，亞衲族的三個族長之一。Ahiman

Terms.Localization: giant; descendant of Anak

Localization.Gloss: 亞希幔（yà xī màn），《思》阿希曼。被擄歸回後的利未支派人，聖殿守門者。Ahiman

Terms.Localization: gatekeeper; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 亞希瑪斯（yà xī mǎ sī），《思》阿希瑪茲。掃羅王的妻子亞希暖的父親。Ahimaaz

Terms.Localization: father of Ahinoam, wife of Saul

Localization.Gloss: 亞希瑪斯（yà xī mǎ sī），《思》阿希瑪茲。利未支派人，撒督的兒子，擔任大祭司的職分。Ahimaaz

Terms.Localization: son of Zadok; high priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亞希瑪斯（yà xī mǎ sī），《思》阿希瑪茲。所羅門時代供應王家食物的官吏之一，拿弗他利轄區總督，其妻是所羅門的女兒巴實抹。Ahimaaz

Terms.Localization: governor; time of Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 亞現（yà xiàn），《思》阿希楊。瑪拿西支派示米大的兒子。Ahian

Terms.Localization: son of Shemida; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 亞希拿達（yà xī ná dá），《思》阿希納達布。易多的兒子，所羅門時代供應王家食物的十二官吏之一，駐守瑪哈念。Ahinadab

Terms.Localization: son of Iddo; official; time of king Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 亞希暖（yà xī nuǎn），《思》阿希諾罕。亞希瑪斯的女兒，掃羅的妻子。Ahinoam

Terms.Localization: daughter of Ahimaaz; wife of Saul

Localization.Gloss: 亞希暖（yà xī nuǎn），《思》阿希諾罕。耶斯列人，大衞的妻子，暗嫩的母親。Ahinoam

Terms.Localization: wife of David; from Jezreel

Localization.Gloss: 亞希撒抹（yà xī sā mǒ），《思》阿希撒瑪客。但支派人，協助製作會幕器具的亞何利亞伯的父親。Ahisamach

Terms.Localization: father of Oholiab; tribe of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 亞希以謝（yà xī yǐ xiè），《思》阿希厄則爾。摩西時代但支派的首領，亞米沙代的兒子。Ahiezer

Terms.Localization: son of Ammishaddai; chief; tribe of Dan; time of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 亞希以謝（yà xī yǐ xiè），《思》阿希厄則耳。便雅憫支派人，大衞的勇士之一，在洗革拉投奔大衞。Ahiezer

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞希甘（yà xī gān），《思》阿希甘。沙番的兒子；約西亞王時期及以後的重要人物；被擄時期的猶大的省長基大利的父親。Ahikam

Terms.Localization: son of Shaphan; official; time of king Josiah; father of Gedaliah, governor of Judah, time of exile

Localization.Gloss: 亞希蘭（yà xī lán），《思》阿希蘭。便雅憫的兒子。Ahiram

Terms.Localization: son of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞希蘭族（yà xī lán (zú)），《思》阿希蘭家族。便雅憫的兒子亞希蘭的後裔。Ahiramite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Ahiram, son of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞希拉（yà xī lā），《思》阿希辣。拿弗他利支派的首領，以南的兒子，在摩西時代協助點算以色列人數。Ahira

Terms.Localization: son of Enan; chief; tribe of Naphtali; time of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 亞希沙哈（yà xī shā hā），《思》希沙哈爾。便雅憫支派耶疊的孫子，比勒罕的兒子，是族長和勇士。Ahishahar

Terms.Localization: son of Bilhan; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞希煞（yà xī shā），《思》阿希沙爾。所羅門時代宮內的家宰。Ahishar

Terms.Localization: official; time of king Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 亞希多弗（yà xī duō fú），《思》阿希托費耳。基羅人，大衞的謀士。Ahithophel

Terms.Localization: from Giloh; counselor of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亞黑拉（yà hēi lā），《思》阿赫拉布。亞設支派境內的一座城。Ahlab

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 亞來（yà lái），《思》阿赫來。猶大支派人，耶拉篾的後裔，示珊的兒子。Ahlai

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亞萊（yà lái），《思》阿赫來。大衞的三十勇士之一撒拔的父親。Ahlai

Terms.Localization: father of Zabad, warrior, time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 紫晶（？）； 碧玉（？）。紫色的（半）寶石。amethyst (?); jasper (?)

Terms.Localization: (semi-)precious stone of a purple color

Localization.Gloss: 亞馬他（yà mǎ tā），《思》厄克巴塔納。城鎮；在米底亞省內。Ecbatana

Terms.Localization: town; in Media

Localization.Gloss: 亞哈拜（yà hā bài），《思》阿哈斯拜。大衞的三十勇士之一瑪迦人以利法列的父親。Ahasbai

Terms.Localization: from Maacah; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亞哈拉（yà hā lā），《思》阿希蘭。便雅憫的兒子之一。Aharah

Terms.Localization: son of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞哈黑（yà hā hēi），《思》阿哈勒爾。猶大支派哈崙的兒子。Aharhel

Terms.Localization: son of Harum; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亞哈隨魯（yà hā suí lǔ），《思》薛西斯。波斯君王，娶以斯帖為王后，可能是薛西斯一世（Xerxes I，公元前485-465）。Ahasuerus, Xerxes

Terms.Localization: king of Persia

Localization.Gloss: 荆棘。帶刺植物。帶刺的灌木或小樹；懸鉤子屬。thorn, thistle, brier

Terms.Localization: bush or small tree with sharp thorns; Boxthorn Lycaeum europaeum or rubus species

Localization.Gloss: 亞麻布；線織的布；麻織的布。用亞麻莖的纖維造成的編織物料；比很多其他種類的布料更吸汗；用作床罩、船帆、祭司的衣服、帳幕的佈置、喪葬的衣服等；與質量、強韌和清爽關聯。linen

Terms.Localization: woven material made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; used for bed covers, sails of ships, garments for priests, furnishings for the tabernacle, burial clothes; associated with quality, strength, and coolness

Localization.Gloss: 亞特（yà tè），《思》阿特爾。被擄歸回時期的族長之一。Ater

Terms.Localization: family head; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 亞特（yà tè），《思》阿特爾。被擄歸回時期的族長之一，該家族負責聖殿守門的工作。Ater

Terms.Localization: family head; gatekeepers; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 豺狼或野狗。確切意思不明：與死亡、毀壞和荒廢關聯；可能是像狗一樣嚎叫的野生動物。hyena or jackal

Terms.Localization: exact meaning uncertain: animal associated with death, destruction, and devastation; probably a dog-like wild animal that howls

Localization.Gloss: 隼；鷹。一種大型猛禽，能飛得快，也能盤旋（可能包括獵鷹、鷹、較大的鷂、紅隼、蒼鷹等；比老鷹和鳶小）；以大鼠、小鼠和其他鳥類為食；屬不潔淨的動物，所以不能食用。falcon or hawk

Terms.Localization: large bird of prey that can fly fast, but also hover (probably includes falcons, hawks, the bigger harriers, kestrels, goshawks, and others: Circus aeroginosus, Falco peregrinus, Falco biarmicus, and Falco subbuteo, smaller than eagles and kites); lives on rats, mice, and other birds; unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 亞雅（yà yǎ），《思》阿雅。西珥的後裔，何利人祭便的兒子，亞拿的兄弟，負責為父親放驢。Aiah

Terms.Localization: son of Zibeon; descendant of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 愛亞（ài yà），《思》阿雅。掃羅的妃嬪利斯巴的父親。Aiah

Terms.Localization: father of Rizpah, concubine of Saul

Localization.Gloss: 約伯（yuē bó），《思》約伯。烏斯地的一個義人。Job

Terms.Localization: man

Localization.Gloss: 《現》耶洗碧（yē xĭ bì），《和》耶洗別（yē xǐ bié），《思》依則貝耳。腓尼基公主，西頓王謁巴力的女兒，北國以色列王亞哈的妻子。Jezebel

Terms.Localization: wife of king Ahab

Localization.Gloss: 以迦博（yǐ jiā bó），《思》依加波得。以利的孫子，非尼哈的兒子；祭司。Ichabod

Terms.Localization: son of Phinehas, priest

Localization.Gloss: 鹿。四腿野生反芻動物，站立時肩高約有一米高；雄鹿會長角，每年脫落一次；夏季時毛呈紅色，有白點；冬天時白點消失，毛色變深；是潔淨的動物，因此可以食用；與力量、速度和敏捷關聯；雄鹿也與性能力強關聯。fallow deer

Terms.Localization: wild ruminating mammal with four legs, standing about a meter high at the shoulder; male grows antlers, which are dropped every year; has a reddish fur with white spots during summer; during winter the white spots disappear and the coat becomes darker; Cervidae family; clean animal and can therefore be eaten; associated with strength, speed, and agility; the male is also associated with sexual prowess

Localization.Gloss: 公綿羊。雄性草食哺乳類四足動物；胖尾羊；潔淨的動物，可用來獻祭，可為人類提供肉、皮革、羊毛和角；與力量和領導能力關聯。ram

Terms.Localization: adult male herbivorous mammal with four legs; Ovis ladicaudata - fat-tailed sheep; clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, milk, hides, wool, and horns; associated with strength and leadership

Localization.Gloss: 領袖；族長；有勢力的人。做領導的人。leader, chief

Terms.Localization: person who has a position of leadership

Localization.Gloss: 松脂木；橡樹；聖樹；綠樹；樹。樹木；1- אֵלָה。terebinth

Terms.Localization: tree; 1- אֵלָה

Localization.Gloss: 側牆；入口；牆柱。從建築物的主牆突出來相對較短的牆，可以構成側房或用來固定門框；或者是與牆或通道兩旁齊平的柱子；也可能是門框的垂直組成部分（門窗邊框）。side wall; entrance; jamb

Terms.Localization: relatively short side wall projecting from the main wall of a building, either to create side chambers or to hold a door frame. Or perhaps a pillar that stands flush with the wall or with the sides of an entranceway; or the verticle part of a door frame (jamb)

Localization.Gloss: 伊勒巴蘭（yī lè bā lán），《思》厄耳帕蘭。巴蘭曠野的某地，位於阿卡巴灣的北角上。El Paran

Terms.Localization: location in the desert of Paran

Localization.Gloss: 母鹿。成年母鹿（公鹿為אַיָּל）：野生反芻四足哺乳動物，肩高約一米，在夏季皮毛呈淡紅色，有白色斑點；到了冬天，皮毛顏色變深，斑點消失；母鹿與步履穩健、生產許多後代的能力關聯。female fallow deer, doe

Terms.Localization: adult female deer (male: אַיָּל): wild ruminating four-footed mammal (Cervidae family), about a meter high at the shoulder, reddish fur with white spots in summer, in winter the coat becomes darker and the spots disappear; the female is associated with surefootedness and the ability to produce abundant offspring

Localization.Gloss: 亞雅倫（yà yǎ lún），《思》阿雅隆。利未支派哥轄族在但支派、以法蓮支派地業中所得的城鎮，位於基遍以西。Aijalon

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Dan, Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 亞雅倫（yà yǎ lún），《思》阿雅隆。西布倫地的城鎮，士師以倫葬在該處。Aijalon

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 以倫（yǐ lún），《思》厄隆。以掃的赫人妻子巴實抹的父親。Elon

Terms.Localization: father of Basmath, wife of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 以倫（yǐ lún），《思》厄隆／阿雅隆。但支派屬地的城鎮，在耶路撒冷的西北部，後來成為所羅門所設的行政區之一。Elon

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 以倫（yǐ lún），《思》厄隆。西布倫人，作以色列士師十年。Elon

Terms.Localization: judge

Localization.Gloss: 以祿（yǐ lù），《思》厄拉特。位於紅海東北尖角的北端的一座海港城市。Eloth

Terms.Localization: town; Red Sea

Localization.Gloss: 以琳（yǐ lín），《思》厄林。以色列人出埃及時安營之地，位於紅海蘇伊士灣西岸。Elim

Terms.Localization: location near Mount Sinai

Localization.Gloss: 以拉他（yǐ lā tā），《思》厄拉特。以色列人出埃及所經之地，是通往紅海的重要城市。Elath

Terms.Localization: town; Red Sea

Localization.Gloss: 驚駭，驚慌，驚惶，驚恐；懼怕；恐怖。狀態，因為真實或預料的危險。terror, dread

Terms.Localization: state of strong fear because of an actual or perceived danger

Localization.Gloss: 以米；以米人。族群；居於沙微基列亭，是摩押地的原居民。Emim, Emites

Terms.Localization: a people

Localization.Gloss: 伊以謝（yī yǐ xiè），《思》耶則爾。瑪拿西的後裔，基列的兒子。Iezer

Terms.Localization: son of Gilead; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 伊以謝（族）（yī yǐ xiè (zú)），《思》耶則爾家族。瑪拿西支派基列的兒子伊以謝的後裔。Iezrite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Iezer, son of Gilead; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 伊施波設（yī shī bō shè），《思》依市巴耳。便雅憫支派人，掃羅的兒子之一，原名「伊施巴力」。Ish-Bosheth

Terms.Localization: son of king Saul; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 伊施荷（yī shī hé），《思》依市曷得。瑪拿西支派人，基列的妹子哈摩利吉的兒子。Ishhod

Terms.Localization: son of Hammolecheth; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 耶西（yē xī），《思》葉瑟。猶大支派人，俄備得的兒子，波阿斯和路得的孫子，大衞的父親。Jesse

Terms.Localization: son of Obed; father of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以太（yǐ tài），《思》依泰。便雅憫族基比亞人利拜的兒子，大衞的勇士之一。Ithai

Terms.Localization: son of Ribai; warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 以鐵（yǐ tiě），《思》依提耳。被擄歸回時期的便雅憫支派人，耶篩亞的兒子，撒路的先祖。Ithiel

Terms.Localization: son of Jeshaiah; ancestor of Sallu, tribe of Benjamin, after exile

Localization.Gloss: 以鐵（yǐ tiě），《思》依提耳。雅基的兒子亞古珥的箴言對象。Ithiel

Terms.Localization: man

Localization.Gloss: 以他瑪（yǐ tā mǎ），《思》依塔瑪（爾）。亞倫的兒子之一，擔任祭司的聖職。從巴比倫被擄之地歸回的人中有他的後裔。Ithamar

Terms.Localization: son of Aaron; priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以探（yǐ tàn），《思》厄堂。猶大的孫子，謝拉的兒子。Ethan

Terms.Localization: son of Zerah; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以探（yǐ tàn），《思》厄堂。服事大衛的智者；謝拉的後裔，猶大支派人，智慧可與所羅門相比的四名哲士之一（詩89；王上4.31）。Ethan

Terms.Localization: wise man serving David; descendant of Zerah; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以探（yǐ tàn），《思》厄堂。利未支派人，薪瑪的兒子，亞薩的祖先。Ethan

Terms.Localization: son of Zimmah; ancestor of Asaph; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以探（yǐ tàn），《思》厄堂。大衞時代的利未家樂師，基示（古沙雅）的兒子。Ethan

Terms.Localization: son of Kishi, Kushaiah; temple singer; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亞甲（yà jiǎ），《思》阿加得。美索不達米亞的一座城。Accad

Terms.Localization: town; Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 亞革悉（yà gé xī），《思》阿革齊布。猶大支派屬地的高原城鎮之一，位於希伯崙的西北方。Achzib

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亞革悉（yà gé xī），《思》阿革齊布。亞設支派屬地的城鎮之一，位於亞柯以北。Achzib

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 亞吉（yà jí），《思》阿基士。瑪迦的兒子，迦特的王。Achish

Terms.Localization: son of Maacah; king of Gath

Localization.Gloss: 烏甲（wū jiă），《思》烏加耳。亞古珥對他說了一番話。Ucal

Terms.Localization: man

Localization.Gloss: 押煞（yā shā），《思》阿革沙夫。亞設支派屬地的城鎮之一，迦南地的古城，位於亞柯以南。Achshaph

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 上帝，神。古代閃族語系中對神的希伯來文統稱用語，這個字不是專有名詞，通常與其他字詞組合一起稱呼以色列的獨一上帝。god; God

Terms.Localization: generic term for a deity; also commonly used to denote the one God of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 至高者上帝／至高的上帝。音譯作伊勒以羅安，是上帝的稱號。El Elyon; God Most High

Terms.Localization: epithet for God

Localization.Gloss: 全能的上帝。音譯作伊勒沙代，是上帝的稱號。El Shaddai; God Almighty

Terms.Localization: epithet for God

Localization.Gloss: 以拉（yǐ lā），《思》厄拉。所羅門時代地區總督示每的父親。Ela

Terms.Localization: father of Shimei, official, time of king Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 杜松；檀香木。高大的常青樹，與香柏樹相似，生長於黎巴嫩和俄斐；提供優質的木材；又或者是紫檀。juniper tree; sandalwood

Terms.Localization: large evergreen tree, somewhat similar to cedar, Juniperus phoenicea excelsa, found both in Lebanon and Ophir; provides excellent timber; or, red sandalwood, Pterocarpus santolinus

Localization.Gloss: 伊利達（yī lì dá），《思》厄耳達得。在曠野時代，分擔摩西工作的七十位以色列長老之一。Eldad

Terms.Localization: elder of Israel; time of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 以勒大（yǐ lè dà），《思》厄耳達阿。亞伯拉罕與基土拉的子孫，米甸的兒子。Eldaah

Terms.Localization: son of Midian, son of Keturah, wife of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 詛咒；發詛起誓；用詛咒束縛。發聲請求傷害臨到某人。to curse

Terms.Localization: to utter a statement calling for harm or injury to someone

Localization.Gloss: 樹；聖樹；橡樹。樹木；אֵלָה。terebinth

Terms.Localization: tree; אֵלָה

Localization.Gloss: 詛咒。願某人受損傷的一種召喚或祈求，或這種祈求的提示物。curse

Terms.Localization: an invocation of harm or injury to someone, or a reminder of such an invocation

Localization.Gloss: 起誓。莊嚴的誓詞，證明所說或想要做的事情是真確的。oath

Terms.Localization: a solemn attestation to the truth of what one says or intends to do

Localization.Gloss: 橡樹。一種枝幹粗大，樹冠寬闊的樹木，高度達7.5米至9米，是落葉喬木，花朵細小而不顯眼；其樹幹含芳香松脂，一種樹脂汁液，當樹皮被切開便會流出來；堅果用於動物皮的染色和鞣製，烘烤後可以吃用；因其高大雄偉，人們喜歡坐在樹下遮陰乘涼；這樹與異教的敬拜有關，為古代以色列人和其他民族所崇敬，他們在橡樹林中建造神龕和祭壇，有時也在樹林中埋葬死人；3- אַיִל, אַלָּה。terebinth

Terms.Localization: tree, with a broad crown, heavy branches, and thick trunk; 7.5 to 9 m. high; sheds its leaves; has small inconspicuous flowers; Pistacia terebinthus or Pistacia atlantica; the stem contains aromatic turpentine, a resinous juice, which flows out when the bark is cut; the nuts are used for dyeing and tanning animal skins, and can be eaten if roasted; imposing tree, preferred place to sit under and enjoy the shade, associated with cultic worship, revered by ancient Israelites and other peoples, who built shrines and altars in the terebinth groves, and sometimes buried people there; 3- אַיִל, אַלָּה

Localization.Gloss: 以拉（yǐ lā），《思》厄拉。以東的族長之一。Elah

Terms.Localization: chief of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 以拉（yǐ lā），《思》厄拉。巴沙的兒子，繼承父位作以色列的君王（公元前886/85-885/84年在位）。Elah

Terms.Localization: son of Baasha; king of Israel (886/85-885/84)

Localization.Gloss: 以拉（yǐ lā），《思》厄拉。以色列最後一個國王何細亞的父親。Elah

Terms.Localization: father of Hoshea, king of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 以拉（yǐ lā），《思》厄拉。猶大支派人，迦勒的兒子，耶孚尼的孫子。Elah

Terms.Localization: son of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以拉（yǐ lā），《思》厄拉。被擄歸回時期的便雅憫支派人，烏西的兒子。Elah

Terms.Localization: son of Uzzi; tribe of Benjamin; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 神，上帝。這字原是一個複數名詞，用來泛指某個民族所敬拜的多個神明；也常常用來指稱以色列民所敬奉的獨一上帝。god; gods; God

Terms.Localization: originally a plural form, used as a generic term for the deities served by a particular people; also commonly used to denote the one God of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 上帝。指以色列的神的術語。God

Terms.Localization: term for the deity of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 神明。指任何民族的神的術語。god

Terms.Localization: term for a deity of any peoples

Localization.Gloss: 以祿（yǐ lù），《思》厄路耳。第六個月，想當於八月至九月。Elul

Terms.Localization: the sixth month, equivalent to the period Aug-Sept

Localization.Gloss: 橡樹。塔博橡木：一種高達 25 米（82 英呎）的大樹，單獨生長，也可見於叢林或森林中，冬天落葉。也指櫟樹：常綠樹，在地面分枝的大型灌木。用作地標、墓穴標記或聚集地點；迦南人認為櫟樹樹林是神聖的，經常在樹下進行宗教儀式，以色列人也受引誘照樣去做，聖經譴責這種行為是拜偶像；這種樹的特點使其適合成為各種屬性或態度的象徵。oak tree

Terms.Localization: Quercus macrolepsis: a large tree reaching height of 25 meters (82 feet); found either alone or in clumps or forests; loses leaves in winter. Also refers to Quercus calliprinos: large shrub branching at ground level, evergreen. Functioned as landmarks, grave markers, or gathering places; since its groves were considered sacred by Canaanites, ritual practices under them was always a temptation to Israelites, denounced in the texts as idolatry; their characteristics made them suitable symbols of a variety of attributes or attitudes

Localization.Gloss: 亞龍（yà lóng），《思》阿隆。西緬支派人，耶大雅的兒子。Allon

Terms.Localization: son of Jedaya; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 橡樹。塔博橡木：一種高達 25 米（82 英呎）的大樹，在 5.5 米左右開始分枝，冬天落葉；也指櫟樹：常綠樹，在地面分枝的大型灌木。用作地標、墓穴標記或聚集地點；迦南人認為櫟樹樹林是神聖的，經常在樹下進行宗教儀式，以色列人也受引誘照樣去做，聖經譴責這種行為是拜偶像；這種樹的特點使其適合成為各種屬性或態度的象徵。oak tree

Terms.Localization: Quercus macrolepsis (Tabor oak), large tree reaching height of 25 meters (82 feet), branching at around 5.5 meters, loses its leaves every winter; or, Quercus calliprinos (Kermes oak), large shrub branching at ground level, evergreen; functioned as landmarks, grave markers, or gathering places; since its groves were considered sacred by Canaanites, ritual practices under them was always a temptation to Israelites, denounced in the texts as idolatry; their characteristics made them suitable symbols of a variety of attributes or attitudes

Localization.Gloss: 以倫（yǐ lún），《思》厄隆。西布倫的兒子。Elon

Terms.Localization: son of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 《現》他泊的聖樹（tā bó de shèng shù），《和》他泊的橡樹（tā bó de xiàng shù），《思》德波辣的橡樹。撒母耳對掃羅的預言中所提及之地，位於拉瑪與基比亞之間。oak of Tabor

Terms.Localization: tree; between Ramah and Gibea

Localization.Gloss: 以倫（族）（yǐ lún (zú)），《思》厄隆家族。西布倫的兒子以倫的後裔。Elonite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Elon, son of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 母牛，牲畜之首；公牛。家養牛的總稱，包括雄性和雌性，通常是複數；用於供應奶和肉，也用於耕地；出現在描述幸福和繁榮的語境中。cow, head of cattle; ox

Terms.Localization: generic term for domesticated cattle, both male and female, always plural; used for milk and meat, and for plowing; used in contexts describing well-being and prosperity

Localization.Gloss: 亞錄（yà lù），《思》阿路士。埃及之路上的一個地點，在脫加與利非訂之間，確實的位置不詳，以色列人前往迦南地途中曾在這裡安營。Alush

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 以利薩巴（yǐ lì sà bā），《思》厄耳匝巴得。迦得支派中投奔大衞的勇士。Elzabad

Terms.Localization: warrior; tribe of Gad; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利薩巴（yǐ lì sà bā），《思》厄耳匝巴得。大衛時期，可拉族的守門人，示瑪雅的兒子。Elzabad

Terms.Localization: son of Shemaiah; gatekeeper; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 伊勒哈難（yī lè hā nán），《思》厄耳哈難。伯利恆人朵多的兒子，大衞軍中的勇士。Elhanan

Terms.Localization: warrior(s); time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利押（yǐ lì yā），《思》厄里雅布。摩西時代的西布倫支派領袖，希倫的兒子。Eliab

Terms.Localization: son of Helon; chief; tribe of Zebulun; time of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 以利押（yǐ lì yā），《思》厄里雅布。呂便支派人，大坍和亞比蘭的父親。Eliab

Terms.Localization: father of Dathan and Abiram; tribe of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 以利押（yǐ lì yā），《思》厄里雅布。猶大支派人，耶西的長子，大衞的長兄。Eliab

Terms.Localization: oldest son of Jesse; brother of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利押（yǐ lì yā），《思》厄里雅布。利未支派人，以利加拿的後裔，撒母耳的祖先。Eliab

Terms.Localization: descendant of Elkanah; grandfather of Samuel; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利押（yǐ lì yā），《思》厄里阿布。利未支派的幾個男子。Eliab

Terms.Localization: various men; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利押（yǐ lì yā），《思》厄里雅布。迦得支派人，投奔大衞的勇士之一。Eliab

Terms.Localization: warrior; tribe of Gad; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以列（yǐ liè），《思》厄里耳。瑪拿西半支派的族長之一。Eliel

Terms.Localization: family head; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 以列（yǐ liè），《思》厄里耳。利未支派人，以利加拿的後裔，陀亞的兒子，撒母耳和希幔的祖先。Eliel

Terms.Localization: descendant of Elkanah; ancestor of Samuel, Heman; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以列（yǐ liè），《思》厄里耳。便雅憫支派的族長之一，示每的兒子。Eliel

Terms.Localization: son of Shimei; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以列（yǐ liè），《思》厄里耳。便雅憫支派的族長之一，沙煞的兒子。Eliel

Terms.Localization: son of Shashak; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以利業（yǐ lì yè），《思》厄里耳。大衞軍中的幾個勇士。Eliel

Terms.Localization: various warriors; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以列（yǐ liè），《思》厄里耳。希伯崙的子孫，利未支派的族長之一。Eliel

Terms.Localization: chief; descendants of Hebron; tribe of levi

Localization.Gloss: 以列（yǐ liè），《思》厄里耳。猶大王希西家和管理神殿的亞撒利雅所委派的聖殿督理之一。Eliel

Terms.Localization: official; time of king Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞他（yǐ lì yà tā），《思》厄里雅達。希幔的兒子，大衞時期第20班次聖殿樂師的首領。Eliathah

Terms.Localization: son of Heman; temple singer; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利達（yǐ lì dá），《思》厄里達得。便雅憫支派的首領，基斯倫的兒子。Elidad

Terms.Localization: son of Chislon; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以利雅大（yǐ lì yǎ dà），《思》厄肋雅達／厄里雅達。猶大支派人，大衞在耶路撒冷所生的兒子之一。Eliada

Terms.Localization: son of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞大（yǐ lì yà dà），《思》厄肋雅達。所羅門的敵人大馬士革王利遜的父親。Eliada

Terms.Localization: father of Rezon, king of Damascus

Localization.Gloss: 以利雅大（yǐ lì yǎ dà），《思》厄肋雅達。便雅憫的後裔，約沙法王時期軍中的英勇戰士。Eliada

Terms.Localization: army commander; time of Jehoshaphat

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞（yǐ lì yà），《思》厄里亞。提斯比人，公元前9世紀北國以色列亞哈王和亞哈謝王時代的先知。Elijah

Terms.Localization: prophet; time of king Ahab

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞（yǐ lì yà），《思》厄里雅。便雅憫支派的族長之一，耶羅罕的兒子。Elijah

Terms.Localization: son of Jeroham; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以利雅（yǐ lì yǎ），《思》厄里雅。被擄歸回時期，聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的兩個人。Elijah

Terms.Localization: various men; married foreign wives; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞（yǐ lì yà），《思》厄里亞。提斯比人，公元前9世紀北國以色列亞哈王和亞哈謝王時代的先知。Elijah

Terms.Localization: prophet; time of Ahab

Localization.Gloss: 以利戶（yǐ lì hù），《思》厄里胡。利未支派的可拉族人，俄別以東的孫子，示瑪雅的兒子，負責守衞聖殿的門。Elihu

Terms.Localization: son of Shemaiah; gatekeeper; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利戶（yǐ lì hù），《思》厄里雅布。猶大支派的領袖之一，大衞的哥哥。Elihu

Terms.Localization: brother of David; chief; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利戶（yǐ lì hù），《思》厄里胡。利未支派人，以利加拿的後裔，撒母耳的曾祖父。Elihu

Terms.Localization: descendant of Elkanah; grandfather of Samuel; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利戶（yǐ lì hù），《思》厄里胡。大衛時期的勇士，瑪拿西支派人。Elihu

Terms.Localization: warrior; tribe of Manasseh; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 以利戶（yǐ lì hù），《思》厄里烏。布西人巴拉迦的兒子，約伯的朋友之一。Elihu

Terms.Localization: friend of Job

Localization.Gloss: 以利約乃（yǐ lì yuē nǎi），《思》厄肋約乃。米施利米雅的七子，大衛時期可拉族的守門人。Eliehoenai

Terms.Localization: son of Meshelemiah; gatekeeper; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利約乃（yǐ lì yuē nǎi），《思》厄里約乃。西拉希雅的兒子，被擄歸回時期的巴哈‧摩押家族領袖。Eliehoenai

Terms.Localization: son of Zerahiah; clan of Pahath-Moab; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 以利約乃（yǐ lì yuē nǎi），《思》厄里約乃。猶大支派人，所羅巴伯的後裔，尼利雅的兒子。Elioenai

Terms.Localization: descendant of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利約乃（yǐ lì yuē nǎi），《思》厄里約乃。西緬支派的族長之一。Elioenai

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 以利約乃（yǐ lì yuē nǎi），《思》厄里約乃。便雅憫支派人，比結的兒子。Elioenai

Terms.Localization: son of Becher; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以利約乃（yǐ lì yuē nǎi），《思》厄里約乃。被擄歸回時期的幾個祭司。Elioenai

Terms.Localization: various priests; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 以利約乃（yǐ lì yuē nǎi），《思》厄里約乃。薩土的子孫，聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人。Elioenai

Terms.Localization: man; time of Ezra

Localization.Gloss: 以利雅哈巴（yǐ lì yǎ hā bā），《思》厄里雅巴。沙本人，大衞王的三十勇士之一。Eliahba

Terms.Localization: from Shaalbon; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利何烈（yǐ lì hé liè），《思》厄里曷勒夫。示沙的兩個兒子之一，所羅門王的書記。Elihoreph

Terms.Localization: son of Shisha; official; time of king Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 偶像。被認為代表神明且被當做神明來敬拜的物件；與無價值和無用關聯；對外邦神明和偶像的蔑稱。idol

Terms.Localization: object that is regarded to represent a deity and worshipped as such; associated with being worthless and useless; derogatory term for pagan god, idol

Localization.Gloss: 以利米勒（yǐ lì mǐ lè），《思》厄里默肋客。來自伯利恆，士師時代猶大支派人，拿俄米的丈夫。Elimelech

Terms.Localization: man from Bethlehem; time of the Judges

Localization.Gloss: 以利雅薩（yǐ lì yǎ sà），《思》厄肋雅撒夫。摩西時期迦得支派族長，丟珥的兒子。Eliasaph

Terms.Localization: son of Deuel; chief; tribe of Gad; time of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 以利雅薩（yǐ lì yǎ sà），《思》厄肋雅撒夫。利未支派革順宗族的首領，拉伊勒的兒子。Eliasaph

Terms.Localization: man; son of Lael; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利以謝（yǐ lì yǐ xiè），《思》厄里厄則爾。大馬士革人，亞伯拉罕的奴僕。Eliezer

Terms.Localization: slave of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 以利以謝（yǐ lì yǐ xiè），《思》厄里厄則爾。摩西的兒子。Eliezer

Terms.Localization: son of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 以利以謝（yǐ lì yǐ xiè），《思》厄里厄則爾。便雅憫的孫子，比結的兒子。Eliezer

Terms.Localization: son of Becher; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以利以謝（yǐ lì yǐ xiè），《思》厄里厄則爾。大衞把約櫃搬進耶路撒冷時，在約櫃前吹號的七位祭司之一。Eliezer

Terms.Localization: priest; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 以利以謝（yǐ lì yǐ xiè），《思》厄里厄則爾。大衞時期的呂便支派領袖，細基利的兒子。Eliezer

Terms.Localization: son of Zichri; chief; tribe of Reuben; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 以利以謝（yǐ lì yǐ xiè），《思》厄里厄則爾。瑪利沙人，多大瓦的兒子，猶大王約沙法時代的先知。Eliezer

Terms.Localization: son of Dodavahu; prophet; time of king Jehoshaphat

Localization.Gloss: 以利以謝（yǐ lì yǐ xiè），《思》厄里（厄）則爾。被擄歸回時期的幾個人。(1)被以斯拉派遣去見迦西斐雅的領袖易多的眾人之一（拉8:16-17）。(2)耶書亞的子孫，聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的祭司（拉10:18）。 (3)聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的利未人（拉10:23）。 (4)哈琳的子孫，聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的人（拉10:31）。Eliezer

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 《現》以蓮（yǐ lián），《和》以連，《思》厄里安。大衛之妻拔示巴的父親。Eliam

Terms.Localization: father of Bathsheba, wife of Uriah, David

Localization.Gloss: 以連（yǐ lián），《思》厄里安。基羅人亞希多弗的兒子，大衞軍的三十勇士之一。Eliam

Terms.Localization: son of Ahitophel; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利乃（yǐ lì nǎi），《思》厄里約乃。便雅憫支派的族長之一，示每的兒子。Elienai

Terms.Localization: son of Shimei; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以利法（yǐ lì fǎ），《思》厄里法次。以掃跟亞大所生的長子，以東族的祖先。Eliphaz

Terms.Localization: son of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 以利法（yǐ lì fǎ），《思》厄里法次。提幔人，約伯的三個朋友之一。Eliphaz

Terms.Localization: Temanite; friend of Job

Localization.Gloss: 以利法勒（yǐ lì fǎ lè），《思》厄里法耳。吾珥的兒子，大衞軍中的勇士之一。Eliphal

Terms.Localization: son of Ur; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利斐利戶（yǐ lì fěi lì hù），《思》厄里斐路。大衛時期的利未支派人。Eliphelehu

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利法列（yǐ lì fǎ liè），《思》厄里培肋特。猶大支派人，大衞在耶路撒冷所生的兒子之一。Eliphelet

Terms.Localization: son of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利法列（yǐ lì fǎ liè），《思》厄里培肋特。瑪迦人亞哈拜的兒子，大衞的勇士之一。Eliphelet

Terms.Localization: warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利法列（yǐ lì fǎ liè），《思》厄里培肋特。便雅憫支派人，掃羅和約拿單的後裔，以設的兒子。Eliphelet

Terms.Localization: son of Eshek; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以利法列（yǐ lì fǎ liè），《思》厄里培肋特。以斯拉時代從被擄之地歸回巴勒斯坦的兩個人。(1)亞多尼干的子孫。(2)哈順的子孫。Eliphelet

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 以利蓿（yǐ lì sù），《思》厄里族爾。摩西時期呂便支派的族長，示丟珥的兒子。Elizur

Terms.Localization: son of Shedeur; chief; tribe of Reuben; time of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 以利撒反（yǐ lì sā fǎn），《思》厄里匝番。利未支派人，烏薛的兒子，哥轄宗族的首領。Elizaphan

Terms.Localization: son of Uzziel; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利撒番（yǐ lì sā fān），《思》厄里匝番。帕納的兒子，西布倫支派的首領。Elizaphan

Terms.Localization: son of Parnach; chief; tribe of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 以利加（yǐ lì jiā），《思》厄里卡。哈律人，大衞軍的三十勇士之一。Elika

Terms.Localization: from Harod; warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞敬（yĭ lì yà jìng），《思》厄里雅金。希勒家的兒子，猶大王希西家時期的家宰。Eliakim

Terms.Localization: son of Hilkiah; official; time of king Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》以利亞敬（yĭ lì yà jìng），《和》以利亞敬／以利雅敬（yǐ lì yǎ jìng），《思》厄里雅金。猶大王約西亞（公元前609-597年在位）的兒子，約哈斯的哥哥，法老尼哥立他為王，給他改名為約雅敬。Eliakim

Terms.Localization: son of Josiah; king of Judah (609-597)

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞金（yǐ lì yà jīn），《思》厄里雅金。被擄歸回後協助重建耶路撒冷城牆的祭司之一。Eliakim

Terms.Localization: priest; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 以利沙巴（yǐ lì shā bā），《思》厄里舍巴。亞米拿達的女兒，亞倫的妻子。Elisheba

Terms.Localization: daughter of Amminadab; wife of Aaron

Localization.Gloss: 以利沙（yǐ lì shā），《思》厄里沙。雅完的兒子，雅弗的後裔；據信，他建立了一個同名國家，該國與泰爾貿易往來。Elishah

Terms.Localization: son of Javan; descendant of Japheth; also, name of the nation Elishah was believed to have founded, which traded with Tyre

Localization.Gloss: 以利書亞（yǐ lì shū yà），《思》厄里叔亞。猶大支派人，大衞在耶路撒冷所生的兒子之一。Elishua

Terms.Localization: son of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞實（yǐ lì yà shí），《思》厄里雅史布。猶大支派人，所羅巴伯的後裔，以利約乃的兒子。Eliashib

Terms.Localization: descendant of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞實（yǐ lì yà shí），《思》厄里雅史布。大衞時代在聖殿供職的第11班次祭司首領。Eliashib

Terms.Localization: priest; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞實（yǐ lì yà shí），《思》厄里雅史布。被擄歸回後，聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的三個以色列人。Eliashib

Terms.Localization: various men; married foreign wives; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞實（yǐ lì yà shí），《思》厄肋雅史布。約哈難的父親，被擄歸回時期的大祭司。Eliashib

Terms.Localization: high priest; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 以利沙瑪（yǐ lì shā mǎ），《思》厄里沙瑪。出埃及時期以法蓮支派的首領，亞米忽的兒子，約書亞的先祖。Elishama

Terms.Localization: son of Ammihud; chief; tribe of Ephraim; ancestor of Joshua

Localization.Gloss: 《現》以利沙瑪／以利書亞（yǐ lì shā mǎ/yǐ lì shū yà），《和》以利沙瑪，《思》厄里沙瑪／里沙瑪。猶大支派人，大衞在耶路撒冷所生的兒子之一。Elishama

Terms.Localization: son of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利沙瑪（yǐ lì shā mǎ），《思》厄里沙瑪。以實瑪利的祖父。Elishama

Terms.Localization: grandfather of Ishmael

Localization.Gloss: 以利沙瑪（yǐ lì shā mǎ），《思》厄里沙瑪。猶大支派人，耶加米雅的兒子。Elishama

Terms.Localization: son of Jekamiah; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利沙瑪（yǐ lì shā mǎ），《思》厄里沙瑪。約沙法王差遣往猶大各城教訓百姓的祭司之一。Elishama

Terms.Localization: priest; time of Jehoshaphat

Localization.Gloss: 以利沙瑪（yǐ lì shā mǎ），《思》厄里沙瑪。約雅敬王時期的文士之一。Elishama

Terms.Localization: official; time of Jehoiakim

Localization.Gloss: 以利沙（yǐ lì shā），《思》厄里叟。沙法的兒子，公元前9世紀北國以色列的先知。Elisha

Terms.Localization: son of Shaphat; prophet

Localization.Gloss: 以利沙法（yǐ lì shā fǎ），《思》厄里沙法特。亞她利雅掌權時期，耶何耶大所召的百夫長之一，細基利的兒子。Elishaphat

Terms.Localization: son of Zichri; army officer; time of queen Athaliah

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞他（yǐ lì yà tā），《思》厄里雅達。希幔的兒子，大衞時期第20班次聖殿樂師的首領。Eliathah

Terms.Localization: son of Heman; temple singer; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 杜松樹；檀香樹。高大的常綠喬木，與香柏樹相似，生長於黎巴嫩和俄斐；提供優質木材；或指紫檀木。juniper tree; sandalwood

Terms.Localization: large evergreen tree, somewhat similar to cedar, Juniperus phoenicea excelsa, found both in Lebanon and Ophir; provides excellent timber; or, red sandalwood, Pterocarpus santolinus

Localization.Gloss: 禾捆。農作物收割後，莖和穗綁在一起而成的麥穗捆；捆扎所用的通常是穀物本身的莖。sheaf

Terms.Localization: bundle of harvested ears of grain made by binding together the stalks and ears of a crop; binding often done with stalks of the grain itself

Localization.Gloss: 亞摩答（yà mó dá），《思》阿耳摩達得。閃的後裔，約坍的兒子，亦可指亞摩答的後裔。Almodad

Terms.Localization: son of Joktan; descendant of Shem

Localization.Gloss: 亞拉米勒（yà lā mǐ lè），《思》阿拉默肋客。亞設支派的城鎮，位置不詳。Allammelech

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 伊利拿安（yī lì ná ān），《思》厄耳納罕。大衞兩個勇士耶利拜和約沙未雅的父親。Elnaam

Terms.Localization: father of Jeribai and Joshaviah

Localization.Gloss: 以利拿單（yǐ lì ná dān），《思》厄耳納堂。約雅敬王的妻子尼護施她的父親。Elnathan

Terms.Localization: father of Nehushta, wife of king Jehoiakim

Localization.Gloss: 以利拿單（yǐ lì ná dān），《思》厄耳納堂。亞革波的兒子，約雅敬時代的猶大官員。Elnathan

Terms.Localization: son of Achbor; official; time of king Jehoiakim

Localization.Gloss: 以利拿單（yǐ lì ná dān），《思》厄耳納堂。被擄歸回時期猶太人的三個首領。Elnathan

Terms.Localization: chief; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 以拉撒（yǐ lā sā），《思》厄拉撒爾。巴比倫尼亞地區中的一個小國，位於幼發拉底河的東岸。Ellasar

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 《現》以利（yǐ lì），《和》以列（yǐ liè），《思》厄拉得。以法蓮的兒子。Elad

Terms.Localization: son of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 以拉大（yǐ lā dà），《思》厄拉達。以法蓮支派人，他哈的兒子。Eleadah

Terms.Localization: son of Tahath; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 伊利烏賽（yī lì wū sài），《思》厄路齋。便雅憫支派人，離開掃羅後成為大衞軍的勇士。Eluzai

Terms.Localization: man; warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞撒（yǐ lì yà sā），《思》厄肋阿匝爾。亞倫的兒子，繼承亞倫大祭司的職位。Eleazar

Terms.Localization: son of Aaron; high priest

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞撒（yǐ lì yà sā），《思》厄肋阿匝爾。亞比拿達的兒子。Eleazar

Terms.Localization: man; son of Abinadab

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞撒（yǐ lì yà sā），《思》厄肋阿匝爾。朵多的兒子，大衞的三個勇士之一。Eleazar

Terms.Localization: son of Dodo, Dodai; warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞撒（yǐ lì yà sā），《思》厄肋阿匝爾。利未支派人，抹利的兒子。Eleazar

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞撒（yǐ lì yà sā），《思》厄肋阿匝爾。幾個男子。(1)非尼哈的兒子，伴着祭司米利末一同處理聖殿的金銀器皿（拉8.33）。(2)巴錄的子孫，聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人之一（拉10.25）。(3)慶祝建成耶路撒冷城牆的祭司之一（尼12.42）。Eleazar

Terms.Localization: various men

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞利（yǐ lì yà lì），《思》厄肋阿肋。迦得支派與呂便支派向摩西所求城鎮之一，亦是呂便子孫所造的堅固城之一，位於希實本的東北方。Elealeh

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞薩（yǐ lì yà sà），《思》厄拉撒。猶大支派人，耶拉篾的後裔。Eleasah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞薩（yǐ lì yà sà），《思》厄拉撒。便雅憫支派人，掃羅的後裔，拉法的兒子。Eleasah

Terms.Localization: son of Raphah; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞撒（yǐ lì yà sā），《思》厄拉撒。以斯拉時期的祭司。Eleasah

Terms.Localization: priest; time of Ezra

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞薩（yǐ lì yà sà），《思》厄拉撒。猶大王西底家的臣子，沙番的兒子。Eleasah

Terms.Localization: son of Shaphan; official; time of Zedekiah

Localization.Gloss: 牛；牲畜。馴養的牛的統稱，包括雌性和雄性，總是以複數形式出現，用作產奶和肉類，也用作耕犁；出現在描述幸福和繁榮的語境中。cow, head of cattle; ox

Terms.Localization: generic term for domesticated cattle, both male and female, always plural; used for milk and meat, and for plowing; used in contexts describing well-being and prosperity

Localization.Gloss: 以法列（yǐ fǎ liè），《思》厄里培肋特。猶大支派人，大衞在耶路撒冷所生的眾子之一。Elpelet

Terms.Localization: son of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以利巴力（yǐ lì bā lì），《思》厄耳帕耳。便雅憫支派人，沙哈連的兒子。Elpaal

Terms.Localization: son of Shaharaim; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以利巴力（yǐ lì bā lì），《思》厄耳帕耳。便雅憫支派人。Elpaal

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 以利撒反（yǐ lì sā fǎn），《思》厄里匝番。利未支派人，烏薛的兒子。Elzaphan

Terms.Localization: son of Uzziel; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利加拿（yǐ lì jiā ná），《思》厄耳卡納。利未支派人，哥轄的後裔，亞惜的兒子。Elkanah

Terms.Localization: son of Assir; descendant of Kohath; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利加拿（yǐ lì jiā ná），《思》厄耳卡納。住在以法蓮的利未支派人，耶羅罕的兒子，撒母耳的父親，哈拿的丈夫；希幔的祖先。Elkanah

Terms.Localization: son of Jeroham; father of Samuel; ancestor of Heman; tribe of Levi; lived in Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 以利加拿（yǐ lì jiā ná），《思》厄耳卡納。可拉人，大衞的勇士之一。Elkanah

Terms.Localization: warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利加拿（yǐ lì jiā ná），《思》厄耳卡納。利未支派人，可拉的後裔。Elkanah

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利加拿（yǐ lì jiā ná），《思》厄耳卡納。利未支派人，（1）亞希摩的兒子，撒母耳的先祖；（2）瑪哈的兒子，哥轄的後裔，希幔的先祖。Elkanah

Terms.Localization: son of Ahimoth, Mahath; ancestor of Samuel, Heman; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利加拿（yǐ lì jiā ná），《思》厄耳卡納。利未支派人，約珥的兒子，希幔的先祖。Elkanah

Terms.Localization: son of Joel; ancestor of Heman; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以利加拿（yǐ lì jiā ná），《思》厄耳卡納。利未支派人，比利家的祖先。Elkanah

Terms.Localization: ancestor of Berechiah, Levite

Localization.Gloss: 以利加拿（yǐ lì jiā ná），《思》厄耳卡納。大衛時期利未支派人，負責看守約櫃。Elkanah

Terms.Localization: carrier of the ark of the covenant; tribe of Levi; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以利加拿（yǐ lì jiā ná），《思》厄耳卡納。猶大王亞哈斯的宰相。Elkanah

Terms.Localization: second in command to king Ahaz

Localization.Gloss: 伊勒歌斯人（yī lè gē sī rén），《思》厄耳科士人。伊勒歌斯的居民；伊勒歌斯是先知那鴻的家鄉，位置不詳。Elkoshite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Elkosh

Localization.Gloss: 伊勒多臘（yī lè duō là）／伊利多拉（yī lì duō lā），《思》厄耳托拉得。西緬支派自猶大支派屬地中所取得的一座城，位置不詳。Eltolad

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 伊利提基（yī lì tí jī），《思》厄耳特刻。但支派屬地的城鎮，後分給利未支派哥轄族為業。Eltekeh

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 伊勒提君（yī lè tí jūn），《思》厄耳特孔。猶大支派屬地的城鎮，位於伯利恆以西。Eltekon

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亞瑪（山）（yà mǎ (shān)），《思》阿瑪（山崗）。約押追趕押尼珥所到之山，在基遍的附近，位置不詳。Ammah

Terms.Localization: hill

Localization.Gloss: 女奴；女僕，使女，婢女；宮女。女性，屬於某人的合法財產；已婚的或有資格結婚的；她的兒女屬於她的主人slave, handmaid

Terms.Localization: woman who is the legal property of someone else; either married or eligible for marriage; her children belong to the person who owns her

Localization.Gloss: 亞們（yà mén），《思》阿孟。猶大王（公元前643/42-641/40年在位），瑪拿西的兒子。Amon

Terms.Localization: son of Manasseh; king of Judah (643/42-641/40)

Localization.Gloss: 亞們（yà mén），《思》阿孟。以色列王亞哈時期，撒瑪利亞的邑宰。Amon

Terms.Localization: governor of Samaria; time of Ahab

Localization.Gloss: 《現》亞捫（yà mén），《和》亞們（yà mén），《思》阿孟。所羅門僕人後裔的家族領袖，從被擄之地回歸巴勒斯坦。Amon

Terms.Localization: family head; servants of Solomon; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 亞捫（yà mén），《思》阿孟。埃及的太陽神明， 源於底比斯的地方神明。Amon

Terms.Localization: Egyptian deity

Localization.Gloss: 忠誠；誠實；忠信的人。忠誠的品質，或具有這種品質的人。faithfulness; truth; faithful person

Terms.Localization: the quality of faithfulness, or person who has that quality

Localization.Gloss: 穩重；信實；信任。堅定、穩定、值得信賴的品質。steadiness; faithfulness; trust

Terms.Localization: the quality of being firm, steady, trustworthy

Localization.Gloss: 亞摩斯（yà mó sī），《思》阿摩茲。先知以賽亞的父親。Amoz

Terms.Localization: father of prophet Isaiah

Localization.Gloss: 亞米（yà mǐ），《思》阿米。所羅門僕人的家族後裔領袖，跟隨所羅巴伯回猶大，另稱為「亞們」。Ami

Terms.Localization: family head; servant to Solomon; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 暗嫩（àn nèn），《思》阿默農。大衞的長子，耶斯列人亞希暖所生。Amnon

Terms.Localization: son of David

Localization.Gloss: 亞曼（yà màn），《思》阿曼。猶大支派屬地南邊的城鎮之一，可能是在南地。Amam

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: Niphal（單純被動式）：堅固，穩妥；忠誠，堅定，可靠，值得信賴。具有穩定、可靠或持久的品質。Niphal: be firm, well-established; be loyal, steadfast, reliable, trustworthy

Terms.Localization: have the quality of being stable or trustworthy or long-lasting

Localization.Gloss: Hiphil（使役主動式）：相信，信靠。認為某人或某事是值得信賴的。Hiphil: believe in, trust

Terms.Localization: think someone/thing is trustworthy

Localization.Gloss: 《現》是的／阿們／但願如此，《和》阿們。鄭重地表示同意或確認的一個表達式。surely!, amen!

Terms.Localization: solemn formula expressing agreement or affirmation

Localization.Gloss: 忠信，誠實，可靠。神明被視為值得信任的狀態，因為他們可靠和盡職，性格堅定，這反映在他們的行為上。faithfulness, trustworthiness

Terms.Localization: state whereby deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their actions

Localization.Gloss: 亞罷拿（yà bà ná），《思》阿巴納。敘利亞境內流經大馬色的主要河流之一，可能即今天的巴拉達河。Amanah

Terms.Localization: river; Syria

Localization.Gloss: 亞瑪拿（yà mǎ ná），《思》阿瑪納山巔。位於黎巴嫩的一座山。Amanah

Terms.Localization: mountain; Lebanon

Localization.Gloss: 暗嫩（àn nèn），《思》阿默農。大衞的長子，耶斯列人亞希暖所生。Amnon

Terms.Localization: son of David

Localization.Gloss: 暗嫩（àn nèn），《思》阿默農。猶大支派示門的兒子。Amnon

Terms.Localization: son of Shimon; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 暗西（àn xī），《思》阿默漆。利未支派米拉利的後裔，巴尼的兒子，以探的先祖。Amzi

Terms.Localization: son of Bani; ancestor of Ethan; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 暗洗（àn xǐ），《思》阿默漆。利未支派人，撒迦利亞的兒子，亞大雅的先祖，擔任祭司的職分。Amzi

Terms.Localization: son of Zechariah; ancestor of Adaiah, priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亞瑪謝（yà mǎ xiè），《思》阿瑪責雅。猶大王（公元前796-767），約阿施的兒子，25歲登位。Amaziah

Terms.Localization: son of Joash; king of Judah (796-767)

Localization.Gloss: 亞瑪謝（yà mǎ xiè），《思》阿瑪責雅。西緬支派人，約沙的父親。Amaziah

Terms.Localization: father of Joshah; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 亞瑪謝（yà mǎ xiè），《思》阿瑪責雅。利未支派人，米拉利的後裔，希勒家的兒子，以探的先祖。Amaziah

Terms.Localization: son of Hilkiah; ancestor of Ethan; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亞瑪謝（yà mǎ xiè），《思》阿瑪責雅。先知阿摩司時期伯特利的祭司。他可能不屬於利未支派，但被耶羅波安立為祭司。Amaziah

Terms.Localization: priest of Bethel; time of prophet Amos

Localization.Gloss: 亞瑪謝（yà mǎ xiè），《思》阿瑪責雅。猶大王（公元前796-767），約阿施的兒子，25歲登位。Amaziah

Terms.Localization: son of Joash; king of Judah (796-767)

Localization.Gloss: 小綿羊／綿羊羔。幼小的綿羊；用作祭品。lamb

Terms.Localization: a young sheep; used as sacrifice

Localization.Gloss: 音麥（yīn mài），《思》依默爾。瑪賽、亞瑪帥的先祖；祭司。Immer

Terms.Localization: ancestor of Maasai, Amashsai, priest

Localization.Gloss: 音麥（yīn mài），《思》依默爾。大衞時代在聖殿供職的第16班次祭司首領。Immer

Terms.Localization: priest; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 音麥（yīn mài），《思》依默爾。被擄歸回的族長之一。Immer

Terms.Localization: family head; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 音麥（yīn mài），《思》依默爾。地點。Immer

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 音麥（yīn mài），《思》依默爾。耶利米時代聖殿的總管巴施戶珥的父親。Immer

Terms.Localization: father of Pashhur, priest

Localization.Gloss: 音利（yīn lì），《思》依默黎。猶大支派人，巴尼的兒子，烏太的先祖。Imri

Terms.Localization: son of Bani; ancestor of Uthai; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 音利（yīn lì），《思》依默黎。協助尼希米建造城牆的撒刻的父親。Imri

Terms.Localization: father of Zaccur; wall repairer; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 亞摩利人（yà mó lì rén），《思》阿摩黎人。迦南之子亞摩利的後裔。Amorite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Canaan

Localization.Gloss: 亞瑪利雅（yà mǎ lì yǎ），《思》阿瑪黎雅。利未支派人，亞倫第三子以利亞撒的後裔，米拉約的兒子，撒督的祖父；擔任大祭司的職分。Amariah

Terms.Localization: son of Meraioth; high priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亞瑪利雅（yà mǎ lì yǎ），《思》阿瑪黎雅。利未支派人，亞倫第三子以利亞撒的後裔，亞撒利雅的兒子；擔任大祭司的職分。Amariah

Terms.Localization: son of Azariah; high priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亞瑪利亞（yà mǎ lì yà），《思》阿瑪黎雅。大衛時代的利未支派人，哥轄的孫子，希伯倫的兒子。Amariah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Hebron; tribe of Levi; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亞瑪利雅（yà mǎ lì yǎ），《思》阿瑪黎雅。被擄歸回時期的兩個以色列人。（1）聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人。（2）約雅金時期的祭司，隨同尼希米簽約遵守神的律法，並與所羅巴伯一同歸回耶路撒冷。Amariah

Terms.Localization: man; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 亞瑪利雅（yà mǎ lì yǎ），《思》阿瑪黎雅。被擄歸回的猶大支派人，法勒斯的後裔，示法提雅的兒子。Amariah

Terms.Localization: son of Shephatiah; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 亞瑪利雅（yà mǎ lì yǎ），《思》阿瑪黎雅。希西家的兒子，先知西番雅的先祖。Amariah

Terms.Localization: son of Hezekiah; ancestor of prophet Zephaniah

Localization.Gloss: 亞瑪利亞（yà mǎ lì yà），《思》阿瑪黎雅。利未支派人，哥轄的孫子，希伯倫的兒子。Amariah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Izhar; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亞瑪利雅（yà mǎ lì yǎ），《思》阿瑪黎雅。利未支派人，約沙法時期的大祭司，管理一切屬神的事。Amariah

Terms.Localization: high priest; tribe of Levi; time of Jehoshaphat

Localization.Gloss: 亞瑪利雅（yà mǎ lì yǎ），《思》阿瑪黎雅。利未支派人，希西家時期的祭司。Amariah

Terms.Localization: priest; tribe of Levi; time of Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 暗拉非（àn lā fēi），《思》阿默辣斐耳。示拿王，聯同以拉撒王亞略、以攔王基大老瑪、戈印王提達攻擊所多瑪等城，引致四王與五王交戰。Amraphel

Terms.Localization: king of Shinar

Localization.Gloss: 真實；忠誠。人類和神明被視為值得信任的狀態，因為他們可靠和盡職，性格堅定，這反映在他們的言語和行為上。truth, faithfulness

Terms.Localization: state whereby humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions

Localization.Gloss: 袋子，口袋，布袋。比較大的袋子，用皮革或布料製成，用來貯藏及運送食物和穀物。bag, sack

Terms.Localization: large bag, made of leather or cloth, used for storing and transporting food or grain

Localization.Gloss: 亞米太（yà mǐ tài），《思》阿米泰。迦特希弗人，先知約拿的父親。Amittai

Terms.Localization: father of prophet Jonah

Localization.Gloss: 以挪士（yǐ nuó shì），《思》厄諾士。塞特的兒子，該南的父親。Enosh

Terms.Localization: son of Seth

Localization.Gloss: 亞拿哈拉（yà ná hā lā），《思》阿納哈辣特。以薩迦支派屬地的城鎮之一，位置不詳，可能是在伯善以北的附近。Anaharath

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 阿尼安（ā ní ān），《思》阿尼罕。瑪拿西支派示米大的兒子。Aniam

Terms.Localization: son of Shemida; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 《現》鉛垂線，《和》準繩。繩子的一端繫有重物，建築工人用它來測量一堵墻是否垂直的工具。常用來比喻道德和倫理標準。plumb line

Terms.Localization: a weight suspended on the end of a string, used by builders to determine whether a wall was straight or not; often used in a figurative sense in the context of moral and ethical standards

Localization.Gloss: 鷺，鷺鷥，蒼鷺。體形頗大的雀鳥，有長頸、長嘴，和長腿；或指任何長著突出的喙的水鳥，包括蒼鷺、朱鷺、白鷺、池鷺和琵鷺；牠們站立或緩慢行走於河流、堤壩、池塘，或湖泊的淺水區，會用極快的動作把頭插進水裡，捕捉小魚；牠們飛行時拍打翅膀的速度很慢；屬於不潔的動物。heron

Terms.Localization: fairly large water bird with a long neck, long beak, and long legs (Ardea family); or any waterside bird with a prominent beak, including not only heron but also ibis, egret, and perhaps bittern and spoonbill; stands or walks slowly in shallow water in rivers or ponds looking for small fish, which it catches by suddenly darting its head into the water; flies with slow wing-beats; unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 壁虎。小型蜥蜴，身長約為 10 公分（4 英吋），腳趾末端有爪墊和小毛，讓牠可以在房頂和懸樑上倒立爬行；是唯一會發聲的蜥蜴；以昆蟲為食；地中海壁虎或各種壁虎的總稱；有些品種經常出現在建築物內；是不潔淨的動物，因此不可吃。gecko
