Localization.Gloss: 雅憫（族）（yǎ mǐn (zú)），《思》雅明家族。西緬的兒子雅憫的後裔。Jaminite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jamin, son of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 《現》便雅憫(支族) （biàn yă mĭn (zhī zú)），《和》便雅憫人，《思》本雅明族人／本雅明支派。便雅憫支派的成員。Benjaminite

Terms.Localization: member of tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 音拉（yīn lā），《思》依默拉。亞哈王時期先知米該雅的父親。Imlah

Terms.Localization: father of Micaiah, prophet, time of king Ahab

Localization.Gloss: 雅米勒（yǎ mǐ lè），《思》雅默肋客。西緬支派的族長之一。Jamlek

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 音拿（yīn ná），《思》依默納。亞設的兒子。Imnah

Terms.Localization: son of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 音拿（yīn ná），《思》依默納。利未支派人，可利的父親，在希西家時代負責守聖殿的東門。Imnah

Terms.Localization: father of Korah; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 音拿（yīn ná）／音拿（宗）族（yīn ná (zōng) zú），《思》依默納／依默納家族。亞設的兒子音拿的後裔。Imnite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Imnah, son of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 《現》音拿（yīn ná），《和》音那（yīn nà），《思》依默納。亞設的後裔，希連的兒子。Imna

Terms.Localization: son of Helem; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 音拉（yīn lā），《思》依默辣。亞設的後裔，瑣法的兒子。Imrah

Terms.Localization: son of Zophah; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 雅挪哈（yǎ nuó hā），《思》雅諾亞。以法蓮支派和瑪拿西支派地業的邊界，位於示劍的東南方。Janoah

Terms.Localization: town; at boundary between territories of Ephraim and Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 亞挪（yà nuó），《思》雅諾亞。亞設支派地業的城鎮之一，位於亞柯的東北。Janoah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 雅農（yǎ nóng），《思》雅農。猶大支派屬地的山地城鎮之一，位置不詳。Janum

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 貓頭鷹。確切意思不明；可能指：貓頭鷹的一種，有灰棕色的斑紋；眼睛周圍呈淺色，因此看上去像戴了眼鏡；喜愛樹木繁茂的地區或果園，在樹幹附近棲息；不潔淨，因此不可食用。tawny owl

Terms.Localization: exact meaning unknown; possibly: type of owl with a mottled gray-brown color; its eyes are outlined with pale circles, so that it looks as though it is wearing spectacles; it prefers wooded areas or orchards and roosts close to the trunk of a tree; Strix aluco; unclean animal, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 亦迦（yì jiā），《思》依色加。哈蘭的女兒之一，密迦的姐妹。Iscah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Haran; sister of Milcah

Localization.Gloss: 伊斯瑪基雅（yī sī mǎ jī yǎ），《思》依斯瑪基雅。猶大王希西家所委派的聖殿督理之一，利未支派人。Ismachiah

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 雅比斯（yǎ bǐ sī），《思》雅貝茲。眾文士居住之地，可能是在猶大的伯利恆附近，位置不詳。Jabez

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 雅比斯（yǎ bǐ sī），《思》雅貝茲。猶大支派的族長之一。Jabez

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 易多（yì duō），《思》依多。記錄列王事蹟的先知。Iddo

Terms.Localization: seer

Localization.Gloss: 耶烏利（yē wū lì），《思》耶烏耳。被擄歸回之後的猶大支派人，謝拉的子孫。Jeuel

Terms.Localization: descendant of Zerah; tribe of Judah; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 耶烏斯（yē wū sī），《思》耶烏茲。便雅憫支派的族長之一，沙哈連和賀得的兒子。Jeuz

Terms.Localization: son of Shaharaim; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 耶烏施（yē wū shī），《思》耶烏士。以掃和阿何利巴瑪的兒子。Jeush

Terms.Localization: son of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 耶烏施（yē wū shī），《思》耶烏士。便雅憫支派比勒罕的兒子。Jeush

Terms.Localization: son of Bilhan; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 耶烏施（yē wū shī），《思》耶烏士。便雅憫支派以設的次子，掃羅的後裔。Jeush

Terms.Localization: son of Eshek; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 耶烏施（yē wū shī），《思》耶烏士。利未支派人，革順的後裔，示每的兒子。Jeush

Terms.Localization: son of Shimei; descendant of Gershon; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 耶烏施（yē wū shī），《思》耶烏士。猶大王羅波安的兒子。Jeush

Terms.Localization: son of Rehoboam

Localization.Gloss: 雅薛（yǎ xuē），《思》雅阿齊耳。大衞時期奏樂的利未人之一。Jaaziel

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 雅西雅（yǎ xī yǎ），《思》雅哈齊雅。利未支派米拉利的後裔。Jaaziah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Merari; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 雅謝（yǎ xiè），《思》雅則爾。利未支派從迦得支派所取得的城鎮，位於希實本以北之地。Jazer

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 耶利（yē lì），《思》耶厄耳。呂便支派的族長之一。Jeiel

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 耶利（yē lì），《思》耶依耳。基遍的創建者。Jeiel

Terms.Localization: founder of Gibeon

Localization.Gloss: 耶利（yē lì），《思》耶厄耳。亞羅珥人何坦的兒子，大衞的勇士之一。Jeiel

Terms.Localization: son of Hotham; from Aroer; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 耶利（yē lì），《思》耶依耳／耶希耳。大衛時期，利未支派負責在約櫃前事奉的其中一人。Jeiel

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 耶利（yē lì），《思》耶依耳。大衛時期，利未支派負責在約櫃前事奉的其中一人。Jeiel

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 耶利（yē lì），《思》耶依耳。利未支派人，瑪探雅的兒子。Jeiel

Terms.Localization: son of Mattaniah; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 耶利（yē lì），《思》耶依耳。猶大王烏西雅的書記。Jeiel

Terms.Localization: secretary; time of Uzziah

Localization.Gloss: 耶利（yē lì），《思》耶烏耳。希西家時期，利未支派以利撒反的子孫。Jeiel

Terms.Localization: descendant of Elizaphan; tribe of Levi; time of Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 耶利（yē lì），《思》耶依耳。約西亞時期利未人的族長之一。Jeiel

Terms.Localization: chief of tribe of Levi; time of Josiah

Localization.Gloss: 耶利（yē lì），《思》耶依耳。以斯拉時期亞多尼干的子孫。Jeiel

Terms.Localization: descendant of Adonikam; time of Ezra

Localization.Gloss: 耶利（yē lì），《思》耶依耳。尼波的子孫，聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人之一。Jeiel

Terms.Localization: descendant of Nebo; time of Ezra

Localization.Gloss: 睚珥（yá ěr），《思》雅依爾。大衛的勇士伊勒哈難的父親。Jair

Terms.Localization: father of Elhanan, warrior, time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 雅干（yǎ gān），《思》雅甘。迦得的子孫，亞比孩的兒子。Jakan

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 雅億（yǎ yì），《思》雅厄耳。士師時期基尼人希百的妻子。Jael

Terms.Localization: wife of Heber, Kenite; time of the Judges

Localization.Gloss: 野山羊／母鹿。體型頗大的野生山羊，成年羊的肩膀大約高 90 厘米；全年大部分時間都是灰色，冬天時轉為褐色；雄性羊有粗大的角，超過 130 厘米長，向後方作半圓狀彎曲延伸；雌性羊的角纖幼和短小得多，只生長至大約 40 厘米長；角的表面只有最後數厘米是平滑的，其餘都有凹凸不平的環紋；群居動物，每群為數不多，住在山上，並且喜愛懸崖和峭壁，在那裡牠們靠進食生長在崖壁突出部分的矮灌木為生；屬潔淨動物，可供人食用。ibex, wild goat

Terms.Localization: fairly large wild goat; adult reaches about 90 cm at the shoulder; most of the year its color is grayish but turns browner in winter; male has thick long horns over 130 cm in length which curve backwards in a semicircle; female's horns are about 40 cm long; last few centimeters of the horns are smooth, the rest are ringed with ridges; lives in small herds in the mountains and prefers cliffs and crags, where it lives off the bushes that grow on the ledges; clean animal, may be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 雅拉（yǎ lā），《思》雅阿拉。跟隨所羅巴伯返回猶大的所羅門僕人的家族族長之一。Jaala

Terms.Localization: family head; servants of Solomon; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 雅拉（yǎ lā），《思》雅阿拉。跟隨所羅巴伯返回猶大的所羅門僕人的家族族長之一。Jaalah

Terms.Localization: family head; servants of Solomon; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 雅蘭（yǎ lán），《思》雅藍。以掃在迦南地生的兒子之一，雅蘭族的族長。Jalam

Terms.Localization: son of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 鴕鳥。大型鳥類，雙翼不發達，因而不能飛；脖子和雙腳很長，約 2 米高；雄鳥的身體呈黑色，翅膀上有白色的長羽毛；雌鳥呈灰棕色；主要吃種子、落果，和嫩芽，有時也吃蜥蜴、青蛙；它們以二十隻左右的小群生活；與殘忍無情有關，因為大多數雌鳥不孵化自己下的蛋，也不照顧幼鳥。ostrich

Terms.Localization: large bird with underdeveloped wings so that it cannot fly; long neck and legs; about 2 m tall; male's body is black with long white feathers on its wings; females are a uniform grayish brown; feeds mainly on seeds, fallen fruit, and shoots, occasionally lizards or frogs; lives in small flocks of about twenty; Struthio camelus; associated with heartless cruelty because most females do not hatch their own eggs and do not take care of their own young

Localization.Gloss: 雅乃（yǎ nǎi），《思》雅乃。迦得支派的一個男子。Janai

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 雅各（yǎ gè），《思》雅各伯。以撒的兒子；在詩歌文本中，長被用來指所有以色列人。Jacob

Terms.Localization: son of Isaac; people

Localization.Gloss: 雅哥巴（yǎ gē bā），《思》雅科巴。西緬人的族長之一。Jaakobah

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 亞干（yà gàn），《思》阿甘。西珥的後裔。Jaakan

Terms.Localization: descendant of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 雅拉（yǎ lā），《思》約阿達。便雅憫支派人，掃羅的後裔，亞哈斯的兒子。Jarah

Terms.Localization: son of Ahaz; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 《現》睚珥（yá ěr），《和》雅雷（yǎ léi），雅雷俄珥金（yǎ léi é ěr jīn），《思》雅依爾。大衛王時期的勇士伊勒哈難的父親。Jaare-Oregim

Terms.Localization: father of Elhanan, warrior, time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 雅利西（yǎ lì xī），《思》雅勒舍雅。便雅憫支派耶羅罕的兒子，住在耶路撒冷的族長。Jaareshiah

Terms.Localization: son of Jeroham; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 雅掃（yǎ sǎo），《思》雅阿掃。娶了外邦女子為妻；被擄歸回時期的人物。Jaasu

Terms.Localization: man; married a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 雅西業（yǎ xī yè），《思》雅息耳。米瑣八人，大衞的勇士之一。Jaasiel

Terms.Localization: warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 雅西業（yǎ xī yè），《思》雅息耳。便雅憫支派人，押尼珥的兒子，大衞的勇士之一。Jaasiel

Terms.Localization: son of Abner; chief; tribe of Benjamin; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 伊弗底雅（yī fú dǐ yǎ），《思》依費德雅。沙煞的兒子；家族族長；屬便雅憫支派。Iphdeiah

Terms.Localization: son of Shashak; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 約帕（yuē pà），《思》約培。地中海岸的一座古城，是世界上最古老的海港，位於耶路撒冷的西北方，屬於但支派的城鎮。Joppa

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 雅非亞（yǎ fēi yà），《思》雅非亞。拉吉王；約書亞時期的人物。Japhia

Terms.Localization: king of Lachish; time of Joshua

Localization.Gloss: 雅非亞（yǎ fēi yà），《思》雅非亞。城鎮；在西布倫境內。Japhia

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Zebulon

Localization.Gloss: 雅非亞（yǎ fēi yà），《思》雅非亞。大衛的兒子；屬猶大支派。Japhia

Terms.Localization: son of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 雅弗勒（yǎ fú lè），《思》雅費肋特。亞設的後裔，希別的兒子。Japhlet

Terms.Localization: son of Heber; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 押利提人（yā lì tí rén），《思》雅費肋提人。亞設支派人，希別的兒子雅弗勒的後裔。Japhletite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Japhlet, son of Heber; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 耶孚尼（yē fú ní），《思》耶孚乃。猶大支派的族長迦勒的父親。Jephunneh

Terms.Localization: father of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 耶孚尼（yē fú ní），《思》耶孚乃。亞設支派益帖的兒子。Jephunneh

Terms.Localization: son of Jether; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 雅弗（yǎ fú），《思》耶斐特。挪亞的兒子。Japheth

Terms.Localization: son of Noah

Localization.Gloss: 益弗他（yì fú tā），《思》依弗達。猶大支派地業的高原城鎮之一，位於希伯崙的西北方。Iphthah, Jephthah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 耶弗他（yē fú tā），《思》依弗大。以色列的士師之一，基列的兒子。Iphthah, Jephthah

Terms.Localization: judge of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 帶領。字面意思：出去和進來，出入；因此解作：帶領。to lead

Terms.Localization: literally: to go out and come in; hence: to lead

Localization.Gloss: 《現》橄欖油，《和》油。從第一次壓榨橄欖果時提取的高品質油；用作食物，也在多種宗教儀式中使用。oil

Terms.Localization: high quality oil, extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; used as food and in various religious rituals

Localization.Gloss: 以斯哈（yǐ sī hā），《思》依茲哈爾。利未支派哥轄的兒子。Izhar

Terms.Localization: son of Kohath; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以斯哈族（yǐ sī hā zú）／以斯哈後代／以斯哈的子孫，《思》依茲哈爾（族）／依茲哈爾的子孫。利未支派哥轄的兒子以斯哈的後裔。Izharite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Izhar; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 以撒（yǐ sā），《思》依撒格。亞伯拉罕的兒子，以掃和雅各的父親。Isaac

Terms.Localization: son of Abraham; father of Jacob

Localization.Gloss: 耶色（yē sè），《思》耶則爾。拿弗他利的兒子之一。Jezer

Terms.Localization: son of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 窯匠／瓦器。用黏土製作陶器等物件的人；與創造和中介有關。potter

Terms.Localization: a craftsperson who makes objects, usually containers, out of clay; associated with creation and agency

Localization.Gloss: 耶色宗族（yē sè zōng zú），《思》耶則爾家族。拿弗他利的兒子之一耶色的後代。Jezerite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jezer, son of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 《現》西利（xī lì），《和》伊洗利（yī xĭ lì），《思》依責黎。利未支派人，聖殿樂師的第四班次首領。Izri

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 《現》醡槽／壓酒池／酒桶，《和》酒醡／酒池。一種大容器；通常從石頭鑿出來，是酒醡的一部分；葡萄汁會被收集在這些醡槽裡。vat (of winepress)

Terms.Localization: large container; normally hewn out of stone and part of a winepress; where the grape juice is collected

Localization.Gloss: 酒醡／壓酒池／醡酒池。一個大盆，從石頭鑿出，或塗上灰泥，然後把收穫的葡萄倒進去踩壓出汁液，汁液從盆裡流入槽或桶；踩葡萄常用來形容上帝的忿怒和懲罰。winepress

Terms.Localization: basin; hewn out of a rock or lined with plaster into which harvested grapes were thrown and trampled to squeeze out the juice, which from there flowed into a trough or vat; treading a winepress is often used as a figure of speech to refer to God's anger and punishment

Localization.Gloss: 葉甲薛（yè jiǎ xuē），《思》卡貝責耳。猶大人回歸建殿之後，所居城鎮之一，位於別是巴的東北。Jekabzeel

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 約甸（yuē diàn），《思》約刻德罕。猶大支派的山地城鎮之一，位於希伯崙以南。Jokdeam

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 雅基（yǎ jī），《思》雅刻。哲人亞古珥的父親。Jakeh

Terms.Localization: father of Agur, wise man

Localization.Gloss: 《現》獵人／捕鳥人，《和》捕鳥人。以捕捉野獸和雀鳥為職業的人，他們會借助捕網和圈套等工具；常指攻擊和欺壓。hunter; fowler

Terms.Localization: someone whose profession is to catch animals and birds with the help of nets and traps; associated with aggression and oppression

Localization.Gloss: 耶古鐵（yē gǔ tiě），《思》耶谷提耳。猶大支派米列的後裔，撒挪亞之祖。Jekuthiel

Terms.Localization: founder of Zanoah; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 約坍（yuē tān），《思》約刻堂。希伯的兒子；法勒的兄弟；閃的後裔。Joktan

Terms.Localization: son of Eber; descendant of Shem

Localization.Gloss: 雅金（yǎ jīn），《思》雅肯。便雅憫支派的族長之一，示每的兒子。Jakim

Terms.Localization: son of Shimei; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 雅金（yǎ jīn），《思》雅肯。利未人；大衞時代在聖殿供職的第12班的祭司首領。Jakim

Terms.Localization: priest; tribe of Levi; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 耶加米雅（yē jiā mǐ yǎ），《思》耶卡米雅。猶大支派人，耶拉篾的後裔，沙龍的兒子。Jekamiah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 耶加米（yē jiā mǐ），《思》耶卡米雅。猶大王耶哥尼雅（約雅斤）的兒子之一。Jekamiah

Terms.Localization: son of Jehoiachin; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 約緬（yuē miǎn），《思》約刻默罕。以法蓮支派地業內的一座城鎮；分配給利未人。Jokmeam

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Ephraim; Kibzaim

Localization.Gloss: 約緬（yuē miǎn），《思》約刻默罕。以法蓮以東某處的一座城鎮。Jokmeam

Terms.Localization: town; somewhere east of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 耶加面（yē jiā miàn），《思》雅刻默罕／耶卡默罕。大衛時期的利未支派希伯倫的四子。Jekameam

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 約念（yuē niàn），《思》約刻乃罕。利未支派從西布倫支派所得的城鎮之一。Jokneam

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 設網羅／設圈套。把捕網或圈套暗設在不起眼的地方，用來捕捉野獸和雀鳥；常用來形容人們用不義的方法來控制別人的行為。to entrap, ensnare

Terms.Localization: to place a net or trap in such a way that it is not easily seen; for the purpose of catching animals and birds; often used figuratively to denote someone's efforts to gain control over someone else in an unjust way

Localization.Gloss: 約珊（yuē shān），《思》約刻商。亞伯拉罕的兒子。Jokshan

Terms.Localization: son of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 約帖（yuē tiē），《思》約刻特耳。猶大支派的高原城鎮之一，位置不詳。Joktheel

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 約帖（yuē tiē），《思》約刻特耳。以東地的一座城鎮，原名西拉（Sela），在波斯拉城附近。Joktheel

Terms.Localization: town; Edom

Localization.Gloss: 害怕／懼怕／驚慌／敬畏。感到害怕，可能包括恐懼，和／或對某人或某事的敬畏。fear

Terms.Localization: to experience a feeling of fear, which may include apprehension, and/or a reverential awe of someone or something

Localization.Gloss: 敬畏；畏懼。處於懼怕或恐懼的狀態。state of fearing, standing in awe

Terms.Localization: state of fearing, standing in awe

Localization.Gloss: 懼怕／害怕／敬畏。懼怕，敬畏。fear, awe

Terms.Localization: fear, awe

Localization.Gloss: 以利穩（yǐ lì wěn），《思》依郎。拿弗他利支派屬地的堅固城，位於北加利利的山區之內，夏瑣的西北。Yiron

Terms.Localization: fortified town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 伊利雅（yī lì yǎ），《思》依黎雅。西底家時期耶路撒冷便雅憫門的守門官，示利米雅的兒子。Irijah

Terms.Localization: son of Shelemiah; captain of the guard; time of king Zedekiah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》耶路‧巴力（yē lù-bā lì）／基甸（jī diàn），《和》耶路‧巴力（yē lù-bā lì），《思》耶魯巴耳。瑪拿西支派人，約阿施的兒子，士師基甸的別稱(約公元前1169-1129年作士師)。Jerubbaal

Terms.Localization: son of Joash; judge of Israel; tribe of Manasseh (1169-1129)

Localization.Gloss: 耶羅波安（yē luó bō ān），《思》雅洛貝罕。耶羅波安一世，北國以色列的君王（約公元前931/930-910/909年在位），尼八的兒子。Jeroboam

Terms.Localization: son of Nebath; king of Israel (931/30-910/09)

Localization.Gloss: 耶羅波安（yē luó bō ān），《思》雅洛貝罕。耶羅波安二世，北國以色列的君王（約公元前782/781-753年在位），約阿施的兒子。Jeroboam

Terms.Localization: son of Joash; king of Israel (782/81-753)

Localization.Gloss: 《現》基甸（jī diàn），《和》耶路‧比設（yē lù-bĭ shè），《思》耶魯巴耳。瑪拿西支派人，約阿施的兒子，士師基甸的別稱。Jerubbesheth

Terms.Localization: son of Joash; judge of Israel; tribe of Manasseh (1169-1129)

Localization.Gloss: 雅列（yǎ liè），《思》耶勒得。塞特的後裔，瑪勒列的兒子。Jared

Terms.Localization: son of Mahalalel; descendant of Seth

Localization.Gloss: 雅列（yǎ liè），《思》耶勒得。猶大支派的後裔，基多之祖。Jared

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 約旦（yuē dàn），《舊》約但，《思》約但。巴勒斯坦最主要的河流，源於黑門山的河流，向南流入加利利海，直到死海。Jordan

Terms.Localization: river

Localization.Gloss: 耶魯伊勒（yē lǔ yī lè），《思》耶魯耳。曠野；猶大支派的地業。Jeruel

Terms.Localization: wilderness; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 耶羅亞（yē luó yà），《思》雅洛亞。迦得支派的族長之一，基列的兒子。Jaroah

Terms.Localization: son of Gilead; tribe of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 《現》耶露莎（yē lù shā），《和》耶路沙（yē lù shā），《思》耶魯沙。撒督的女兒，猶大王烏西雅的妻子，猶大王約坦的母親。Jerusha

Terms.Localization: daughter of Zadok; wiffe of Uzziah; mother of Jotham

Localization.Gloss: 耶路撒冷（yē lù sā lěng），《思》耶路撒冷。城鎮；在猶大境內。Jerusalem

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 耶路撒冷（yē lù sā lěng），《思》耶路撒冷。在猶大境內的一座城鎮。Jerusalem

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 耶拉人（yē lā rén），《思》耶辣。閃的第五代孫，約坍的兒子耶拉及其後裔的族名。Jerah

Terms.Localization: son of Joktan; descendant of Shem

Localization.Gloss: 耶利哥（yē lì gē），《思》耶里哥。城鎮。Jericho

Terms.Localization: town

Localization.Gloss: 耶羅罕（yē luó hǎn），《思》耶洛罕。利未支派人，以利加拿的後裔，撒母耳、希幔的祖先。Jeroham

Terms.Localization: father of Elkanah; ancestor of Samuel, Heman; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 耶羅罕（yē luó hǎn），《思》耶洛罕。便雅憫支派人，他的兒子都是住在耶路撒冷的族長。Jeroham

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 耶羅罕（yē luó hǎn），《思》耶洛罕。便雅憫人伊比尼雅的父親。Jeroham

Terms.Localization: father of Ibneiah; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 耶羅罕（yē luó hǎn），《思》耶洛罕。祭司亞大雅的父親，毗拉利的兒子。Jeroham

Terms.Localization: son of Pelaliah; father of Adaiah, priest

Localization.Gloss: 耶羅罕（yē luó hǎn），《思》耶洛罕。大衞的勇士基多人猶拉的父親。Jeroham

Terms.Localization: warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 耶羅罕（yē luó hǎn），《思》耶洛罕。大衞時期但支派人的領袖亞薩列的父親。Jeroham

Terms.Localization: father of Azarel; chief; tribe of Dan; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 耶羅罕（yē luó hǎn），《思》耶洛罕。亞她利雅時期的軍事將領亞撒利雅的父親。Jeroham

Terms.Localization: father of Azariah, officer; time of queen Athaliah

Localization.Gloss: 耶拉篾（yē lā miè），《思》耶辣默耳。猶大的後裔，希斯崙的兒子。Jerahmeel

Terms.Localization: son of Hezron; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 耶拉篾（yē lā miè），《思》耶辣默耳。利未支派人，基士的子孫。Jerahmeel

Terms.Localization: son of Kish; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 《現》耶拉默（yē lā mò），《和》耶拉篾（yē lā miè），《思》耶辣默耳。猶大王約雅敬的兒子。Jerahmeel

Terms.Localization: son of Jehoiakim, king of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》耶拉篾族（yē lā miè zú）／耶拉篾部落（yē lā miè bù luò），《和》耶拉篾（yē lā miè），《思》耶辣默耳人。與大衞有來往的猶大的某個地方及其居民，位置不詳。Jerahmeelite

Terms.Localization: clan; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 耶哈（yē hā），《思》雅爾哈。猶大支派的一個埃及僕人，示珊的僕人及女婿。Jarha

Terms.Localization: Egyptian slave; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 耶勒（yē lè），《思》耶黎耳。陀拉的兒子，以薩迦支派的族長之一。Jeriel

Terms.Localization: son of Tola; tribe of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 雅立（yǎ lì），《思》雅黎布。西緬的兒子。Jarib

Terms.Localization: son of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 雅立（yǎ lì），《思》雅黎布。以斯拉時期的猶太人的首領之一。Jarib

Terms.Localization: chief; time of Ezra

Localization.Gloss: 雅立（yǎ lì），《思》雅黎布。聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的祭司之一。Jarib

Terms.Localization: priest; time of Ezra

Localization.Gloss: 耶利拜（yē lì bài），《思》耶黎拜。伊利拿安的兒子，大衞的勇士之一。Jeribai

Localization.Gloss: 耶利雅（yē lì yǎ），《思》耶黎雅。利未人；大衛王時期的人物。Jeriah

Localization.Gloss: 耶利雅（yē lì yǎ），《思》耶黎雅。利未人；大衛王時期的人物。Jeriah

Localization.Gloss: 耶利摩（yē lì mó），《思》耶黎摩特。便雅憫支派人，大衞的勇士之一。Jerimoth

Terms.Localization: warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 耶利摩（yē lì mó），《思》耶黎摩特。利未支派米拉利的子孫，母示的兒子。Jerimoth

Terms.Localization: son of Mushi; descendant of Merari; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 耶利摩（yē lì mó），《思》耶黎摩特。希幔的兒子，大衛時期的聖殿樂師之一。。Jerimoth

Terms.Localization: son of Heman; temple singer; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 耶利摩（yē lì mó），《思》耶黎摩特。大衛時期拿弗他利支派的族長之一，是亞斯列的兒子。Jerimoth

Terms.Localization: son of Azriel; chief; tribe of Naphtali; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 耶利摩（yē lì mó），《思》耶黎摩特。羅波安的妻子瑪哈拉的父親。Jerimoth

Terms.Localization: father of Mahalath, wife of Rehoboam

Localization.Gloss: 耶利末（yē lì mò），《思》耶黎摩特。利未支派人，猶大王希西家時期的聖殿督理之一。Jerimoth

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Levi; time of Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 耶略（yē luè），《思》耶黎敖特。猶大支派人，希斯崙的兒子迦勒的妻子。Jerioth

Terms.Localization: wife of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 耶末（yē mò），《思》雅爾慕特。猶大支派的地業之一，位於伯利恆以西。Jarmuth

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 耶末（yē mò），《思》雅爾慕特。利未支派革順族從以薩迦支派的地業中所取得的城鎮，位於伯善以北。Jarmuth

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 耶利摩（yē lì mó），《思》耶勒摩特。便雅憫支派比結的兒子。Jeremoth

Localization.Gloss: 耶利摩（yē lì mó），《思》耶黎摩特。利未支派的族長之一，米拉利的子孫，母示的兒子。Jeremoth

Terms.Localization: son of Mushi; descendant of Merari; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 耶利摩（yē lì mó），《思》耶黎摩特。大衛時期聖殿的樂師之一，希幔的兒子，利未支派的領袖之一。Jeremoth

Terms.Localization: son of Heman; temple singer; time of king David

Terms.Localization: various men; married foreign wives; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 耶利買（yē lì mǎi），《思》耶勒買。哈順的子孫，娶了外邦女子為妻；被擄歸回時期的人物。Jeremai

Terms.Localization: man; married a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 耶利米（yē lì mǐ），《思》耶勒米雅。瑪拿西支派的族長之一。Jeremiah

Terms.Localization: family head; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 耶利米（yē lì mǐ），《思》耶勒米雅。大衛的三個勇士。Jeremiah

Terms.Localization: various warriors; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 耶利米（yē lì mǐ），《思》耶勒米雅。被擄歸回之後的三個人：(1)隨同所羅巴伯在被擄後回歸巴勒斯坦的祭司之一；(2)與尼希米一同簽約的祭司之一；(3)參與耶路撒冷城牆的告成禮的祭司之一。Jeremiah

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 耶利米（yē lì mǐ），《思》耶肋米亞。猶大末年最重要的先知之一，希勒家的兒子。Jeremiah

Terms.Localization: son of Hilkiah; prophet

Localization.Gloss: 《現》葉利米（yè lì mǐ），《和》耶利米（yē lì mǐ），《思》耶勒米雅／耶肋米亞。猶大王約西亞的妻子哈慕他的父親。Jeremiah

Terms.Localization: father of Hamutal, wife of Josiah

Localization.Gloss: 耶利米（yē lì mǐ），《思》耶勒米雅烏。大衛的勇士之一。Jeremiah

Terms.Localization: warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 耶利米（yē lì mǐ），《思》耶肋米亞。猶大末年最重要的先知之一，希勒家的兒子。Jeremiah

Terms.Localization: son of Hilkiah; prophet

Localization.Gloss: 雅利米雅（yǎ lì mǐ yǎ），《思》依爾米雅。哈巴洗尼雅的兒子，利甲族的首領雅撒尼亞的父親。Jeremiah

Terms.Localization: son of Habazziniah; descendant of Rechab

Localization.Gloss: 《現》伊利比勒（yī lì bǐ lè），《和》伊利毗勒，《思》依爾培耳。便雅憫支派屬地的城鎮之一，位於耶路撒冷以北。Irpeel

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 《現》灼熱的風／霉爛／熱風／蒼白，《和》霉爛／變青。微小真菌在植物上的破壞性生長；通常被認為是上帝的懲罰。mildew

Terms.Localization: destructive growth of minute fungi on plants; usually regarded as punishment from God

Localization.Gloss: 約干（yuē gān），《思》約爾刻罕。猶大支派人，迦勒的子孫，拉含的兒子。Jorkeam

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 繼承產業／繼承人／後嗣。獲得繼承土地和其他物品的擁有權。inherit; possess

Terms.Localization: to be, become in possession of land and other things

Localization.Gloss: 繼承人。在另一個人死後有權接收他的財產的人。heir

Terms.Localization: someone who is (entitled) to receive someone else's possessions after that person's death

Localization.Gloss: 《現》窮困潦倒／缺乏，《和》敗落／貧窮。失去產業。be, become poor

Terms.Localization: to lose one's possessions

Localization.Gloss: 獲得產業，承受產業。獲得（土地的）所有權。take possession

Terms.Localization: to take possession (of land)

Localization.Gloss: 殺滅／趕出／趕走。把人們趕走以霸佔其土地。dispossess

Terms.Localization: to dispossess people by driving them from their land

Localization.Gloss: 使繼承；使擁有。使人獲得或擁有。to cause to possess

Terms.Localization: to cause to possess

Localization.Gloss: 土地／產業／業。產業。possession

Terms.Localization: possession

Localization.Gloss: 以撒（yǐ sā），《思》依撒格。亞伯拉罕的兒子，以掃和雅各的父親。Isaac

Terms.Localization: son of Abraham; father of Jacob

Localization.Gloss: 耶西篾（yē xī miè），《思》耶息米耳。西緬支派的族長之一。Jesimiel

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 《現》以色列人（yǐ sè liè rén）／雅各（yǎ gè）／以色列的後代，《和》以色列人，《思》以色列人／以色列子民。神給雅各起的另一個名字，也指雅各後裔的總稱。Israel

Terms.Localization: new name given by the LORD to Jacob; henceforth the name of the people descending from Jacob

Localization.Gloss: 耶薩利拉（yē sà lì lā），《思》耶沙勒拉。利未支派人，大衞時期聖殿中的樂師之一，亞薩的兒子。Jesharelah

Terms.Localization: son of Asaph; temple singer; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 以色列人（yǐ sè liè rén）／以實瑪利人（yǐ shí mǎ lì rén），《思》以色列人／依市瑪耳人。以色列的後裔。Israelite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 以薩迦（yǐ sà jiā），《思》依撒加爾。雅各的兒子，以薩迦支派的始祖。Issachar

Terms.Localization: son of Jacob; founder of tribe of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 以薩迦（yǐ sà jiā），《思》依撒加爾。俄別以東的兒子之一，聖殿的守門人。Issachar

Terms.Localization: gatekeeper

Localization.Gloss: 約設‧巴設（yuē shè-bā shè），《思》依市巴耳。大衛時期的勇士之一。Josheb-Basshebeth

Terms.Localization: warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 耶是比押（yē shì bǐ yā），《思》耶舍貝阿布。大衞時代在聖殿供職的第14班祭司首領。Jeshebeab

Terms.Localization: priest; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 益巴（yì bā），《思》依市巴。猶大的後裔，米列的兒子，以實提摩之祖。Ishbah

Terms.Localization: son of Mered; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 以實‧比諾。男性；拉法的後裔；巨人。Ishbi-Benob

Localization.Gloss: 祭司。祭司。priest

Terms.Localization: priest

Localization.Gloss: 《現》祭司職務／祭司職位，《和》祭司職任／祭司職分。在聖殿中事奉的祭司的職務。priesthood

Terms.Localization: the office of a priest serving in the temple

Localization.Gloss: 《現》故普(gù pǔ)，《和》古巴人（gǔ bā rén），《思》利比亞。北非地中海沿岸地區；（利比亞？）。Libya

Terms.Localization: area; Libya?

Localization.Gloss: 均（jūn），《思》貢。瑣巴王哈大利謝的的屬地，是以色列的北界，位於大馬士革北部。Cun

Terms.Localization: town; territory of king Hadadezer of Zobah

Localization.Gloss: 鴞鳥。確切意思不明；可能指：一種小型貓頭鷹，長約 25 釐米（10 英吋），尾巴短、耳朵無絨毛；夜間進食，主要以昆蟲和雛鳥為食；在河岸或白蟻巢的洞中築巢；不潔淨，因而不可食用。little owl

Terms.Localization: exact meaning unknown; probably: small type of owl, about 25 cm in length, with a short tail and without ear tufts, which feeds at night mainly on insects and nestlings; it nests in holes in banks or termite hills; Athene noctua; unclean animal, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 《現》塞魯士（sāi lǔ shì），《和》居魯士（jū lǔ shì），《舊》古列（gǔ liè），《思》居魯士。波斯王。Cyrus

Terms.Localization: king of Persia

Localization.Gloss: 塞魯士（sāi lǔ shì），《舊》古列（gǔ liè），《思》居魯士。波斯王。Cyrus

Terms.Localization: king of Persia

Localization.Gloss: 古實（gǔ shí），《思》雇士。含的長子；挪亞的孫子。Cush

Terms.Localization: oldest son of Ham, son of Noah

Localization.Gloss: 古實；埃塞俄比亞。埃塞俄比亞、阿拉伯半島或尼羅河上游的地域。Cush; Ethiopia

Terms.Localization: territory variously identified with Ethiopia or with the Arabian peninsula or with the upper Nile region

Localization.Gloss: 古實（gǔ shí），《思》古士。男性；屬便雅憫支派。Cush

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 古實人。來自古實地的人。Cushite

Terms.Localization: person from the land of Cush

Localization.Gloss: 古示（gǔ shì），《思》雇史。猶底的曾祖父。Cushi

Terms.Localization: great-grandfather of Jehudi

Localization.Gloss: 古示（gǔ shì），《思》雇史。先知西番雅的父親。Cushi

Terms.Localization: father of Zephaniah

Localization.Gloss: 古珊（gǔ shān），《思》雇商。地區或族群，可能與米甸有關。Cushan

Terms.Localization: area or people; Midian?

Localization.Gloss: 古珊‧利薩田（gǔ shān-lì sà tián），《思》雇商黎沙塔殷。士師時期的美索不達米亞王。Cushan-Rishathaim

Terms.Localization: king of Mesopotamia; time of the Judges

Localization.Gloss: 古他（gǔ tā），《思》雇特。位於巴比倫城的北部，是古代的重要城市之一。Cuth

Terms.Localization: town; northern Babylonia

Localization.Gloss: 古他（gǔ tā），《思》雇特。位於巴比倫城的北部，是古代的重要城市之一。Cuthah

Terms.Localization: town; northern Babylonia

Localization.Gloss: 哥西巴（gē xī bā），《思》苛則巴。猶大支派城鎮之一，位於希伯崙的西北方。Cozeba

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》歌斯比（gē sī bǐ），《和》哥斯比（gē sī bǐ），《思》苛次彼。米甸首領蘇珥的女兒。Cozbi

Terms.Localization: woman; Midianite

Localization.Gloss: 基悉（jī xī），《思》革齊布。猶大的妻子書亞生示拉的地方。Chezib

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 巨蜥，守宮。一種蜥蜴，具體品種不確定：可能是沙漠巨型蜥蜴，以色列最大的蜥蜴之一，身長約 1.2 米；強壯但行動緩慢 , 除非在躲避危險的時候 ; 肉食性 , 捕食各種類型的獵物 , 包括昆蟲 , 老鼠 , 蛇 , 鳥蛋 , 雛鳥 , 和動物屍體的腐肉 ; 灰褐色；生活在沙漠和半沙漠的稀樹草原中；不潔動物 ,因此不能食用。monitor lizard

Terms.Localization: type of lizard, uncertain identification: perhaps desert monitor, one of the largest lizards, reaching a length of nearly 1.2 m in Israel; powerful, but slow-moving except when escaping from danger; carnivorous, eating a wide variety of prey, including insects, mice, snakes, lizards, birds’ eggs, nestlings, and carrion from animal carcasses; greyish brown; lives in desert and savannah semidesert regions; listed as unclean

Localization.Gloss: 力量，氣力，力氣；大能，大能大力；能力。力量，氣力，力氣；大能，大能大力；能力。strength, power, might; substance, wealth, riches

Terms.Localization: strength, power, might; substance, wealth, riches

Localization.Gloss: 基頓（jī dùn），《思》基冬。一個打禾場的所有者。Chidon

Terms.Localization: owner of a threshing floor

Localization.Gloss: 迦溫（jiā wēn），《思》克汪。亞述人的神明；土星的表現形式。Kaiwan

Terms.Localization: Assyrian deity; manifestation of Saturn

Localization.Gloss: 皮包／囊袋。用皮革或布料造的容器，用來攜帶個人物品，包括金錢。bag, purse

Terms.Localization: receptacle, made of leather or cloth, used to carry possessions, including money

Localization.Gloss: 撚線竿／紡錘。細長的木棍，其頂部（整速輪）有重物；用來把纖維紡成紗線。spindle

Terms.Localization: short, oblong wooden stick with a weight on the top ("whorl"); used for spinning fibers into a thread

Localization.Gloss: 《現》各‧荷西（gè-hé xī），《和》各荷西（gè hé xī），《思》苛耳曷則。沙崙的父親；米斯巴區的官長；被擄歸回時期的人物。Col-Hozeh

Terms.Localization: father of Shallum; chief of the Mizpah district of Mizpah; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 《現》谷‧何西（gǔ-hé xī），《和》谷何西（gǔ hé xī），《思》苛耳曷則。猶大支派人，哈賽雅的兒子，瑪西雅的先祖。Col-Hozeh

Terms.Localization: son of Hazaiah; ancestor of Maaseiah; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 罪犯，囚犯。關押罪犯或其他囚犯的地方。prison

Terms.Localization: place where criminals or other prisoners were confined

Localization.Gloss: 基利押（jī lì yā），《思》基肋阿布。大衞的兒子，與亞比該在希伯崙所生。Chileab

Terms.Localization: son of David

Localization.Gloss: 迦勒（jiā lè），《思》加肋布。猶大支派耶孚尼的兒子，是被摩西差往窺探迦南地的探子之一。Caleb

Terms.Localization: son of Jephunneh; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 迦勒（jiā lè），《思》加肋布。猶大支派人，希斯崙的兒子，娶阿蘇巴和耶略為妻。Caleb

Terms.Localization: son of Hezron; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 迦勒（jiā lè），《思》加肋布。約書亞給迦勒的地業，位於希伯崙和底壁之間。Caleb

Terms.Localization: location; south of Israel in the Negeb

Localization.Gloss: 狗。相對較小的淺棕色家畜，從生活垃圾到動物尸體和排洩物等甚麼都吃；極其不潔淨的動物，因此不能食用，但用於打獵和放羊；被認為幾乎和豬一樣不潔淨；與各種不潔、好鬥、貪婪和地位低下有關；用作對男廟妓的蔑稱。dog

Terms.Localization: relatively small light brown domestic animal, feeding on anything from household refuse to animal carcasses and excreta; Canis familiaris putiatini; extremely unclean animal and not to be eaten, though used for hunting and for watching sheep; associated with all sorts of uncleanness, aggression, greediness, low status; used as derogatory term for male shrine prostitutes

Localization.Gloss: 迦勒‧以法他（jiā lè-yǐ fǎ tā）。地點；可能在伯利恆附近。Caleb Ephrathah

Terms.Localization: location; perhaps near Bethlehem

Localization.Gloss: 迦勒族（jiā lè zú），《思》加肋布族人。猶大支派人；迦勒的後裔。Calebite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 監獄，監牢。關押罪犯或其他囚犯的地方；כֶּלֶא 和 כְּלִיא。prison

Terms.Localization: place where criminals or other prisoners were confined; כֶּלֶא and כְּלִיא

Localization.Gloss: 基綠（jī lǜ），《思》革路布。猶大支派人，米黑的父親。Chelub

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 基綠（jī lǜ），《思》革路布。大衞時代掌管耕田種地的官員以斯利的父親。Chelub

Terms.Localization: father of Ezri, official, time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 基路拜（jī lù bài），《思》革路拜。猶大支派人，希斯崙的兒子。Chelubai

Terms.Localization: son of Hezron; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 基祿（jī lù），《思》革路希。巴尼的子孫，聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人。Cheluhi

Terms.Localization: man; married to a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 迦拉（jiā lā），《思》加拉。寧錄所建造的城鎮之一，位於美索不達米亞。Calah

Terms.Localization: town in Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 《現》牧人用的袋子，《和》牧人帶的囊。用帶子掛在肩膀上，或繫在腰間的皮帶或布帶上的小袋子；用皮革或布料製成；牧羊人用它來攜帶食物和細小的個人物品。shepherd's bag

Terms.Localization: small bag hung from the shoulder by a strap or attached to the belt or sash around the waist; made of leather or cloth; used by shepherds for carrying food and small personal items

Localization.Gloss: 監獄，監牢。關押罪犯或其他囚犯的地方；כֶּלֶא 和 כְּלוּא。prison

Terms.Localization: place where criminals or other prisoners were confined; כֶּלֶא and כְּלוּא

Localization.Gloss: 基連（jī lián），《思》基肋雍。士師時代猶大伯利恆人，以利米勒和拿俄米的兒子之一。Chilion

Terms.Localization: son of Elimelech

Localization.Gloss: 甲各（jiǎ gè），《思》加耳苛耳。大衛時期的四名哲士之一，瑪曷的兒子。Calcol

Terms.Localization: son of Mahol; wise man; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 甲各（jiǎ gè），《思》加耳苛耳。猶大支派人，謝拉的兒子。Calcol

Terms.Localization: son of Zerah; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 基拉（jī lā），《思》革拉耳。巴哈‧摩押的子孫，娶了外邦女子為妻；被擄歸回時期的人物。Chelal

Terms.Localization: descendant of Pahath-Moab; married a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 基抹（jī mǒ），《思》瑪待。美索不達米亞的城鎮之一。Chilmad

Terms.Localization: town; Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 甲尼（城）（jiǎ ní (chéng)），《思》加耳乃。美索不達米亞的城鎮之一。Calneh

Terms.Localization: town; Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 迦勒挪（jiā lè nuó），《思》加耳諾。美索不達米亞的城鎮，亞述帝國所征服的國家之一。Calno

Terms.Localization: town; Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 《現》金罕（jīn hǎn），《和》金罕寓（jīn hǎn yù）／金罕（jīn hǎn），《思》革魯特基默罕／基默罕。基列人巴西萊的兒子。Chimham

Terms.Localization: son of Barzillai, from Gilead

Localization.Gloss: 金罕（jīn hǎn），《思》基默罕。基列人巴西萊的兒子。Chimham

Terms.Localization: son of Barzillai, from Gilead

Localization.Gloss: 基抹（jī mǒ），《思》革摩士。摩押的神明。Chemosh

Terms.Localization: deity; of Moab

Localization.Gloss: 小茴香。可能是植物小茴香：與胡蘿蔔同科；這種植物從基部開始分枝，有相似的葉子和花，但種子的氣味更強烈；每年種植和收穫，可高達 50-60 釐米；其種子用於烹飪和藥物；與其他花園種子一起引用，來說明不同植物和果實需要不同的照料和處理。cummin (cumin)

Terms.Localization: probably the plant Cuminum cyminum; same family as carrot; branches from the base and has similar leaves and flowers, though seeds have a sharper smell; planted and harvested each year, reaching a height of about 50-60 cm; seeds are used in cooking and as medicine; cited with other garden plants to show how different plants and their fruits require different care and processing

Localization.Gloss: 蚊蟲／虱子。一種小飛蟲，飛行時發出一種特有的鳴叫聲；見於死水和植被周圍；以人和動物的血為食；有些種類可以傳播瘧疾和登革熱等疾病。mosquito

Terms.Localization: small flying insect that makes a characteristic whining noise as it flies; found around stagnant water and vegetation; feeds on human or animal blood; some species can transmit diseases such as malaria and dengue fever.

Localization.Gloss: 干尼人（gān ní rén），《思》加乃。美索不達米亞的一座城鎮。Canneh

Terms.Localization: town; Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 《現》約雅斤（yuē yǎ jīn），《和》哥尼雅（gē ní yă），《思》苛尼雅。南國猶大末期的君王（公元前597年在位），約雅敬的兒子；又名耶哥尼雅。Coniah

Terms.Localization: son of Jehoiakim; king of Judah (597); also known as Jehoiachin

Localization.Gloss: 基拿尼（jī ná ní），《思》革納尼。被擄歸回時期的一個利未人。Chenani

Terms.Localization: Levite; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 基拿尼雅（jī ná ní yǎ），《思》革納黎雅。利未人以斯哈族的族長， 大衛時期聖殿樂師的首領，並且管理以色列的外事。Chenaniah

Terms.Localization: Levite; chief; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 基拿尼雅（jī ná ní yǎ），《思》革納尼雅。利未支派以斯哈族的族長，大衛時期聖殿樂師的首領，並且管理以色列的外事。Chenaniah, Conaniah

Terms.Localization: Levite; chief; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 歌楠雅（gē nán yǎ），《思》苛納尼雅。利未支派人，希西家王委派他掌管供物和聖物的倉庫。Chenaniah, Conaniah

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 歌楠雅（gē nán yǎ），《思》苛納尼雅。約西亞時代的利未支派族長之一。Chenaniah, Conaniah

Terms.Localization: Levite; chief; time of king Josiah

Localization.Gloss: 基拿尼雅（jī ná ní yǎ），《思》革納尼雅。利未人以斯哈族的族長， 大衛時期圣殿樂師的首領，並且管理以色列的外事。Chenaniah

Terms.Localization: Levite; chief; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 迦南（jiā nán），《思》客納罕。含的兒子；迦南人的祖先。Canaan

Terms.Localization: son of Ham; ancestor of the Canaanites

Localization.Gloss: 《現》迦南，《和》迦南地，《思》客納罕地。約旦河以西的土地。(land of) Canaan

Terms.Localization: land west of the Jordan River

Localization.Gloss: 基拿拿（jī ná ná），《思》革納阿納。亞哈時代假先知西底家的父親。Chenaanah

Terms.Localization: father of Zedekiah, false prophet; time of Ahab

Localization.Gloss: 基拿拿（jī ná ná），《思》革納阿納。便雅憫支派人，比勒罕的兒子，大衞的勇士之一。Chenaanah

Terms.Localization: son of Bilhan; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 迦南人（jiā nán rén），《思》客納罕人。含的兒子迦南的後裔。Canaanite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Canaan

Localization.Gloss: 《現》加利利（jiā lì lì），《和》基尼烈（jī ní liè），《思》基乃勒特。加利利湖及其西岸的地區。Chinnereth, Chinneroth

Terms.Localization: Lake of Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 基尼烈（jī ní liè），《思》基乃勒特。拿弗他利支派的堅固城之一，位於加利利湖的西北岸。Chinnereth, Chinneroth

Terms.Localization: fortified town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 寶座／王位。供君王所使用的座位；相對較大、精心製作；用石頭或木頭、珍貴的金屬或象牙做成；通常有靠背和扶手；與統治和審判有關。throne

Terms.Localization: seat used by kings; relatively large and elaborate; made of stone or wood, precious metals or ivory; usually with back and armrests; associated with ruling, judging

Localization.Gloss: 愚昧。缺乏智慧和理智。stupid

Terms.Localization: lacking wisdom and good sense

Localization.Gloss: 基失（jī shī），《思》革息耳。在猶大境內的一座城鎮。Chesil

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 愚昧／愚蒙／愚蠢。缺乏智慧和理智。stupidity

Terms.Localization: lack of wisdom and good sense

Localization.Gloss: 愚昧。缺乏智慧和理智。stupidity

Terms.Localization: lack of wisdom and good sense

Localization.Gloss: 基斯倫（jī sī lún），《思》基斯隆。便雅憫支派的首領， 以利達的父親。Chislon

Terms.Localization: father of Elidad; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 基撒崙（jī sā lún），《思》革撒隆。猶大支派地業內的一座城鎮。Chesalon

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 基蘇律（jī sū lǜ），《思》革穌羅特。以薩迦支派地業的城鎮之一， 位於約念以東。Chesulloth

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 迦斯路希人（jiā sī lù xī rén），《思》加斯路人。族群；含的兒子麥西的後裔。Casluhim

Terms.Localization: people; descendants of Mizraim

Localization.Gloss: 吉斯綠‧他泊（jí sī lǜ-tā bó），《思》基斯羅特大博爾。以薩迦支派屬地的城鎮之一，位於東方邊界上。Chisloth-Tabor

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 粗麥。一種穀物，可能是二粒小麥的一種。spelt

Terms.Localization: type of grain, probably a type of emmer wheat; Triticum dicoccum

Localization.Gloss: 銀子／銀錢。通常是平滑沒有蓋戳的銀塊，需要稱重來決定其價值；被擄歸回後，以色列人開始使用錢幣。silver; money

Terms.Localization: silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile people in Israel started using coins

Localization.Gloss: 迦西斐雅（jiā xī fěi yǎ），《思》加息非雅。以斯拉打發人去招集利未人建殿之地，在巴比倫境內。Casiphia

Terms.Localization: location; Babylonia

Localization.Gloss: 棕樹枝。棕樹上的枝子；在住棚節時使用。palm branch

Terms.Localization: branch of palm tree; used in the Festival of Shelters (Booths)

Localization.Gloss: 棕枝與蘆葦，即：每一個人，不論大小、貴賤。習語，用棕樹枝（高貴而高大）和蘆葦（弱小而卑微）來比喻社會上各階層的每一個人。palm branch and reed = everyone, whether great or small

Terms.Localization: idiomatic expression that indicates everyone from the great to the small using the metaphor of the palm branch (noble and high) and the reed (weak and low down)

Localization.Gloss: 幼獅／少壯獅子。雄性年輕獅子；效率殺手。young lion

Terms.Localization: young male lion; efficient killer

Localization.Gloss: 基非拉（jī fēi lā），《思》革非辣。便雅憫支派地業內的一座城鎮。Chephirah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 寬容，饒恕；贖罪。寬容，饒恕；贖罪。appease, make amends

Terms.Localization: appease, make amends

Localization.Gloss: 舉行贖罪的禮儀。舉行贖罪的禮儀。perform the ritual of making atonement

Terms.Localization: perform the ritual of making atonement

Localization.Gloss: 饒恕，赦免。饒恕，赦免。forgive

Terms.Localization: forgive

Localization.Gloss: 基法‧阿摩尼（jī fǎ-ā mó ní），《思》革法爾阿摩尼。便雅憫支派地業的城鎮之一，位於伯特利以北。Chephar-Ammoni

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 贖罪。贖罪。atonement

Terms.Localization: atonement

Localization.Gloss: 《現》克里特（kè lǐ tè）／迦斐託（島）（jiā fěi tuō (dǎo)），《和》迦斐託（島），《思》加非托爾（島）。地區名稱，可能就是克裡特島。Caphtor

Terms.Localization: area; possibly Crete

Localization.Gloss: 《現》克里特人（kè lǐ tè rén）／迦斐託人（jiā fěi tuō rén），《和》迦斐託人，《思》加非托爾人。迦斐託的居民；麥西的後裔Caphtorim

Terms.Localization: inhabitants of Caphtor; descendants of Mizraim

Localization.Gloss: 小羊／羊羔；被閹割了的公羊。顯然指指從外地進口的羊或一個特別配種的羊 ; 也可能指一頭閹羊 （ 被閹割了的公羊 ）；不能用於獻祭。sheep; castrated ram

Terms.Localization: apparently: imported foreign sheep or a special breed; or, a castrated ram (wether; never used in the context of sacrifice)

Localization.Gloss: 駱駝鞍的袋子／（駱駝的）馱簍。確切含義不肯定；指放在駱駝上、讓人坐在上面的東西，可能是一個放有毯子的木架。(camel) saddle

Terms.Localization: exact meaning uncertain: something to place on a camel to sit on, possibly a wooden frame on which to put blankets

Localization.Gloss: 基路伯。天上帶翅膀的生物；象徵上帝的威嚴，與他的同在有關。cherub, cherubim (pl.)

Terms.Localization: heavenly creature, symbol of God's majesty and associated with his presence

Localization.Gloss: 基綠（jī lǜ），《思》革魯布。位於巴比倫的一座城鎮；一群猶太人從那裡回到了以色列。Cherub

Terms.Localization: town; Chaldea

Localization.Gloss: 《現》王室侍衛／王室警衛，《和》迦利人（jiā lì rén），《思》加黎人。王室護衛兵的成員。Carite

Terms.Localization: member of the royal guard

Localization.Gloss: 基立溪（jī lì xī），《思》革黎特（小河）。約旦河東邊、靠近耶利哥的一條小溪，又稱雅比河。Cherith

Terms.Localization: brook; east of Jordan

Localization.Gloss: 番紅花。一種長錐形草狀葉子的植物，從地下洋蔥狀的球莖中長出來；開紅色或紫色的花；它的花朵可以用來做香水和藥。saffron plant

Terms.Localization: plant with tapered grasslike leaves growing from an onion-like bult under the ground; reddish or purple flower; Crocus sativus; flower is used for perfume and medicine

Localization.Gloss: 迦基米施（jiā jī mǐ shī），《思》加革米士／加克米士。位於哈蘭以西，幼發拉底河西岸的一座城。Carchemish

Terms.Localization: town; on the Euphrates

Localization.Gloss: 甲迦（jiǎ jiā），《思》加爾加斯。亞哈隨魯王的七個太監之一。Carkas

Terms.Localization: eunuch; servant of king Ahasuerus (Xerxes)

Localization.Gloss: 駱駝，獨峰駝。大型四足哺乳動物，可達 2 米甚至更高；單峰駱駝的體型更大，統一為淺黃褐色；雙峰駱駝的顏色更深；駱駝適合生活在沙漠地區，在駝峰中儲存多餘的食物，可以長時間不喝水，在乾旱地區長途跋涉；這個詞似乎是指騎行駱駝，而不是載重駱駝；是不潔淨的動物，不可吃。camel, dromedary

Terms.Localization: large four-footed mammal; Camelus dromedarius and Camelus bactrianus; bactrians may reach 2 m.; dromedaries are bigger and a uniform light fawn color; bactrians are darker; suited to life in desert areas; store excess food in their humps, can go without water for long periods; can make long journeys through dry areas; this word seems to refer to camels used for riding rather than carrying loads; unclean, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 葡萄園。種植葡萄樹的田地；一般以石牆圍繞，設有一個守望塔。vineyard

Terms.Localization: field in which grapevines are cultivated; typically surrounded by stone fence, with guard-tower

Localization.Gloss: 迦米（jiā mǐ），《思》加爾米。呂便的兒子。Carmi

Terms.Localization: son of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 迦米（jiā mǐ），《思》加爾米。猶大支派，撒底的兒子，亞干的父親。Carmi

Terms.Localization: father of Achan; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 迦米（jiā mǐ），《思》加爾米。猶大的兒子。Carmi

Terms.Localization: son of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》迦米（宗族）（jiā mǐ (zōng zú)），《和》迦米族，《思》加爾米家族。呂便的兒子迦米的後裔。Carmite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Carmi, son of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 迦密（jiā mì），《思》加爾默耳。猶大支派地業的山地城鎮之一，位於希伯崙的東南方。Carmel

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 迦密山（jiā mì shān），《思》加爾默耳山。位於以色列北面的一座山。Carmel

Terms.Localization: mountain in north of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 迦密人（jiā mì rén），《思》加爾默耳人。猶大支派地業的山地城鎮迦密的居民。of Carmel

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Carmel

Localization.Gloss: 基蘭（jī lán），《思》革蘭／革郎。西珥的後裔，何利人底順的兒子。Cheran

Terms.Localization: son of Dishon; descendant of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 甲示拿（jiǎ shì ná），《思》加爾舍納。亞哈隨魯王的七個參謀之一。Carshena

Terms.Localization: adviser to Ahasuerus (Xerxes)

Localization.Gloss: 基利提人（jī lì tí rén），《思》革勒提人。非利士人的別稱。Cherethites

Terms.Localization: other name for Philistine

Localization.Gloss: 《現》宮廷侍衛隊，《和》基利提人（jī lì tí rén），《思》革勒提人。大衛宮廷侍衛的稱號。Cherethites

Terms.Localization: name of David's royal guard

Localization.Gloss: 綿羊羔，小綿羊。小羊，常用於獻祭；כֶּשֶׂב（雄）；כִּשְׂבָּה（雌）。lamb

Terms.Localization: young of a sheep; often used for ritual sacrifice; כֶּשֶׂב (m); כִּשְׂבָּה (f)

Localization.Gloss: 基薛（jī xuē），《思》革色得。拿鶴和密迦的兒子之一，迦勒底人的先祖。Chesed

Terms.Localization: son of Nahor; ancestor of the Chaldeans

Localization.Gloss: 迦勒底人（jiā lè dǐ rén），《思》加色丁人。拿鶴兒子基薛的後代。Chaldean

Terms.Localization: descendant of Chesed, son of Nahor

Localization.Gloss: 《現》巴比倫人（bā bĭ lún rén），《和》迦勒底人（jiā lè dǐ rén），《思》加色丁人。拿鶴和密迦之子基薛的後裔及其所居之地。Chaldea, Chaldean

Terms.Localization: descendant of Chesed, son of Nahor; their land

Localization.Gloss: 占星者。占星者。astrologers

Terms.Localization: astrologers

Localization.Gloss: 算命的／占卜的／觀兆的／行邪術的。算命的／占卜的／觀兆的／行邪術的。enchanter, magician

Terms.Localization: enchanter, magician

Localization.Gloss: 行邪術。行邪術。incantations, sorceries

Terms.Localization: incantations, sorceries

Localization.Gloss: 基提（jī tí），《思》基廷。雅弗兒子雅完的後裔；希臘？Kittim

Terms.Localization: descendants of Javan, son of Japheth; Greece?

Localization.Gloss: 基提利（jī tí lì），《思》基特里士。猶大支派地業的高原城鎮之一，位於希伯崙以西。Chitlish

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 冠冕；王冠。圓形或半圓形的頭飾，通常用貴重金屬製成，並有寶石作裝飾，為王后所配戴，象徵她的權威和身分。crown; diadem

Terms.Localization: circular or semi-circular ornamental headdress, usually made out of precious metals and decorated with jewels, worn by a queen as a symbol of authority and status

Localization.Gloss: 羅‧阿米（luó-ā mǐ），《思》羅阿米。先知何西阿的兒子；「不是我的子民」。Lo-Ammi

Terms.Localization: son of prophet Hosea; "Not my people"

Localization.Gloss: 《現》羅‧露哈瑪（luó-lù hā mǎ），《和》羅‧路哈瑪，《思》羅魯阿瑪。先知何西阿的女兒；「不蒙憐憫」。Lo-Ruhamah

Terms.Localization: daughter of prophet Hosea; "No compassion"

Localization.Gloss: 《現》麗亞（lì yà），《和》利亞（lì yà），《思》肋阿。拉班的長女，拉結的姊姊，雅各的妻子。Leah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Laban; wife of Jacob

Localization.Gloss: 拉伊勒（lā yī lè），《思》拉耳。利未支派革順宗族的首領以利雅薩的父親。Laël

Terms.Localization: father of Eliasaph, chief of Gershonites; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 《現》利烏米人（lì wū mǐ rén），《和》利烏米族，《思》肋烏明人。亞伯拉罕的兒子約珊的後裔。Leummim

Terms.Localization: people; descendants of Jokshan

Localization.Gloss: 利巴勿（lì bā wù），《思》肋巴敖特。西緬支派地業內的一座城鎮。Lebaoth

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 利波拿（lì bō ná），《思》肋波納。城鎮；在示羅附近。Lebonah

Terms.Localization: town; near Shiloh

Localization.Gloss: 獅子。最大的貓科動物，通常從鼻子到尾巴尖約有 2.8 米，站立時肩膀高度可達 1 米（3 呎 3 吋）；淺啡黃色；成年雄性脖子和肩膀周圍的鬃毛比其他部位的毛髪顏色更深；不潔的動物；與侵略和力量相關。lion

Terms.Localization: largest of the great cats, often about 2.8 m. from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; adult males have a mane around the neck and shoulders that is darker than the rest of their fur; Panthera leo; unclean animal; associated with aggression and strength

Localization.Gloss: 母獅。雌性獅子。lioness

Terms.Localization: female lion

Localization.Gloss: 拉班（lā bān），《思》拉班。彼土利的兒子，拿鶴的孫子，利百加的哥哥，利亞和拉結的父親。Laban

Terms.Localization: son of Bethuel; father of Leah and Rachel

Localization.Gloss: 拉班（lā bān），《思》拉班。地點，可能就是立拿；在西奈半島，位於臨門‧帕烈和勒撒之間；以色列人從埃及起行，往迦南地去時，在路上安營的地方，離摩西重申律法的地方不遠。Laban

Terms.Localization: location, possibly to be identified with Libnah, in Sinai, between Rimmon-Perez and Rissah; Israelites encamped there on their way from Egypt to Canaan

Localization.Gloss: 立拿（lì ná），《思》里貝納。地點，可能就是拉班；在西奈半島，位於臨門‧帕烈和勒撒之間；以色列人從埃及起行，往迦南地去時，在路上安營的地方，離摩西重申律法的地方不遠。Libnah

Terms.Localization: location, possibly to be identified with Laban, in Sinai, between Rimmon-Perez and Rissah; Israelites encamped there on their way from Egypt to Canaan

Localization.Gloss: 立拿（lì ná），《思》里貝納。猶大支派屬地的城鎮之一，分配給利未支派亞倫族，位於希伯崙的西北。Libnah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah; assigned to clan of Aaron, tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 白楊樹。一種樹，高達 20 米；沿河岸生長。white poplar

Terms.Localization: tall tree reaching 20 m; Populus alba; grows along riverbanks

Localization.Gloss: 蘇合香樹，安息香樹。一種小樹或灌木，3 至 6 米高，有橢圓形的樹葉，葉面是綠色，底部白色和有棉的質感；長白色的花與橙樹的花相似；提供良好的樹蔭，以色列人在那裡進行偶像崇拜。styrax tree

Terms.Localization: small tree or shrub, 3 to 6 m high, with oval leaves that are green above and white and cottony below; it has white flowers that resemble those of the orange tree; Styrax officinalis; gives good shade, where Israelites practiced idolatry

Localization.Gloss: 利巴拿（lì bā ná），《思》肋巴納。從被擄之地歸回的尼提寧（殿役）的家族族長之一。Lebanah

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 磚。用粘土倒模製成的方塊，放在太陽底下曬乾，或放在烤爐中烘硬，便可成形；用作建築物料，尤其在很難找到石材和木材的地方。brick

Terms.Localization: block made of clay in a mold and either dried in the sun or hardened in an oven; used as a building material, especially in places where stone or wood was scarce

Localization.Gloss: 乳香。樹脂類；由橄欖科乳香屬樹木產生的黃色或帶紅色樹膠；乳香樹是一種可生長至大約 3 米高的灌木，有多個樹幹和細小帶綠色或白色的花；樹膠從樹枝上滴出來；是在會幕中燃燒的香的原料。frankincense

Terms.Localization: type of resin; Boswellia sacra; yellow or reddish gum produced by the Boswellia tree, a shrub that reaches 3m high, with multiple trunks and small greenish or white flowers; gum comes out in drops from the branches; ingredient of the incense burned in the tabernacle

Localization.Gloss: 黎巴嫩（lí bā nèn），《舊》利巴嫩，《思》黎巴嫩。以色列的北部的山脈。Lebanon

Terms.Localization: range of mountains; north of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 立尼（lì ní），《思》里貝尼。利未支派人，革順的兒子，立尼族的先祖。Libni

Terms.Localization: son of Gershon; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 立尼（lì ní），《思》里貝尼。利未支派米拉利的後裔，抹利的兒子。Libni

Terms.Localization: son of Mahli; descendant of Merari; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 《現》立尼家族（lì ní jiā zú），《和》立尼族，《思》里貝尼族。利未支派立尼的後裔。Libnite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Libni; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 《現》羅德／羅得（luó dé），《和》羅德，《思》羅得。便雅憫支派地業內的一座城鎮；由沙麥建造。Lod

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 底璧。城鎮，猶大支派的山地；分配了給利未支派的亞倫宗族。of Debir

Terms.Localization: town; Gilead

Localization.Gloss: 利哈比人（lì hā bǐ rén），《思》肋哈賓人。麥西的兒子利哈比的後裔。Lehabim

Terms.Localization: people; descendants of Mizraim

Localization.Gloss: 拉哈（lā hā），《思》拉哈得。猶大支派人，雅哈的兒子。Lahad

Terms.Localization: son of Jahath; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 羅‧底巴（luó dǐ bā），《思》羅德巴爾。位於基列境內、約旦河以東的一座城鎮；屬迦得支派。Lodebar

Terms.Localization: town; Gilead

Localization.Gloss: 《現》利比亞人（lì bǐ yà rén），《和》利比亞人（lì bǐ yà rén）／路比人（lù bǐ rén）／路比族（lù bǐ zú），《思》利比亞人。利比亞的居民。Libyan

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Libya

Localization.Gloss: 《現》路德人（lù dé rén）／呂底亞（lǚ dǐ yà），《和》路德人，《思》路得／路丁。閃的兒子路德及其後裔的族名與所居之地。Lud

Terms.Localization: son of Shem; people, land

Localization.Gloss: 《現》路低人（lù dī rén）／呂底亞人（lǚ dǐ yà rén），《和》路低人／路德族（lù dé zú），《思》路丁人。含的孫子路低及其後裔的族名與所居之地。Ludim

Terms.Localization: people; descendants of Mizraim

Localization.Gloss: 杏樹。一種樹，屬於桃科；生長在野外，可高達 4.5 至 6 米，葉子呈橢圓形；冬天落葉，開白色或粉紅色的花朵，而且花期很早；葉子更晚才長出來；肉質果實裡面包著堅硬的果核；果核含油。almond tree

Terms.Localization: tree, belonging to the peach family, which grows wild, reaching a height of 4.5 to 6 m; Prunis dulcis; sheds its oblong leaves in winter; produces white or pink flowers and blooms as early as January; the leaves appear much later; its fleshy fruit encloses a stone, which contains oil

Localization.Gloss: 路斯（lù sī），《思》路次。伯特利城原本的迦南名字。Luz

Terms.Localization: town; Bethel

Localization.Gloss: 木板／板。表面平滑的扁平物；通常用木製成；是建築或裝飾的物料。board, plank

Terms.Localization: flat object with a smooth surface; usually made of wood; used for construction or decoration

Localization.Gloss: 石版／法版。石頭製成的小書寫板，要用鐵筆來書寫，常指恒久不變的狀況。(stone) tablet

Terms.Localization: small, flat tablet, made of stone, on which words were scratched with a stylus; associated with conditions that are permanent and are not likely to change

Localization.Gloss: 魯希（lǔ xī），《思》路希特。位於摩押一個海拔相對較高的地方。Luhith

Terms.Localization: location; Moab

Localization.Gloss: 羅得（luó dé），《思》羅特。哈蘭的兒子，亞伯拉罕的侄兒。Lot

Terms.Localization: son of Haran; nephew of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 羅坍（luó tān），《思》羅堂。西珥的長子，何利人的族長之一。Lotan

Terms.Localization: son of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 利未人（lì wèi rén），《思》肋未人。利未祭司支派的成員。Levite

Terms.Localization: of the priestly tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 利未（lì wèi），《思》肋未。雅各的兒子；利未支派的始祖。Levi

Terms.Localization: man; son of Jacob; founder of tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 利未人（lì wèi rén），《思》肋未人。利未祭司支派的成員。Levite

Terms.Localization: of the priestly tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 力威亞探；巨型海怪。生活在海里的大型神話怪物，象征埃及及其神明，也象征亞述和巴比倫，因而是以色列的大仇敵。sea monster, Leviathan

Terms.Localization: a mythical sea animal of gigantic proportions; symbolized Egypt and its gods, and also Assyria and Babylon, thus the great enemies of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 利希（lì xī），《思》肋希。地點；在非利士邊界上的一個地點。Lehi

Terms.Localization: location; on the boundary of Philistea

Localization.Gloss: 陳設餅；供餅；聖餅。獻祭的聖餅，常放在聖殿的專用桌子上。bread of display; bread of the Presence; sacred bread

Terms.Localization: sacred bread of offering, always present on a dedicated table in the temple

Localization.Gloss: 拉哈米（lā hā mǐ），《思》拉赫米。迦特人歌利亞的兄弟，非利士的軍人。Lahmi

Terms.Localization: from Gath; brother of Goliath; Philistine

Localization.Gloss: 拉幔（lā màn），《思》拉赫瑪斯。猶大支派屬地的高原城鎮之一，位於別是巴以北。Lahmas

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 岩薔薇；沒藥。芳從一種矮灌木的多毛葉子中提取的香、粘稠的汁液；汁液變硬、磨成粉末後作藥用和香水。ladanum; fragrant sap

Terms.Localization: fragrant sticky juice from the hairy leaves of a low shrub; Cistus laurifolius (rock rose); juice is hardened and ground for medicine, perfume

Localization.Gloss: 《現》蜥蜴，《和》守宮。體型較小的蜥蜴，長約 15-20 釐米；皮膚光滑、有光澤、有顏色；以昆蟲為食，生活在果園和森林；又或者是一種較大型的蜥蜴，長約 50-60 釐米；暗灰色；雄蜥蜴在交配的季節顏色會變得明亮；以昆蟲和小蜥蜴為食；蜥蜴被列為不潔淨的動物，因而不能食用。lizard

Terms.Localization: relatively small type of lizard, about 15-20 cm long; shiny, smooth, and colored skin; feeds on insects and is found in orchards and woods; Lacerta trilineata; or, larger type, about 50-60 cm long; dull gray color, except in mating season when the male is brightly colored; feeds on insects and smaller lizards; Agama stellio; lizards are listed as unclean, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 《現》利都是人（lì dū shì rén），《和》利都是族，《思》肋突興人。族群；亞伯拉罕的兒子約珊的後裔。Letushim

Terms.Localization: people; descendants of Jokshan

Localization.Gloss: 《現》妖魔鬼怪，《和》怪物。確切意思不明；可能是灰林鴞的另一個名字；或：一種小耳朵、灰色具有雜斑的貓頭鷹；白天棲息在靠近樹幹的地方，帶斑點的顏色與樹皮融合在一起，使其看起來就像折斷的樹幹；叫聲輕柔，有顫音；與魔鬼有關。tawny owl; scops owl

Terms.Localization: exact meaning unknown; possibly another name for the tawny owl; or, type of owl with tiny ears; mottled gray in color; by day it perches close to the trunk of a tree, where its mottled coloring makes it look like the stump of a broken branch; soft, trilled call; associated with demons

Localization.Gloss: 強壯的獅子。公獅子； 一種強壯無畏的動物。mighty lion

Terms.Localization: male lion; seen as a strong and fearless animal

Localization.Gloss: 拉億（lā yì），《思》拉依士。「但」城（Dan）的原稱，位於加利利海以北，哥蘭高地的北部邊界。Laish

Terms.Localization: previous name of town of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 拉億（lā yì），《思》拉依士。迦琳人；米甲的丈夫帕鐵的父親；米甲曾嫁給大衛。Laish

Terms.Localization: from Gallim; father of Palti, who married Michal, David's wife

Localization.Gloss: 萊煞（lái shā），《思》拉依士。便雅憫支派之地，位於耶路撒冷的東北方。Laishah

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 利迦（lì jiā），《思》肋加。猶大支派示拉的兒子珥所建立的城鎮。Lekah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 拉吉（lā jí），《思》拉基士。猶大支派的高原城鎮之一，在希伯崙西面，位於往迦薩的路上。Lachish

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 利慕伊勒（lì mù yī lè），《思》肋慕耳。撰寫《箴言》31:1-9中提到的王。Lemuel

Terms.Localization: king

Localization.Gloss: 拉麥（lā mài），《思》拉默客。瑪土撒利的兒子，該隱的後裔。Lamech

Terms.Localization: son of Methushael; descendant of Cain

Localization.Gloss: 拉麥（lā mài），《思》拉默客。瑪土撒拉的兒子，塞特的後裔。Lamech

Terms.Localization: son of Methuselah; descendant of Seth

Localization.Gloss: 拉大（lā dà），《思》拉阿達。猶大支派人，示拉的兒子，瑪利沙的創建者。Laadah

Terms.Localization: son of Shelah; founder of Maresha; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 拉但（lā dàn），《思》拉丹。以法蓮支派人，他罕的兒子，約書亞的先祖。Ladan

Terms.Localization: son of Tahan; ancestor of Joshua; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 拉但（lā dàn），《思》拉當。利未支派革順家族的子孫。Ladan

Terms.Localization: descendant of Gershon; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 《現》苦果／毒藥，《和》茵蔯／苦菜。可長至灌木大小、葉子具有棉狀毛的一種植物，其葉子的汁液有苦味，可能有毒；作藥用。wormwood

Terms.Localization: plant that may grow as large as a bush, with woolly green leaves; the juice of the leaves tastes bitter and can be poisonous; functions as medicine

Localization.Gloss: 拉比多（lā bǐ duō），《思》拉丕多特。女士師、女先知底波拉的丈夫。Lappidoth

Terms.Localization: husband of Deborah, prophetess and judge

Localization.Gloss: 拉共（lā gòng），《思》拉孔。拿弗他利支派屬地的堅固城之一，位於耶斯列北面，加利利湖的南端。Lakkum

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 利克希（lì kè xī），《思》里刻希。瑪拿西支派人，示米大的兒子。Likhi

Terms.Localization: son of Shemida; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 紅鋯石；紫瑪瑙。紅色或橙色的（半）寶石；可能是鋯石的一種：紅鋯石。jacinth

Terms.Localization: (semi-)precious stone of red or orange color; possibly variety of zircon: jacinth

Localization.Gloss: 利善（lì shàn），《思》肋笙。城鎮；在但的境內。Leshem

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 拉沙（lā shā），《思》肋沙。位於迦南境內的南部邊界的一座城鎮。Lasha

Terms.Localization: town

Localization.Gloss: 《現》榖倉，《和》倉廩。用來儲存穀物的房舍；通常用石頭建成。granary

Terms.Localization: building used for storing grain; usually made of stone

Localization.Gloss: 天平，秤。用繩子綁在木棒的中央，兩端各連接著一個盤子的一種裝置，用以稱量重量，有時用作比喻，以重量來描述人的地位或道德，或情況的嚴重性。balance; scales

Terms.Localization: contraption consisting of rod held by a cord in the middle and with pans attached to both ends; used for weighing objects; sometimes used figuratively in expressions describing people's status or integrity or the seriousness of a situation in terms of weight

Localization.Gloss: 咒詛%＝針對某人或某物的一種宣告，要把他們交付死亡、損壞或毀滅。curse

Terms.Localization: a pronouncement against someone or something, calling for death, damage, or destruction

Localization.Gloss: 彌伯哈。男性；哈基利的兒子戰士；大衛的勇士之一。Mibhar

Terms.Localization: son of Hagri; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 自信；信靠；安全。一種安全、感到自信的狀態。safety; confidence; trust

Terms.Localization: a state of security, feeling of confidence

Localization.Gloss: 米本乃。戶沙人；大衛的勇士之一。Mebunnai

Terms.Localization: from Hushah; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 米比薩（mǐ bǐ sà），《思》米貝匝爾。以東人的族長之一。Mibzar

Terms.Localization: chief of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 米比衫（mǐ bǐ shān），《思》米貝散。以實瑪利的兒子。Mibsam

Terms.Localization: son of Ishmael

Localization.Gloss: 米比衫（mǐ bǐ shān），《思》米貝散。西緬支派人，沙龍的兒子，米施瑪的父親。Mibsam

Terms.Localization: son of Shallum; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 末必（mò bì），《思》瑪革彼士。被擄歸回時期的家族族長之一。Magbish

Terms.Localization: family head; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 米吉多（mǐ jí duō），《思》默基多。瑪拿西支派地業內的一座城鎮；位於耶斯列山谷西南方；在以前的迦南帝國境內；猶大王約西亞與法老尼哥打戰被殺的地點。Megiddo

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 塔。用石頭做成、相當高的建築；用來保衛和防禦來自外部的敵對勢力；מִגְדָּל。tower

Terms.Localization: high structure made of stone; for guarding and protecting against hostile forces from outside; מִגְדָּל

Localization.Gloss: 瑪基疊（mǎ jī dié），《思》瑪革狄耳。以東人的族長之一。Magdiel

Terms.Localization: chief of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 塔。用石頭做成、相當高的建築；用來保衛和防禦來自外部的敵對勢力；與安全和保護有關。watchtower

Terms.Localization: relatively high structure made of stone; used for guarding the surrounding area and/or for providing protection against hostile forces from outside; associated with security and protection

Localization.Gloss: 密奪。在埃及東北、鄰近紅海的一個地點；靠近比哈希錄；以色列從埃及前往迦南途中，未穿過紅海之前，曾在這裡紮營。Migdol

Terms.Localization: location; Egypt; along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 密大‧伊勒。拿弗他利支派地業內的一座堅固城。Migdal-El

Terms.Localization: fortified town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 麥大‧迦得（mài dà-jiā de），《思》米革達耳加得。猶大支派地業的城鎮之一，位於希伯崙以東。Migdal-Gad

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》百樓（bǎi lóu），《和》哈米亞樓（hā mĭ yà lóu），《思》默阿堡。耶路撒冷城牆的塔樓之一。Tower of a Hundred

Terms.Localization: Tower of the Hundred; tower in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 《現》以得塔（yǐ de tǎ），《和》以得台（yǐ de tái），《思》米革達耳厄德爾。以得塔，以色列民出埃及時的營地之一，位置不詳。Migdal Eder

Terms.Localization: location; "tower of Eder"

Localization.Gloss: 示劍樓。位於示劍附近的一座城鎮，或在示劍內的一座建築。Tower of Shechem

Terms.Localization: town; near Shechem, or construction within Shechem

Localization.Gloss: 瑪各。雅弗的兒子；被認為是相同名字的國家的建立者。Magog

Terms.Localization: son of Japheth

Localization.Gloss: 鐮刀。有短木柄（15-20釐米）的大彎刀，用來收割穀物。sickle

Terms.Localization: large, curved knife with a short wooden handle (15-20 cm); used for cutting grain

Localization.Gloss: 經卷／書卷。用一張張的蒲草紙或皮革縫製而成的書寫材料，通常兩端各有一木棍，書卷可繞著木棍從一端或兩端捲起來。這種書卷攤開來約長10米，高約23-25釐米。scroll

Terms.Localization: long strip of writing material made by sewing together sheets of papyrus or parchment; this strip was then rolled up from one end or from both ends to form one or two cylinders; usually the ends of the scroll were attached to sticks, around which the scroll was rolled; an unrolled scroll was often about 10 m long and stood approximately 23-25 cm high

Localization.Gloss: 盾牌。扁平狀，通常為圓形的物件；木頭或鐵製成；用於戰爭；戰士拿在身前以保護自己免受敵人武器的攻擊；比צִנָּה小。shield

Terms.Localization: flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; smaller than a צִנָּה

Localization.Gloss: 盾牌；保護者。「盾牌」的引申義，描述上帝的保護。shield; protector

Terms.Localization: figurative extension of meaning of 'shield,' to describe God's protection

Localization.Gloss: 打擊，瘟疫，擊敗。字面意思：沉重的打擊；嚴重的傷害，損傷、流行病，或影響個人或群體的其他疾苦。blow, plague, defeat

Terms.Localization: literally: heavy blow; serious harm, injury, epidemic, or other affliction affecting an individual or group of people

Localization.Gloss: 抹比押（mǒ bǐ yā），《思》瑪革丕阿士。被擄歸回後隨同尼希米簽約遵守神律法的民眾首領之一。Magpiash

Terms.Localization: chief; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 鋸子，磨石刨子，石銼刀。好像銼刀、表面粗糙的鐵器工具，在大石上來回推拉，可使其表面平滑。stone plane; stone file

Terms.Localization: heavy metal instrument with a wide rough surface, like that of a file; pushed and pulled across the surface of the stone until it is smooth

Localization.Gloss: 米磯崙（mǐ jī lún），《思》米革龍／禾場。便雅憫支派地業的城鎮之一，在基比亞附近。Migron

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 瑪頓（mǎ dùn），《思》瑪冬。約書亞所攻擊的迦南城鎮之一，位於基尼烈城的西南方。Madon

Terms.Localization: location; Canaan

Localization.Gloss: 瑪代。雅弗的兒子；瑪代人的祖先。Madai, Media, Mede

Terms.Localization: son of Japheth; ancestor of Medians

Localization.Gloss: 瑪代。雅弗的兒子；瑪代人的祖先。Madai, Media, Mede

Terms.Localization: son of Japheth; ancestor of Medians

Localization.Gloss: 密丁（mì dīng），《思》米丁。猶大支派在曠野的城鎮之一，位於耶路撒冷以東，亞割谷的荒原之內。Middin

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 米甸人（mǐ diàn rén），《思》米德楊人。亞伯拉罕和基土拉所生的兒子米甸及其後裔的族名及所住之地的名稱。Midian

Terms.Localization: son of Abraham; people, land

Localization.Gloss: 米甸人（mǐ diàn rén）／米甸的，《思》米德楊人／米德楊的。亞伯拉罕的兒子米甸的後裔或居民。Midianite

Terms.Localization: descendant or inhabitant of Midian, son of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 瑪得緬（mǎ dé miǎn），《思》瑪德門。位於死海以東的摩押之地；可能是底本。Madmen

Terms.Localization: location; Moab; perhaps Dibon

Localization.Gloss: 麥瑪拿（mài mǎ ná），《思》瑪德瑪納。猶大支派儘南邊的城鎮之一，與以東交界相近。Madmannah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 瑪得米那（mǎ dé mǐ nà rén），《思》瑪德默納。便雅憫支派地業內的一座城鎮。Madmenah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 米但（mǐ dàn），《思》默丹。亞伯拉罕的兒子之一。Medan

Terms.Localization: son of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 米戶幔（mǐ hù màn），《思》默胡曼。亞哈隨魯王的七個太監之一。Mehuman

Terms.Localization: eunuch; servant of king Ahasuerus (Xerxes)

Localization.Gloss: 米希她別（mǐ xī tā bié），《思》默塔貝耳。瑪特列的女兒，以東王哈達的妻子。Mehetabel

Terms.Localization: daughter of Matred; wife of Hadar, king of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 米希大別（mǐ xī dà bié），《思》默塔貝耳。尼希米時期的假先知示瑪雅的祖父。Mehetabel

Terms.Localization: man

Localization.Gloss: 瑪勒列（mǎ lè liè），《思》瑪拉肋耳。塞特的後裔，該南的兒子，雅列的父親。Mahalalel

Terms.Localization: son of Kenan; descendant of Seth

Localization.Gloss: 瑪勒列（mǎ lè liè），《思》瑪拉肋耳。猶大支派人，法勒斯的兒子，示法提雅的父親；尼希米時期的人物。Mahalalel

Terms.Localization: father of Shephatiah; tribe of Judah; time of Nehemiah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》快搶、速奪，《和》瑪黑珥‧沙拉勒‧哈施‧罷斯（mă hēi ĕr-shā lā lè-hā shī-bà sī），《思》瑪赫爾沙拉耳哈市巴次。以賽亞給他第三個兒子所起的名字，意思是「擄掠速臨搶奪快到」，象徵以色列和亞蘭即將被亞述所滅，不能進侵猶大。Maher-Shalal-Hash-Baz

Terms.Localization: son of prophet Isaiah; "Quick to the plunder, swift to the spoil"

Localization.Gloss: 瑪哈萊（mǎ hā lái），《思》瑪哈賴。猶大地謝拉族的尼陀法人，大衛的勇士之一。Maharai

Terms.Localization: of Netophah; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 摩押（mó yā），《思》摩阿布。羅得長女所生的兒子摩押與其後裔的族名，並其所居之地，位於死海東邊的地區。Moab

Terms.Localization: son of Lot; people, land

Localization.Gloss: 摩押人（mó yā rén），《思》摩阿布人。摩押的後裔或摩押地的居民。Moabite

Terms.Localization: descendant or inhabitant of Moab

Localization.Gloss: 軛。見מוֹטָה。yoke

Terms.Localization: מוֹטָה

Localization.Gloss: 軛。套在動物或人的頸項上的木棒，用一根繩索來控制，可以限制被套者的行動，防止他逃脫；這詞經常用來比喻壓迫；מוֹט。yoke

Terms.Localization: wooden pole secured to the necks of animals or human beings with the help of a rope to restrict movement or to prevent escape; often used in a figurative sense to denote oppression; מוֹט

Localization.Gloss: 割包皮；割禮。某人移除陰莖上的包皮的動作，最好是用火石刀；亞伯拉罕的後代跟上帝之間立約的記號；被視為一種外在改變 , 這種改變應該連帶產生態度上的內在改變。（見[b]）to circumsize; circumcision

Terms.Localization: action whereby someone removes the foreskin of the penis, preferably with a flint knife, as a sign of the covenant between YHWH and Abraham's descendants; considered an outward change for the good that should be accompanied by an inward change in attitude as well (see [b])

Localization.Gloss: （一個人的心）受割禮 >委身（跟隨上帝）。字面意思：移除心臟的包皮；因此：＝某人面對上主改變他／她的態度，就好像移除包在心臟外的東西，就像移除包皮一樣，這樣，心便變得樂意守約、全心事奉上帝。to circumsize (one's heart) > to (re)commit oneself (to following God)

Terms.Localization: literally: to remove the foreskin of the heart; hence: action whereby someone changes his/her attitude towards YHWH, as if by removing something that covers the heart like a foreskin, and so become willing to obey the terms of the covenant and serve YHWH wholeheartedly

Localization.Gloss: 使……受割禮；切除。確切含義不明；可能是：殺害未受割禮的敵人，割下包皮做證據。to cause to be circumsized; to cut off

Terms.Localization: exact meaning unknown; probably: to kill an uncircumsized enemy, and remove his foreskin as proof

Localization.Gloss: 摩拉大。猶大、西緬支派地業內的城鎮。Moladah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah, Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 後代，家族。後代，家族。offspring, family

Terms.Localization: offspring, family

Localization.Gloss: 割禮。某人移除陰莖上的包皮的動作，最好是用火石刀，亞伯拉罕的後代跟上帝之間立約的記號。circumcision

Terms.Localization: action whereby someone removes the foreskin of the penis, preferably with a flint knife, as a sign of the covenant between YHWH and Abraham's descendants

Localization.Gloss: 摩利。耶拉篾的後裔；猶大支派人。Molid

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 摩西錄（mó xī lù），《思》摩色爾。מֹסֵרֹות；以色列人出埃及時在曠野的營地之一。Moserah

Terms.Localization: מֹסֵרֹות; location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 指定的節期。指定的節期。appointed feast

Terms.Localization: appointed feast

Localization.Gloss: 摩亞底（mó yà dǐ），《思》摩阿狄雅。被擄歸回時期的一個祭司。Moadiah

Terms.Localization: priest; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 證據，警告，預兆，記號。證據，警告，預兆，記號。example, symbol, sign

Terms.Localization: example, symbol, sign

Localization.Gloss: 神蹟奇事，預兆，兆頭。神蹟奇事，預兆，兆頭。miracle, wonder

Terms.Localization: miracle, wonder

Localization.Gloss: 摩撒（mó sā），《思》摩匝。猶大支派人，迦勒的兒子。Moza

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 摩撒（mó sā），《思》摩匝。便雅憫支派掃羅的後裔，心利的兒子，比尼亞的父親。Moza

Terms.Localization: son of Zimri; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 圈套，網羅。用來抓動物的圈套；與侵略和控制相關。trap

Terms.Localization: contraption used for catching animals; associated with aggression and control

Localization.Gloss: 驚恐／畏懼／大而可畏。驚恐／畏懼／大而可畏。fear, awe

Terms.Localization: fear, awe

Localization.Gloss: 釘耙／尖利的器具／打麥板／打糧的器具。一種木製的板，板上有尖石或鐵耙嵌在一些小洞孔裡；由役畜拖拉著這種器具，在收割下來的穀物上拖動，使穀粒與穀殼或稻草分離；象徵權力和侵略。threshing-sledge

Terms.Localization: wooden board with sharp stones or pieces of iron tightly wedged into small holes; dragged over harvested grain with the help of a draft animal to separate grain from straw or husk; symbol of power and aggression

Localization.Gloss: 剃頭刀。利刀，用來刮去皮膚上的毛髮。razor

Terms.Localization: sharp knife, used to shave hair from the skin

Localization.Gloss: 摩利（mó lì），《思》摩勒。示劍的一個地方或一個人。Moreh

Terms.Localization: person or location

Localization.Gloss: 摩利岡（mó lì gāng），《思》摩勒山。位於米吉多平原東端的小山岡。Moreh

Terms.Localization: hill

Localization.Gloss: 摩利設‧迦特（mó lì shè-jiā tè），《思》摩勒舍特加特。猶大支派希伯崙西北方的城鎮。Moresheth-Gath

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》摩利沙人（mó lì shā rén）／摩利設人（mó lì shè rén），《和》摩利沙人（mó lì shā rén），《思》摩勒舍特人。摩利設‧迦特的居民。of Moresheth

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Moresheth-Gath

Localization.Gloss: 母示（mǔ shì），《思》慕史。利未的孫子，米拉利的第二個兒子。Mushi

Terms.Localization: son of Merari; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 《現》母示（族）（mǔ shì (zú)），《和》母示族（mǔ shì zú），《思》慕史族。利未支派人，母示的後裔。Mushite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Mushi; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 救恩；拯救者。救恩。salvation, rescuer

Terms.Localization: salvation

Localization.Gloss: 燔祭壇。殿裡用火獻祭的壇。altar of burnt offering

Terms.Localization: temple altar for sacrifices offered by fire

Localization.Gloss: 米撒。男性；以掃的兒子流珥的兒子。Mizzah

Terms.Localization: son of Reuel, son of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 圈套，網羅。用來抓動物的圈套；與侵略和控制相關。trap

Terms.Localization: contraption; used for catching animals; associated with aggression and control

Localization.Gloss: 史官。可能是在王室宮廷負責國家紀錄和文件的人。recorder, chronicler

Terms.Localization: recorder, chronicler

Localization.Gloss: 慎重／謀略。慎重／謀略。discretion

Terms.Localization: discretion

Localization.Gloss: 計畫；計謀。人或神明想出來要完成特定目的的計畫或策略；用在人身上時只有負面的意思。plan, purpose, device, scheme

Terms.Localization: plan, purpose, device, scheme

Localization.Gloss: 詩歌／詩。詩歌／詩。psalm

Terms.Localization: psalm

Localization.Gloss: 鐮刀，剪枝刀。一種刀或金屬刀刃，有時連接著長木柄；用來剪去不結果的枝子，令作物產量增加。pruning knife

Terms.Localization: knife or metal blade, sometimes attached to a long wooden handle; used for cutting away or cutting back unproductive branches so they can produce better

Localization.Gloss: 杈子／簸箕。像叉子的一種木製工具，有五至七個尖齒，可以把打過的穀物揚到空中，借助風力使稻草和糠秕從穀粒分離；在修辭手法上，簸穀常用來比喻區別好壞的過程。winnowing fork

Terms.Localization: wooden fork-like implement with five to seven prongs, for throwing threshed grain into the air so that the wind separates the straw and chaff from the grain; winnowing is often used as a figure of speech to denote the process of distinguishing between good and bad

Localization.Gloss: 赦免。抹去（罪）；赦免。forgive

Terms.Localization: wipe out (sins) forgive

Localization.Gloss: 《現》消滅／清除，《和》除滅／塗抹／擦淨。抹去；毀滅。destroy

Terms.Localization: wipe (out) destroy

Localization.Gloss: 圓尺／圓規。用來畫圓的工具。compass

Terms.Localization: tool for drawing or marking circles

Localization.Gloss: 米戶雅利（mǐ hù yǎ lì），《思》默胡雅耳。該隱的後裔，以諾的孫子，以拿的兒子，瑪土撒利的父親。Mehujael

Terms.Localization: son of Irad; descendant of Cain

Localization.Gloss: 跳舞／圓舞。跳舞／圓舞。round dance

Terms.Localization: round dance

Localization.Gloss: 瑪曷（mǎ hé），《思》瑪曷耳。大衛時代的哲士希幔、甲各、達大的父親。Mahol

Terms.Localization: father of Calcol and Darda, wise men, time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 瑪哈秀（mǎ hā xiù），《思》瑪哈齊約特。希幔的兒子，大衞委派的聖殿樂師之一。Mahazioth

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Asher (with emendation)

Localization.Gloss: 瑪拉（mǎ lā），《思》瑪赫拉。瑪拿西支派人西羅非哈的第一個女兒。Mahlah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Zelophehad; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 瑪拉（mǎ lā），《思》瑪赫拉。瑪拿西的後裔，基列的妹子哈摩利吉的兒子。Mahlah

Localization.Gloss: 抹利（mǒ lì）／末力（mò lì），《思》瑪赫里。利未支派米拉利的兒子，母示的兄弟。Mahli

Terms.Localization: son of Merari; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 末力（mò lì），《思》瑪赫里。利未支派人；米拉利的孫子，母示的兒子。Mahli

Localization.Gloss: 抹利族（mŏ lì zú）／瑪利族（mǎ lì zú），《思》瑪赫里家族。米拉利的兒子抹利的後裔；利未支派人。Mahlite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Mahli; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 瑪哈拉。以實馬利的女兒；以掃的妻子。Mahalath

Localization.Gloss: 瑪哈拉。耶利末的女兒；猶大王羅波安的妻子。Mahalath

Terms.Localization: daughter of Jerimoth; wife of Rehoboam, king of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 米何拉人。亞伯‧米何拉的居民。Meholathite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Abel-Meholah

Localization.Gloss: 瑪哈念（mǎ hā niàn），《思》瑪哈納殷／瑪哈納因。迦得支派地業內的一座城鎮；分配給利未人。Mahanaim

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 避難所；庇護所。提供庇護和安全的地方。refuge, shelter

Terms.Localization: a place that provides shelter and safety

Localization.Gloss: 嚼環。用繩子或皮條做成的網套，用來套在動物的嘴上，防止牠亂咬亂吃；用來比喻一種阻止人說話的裝置。muzzle

Terms.Localization: a guard made of rope or leather strips formed into a loose mesh, placed over or around the mouth of an animal to prevent it from biting or eating; used figuratively to refer to a device that keeps human beings from talking

Localization.Gloss: 《現》瑪西雅（mǎ xī yǎ）／瑪西亞（mǎ xī yà），《和》瑪西雅，《思》瑪赫色雅。尼利亞的父親，巴錄和西萊雅的祖父。Mahseiah

Terms.Localization: son of Amasai; tribe of Levi; time of Hezekiah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Reuben, Moab

Localization.Gloss: 米達（mǐ dá），《思》默達得。以色列的長老；摩西時期的人物。Medad

Terms.Localization: elder of Israel; time of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 米迦（mǐ jiā），《思》米加。便雅憫支派米非波設的兒子，約拿單的孫子，掃羅的曾孫。Mica

Terms.Localization: descendant of king Saul; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 米迦（mǐ jiā），《思》米加。利未支派亞薩的子孫，撒底、細基利的兒子，瑪他尼的父親。Mica

Terms.Localization: son of Zichri, Zabdi; father of Mattaniah, Levite

Localization.Gloss: 米迦（mǐ jiā），《思》米加。被擄歸回時期在尼希米的約上簽名的利未人之一。Mica

Terms.Localization: Levite; after exile

Terms.Localization: father of Sethur, spy; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 米迦勒（mǐ jiā lè），《思》米加耳。利未支派人，聖殿的樂師，亞薩的曾祖父，巴西雅的兒子。Michael

Localization.Gloss: 米迦勒（mǐ jiā lè），《思》米加耳。瑪拿西支派人；大衛的勇士之一。Michael

Localization.Gloss: 米迦勒（mǐ jiā lè），《思》米加耳。大衛時期以薩迦支派的軍事首領暗利的父親。Michael

Terms.Localization: father of Omri, chief; tribe of Issachar; time of David

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 米該雅（mǐ gāi yǎ），《思》米加雅。音拉的兒子，以色列王亞哈時期的先知。Micah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》米該亞（mǐ gāi yà），《和》米迦（mǐ jiā），《思》米加。約西亞時期亞比頓的父親。Micah

Terms.Localization: woman; daughter of Uriel; mother of Abijah

Localization.Gloss: 米該亞（mǐ gāi yà），《思》米加雅。猶大王約沙法時期猶大的首領之一。Micaiah

Localization.Gloss: 米迦（mǐ jiā），《思》米加。以法蓮山地的一個人。Micah, Micaiah
