Localization.Gloss: 亞拉得。比利亞的兒子；便雅憫支派的族長之一。Arad

Terms.Localization: son of Beria; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 野驢。體型相對較小的野生驢，耳朵長，尾巴呈簇狀；淺棕色，脊背和肩膀有一條深色的條紋，前腿下部也有條紋；是努比亞野驢的一種。wild ass

Terms.Localization: wild donkey of a relatively small size with long ears and a tufted tail; light brown color with a dark stripe down its spine and across its shoulders, and stripes on the lower part of its forelegs; Asinus asinus africanus - Nubian wild ass

Localization.Gloss: 機敏的，狡猾的，謹慎的。形容機敏的，狡猾的，謹慎的。crafty, prudent, cunning

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being crafty, prudent, cunning

Localization.Gloss: 亞羅珥。呂便支派地業內的一座城鎮。Aroer

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 亞羅珥人。亞羅珥的居民。Aroerite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Aroer

Localization.Gloss: 以利（yǐ lì），《思》厄黎。迦得的兒子，並其後裔。Eri

Terms.Localization: son of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 以利族（yǐ lì zú），《思》厄黎家族。迦得的兒子以利的後裔。Erite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Er; tribe of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 強大，強暴，凶狠。強大，強暴，凶狠。mighty, violent, ruthless

Terms.Localization: mighty, violent, ruthless

Localization.Gloss: 被認為是禁止的；被視為不潔淨的。比喻未受割禮的，因為這是禁止或在禮儀上不潔淨的。regard as forbidden; consider unclean

Terms.Localization: figuratively: regard as uncircumcised regard as forbidden or ritually unclean

Localization.Gloss: 蒙羞，被羞辱。比喻未受割禮的，可能是：露出一個人的身體（和未受割禮的情況），從而使其成為被嘲笑的對象。be disgraced

Terms.Localization: figuratively: be regarded as uncircumcised perhaps: expose one's nakedness (and uncircumcised state) and thus be the object of derision

Localization.Gloss: 未受割禮的人。未受割禮的人。uncircumcised person
被禁止的。比喻：未受割禮的水果是被禁止的。forbidden

Terms.Localization: figuratively: uncircumcised fruit forbidden

Localization.Gloss: 不能聽見；不願聽見。比喻未受割禮的耳朵，不擅於聆聽。unable to hear; unwilling to hear

Terms.Localization: figuratively: uncircumcised ear unskilled in listening

Localization.Gloss: 頑固的；不順服的。比喻未受割禮的心，不肯屈服。stubborn; disobedient

Terms.Localization: figuratively: uncircumcised heart unyielding heart

Localization.Gloss: 說不好的；不善言辭的。比喻未受割禮的嘴唇，不擅於說話。unable to speak well; not eloquent

Terms.Localization: figuratively: uncircumcised lips unskilled in speaking

Localization.Gloss: 包皮。覆蓋在陰莖尖端，可伸縮的皮膚皺褶。foreskin

Terms.Localization: retractable fold of skin that covers the tip of the penis

Localization.Gloss: 機敏，狡猾，謹慎。機敏，狡猾，謹慎，並以此行動。be (or: act) crafty, prudent, cunning

Terms.Localization: to be crafty, prudent, cunning and to act as such

Localization.Gloss: 狡猾；深思熟慮。機敏，狡猾，謹慎的狀態。craftiness, prudence

Terms.Localization: state of being crafty, prudent, cunning

Localization.Gloss: 梧桐樹；一種高大、伸展的樹，樹枝很大，葉子多毛，裂開的葉片呈人手狀；可長至 20 米高；樹皮容易剝下成細條狀，露出白色或黃色的內層；提供樹蔭，也被認為具有特別的美麗。plane-tree

Terms.Localization: large, wide-spreading tree with big branches and lobed, hairy leaves shaped like a hand; up to 20 m high; Platanus orientalis - Oriental plane; bark can easily be peeled off in strips, exposing the white or yellow inner layer; good shade tree and regarded as having special beauty

Localization.Gloss: 以蘭（yǐ lán），《思》厄蘭。以法蓮支派人，書提拉的兒子。Eran

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 《現》以蘭宗族（yǐ lán zōng zú），《和》以蘭族（yǐ lán zú），《思》厄蘭家族。以法蓮支派書提拉的兒子以蘭的後裔。Eranite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Eran; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 亞羅珥。在亞捫境內的一座城鎮。Aroer

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ammon

Localization.Gloss: 杜松。身份不確定，可能指矮小的灌木或樹，可達 5 米；有幼細革質的小葉和莓果狀的小毬果。juniper tree?

Terms.Localization: identification uncertain; perhaps: short shrub or tree that may reach 5 m in height; with tiny leathery leaflets and small berry-like cones; Juniperus phoenicea - Phoenician juniper

Localization.Gloss: 《現》娥珥巴（é ĕr bā），《和》俄珥巴，《思》敖爾帕。摩押女子，以利米勒與拿俄米的兒子基連的妻子。Orpah

Terms.Localization: from Moab; wife of Chilion, son of Elimelech

Localization.Gloss: 亞基人（yà jī rén），《思》阿爾克人。含的兒子迦南的後裔。Arkite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Canaan

Localization.Gloss: 亞撒黑（yà sā hēi），《思》阿撒耳。大衛的外甥，洗魯雅的兒子，約押和亞比篩的兄弟，後來成為大衞三十勇士之一，以「腳快如野鹿一般」著名。Asahel

Terms.Localization: son of Zeruiah, sister of David; warrior

Localization.Gloss: 亞撒黑（yà sā hēi），《思》阿撒耳。利未支派人，猶大王約沙法差遣他到各城教導百姓神的律法。Asahel

Terms.Localization: Levite; time of king Jehoshaphat

Localization.Gloss: 亞撒黑（yà sā hēi），《思》阿撒耳。猶大王希西家和管理神殿的亞撒利雅所委派的聖殿督理之一。Asahel

Terms.Localization: official; time of king Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 亞撒黑（yà sā hēi），《思》阿撒耳。被擄歸回時期，反對以斯拉要求猶太人離棄外邦妻子的命令的約拿單的父親。Asahel

Terms.Localization: father of Jonathan; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 以掃（yǐ sǎo），《思》厄撒烏。以撒和利百加的長子，雅各的雙胞胎兄弟，以東人的始祖。Esau

Terms.Localization: son of Isaac; ancestor of Edomites

Localization.Gloss: 亞薛（yà xuē），《思》阿息耳。西緬支派人，西萊雅的父親。Asiel

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 亞撒雅（yà sā yǎ），《思》阿撒雅。猶大王約西亞的臣僕，被差遣去見女先知戶勒大，詢問律法書的事情。Asaiah

Terms.Localization: servant of king Josiah

Localization.Gloss: 亞帥雅（yà shuài yǎ），《思》阿撒雅。西緬支派的族長之一。Asaiah

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 亞帥雅（yà shuài yǎ），《思》阿撒雅。利未支派的族長之一，米拉利的後裔，哈基雅的兒子。Asaiah

Terms.Localization: son of Haggiah; descendant of Merari; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 亞帥雅（yà shuài yǎ），《思》阿撒雅。被擄歸回後猶大支派人，示羅的子孫，住在耶路撒冷，另稱「瑪西雅」。Asaiah

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Judah; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 蛀蟲，蟲，蛾。褐色或灰色的小蛾，在衣服或布下卵；卵孵成非常幼小的毛蟲，以纖維為食；象徵腐敗、毀壞和慢慢毀滅；這個詞另一個可能的意思是：一個星座，通常等同於「大熊座」或「北斗七星」，後者是「大熊座」的一部分。moth

Terms.Localization: smallish brown or gray moth that lays eggs in clothing or other cloth; eggs hatch into very small caterpillars, which feed on the fibers; Tineidae family, probably Tineola biselliella; symbols of decay, ruin, and slow destruction. Another possible meaning of this word: a constellation, often identified with the "Great Bear" or the "Big Dipper" which is part of the "Great Bear"

Localization.Gloss: 亞施法（yà shī fǎ），《思》阿市瓦特。亞設的後裔，雅弗勒的兒子。Ashvath

Terms.Localization: son of Japhlet; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 亞珊（yà shān），《思》阿商。西緬支派地業內的一座城鎮，分配給利未人。Ashan

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 以設（yǐ shè），《思》厄舍克。便雅憫支派人，掃羅的兒子約拿單的後裔，亞悉的兄弟。Eshek

Terms.Localization: brother of Azel; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞斯他錄（yà sī tā lù），《思》阿舍塔洛特／阿市塔洛特。瑪拿西支派地業內的一座城鎮，分配給利未的革順族；位於約旦河東巴珊王噩的地方，是古代的交通要城。Ashtaroth

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 亞斯她錄（yà sī tā lù），《思》阿市托勒特。古代迦南地區腓尼基的女神，專司繁殖和愛情，也與戰爭有關。Ashtoreth

Terms.Localization: Phoenician goddess of love and fertility

Localization.Gloss: 亞特律‧加寧（yà tè lǜ-jiā níng），《思》阿市塔特卡爾納殷。位於巴珊的一座城鎮。Ashteroth-Karnaim

Terms.Localization: town; Bashan

Localization.Gloss: 亞施他拉人（yà shī tā lā rén），《思》阿市塔洛特人。大衞勇士之一烏西亞的家鄉「亞斯他錄」的居民。Ashterathite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Ashterah

Localization.Gloss: 以特‧加汛（yǐ tè-jiā xùn），《思》依塔卡親。西布倫支派屬地的城鎮之一，靠近拿弗他利支派的屬地，位置不詳。Eth-Kazin

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Zebulon

Localization.Gloss: 公山羊。在 צֹאן 群中的主要公山羊；與權威有關。male goat

Terms.Localization: dominant male goat in a צֹאן flock; associated with authority

Localization.Gloss: 亞太（yà tài），《思》阿泰。猶大支派人，耶拉篾的後裔，埃及人耶哈與示珊的女兒所生的兒子。Attai

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亞太（yà tài），《思》阿泰。大衞的勇士之一，是迦得人中的軍長。Attai

Terms.Localization: warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 亞太（yà tài），《思》阿泰。猶大王羅波安與押沙龍的女兒瑪迦所生的兒子。Attai

Terms.Localization: son of Rehoboam

Localization.Gloss: 亞他雅（yà tā yǎ），《思》阿塔雅。。猶大支派烏西雅的兒子，在被擄歸回後居住在耶路撒冷。Athaiah

Terms.Localization: son of Uzziah; tribe of Judah; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 亞撻（yà tà），《思》阿塔客。猶大支派屬地的城鎮，位於希伯崙之西北。Athach

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 亞勒（yà lè），《思》阿特來。被擄歸回時期，比拜的子孫，聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人之一。Athlai

Terms.Localization: man; married a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 亞她利雅（yà tā lì yǎ），《舊》亞她利雅，《思》阿塔里雅。猶大國歷史上惟一的女性執政者（公元前841-835年在位），以色列王亞哈與耶洗別的女兒，猶大王約蘭的妻子，亞哈謝的母親。Athaliah

Terms.Localization: wife of Joram; queen of Judah (841-835)

Localization.Gloss: 亞她利雅（yà tā lì yǎ），《思》阿塔里雅。便雅憫支派家族族長之一，耶羅罕的兒子。Athaliah

Terms.Localization: son of Jeroham; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 亞她利雅（yà tā lì yǎ），《思》阿塔里雅。被擄歸回時期，隨同以斯拉回歸的以攔子孫領袖耶篩亞的父親。Athaliah

Terms.Localization: father of Jeshaiah; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 俄得尼（é dé ní），《思》敖特尼。利未支派人，示瑪雅的兒子，負責聖殿守門的工作。Othni

Terms.Localization: son of Shemaiah; gatekeeper; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 俄陀聶（é tuó niè），《思》敖特尼耳。以色列人的第一位士師（公元前1374-1334年），迦勒的兄弟基納斯的兒子，他在攻取底壁城後娶得押撒為妻。Othniel

Terms.Localization: son of Kenaz; first judge of Israel (1374-1334)

Localization.Gloss: 以帖（yǐ tiē），《思》厄特爾。(1)猶大支派屬地的城鎮之一（書15.42），位於希伯崙的西北方；(2)西緬支派屬地的城鎮之一（書19.7），位置不詳。Eter

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah, Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 巴蘭（bā lán），《思》帕蘭／瑪紅。以色列人離開西奈曠野後的營地之一，位於西奈半島。Paran

Terms.Localization: desert

Localization.Gloss: 早熟的無花果。早熟的無花果。early fig

Terms.Localization: early fig

Localization.Gloss: 帕結（pà jié），《思》帕革厄耳。俄蘭的兒子，摩西時期亞設支派的首領之一。Pagiel

Terms.Localization: son of Ochran; chief; tribe of Asher; time of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 贖回。付出其他東西來代替，拯救動物或人脫離死亡或奴役的行為。to redeem

Terms.Localization: to deliver an animal or human being from death or slavery by substituting it with something else

Localization.Gloss: 讓（某人）得贖回；讓（某人）得救贖。付出其他東西來代替，使動物或人脫離死亡或奴役的行為。to let (someone) be redeemed

Terms.Localization: to cause an animal or human being to be delivered from death or slavery by substituting it with something else

Localization.Gloss: 贖回；救贖。使（人或物）脫離危險或死亡。to redeem; to deliver

Terms.Localization: to deliver from danger or death

Localization.Gloss: 比大黑。亞米忽的兒子；拿弗他利支派的族長之一。Pedahel

Terms.Localization: son of Ammihud; chief; tribe of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 比大蓿（bǐ dà sù），《思》培達族爾。瑪拿西支派的族長迦瑪列的父親。Pedahzur

Terms.Localization: father of Gamaliel; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 巴頓（bā dùn），《思》帕冬。從被擄之地歸回的尼提寧（殿役）的家族族長之一。Padon

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 《現》比大雅（bǐ dà yǎ），《和》毗大雅（pí dà yǎ），《思》培達雅。猶大王約雅敬的母親西布大的父親。Pedaiah

Terms.Localization: father of Zebidah, mother of king Jehoiakim

Localization.Gloss: 《現》比大雅（bǐ dà yǎ），《和》毗大雅（pí dà yǎ），《思》培達雅。猶大王耶哥尼雅（約雅斤）的兒子。Pedaiah

Terms.Localization: son of Jehoiachin; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》比大雅（bǐ dà yǎ），《和》毗大雅（pí dà yǎ），《思》培達雅。被擄歸回後的巴錄的兒子。Pedaiah

Terms.Localization: man; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 《現》比大雅（bǐ dà yǎ），《和》毗大雅（pí dà yǎ），《思》培達雅。被擄歸回之後的兩個利未人：(1)文士以斯拉宣講律法時，站在他右邊的其中一人；(2)尼希米時期管理庫房的人。Pedaiah

Terms.Localization: various men; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 《現》比大雅（bǐ dà yǎ），《和》毗大雅（pí dà yǎ），《思》培達雅。便雅憫支派人，哥賴雅的兒子，撒路的祖先。Pedaiah

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 《現》比大雅（bǐ dà yǎ），《和》毗大雅（pí dà yǎ），《思》培達雅。大衞的時代，管理西瑪拿西支派的約珥的父親。Pedaiah

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 《現》美索不達米亞，《和》巴旦（bā dàn），《思》帕丹。一個地點；巴旦‧亞蘭（פַּדַּן אֲרָם）的別名。Paddan

Terms.Localization: location; Paddan-aram פַּדַּן אֲרָם

Localization.Gloss: 巴旦‧亞蘭；美索不達米亞。一個地點。Paddan-aram

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 普瓦。以薩迦支派的一個人。Puah

Terms.Localization: man in Issachar's family

Localization.Gloss: 普瓦。以薩迦的兒子；פֻּוָּה。Puah

Terms.Localization: son of Issachar; פֻּוָּה

Localization.Gloss: 普瓦。以薩迦的兒子；פּוּאָה。Puvah

Terms.Localization: son of Issachar; 2- פּוּאָה

Localization.Gloss: 弗。含的兒子。Put

Terms.Localization: son of Ham

Localization.Gloss: 波提非拉（bō tí fēi lā），《思》頗提斐辣。安城的祭司，約瑟的妻子亞西納的父親。Potiphera

Terms.Localization: priest of On; father of Asenath, wife of Joseph

Localization.Gloss: 普鐵（pǔ tiě），《思》普提耳。亞倫的兒子以利亞撒之妻的父親。Putiel

Terms.Localization: father of wife of Eleazar, son of Aaron

Localization.Gloss: 波提乏（bō tí fá），《思》普提法爾。埃及王的侍衞長。Potiphar

Terms.Localization: official of king of Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 彩石。有光澤的灰色金屬。antimony

Terms.Localization: lustrous grey metalloid

Localization.Gloss: 普勒。提革拉毗列色三世；亞述王（公元前744-727年在位）。Pul

Terms.Localization: Tiglath-Pileser III; king of Assyria (744-727)

Localization.Gloss: 普勒。民族。Pul

Terms.Localization: people

Localization.Gloss: 豆子。豆科植物的種子的統稱，通常生長在豆莢中。beans

Terms.Localization: collective term for seeds, often growing in pods, of the legume family

Localization.Gloss: 普瓦（族）（pǔ wǎ (zú)），《思》普瓦家族。以薩迦的兒子普瓦的後裔。Punite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Puvah, son of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 普嫩（pǔ nèn），《思》普農。在出埃及的路線上，以色列人在曠野安營之地，位於彼特拉以北。Punon

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 普阿（pǔ ā），《思》普亞。希伯來的接生婆之一。Puah

Terms.Localization: midwife

Localization.Gloss: 《現》酒桶／踩葡萄，《和》酒醡／酒池。一個大盆，從石頭鑿出，或塗上灰泥，然後把成熟的葡萄倒進去踩壓出汁液，再從那裡流入酒槽或大桶裡；踩葡萄常用來形容上帝的忿怒和懲罰。winepress

Terms.Localization: basin; hewn out of a rock or lined with plaster into which harvested grapes were thrown and trampled to squeeze out the juice, which from there flowed into a trough or vat; treading a winepress is often used as a figure of speech to refer to God's anger and punishment

Localization.Gloss: 省長。一省的生長。governor of a province

Localization.Gloss: 省長。一省的生長。governor of a province

Terms.Localization: governor of a province

Localization.Gloss: 巴哈‧摩押。被擄歸回時期的家族族長之一。Pahath-Moab

Localization.Gloss: 黃玉；貴橄欖石。金黃色的（半）寶石，可能是黃玉或貴橄欖石。topaz, chrysolite

Terms.Localization: (semi-)precious stone of a golden yellow color, possibly topaz or chrysolite

Localization.Gloss: 錘子。一種工具，約長 30 釐米，有一個把手，通常是木做的，把手連接一塊石頭、木頭或金屬（較不常見）的頭；用途很廣，包括鑿開或修整建築用的大石，釘釘子或木樁；鐵匠也會用它來敲打燒熱的金屬，使之成型。hammer

Terms.Localization: instrument of about 30 centimeters long, consisting of a handle, usually made of wood, to which was attached a stone, wooden, or (less frequently) metal head; used for many purposes, including the breaking or dressing of building stones, pounding nails or pegs into wood, or pounding pegs into the ground; also used by blacksmiths to shape hot metal

Localization.Gloss: 比伯實（bǐ bó shí），《思》丕貝色特。埃及城鎮之一，位於古埃及的比東城以西。Pi-Beseth

Localization.Gloss: 比‧哈希錄（bǐ-hā xī lù），《思》丕哈希洛特。在出埃及的路線上，以色列人出埃及後安營之處，在埃及尼羅河三角洲東面。Pi Hahiroth

Localization.Gloss: 非各（fēi gè），《思》非苛耳。亞伯拉罕和以撒時代，非利士王亞比米勒的軍隊統帥。Phicol

Localization.Gloss: 非尼哈（fēi ní hā），《思》丕乃哈斯。以利的兩個兒子之一，何弗尼的兄弟；祭司。Phinehas

Localization.Gloss: 非尼哈（fēi ní hā），《思》丕乃哈斯。以斯拉時代的祭司以利亞撒的父親。Phinehas

Localization.Gloss: 《現》比拉提（bǐ lā tí），《和》毗拉提（pí lā tí），《思》培拉提雅。猶大支派人，所羅巴伯的後裔。Pelatiah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》宮廷侍衛隊／大衛的侍衛，《和》比利提人（bĭ lì tí rén），《思》培肋提人。大衛的王室守衛，來自非利士地或迦特城附近的地區。Pelethite

Localization.Gloss: 《現》比努伊勒（bǐ nǔ yī lè），《和》毗努伊勒（pí nǔ yī lè），《思》培奴耳。猶大支派人，基多之祖。Penuel

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Judah

Terms.Localization: one of mountains of Abarim

Localization.Gloss: 巴西亞。伊施屯的兒子；猶大支派人。Paseah

Terms.Localization: son of Eshton; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 巴西亞。從被擄之地歸回的尼提寧（殿役）的家族族長之一。Paseah

Localization.Gloss: 巴西亞。尼希米時期耶何耶大的父親。Paseah

Localization.Gloss: 逾越節；逾越節的祭牲。紀念在埃及上帝殺了埃及的長子但保存了以色列的長子的節慶及所獻的祭牲。passover; passover sacrifice

Terms.Localization: deity of Moab

Localization.Gloss: 《現》比烏利太（bǐ wū lì tài），《和》毗烏利太（pí wū lì tài），《思》培烏肋泰。大衛時期的利未支派人，俄別以東的第八子。Peullethai

Localization.Gloss: 觀察，注意；留心（某人、某事）。留意某人的不幸或痛苦，並介入以提供幫助。take notice; be mindful (of someone, something)

Terms.Localization: to take notice of someone’s misfortune or suffering and intervene in order to help

Localization.Gloss: 處理，追討責任，懲罰。對不符合倫理道德的行為作出回應、處理該負責人的人，暗示那人將受到懲罰。deal with, hold responsible for, punish

Localization.Gloss: 交付；託付，寄託。把關於某物、一群人、整個土地或國家的某種責任或權威地位給予某人。appoint, give charge of

Terms.Localization: to give someone a certain responsibility or position of authority with regards to an object, a group of people, or an entire land or nation

Localization.Gloss: 視察，顯現。視察顯現。visitation

Terms.Localization: son of Menahem; king of Israel (742/41-740/39)

Localization.Gloss: 小公牛。年幼的公牛；潔淨，用作獻祭；與權力和力量有關，但也有攻擊性，因此經常用來指具有攻擊行為的人。young bull

Terms.Localization: young male bovine; clean, used as sacrifice; associated with power and strength, but also with aggression and therefore often used to denote people who behave aggressively

Localization.Gloss: 野驢。體型較大的野生驢，耳朵較小；身體是淺黃褐色，胸部和腹部發白色；與難以馴服有關。onager

Terms.Localization: wild donkey of a relatively large size but with relatively small ears; is a fawn color with a whitish chest and belly; Persian Wild Ass or Onager, Equus hemonius; associated with untameable wildness

Localization.Gloss: 《現》比蘭（bǐ lán），《和》毗蘭（pí lán），《思》丕蘭。約書亞時期的耶末王。Piram

Terms.Localization: king of Jarmuth; time of Joshua

Localization.Gloss: 騾；騾子。公驢和母馬所生的雄性後代（也有可能是公馬和母驢所生，但較不常見）；比驢強壯，比馬或驢比較能抵抗疾病；無法生育；通常是棕色；比生牠的馬和驢的耳朵要大；用於騎行或作為馱畜；與缺少了解有關。mule

Terms.Localization: male offspring of a male donkey and a female horse (or, but less common, a male horse and a female donkey); stronger than a donkey and more resistant to diseases than horses and donkeys; infertile; usually dark brown in color; has bigger ears than the parent horse; used for riding and as pack animals; associated with a lack of understanding

Localization.Gloss: 母騾。騾；騾子。公驢和母馬所生的雌性後代（也有可能是公馬和母驢所生，但較不常見）；比驢強壯，比馬或驢比較能抵抗疾病；無法生育；通常是棕色；比生牠的馬和驢的耳朵要大；用於騎行或作為馱畜。female mule

Terms.Localization: female offspring of a male donkey and a female horse (or, but less common, a male horse and a female donkey); stronger than a donkey and more resistant to diseases than horses and donkeys; infertile; usually dark brown in color; has bigger ears than the parent horse; used for riding and as pack animals

Localization.Gloss: 年幼的母牛。年幼的母牛，用於獻祭。young cow

Terms.Localization: young cow, used for sacrifice

Localization.Gloss: 巴拉。便雅憫支派地業內的一座城鎮。Parah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 普拉。士師基甸的僕人。Purah

Terms.Localization: servant of Gideon

Localization.Gloss: 比路大（bǐ lù dà），《思》培魯達。跟隨所羅巴伯返回猶大的所羅門僕人的家族族長之一。Peruda

Terms.Localization: family head; servants of Solomon; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 帕路亞。所羅門王時期的官員約沙法的父親。Paruah

Terms.Localization: father of Jehoshaphat, official, time of king Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 巴瓦音。位於亞拉伯的一個地方。Parvaim

Terms.Localization: location in Arabia

Localization.Gloss: 鼴鼠，田鼠；老鼠。意思不確定；古代一些版本把 לַחְפֹּר פֵּרוֹת 讀作 לַחֲפַרְפָּרוֹת；是一種敘利亞鼴鼠，小型哺乳嚙齒動物，身長約 20 厘米；用大牙齒和扁平的前腳掌在地面淺層之下挖掘地道；以根和球莖為食。mole rat

Terms.Localization: exact meaning unknown; ancient versions read לַחֲפַרְפָּרוֹת for לַחְפֹּר פֵּרוֹת: that is: Syrian mole rat (Spalax leucodon ehrenbergi), a small mammal about 20 cm in length and blind; a rodent that digs tunnels underground with its large teeth and flat front paws; feeds on roots and bulbs

Localization.Gloss: 比利洗人。一個民族。Perizzite

Terms.Localization: people

Localization.Gloss: 比路大（bǐ lù dà），《思》培黎達。跟隨所羅巴伯返回猶大的所羅門僕人的家族族長之一。Perida

Terms.Localization: family head; servants of Solomon; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 帕瑪斯他（pà mǎ sī tā），《思》帕瑪市達。哈曼的兒子之一。Parmashta

Terms.Localization: son of Haman

Localization.Gloss: 帕納（pà nà），《思》帕爾納客。西布倫支派的首領以利撒番的父親。Parnach

Terms.Localization: father of Elizaphan, chief; tribe of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 波斯，波斯人。民族和領土。Persia, Persian

Terms.Localization: people, land

Localization.Gloss: 胡禿鷲或髭兀鷹。胡禿鷲或髭兀鷹。bearded vulture or lammergeier

Terms.Localization: bearded vulture or lammergeier

Localization.Gloss: 波斯人（bō sī rén），《思》波斯人。波斯的居民。Persian

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Persia

Localization.Gloss: 波斯人（bō sī rén），《思》波斯人。波斯的居民。Persian

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Persia

Localization.Gloss: 法老。埃及王。Pharaoh

Terms.Localization: title of Egyptian kings

Localization.Gloss: 跳蚤。跳蚤。flea

Terms.Localization: flea

Localization.Gloss: 巴錄（bā lù），《思》帕洛士。被擄後隨着所羅巴伯和以斯拉回歸巴勒斯坦的家族族長之一。Parosh

Terms.Localization: family head; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 比拉頓（bǐ lā dùn），《思》丕辣通。便雅憫支派的一座城鎮。Pirathon

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 比拉頓人（bǐ lā dùn rén），《思》丕辣通人。住在比拉頓的居民。Pirathonite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Pirathon

Localization.Gloss: 法珥法（河）（fǎ ěr fǎ (hé)），《思》帕爾帕爾（河）。位於敘利亞的一條河流，源於黑門山東麓，向東流入敘利亞沙漠。Pharpar

Terms.Localization: river; Syria

Localization.Gloss: 法勒斯（fǎ lè sī），《思》培勒茲。猶大的兒子。Perez

Terms.Localization: son of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 毗列斯‧烏撒。拿艮的禾場附近的一個地點；上帝在這裡擊殺了烏撒，因為他伸手摸了約櫃；פֶּרֶץ עֻזָּה。Perez Uzzah

Terms.Localization: location; פֶּרֶץ עֻזָּה

Localization.Gloss: 毗列斯‧烏撒。拿艮的禾場附近的一個地點；上帝在這裡擊殺了烏撒，因為他伸手摸了約櫃；פֶּרֶץ עֻזָּא。Perez Uzzah

Terms.Localization: location; פֶּרֶץ עֻזָּא

Localization.Gloss: 法勒斯人。猶大的長子法勒斯的後裔。Perezite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Perez, son of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》比拉心（bǐ lā xīn），《和》毗拉心（pí lā xīn），《思》培辣親。位於耶路撒冷的西南方的一座山。Perazim

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 戰馬。主要供士兵策騎的馬匹，但也用於農耕。war-horse

Terms.Localization: horse; primarily used for soldiers to ride on, but also for agricultural purposes

Localization.Gloss: 《現》比利施（bǐ lì shī），《和》毗利施（pí lì shī），《思》培勒士。瑪拿西的孫子，瑪吉的兒子。Peresh

Terms.Localization: son of Machir; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 巴珊大他（bā shān dà tā），《思》帕商大達。哈曼的兒子之一。Parshandatha

Terms.Localization: son of Haman

Localization.Gloss: 幼發拉底河（yòu fā lā dǐ hé），《舊》伯拉河，《思》幼發拉的河。流經美索不達米亞的一條河，是伊甸園的四條支流之一。Euphrates

Terms.Localization: river

Localization.Gloss: 巴施戶珥（bā shī hù ěr），《思》帕市胡爾。瑪基雅的兒子，祭司亞大雅的祖先。Pashhur

Terms.Localization: son of Malchijah; ancestor of Adaiah, priest

Localization.Gloss: 巴施戶珥（bā shī hù ěr），《思》帕市胡爾。隨同所羅巴伯回歸巴勒斯坦的一个祭司家族的族長。Pashhur

Terms.Localization: family head; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 巴施戶珥（bā shī hù ěr），《思》帕市胡爾。先知耶利米時期的一個祭司；音麥的兒子。Pashhur

Terms.Localization: son of Immer; priest; time of Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 巴施戶珥（bā shī hù ěr），《思》帕市胡爾。西底家王時期的官長基大利的父親。Pashhur

Terms.Localization: father of Gedaliah

Localization.Gloss: 反叛，反抗，違反。與權威或道德標準背道而馳的行為。rebel, revolt (against), transgress

Terms.Localization: to act in opposition to an authority or to a moral code

Localization.Gloss: 叛亂，犯罪，罪過。與權威或道德標準背道而馳的行為。rebellion, offense, transgression

Terms.Localization: an act of opposition to authority or to a moral code

Localization.Gloss: 亞麻。一種植物，其莖用來生產亞麻布。flax

Terms.Localization: plant of which the stem is used for the production of linen

Localization.Gloss: 《現》麻紗，《和》麻布。用亞麻莖部的纖維製成的布料；比許多其他布料更吸汗；用來紡布和做衣服；與品質、耐用，和涼快有關。linen

Terms.Localization: cloth made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; used for production of cloth and clothes; associated with quality, strength, and coolness

Localization.Gloss: 《現》比土珥（bǐ tǔ ěr），《和》毗土珥（pí tǔ ěr），《思》培突耳。先知約珥的父親。Pethuel

Terms.Localization: father of prophet Joel

Localization.Gloss: 雕刻。用鋒利的工具在硬物如石頭或金屬上刻成的圖案或文字。engravings

Terms.Localization: figures or characters engraved on the surface of a hard object, such as stone or metal, with a sharp tool

Localization.Gloss: 《現》比奪（bǐ duó），《和》毗奪（pí duó），《思》培托爾。美索不達米亞北部的一個地方，巴蘭的故鄉。Pethor

Terms.Localization: town; de Balaam; north of Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 刻／雕刻。用鋒利的工具在硬物如石頭或金屬上刻出圖案或文字。to engrave

Terms.Localization: to carve figures or characters on the surface of a hard object, such as stone or metal, with a sharp tool

Localization.Gloss: 《現》比他希雅（bǐ tā xī yǎ），《和》毗他希雅（pí tā xī yǎ），《思》培塔希雅。大衞時代在聖殿供職的第19班次祭司首領。Pethahiah

Terms.Localization: priest; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 《現》比他希雅（bǐ tā xī yǎ），《和》毗他希雅（pí tā xī yǎ），《思》培塔希雅。被擄歸回後聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的利未人之一。Pethahiah

Terms.Localization: Levite; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 《現》比他希雅（bǐ tā xī yǎ），《和》毗他希雅（pí tā xī yǎ），《思》培塔希雅。猶大支派人，米示薩別的兒子，被擄歸回後輔助王辦理猶大民的事。Pethahiah

Terms.Localization: son of Meshezabel; assistant of the king; tribe of Judah; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 簡單的人；簡單，無知，愚昧。因自身缺乏智慧和經驗，容易受他人、言論思想或個人情感影響的人；或處於缺乏智慧和經驗的狀態。simple person; simpleness, ignorance

Terms.Localization: person who is easily influenced by other people, ideas or one's own passions, because of his/her lack of wisdom and experience; or the state of lacking wisdom and experience

Localization.Gloss: 繩，線。用棉、羊毛、亞麻或貴金屬製成的細繩；用來把物件繫在衣服上或掛在頸項上，也用來量度和捆扎。cord, thread

Terms.Localization: relatively thin cord made of cotton, wool, flax or precious metal; used for attaching objects to clothes, hanging small objects around the neck, measuring, tying, etc.

Localization.Gloss: （用於丈量的）麻繩。（用於丈量的）麻繩。linen cord (used for measuring)

Terms.Localization: linen cord (used for measuring)

Localization.Gloss: 比東（bǐ dōng），《思》丕通。埃及人的一座積貨城。Pithom

Terms.Localization: town in Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 毒蛇，虺蛇。毒蛇，虺蛇。cobra

Terms.Localization: cobra

Localization.Gloss: 《現》巴特羅（bā tè luó）／埃及南部，《和》巴忒羅（bā tè luó），《思》帕特洛斯。位於埃及南部的一個地區。Pathrus

Terms.Localization: region; south of Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 帕斯魯細人。巴忒羅的居民；麥西的後裔。Pathrusim

Terms.Localization: inhabitants of Pathrus, descendants of Mizraim

Localization.Gloss: 群。一群共同走動和餵食的小型家畜；由綿羊和山羊組成；剪下的羊毛可織成布；雌羊的奶做食物；可以宰殺食用；也用作獻祭；跟數量龐大有關；也可以指上帝的百姓，他們經常被視為羊群，以上帝為牠們的牧羊人。flock

Terms.Localization: quantity of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; consisting of sheep and goats; hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; females milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animals; associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

Localization.Gloss: 撒南（sā nán），《思》匝南。猶大支派地業內的一座城鎮。Zaanan

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 達布蜥蝪；刺尾蜥蝪。體型較大的蜥蝪，長約 65 厘米，外形厚實矮胖，短粗的尾巴有尖刺；以沙漠植物為食；常見於沙漠地區；不潔淨的動物。dab lizard; thorn-tailed lizard

Terms.Localization: relatively large type of lizard, with a length of about 65 cm, a fairly thick, squat appearance, and a thick, short tail covered with spikes; feeds on desert plants; uromastyx aegyptius or uromastyx ornatus, found in desert areas; unclean animal

Localization.Gloss: 車；馬車。兩輪或四輪的木車，由牛、驢，或馬馱拉，用作旅行或運送貨物。cart; wagon

Terms.Localization: two or four-wheeled vehicle; made of wood; pulled by oxen, donkeys, or horses; used for travel or the transport of loads

Localization.Gloss: 天上的萬象（太陽、月亮和星辰）。所有發光天體的統稱；由上帝所創造；很多時受人敬拜，這種做法有違於上帝的律法；在《但以理書》第 8 章，這詞可能用來隱喻上帝的子民。host of heaven (= sun, moon, and stars)

Terms.Localization: collective of all celestial bodies that give light; created by God; often worshiped by people, contrary to God's law; in Daniel 8 possibly used as a metaphor for the people of God

Localization.Gloss: 天軍（天上的創造物）。字面意思：「耶和華軍隊的元帥」或「天上的萬軍」；因而指：圍繞在上帝寶座周圍的天上的生物，它們頌讚上帝，並在地上執行他的意旨。host of heaven (= heavenly creatures)

Terms.Localization: literally: "host of YHWH" or "host of heaven"; hence: heavenly beings surrounding God's throne, praising him and carrying out his will on earth

Localization.Gloss: 萬軍之，萬軍的。字面意思：「萬軍之耶和華（或任何一個上帝其他名稱或這些名稱的組合）」；因而指：上帝的稱號；焦點是：他統領天上圍繞他寶座周圍的生物；它們頌讚上帝、在地上執行他的意旨；這稱號關乎上帝的能力，以及他作為神聖君王和戰士對宇宙的掌控。hosts (in: Lord, LORD, God of hosts)

Terms.Localization: literally: "YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts"; hence: epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior

Localization.Gloss: 《現》洗遍（xǐ biàn）／洗扁（xǐ biǎn），《和》洗扁，《思》責波殷。與所多瑪、蛾摩拉一同被滅的五座城之一。Zeboiim

Terms.Localization: one of the 5 cities in the plain which included Sodom and Gomorrah

Localization.Gloss: 鬣狗。野生哺乳動物，頭大，前腿比後腿長；灰褐色的身上有模糊的深色條紋；頸部的條紋呈斑點和斑塊狀；鬃毛堅硬直立，從兩耳中間延伸整個背部，直至尾巴的末端；主要以腐肉為食，偶爾也自行捕獵；居住在洞穴和塌木下的空隙，但也有人認為牠們會住在廢棄的房屋或墓穴中；發出哀號聲；可能屬不潔的動物。hyena

Terms.Localization: wild mammal with big head and front feet longer than hind feet; brownish grey color with dark indistinct stripes that become spots and blotches on its neck; stiff, upright mane that stretches from between its ears all the way down its back until the end of its tail; feeds mainly on carrion and but occasionally goes hunting itself; lives in holes and hollows under logs but is also known to inhabit abandoned houses or tombs; produces wailing sounds; Hyaena hyaena; probably unclean

Localization.Gloss: 公羚羊。小型到中型的草原羚羊，棲息在稀樹草原和半沙漠地區，呈紅褐色，胸部和腹部發白；長腿，高雅，跳躍高手；一小群生活一起；屬潔淨的動物，可食用；與速度、高雅、美麗、男性的精壯和繁殖相關。male gazelle

Terms.Localization: small- to medium-sized antelope, inhabiting savannah plains and semideserts; reddish brown in color with small horns; long-legged, graceful, and an expert jumper; lives in small herds; Gazella dorcas or Gazella arabica; clean and can be eaten; associated with speed, grace, beauty, male virility, and fertility

Localization.Gloss: 洗比雅（xǐ bǐ yǎ），《思》漆彼雅。便雅憫支派的族長之一，沙哈連和賀得的兒子。Zibia

Terms.Localization: son of Shaharaim; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 西比亞（xī bǐ yà），《思》漆彼雅。別是巴人，亞哈謝的妻子，猶大王約阿施的母親。Zibiah

Terms.Localization: of Beersheba; wife of Ahaziah; mother of Joash, king of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 母羚羊。小型到中型的草原羚羊，棲息在稀樹草原和半沙漠地區，呈紅褐色，胸部和腹部發白；長腿，高雅，跳躍高手；一小群生活一起；母羚羊在一歲時性活躍，高繁殖；屬潔淨的動物，可食用；與速度、高雅、美麗、男性的精壯和繁殖相關。female gazelle

Terms.Localization: small- to medium-sized antelope, inhabiting savannah plains and semideserts; reddish brown in color with small horns (with exception of female impala); long-legged, graceful, and an expert jumper; lives in small herds; female is sexually active at one year; high rate of reproduction; Gazella dorcas or Gazella arabica; clean and can be eaten; associated with speed, grace, beauty, female sexuality, and fertility

Localization.Gloss: 染的布。高品質的染色衣料，十分珍貴。dyed cloth

Terms.Localization: dyed cloth of high quality; highly valued

Localization.Gloss: 祭便（jì biàn），《思》漆貝紅。希未人，亞雅和亞拿的父親。Zibeon

Terms.Localization: father of Anah; Hivite

Localization.Gloss: 祭便（jì biàn），《思》漆貝紅。西珥的兒子。Zibeon

Terms.Localization: son of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 洗波音（谷）（xǐ bō yīn (gǔ)）／洗編（xǐ biān），《思》袋狼（山谷）／責波殷。便雅憫支派的地業之一，在耶路撒冷的東北方。Zeboim

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 西達達（xī dá dá），《思》責辣得／責達得。位於以色列北部邊境的一個地點。Zedad

Terms.Localization: location along northern boundary of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 撒督（sā dū），《思》匝多克。利未支派人，大衛時期的祭司，亞希突的兒子，亞希瑪斯的父親。Zadok

Terms.Localization: son of Ahitub; priest; tribe of Levi; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 撒督（sā dū），《思》匝多克。猶大王約坦的母親耶路沙的父親。Zadok

Terms.Localization: father of Jerushah, mother of Jotham

Localization.Gloss: 撒督（sā dū），《思》匝多克。利未支派人，大祭司，亞希突的兒子。Zadok

Terms.Localization: son of Ahitub; high priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 撒督（sā dū），《思》匝多克。米書蘭的父親，米拉約的兒子，祭司亞薩利雅、西萊雅的先祖。Zadok

Terms.Localization: son of Meraioth; ancestor of Azariah, Seraiah, priest

Localization.Gloss: 撒督（sā dū），《思》匝多克。被擄歸回後的幾個人：(1)巴拿的後裔，(2)音麥的後裔，(3)在尼希米約上簽名的民眾的首領之一，(4)管理庫房的文士。Zadok

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 西丁（xī dīng），《思》漆丁。拿弗他利支派屬地的堅固城之一，位於加利利湖的南端西岸。Ziddim

Terms.Localization: fortified town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 公義；公正；義人。公義；公正；義人。just, righteous person

Terms.Localization: just, righteous person

Localization.Gloss: 公義的；證明是正直的；公正的。公義的；證明是正直的；公正的。be (or show oneself) just, in the right

Terms.Localization: be (or show oneself) just, in the right

Localization.Gloss: 澄清；證明；導致正義。澄清；證明；導致正義。justify

Terms.Localization: justify

Localization.Gloss: 使為義，稱為義。使為義，稱為義。make righteous, pronounce just

Terms.Localization: make righteous, pronounce just

Localization.Gloss: 公義，公平。公義，公平。right, justice

Terms.Localization: right, justice

Localization.Gloss: 公義，公平。公義，公平。right, justice

Terms.Localization: right, justice

Localization.Gloss: 西底家。基拿拿的兒子；亞哈王時期的假先知。Zedekiah

Terms.Localization: son of Chenaanah; false prophet; time of king Ahab

Localization.Gloss: 西底家（xī dǐ jiā），《思》漆德克雅。猶大國最後一個君王（公元前597-587年在位），約西亞的第三個兒子，原名「瑪探雅」，約雅斤的叔叔。Zedekiah

Terms.Localization: son of Josiah; king of Judah (597-587)

Localization.Gloss: 西底家（xī dǐ jiā），《思》漆德克雅。猶大王約雅斤的兒子。Zedekiah

Terms.Localization: son of Jehoiachin, king of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》希底家（xī dǐ jiā），《和》西底家，《思》漆德克雅。被擄歸回後隨同尼希米簽約遵守神律法的猶大首領之一。Zedekiah

Terms.Localization: man; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 西底家（xī dǐ jiā），《思》漆德克雅。基拿拿的兒子，亞哈時期的假先知之一。Zedekiah

Terms.Localization: son of Chenaanah; false prophet; time of Ahab

Localization.Gloss: 西底家（xī dǐ jiā），《思》漆德克雅。猶大國最後一個君王（公元前597-587年在位），約西亞的第三個兒子，原名「瑪探雅」，約雅斤的叔叔。Zedekiah

Terms.Localization: son of Josiah; king of Judah (597-587)

Localization.Gloss: 西底家（xī dǐ jiā），《思》漆德克雅。瑪西雅的兒子，耶利米時期的假先知。Zedekiah

Terms.Localization: false prophet; time of Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 西底家（xī dǐ jiā），《思》漆德克雅。哈拿尼雅的兒子，約雅敬時期猶大的首領。Zedekiah

Terms.Localization: son of Hananiah; official; time of Jehoiakim

Localization.Gloss: 瑣巴（suǒ bā），《思》祚巴。位於敘利亞的一個王國。Zobah

Terms.Localization: land; in Syria

Localization.Gloss: 蘇押（sū yā），《思》族阿爾。以薩迦支派的族長拿坦業的父親。Zuar

Terms.Localization: father of Nethanel; tribe of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 蘇弗（sū fú），《思》族弗。以利加拿的兒子；希幔的祖先；利未支派人。Zuph

Terms.Localization: son of Elkanah; ancestor of Heman; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 瑣法（suǒ fǎ），《思》祚法黑。亞設支派一個宗族的族長，希連的兒子。Zophah

Terms.Localization: son of Helem; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 瑣菲。以利加拿的兒子；利未支派人。Zophai

Terms.Localization: son of Elkanah; descendant of Elkanah; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 瑣法（suǒ fǎ），《思》左法爾。拿瑪人；約伯的三個朋友之一。Zophar

Terms.Localization: Naamathite; friend of Job

Localization.Gloss: 岩石，保護者。字面意思：岩石；因而指：保護者（上帝的別號）。literally: rock; hence: protector (epithet of God)

Terms.Localization: literally: rock; hence: protector (epithet of God)

Localization.Gloss: 蘇珥（sū ěr），《思》族爾。米甸的族長之一，哥斯比的父親。Zur

Terms.Localization: king of Midian

Localization.Gloss: 蘇珥（sū ěr），《思》族爾。基遍的便雅憫人，耶利的兒子。Zur

Terms.Localization: son of Jeiel; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 泰爾（tài ěr），《舊》推羅，《思》提洛。腓尼基海岸的港口城鎮，在西頓以南，屬亞設支派。Tyre

Terms.Localization: town; Phoenicia

Localization.Gloss: 蘇列（sū liè），《思》族黎耳。利未支派米拉利宗族的首領之一，亞比亥的兒子。Zuriel

Terms.Localization: son of Abihail; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 蘇利沙代（sū lì shā dài），《思》族黎沙待。西緬支派的首領示路蔑的父親。Zurishaddai

Terms.Localization: father of Shelumiel; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 瑣轄（suǒ xiá），《思》祚哈爾。赫人弗崙的父親。Zohar

Terms.Localization: father of Ephron; Hittite

Localization.Gloss: 瑣轄（suǒ xiá），《思》祚哈爾。西緬的兒子。Zohar

Terms.Localization: son of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 瑣轄（suǒ xiá），《思》祚哈爾。猶大支派人，希拉的兒子。Zohar

Terms.Localization: son of Helah; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 鬣狗。野生哺乳動物，頭大，前腿比後腿長；灰褐色的身上有模糊的深色條紋；頸部的條紋呈斑點和斑塊狀；鬃毛堅硬直立，從兩耳中間延伸整個背部，直至尾巴的末端；主要以腐肉為食，偶爾也自行捕獵；居住在洞穴和塌木下的空隙，但也有人認為牠們會住在廢棄的房屋或墓穴中；發出哀號聲；可能屬不潔的動物。hyena

Terms.Localization: wild mammal with big head and front feet longer than hind feet; brownish grey color with dark indistinct stripes that become spots and blotches on its neck; stiff, upright mane that stretches from between its ears all the way down its back until the end of its tail; feeds mainly on carrion and but occasionally goes hunting itself; lives in holes and hollows under logs but is also known to inhabit abandoned houses or tombs; produces wailing sounds; Hyaena hyaena; probably unclean

Localization.Gloss: 洗巴（xǐ bā），《思》漆巴。掃羅王的僕人。Ziba

Terms.Localization: servant of king Saul

Localization.Gloss: 西頓（xī dùn），《思》漆冬。迦南的兒子；位於腓尼基的一座城鎮。Sidon

Terms.Localization: son of Canaan; town in Phoenicia

Localization.Gloss: 西頓人（xī dùn rén），《思》漆冬人。住在西頓的居民。Sidonian

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Sidon

Localization.Gloss: 錫安。聖殿所在地；也用來指住在那裡的百姓。Zion

Terms.Localization: mountain; on which the temple has been built; also used to refer to the people living there

Localization.Gloss: 西哈（xī hā），《思》漆哈。從被擄之地歸回的尼提寧（殿役）的家族族長之一。Ziha

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 尋（xún），《思》親。尼革夫的曠野，後來成為猶大支派的南界。Zin

Terms.Localization: location; Negeb

Localization.Gloss: 洗珥（xǐ ěr），《思》漆敖爾。猶大支派屬地的山地城鎮之一，位於希伯崙的東北方。Zior

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 洗斯（xǐ sī），《思》漆茲。隱‧基底附近的一個地方。Ziz

Terms.Localization: location; near En-Gedi

Localization.Gloss: 洗拉（xǐ lā），《思》漆拉。拉麥的第二個妻子，土八該隱和拿瑪的母親。Zillah

Terms.Localization: wife of Lamech

Localization.Gloss: 外表，形象。人的外表呈現。semblance, likeness

Terms.Localization: collection of attributes serving to represent a person

Localization.Gloss: 偶像。作為崇拜對象而造出來代表神明的物品；呈人或動物的形狀；用木頭、金屬或石頭製成。idol

Terms.Localization: object made to represent a god as an object of worship; in the shape of human or animal; made of wood, metal, or stone

Localization.Gloss: 影子；幻影。沒有實質的動物，是真實事物的表象。shadow, phantom

Terms.Localization: a thing without substance that is a semblance of something real

Localization.Gloss: 撒們山。示劍附件的一座山。Zalmon

Terms.Localization: mountain; near Shechem

Localization.Gloss: 撒們（sā mén），《思》匝耳孟。亞合的後裔，大衞的三十勇士之一。Zalmon

Terms.Localization: descendant of Ahoah; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 撒摩拿（sā mó ná），《思》匝耳摩納。在出埃及的路線上，以色列人在曠野安營之地，位於普嫩的西北，別是巴的東南。Zalmonah

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 撒慕拿（sā mù ná），《思》匝耳慕納。士師基甸時期的米甸王。Zalmunna

Terms.Localization: king of Midian

Localization.Gloss: 洗拉（xǐ lā），《思》責拉。便雅憫支派的城鎮之一，位於耶路撒冷的西北方。Zela

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 洗拉以利弗。便雅憫支派地業內的一座城鎮。Zela Haeleph

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 薩拉。哈嫩的父親，被擄歸回時期的一個祭司。Zalaph

Terms.Localization: father of Hanun, priest, after exile

Localization.Gloss: 西羅非哈（xī luó fēi hā），《思》責羅斐哈得。瑪拿西支派人，希弗的兒子。Zelophehad

Terms.Localization: son of Hepher; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 泄撒（xiè sā）。便雅憫支派地業內的一個地點。Zelzah

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 魚鈎，鱼叉。約與一個人高度相等的木棒；一端有鋒利的金屬或骨尖，上面有倒勾，另一端綁著一條繩子，用來拋向魚或其他海洋生物，以捕殺牠們。harpoon; fishing spear

Terms.Localization: wooden rod about the length of a man, with a metal or bone point with barbs on one end, and a rope on the other end; thrown at fish or aquatic animals to kill and catch them

Localization.Gloss: 蝗蟲；蚱蜢。一種成群會跳的昆蟲，可能是某種蝗蟲或蚱蜢。locust

Terms.Localization: a type of swarming hopping insect, probably some sort of locust or grasshopper

Localization.Gloss: 洗勒（xǐ lè），《思》責肋克。亞捫人，大衞的勇士之一。Zelek

Terms.Localization: Ammonite; warrior; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 洗勒太（xǐ lè tài），《思》漆耳泰。便雅憫支派的族長之一，示每的兒子。Zillethai

Terms.Localization: son of Shimei; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 洗勒太（xǐ lè tài），《思》漆肋泰。瑪拿西支派人，大衞時期的官長之一。Zillethai

Terms.Localization: officer; tribe of Manasseh; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 圈套，網羅。某種織物或網羅，能纏住腳跟，用來捕捉野獸；常指攻擊和控制。snare; trap

Terms.Localization: some kind of woven material or mesh that entangles the feet; used for catching animals; associated with aggression and control

Localization.Gloss: 羊毛。綿羊等多毛動物的波浪形柔軟絨毛，可用來紡線造衣服；與潔白、純潔，和柔軟有關。wool

Terms.Localization: soft wavy undercoat of hairy animals such as sheep; used to weave a fabric from which clothing was made; associated with whiteness, purity, and softness

Localization.Gloss: 洗瑪利人（xǐ mǎ lì rén），《思》責瑪黎人。迦南的兒子洗瑪利的後裔。Zemarite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Canaan

Localization.Gloss: 洗瑪臉（xǐ mǎ liǎn），《思》責瑪辣因。便雅憫支派的城鎮之一，位於伯特利的東北方。Zemaraim

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 魚鈎。用金屬、骨頭，甚至硬刺製成的小彎鈎，在鋒利的尖端通常有倒鈎，另一端成環狀，可以繫上魚絲；在鈎子上放上魚餌以誘捕魚兒；與攻擊和控制有關。fishhook

Terms.Localization: small, curved piece of metal or bone or even a strong thorn, with a sharp point on one end, usually with a barb just behind the point, and a loop or bend on the other end to which a fishing line can be attached; used with some bait attached to it in order to attract a fish; associated with aggression and control

Localization.Gloss: 洗楠（xǐ nán），《思》責南。猶大支派的高原城鎮之一。Zenan

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 撒益（sā yì），《思》匝依爾。猶大支派地業內的一座城鎮，在希伯崙東北方。Zair

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 瑣安（suǒ ān），《思》左罕。埃及尼羅河三角洲東部的城鎮，曾是下埃及的行政中心。Zoan

Terms.Localization: town, located in Nile delta of Egypt; Egyptian capital during 21st and 22nd dynasties; administrative centre of Lower Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 撒拿音（sā ná yīn），《思》匝納寧／匝阿納寧。拿弗他利支派地業的邊界城鎮，位於伯善以北。Zaanannim

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 瑣珥（suǒ ěr），《思》左哈爾。迦南地某個平原的五座城之一，所多瑪和蛾摩拉也在該平原上；在耶利哥谷以南、以東境內的撒烈谷南岸。Zoar

Terms.Localization: one of the 5 cities in the plain which included Sodom and Gomorrah; in the south of Jericho Valley; on south bank of Wadi-Zered in Edomite territory

Localization.Gloss: 洗玻（xǐ bō），《思》則缶／則非。以利法的兒子，以掃的孫子，以東的族長之一。Zepho

Terms.Localization: son of Eliphaz, son of Esau Zephi in 1CH 1.36

Localization.Gloss: 撒分（sā fēn），《思》匝豐。迦得支派地業的城鎮之一，位於伯善的東南方。Zaphon

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 洗分（xǐ fēn），《思》責豐。迦得的兒子。Zephon

Terms.Localization: son of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 洗分（族）（xǐ fēn (zú)），《思》責豐家族。迦得的長子洗分的後裔。Zephonite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Zephon, son of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 小鳥；麻雀。麻雀大小的鳥的統稱。bird; sparrow

Terms.Localization: general term for a small bird about the size of a sparrow

Localization.Gloss: 西撥。摩押王巴勒的父親。Zippor

Terms.Localization: father of Balak, king of Moab

Localization.Gloss: 洗玻。以掃的孫子、以利法的兒子。Zephi

Terms.Localization: son of Eliphaz, son of Esau Zepho in Gen 36.11, 15

Localization.Gloss: 洗非芸（xǐ fēi yún），《思》漆斐雍。迦得的長子。Ziphion

Terms.Localization: son of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 公山羊。雄性家畜，通常為黑色，有長毛和短毛的品種；有角；常與綿羊一起牧放；潔淨的動物，皮，羊毛和角的來源，可用來獻祭；有時與鬼魔有關，被認為有侵略性。he-goat

Terms.Localization: male domestic animal, generally black in color, found in both shorthaired and longhaired varieties, with horns, usually herded together with sheep; Capra hircus mambrica or Capra hircus angorensis; clean animal; source of hides, hair, and horns; may be used for sacrifice; sometimes associated with demons, regarded as aggressive

Localization.Gloss: 西番雅（xī fān yǎ），《思》責法尼雅。利未支派人，他哈的兒子，希幔的祖先。Zephaniah

Terms.Localization: son of Tahath; ancestor of Heman; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 西番雅（xī fān yǎ），《思》責法尼雅。西底家時期的祭司，利未支派人。Zephaniah

Terms.Localization: priest; tribe of Levi; time of Zedekiah

Localization.Gloss: 西番雅（xī fān yǎ），《思》索福尼亞。古示的兒子，猶大王約西亞時的先知。Zephaniah

Terms.Localization: son of Cushi; prophet

Localization.Gloss: 西番雅（xī fān yǎ），《思》責法尼雅。先知撒迦利亞時期，約西亞（賢 ）的父親。Zephaniah

Terms.Localization: father of Josiah, Hen, time of Zechariah

Localization.Gloss: 西番雅（xī fān yǎ），《思》責法尼雅。瑪西雅的兒子，西底家王時期的祭司之一。Zephaniah

Terms.Localization: priest; tribe of Levi; time of Zedekiah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》撒發那特‧巴內亞（sā fā nà tè – bā nèi yà），《和》撒發那忒‧巴內亞（sā fā nà tè – bā nèi yà），《思》匝斐納特帕乃亞。約瑟的埃及名字。Zaphenath-Paneah

Terms.Localization: Egyptian name of Joseph

Localization.Gloss: 沙漠眼鏡蛇；埃及眼鏡蛇。一種劇毒的蛇，肋骨能夠伸展到頸部，從而形成一個扁平的輪廓；深棕色，底部為黃色（有時是黃色帶狀）；不潔淨的動物；與侵略和潛伏的危險有關；צִפְעֹנִי。desert cobra; Egyptian cobra

Terms.Localization: extremely poisonous snake with the ability to spread the ribs in the neck area so as to form a broad, flat profile; dark brown in color with a yellowish underside (and sometimes yellowish bands); Desert Cobra (Walterinnesia aegyptia) or Egyptian Cobra (Naja haje); unclean animal; associated with aggression and lurking danger; צִפְעֹנִי

Localization.Gloss: 沙漠眼鏡蛇；埃及眼鏡蛇。一種劇毒的蛇，肋骨能夠伸展到頸部，從而形成一個扁平的輪廓；深棕色，底部為黃色（有時是黃色帶狀）；不潔淨的動物；與侵略和潛伏的危險有關；צֶפַע。desert cobra; Egyptian cobra

Terms.Localization: extremely poisonous snake with the ability to spread the ribs in the neck area so as to form a broad, flat profile; dark brown in color with a yellowish underside (and sometimes yellowish bands); Desert Cobra (Walterinnesia aegyptia) or Egyptian Cobra (Naja haje); unclean animal; associated with aggression and lurking danger; צֶפַע

Localization.Gloss: 楊柳。靠水邊生長的一種樹，可能是柳樹或胡楊樹。willow

Terms.Localization: tree that grows by water; either willow or Euphrates poplar: Salix alba, Salix acmophylla, or Populus euphratica

Localization.Gloss: 青蛙。無尾兩棲動物，身體採蹲坐姿勢，皮膚濕潤光滑，長後腿用於跳躍；身長約 70 毫米；棕色或橄欖綠色；食用蛙或斑點蛙；不潔淨，因此不可吃。frog

Terms.Localization: tailless amphibian with a squat body, moist smooth skin, and long hind legs for jumping; about 70 mm long; brown or olive-green; Rana esculenta (Edible frog) or Rana punctata (Spotted frog); unclean, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 西坡拉（xī pō lā），《思》漆頗辣。米甸祭司流珥或葉忒羅的女兒，摩西的妻子。Zipporah

Terms.Localization: wife of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 洗法（xǐ fǎ），《思》責法特。一座被摧毀的迦南城鎮，位於別是巴以東。Zephath

Terms.Localization: town; Canaan

Localization.Gloss: 洗法谷（xǐ fǎ (gǔ)），《思》責法達山谷。位於謝非拉的瑪利沙附近的一個山谷。Zephathah

Terms.Localization: valley; near Mareshah

Localization.Gloss: 洗革拉（xǐ gé lā），《思》漆刻拉格。西緬支派地業內的一個地點，位於別是巴的西北。Ziklag

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 口袋，行囊。用來攜帶食物的袋子。sack, bag

Terms.Localization: sack or bag for carrying food

Localization.Gloss: 側耳（cè ěr），《思》責爾。拿弗他利支派地業中的堅固城之一，在加利利湖西面。Zer

Terms.Localization: fortified town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 洗利達（xǐ lì dá），《思》》責勒達。以法蓮支派地業內的一座城鎮。Zeredah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 《現》洗璐雅（xĭ lù yǎ），《和》洗魯雅（xǐ lǔ yǎ），《思》責魯雅／史默亞。約押、亞比篩、亞撒黑的母親，拿轄的女兒，大衞的姊妹。Zeruiah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Nahash; sister of David

Localization.Gloss: 《現》洗魯雅（xĭ lǔ yǎ），《和》洗魯阿（xǐ lǔ ā），《思》責魯阿。以色列王耶羅波安的母親。Zeruah

Terms.Localization: mother of king Jeroboam I of Isral

Localization.Gloss: 洗羅（xǐ luó），《思》責洛爾。便雅憫人比歌拉的兒子，亞別的父親，掃羅王的先祖。Zeror

Terms.Localization: son of Becorath; ancestor of king Saul; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 袋子，口袋，錦囊。用布製成的小袋子，用來攜帶金錢，或裝香料放在衣服裡面；常指人所珍惜的財物。bag, bundle, purse, sachet

Terms.Localization: small container made of cloth, used for carrying money, packing fragrant spices in order to put between one's clothes, etc.; associated with treasured possessions

Localization.Gloss: 《現》泰爾人（tài ěr rén）／泰爾的人民／泰爾城來的人，《和》泰爾人，《舊》推羅人，《思》提洛人／提洛的。亞設支派地業的城鎮泰爾的居民。Tyrian

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Tyre

Localization.Gloss: 西利（xī lì），《思》責黎。大衛時期聖殿的樂師，耶杜頓的兒子。Zeri

Terms.Localization: son of Jeduthun; temple singer; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 香膏。從沙漠植物中提取出來，具有治療作用的芳香藥膏。Jericho balm

Terms.Localization: sweet-smelling healing ointment from a desert plant

Localization.Gloss: 換傳染性皮膚病。罹患傳染性皮膚治病。have an infectious skin disease

Terms.Localization: suffer from an infectious skin disease

Localization.Gloss: 瑣拉（suǒ lā），《思》祚辣。但支派地業內的一座城鎮。Zora

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 黃蜂；胡蜂。一種有刺的飛行昆蟲，有透明、膜狀的翅膀；大黃蜂通常為黑色或棕色；胡蜂通常為綠色；較大的黃蜂可達 30-40 毫米長；黃蜂和胡蜂都有刺，被螫到很痛且危險；象征危險的敵人或進攻的軍隊。hornet, wasp

Terms.Localization: flying stinging insect with transparent, membrane-like wings; hornets are usually black or brown; wasps are often greenish; larger hornets can be 30-40 mm long; both have a sting that can be very painful, even dangerous; symbol for a dangerous enemy or an attacking army

Localization.Gloss: 瑣拉人。瑣拉的居民。Zorite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Zora

Localization.Gloss: 傳染性皮膚病。一種傳染性的皮膚疾病；統稱，可能包括牛皮癬、毛囊癬和白斑病。infectious skin disease

Terms.Localization: an infectious skin disease; general term which probably covers diseases as psoriasis, favus, and leucoderma (Hulse)

Localization.Gloss: 瑣拉人。瑣拉的居民。Zorathite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Zora

Localization.Gloss: 鎔化；煉淨；試煉。鎔化；煉淨；試煉。melt; refine; test

Localization.Gloss: 西利拉（xī lì lā），《思》責勒達。以法蓮支派的城鎮之一，位於疏割的西北。Zererah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 洗列（xǐ liè），《思》責勒特。猶大支派人，亞施戶和妻子希拉所生的長子。Zereth

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 《現》撒拉旦（sā lā dàn），《和》撒拉但（sā lā dàn）／撒拉他拿（sā lā tā ná），《思》匝爾堂。以法蓮支派地業內的一座城鎮。Zarethan

Localization.Gloss: 穴鳥。形體相對較小的黑鳥，不潔凈，不能吃；與孤獨、破壞、毀滅有關，可能也指死亡。jackdaw

Terms.Localization: relatively small black bird; unclean, not to be eaten; associated with loneliness, devastation, destruction, and possibly death

Localization.Gloss: 咒詛。咒詛。curse

Localization.Gloss: 甲薛（jiǎ xuē），《思》卡貝責耳。猶大支派屬地的城鎮之一，位於別是巴的東北。Kabzeel

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 基伯先（jī bó xiān），《思》克貝匝殷。以法蓮支派地業內的城鎮之一，分配給利未人，位於示劍的東南方。Kibzaim

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 《現》基博羅‧哈他瓦（jī bó luó-hā tā wǎ）／貪慾的墳墓，《和》基博羅‧哈他瓦（jī bó luó-hā tā wǎ），《思》克貝洛特阿塔瓦／克貝洛特塔瓦。以色列人出埃及的安營之地，位於西奈山和哈洗錄之間的地方。Kibroth Hattaavah

Terms.Localization: location along route of Exodus

Localization.Gloss: 肉桂。用肉桂樹的內樹皮製成的芳香物質；肉桂樹常見於印度和斯里蘭卡，用來製作香薰和膏油；這種樹的花苞用作調味料；葉子和豆莢可能有藥用價值。cassia tree

Terms.Localization: fragrant substance made from the inner bark of the cassia tree (Cinnamomum cassia), found in India and Sri Lanka, and used for the preparation of perfume and anointing oil; the buds of this tree are used to flavor and season food; its leaves and pods may have medicinal qualities

Localization.Gloss: 聖潔。聖潔。holy

Localization.Gloss: 基底莫（jī dǐ mò），《思》刻德摩特。呂便支派地業內的一座城鎮，分配給利未人，位於底本的東北方。Kedemoth

Localization.Gloss: 哥賴雅（gē lài yǎ），《思》科拉雅。耶利米時代的假先知亞哈的父親。Kolaiah

Terms.Localization: people

Localization.Gloss: 猿猴。大型靈長類動物，尾巴長，鼻口與狗相似；體型有如一隻大狗；通常是淺棕色，但較年長的雄性有時變成灰色；有些體型大的公猴會長出像獅子一般的鬃毛；牠們大部分時間生活在地面，以根、莖、果實、葉子、昆蟲和小型爬蟲類動物為食；狒狒屬的多個不同亞物種；從他施運到以色列。baboon

Terms.Localization: large primate with long tail and doglike muzzle, the size of a large dog; usually light brown in color, but older males sometimes turn gray; some large males develop a mane like a lion; they spend most of their time on the ground and eat a variety of roots, shoots, fruits, leaves, insects, and small reptiles; various subspecies of papio; brought to Israel from Tarsis

Localization.Gloss: 哥斯（gē sī），《思》科茲。猶大支派的一個人。Koz

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 哈哥斯（hā gē sī），《思》哈科茲。大衞時代在聖殿供職的第七班次祭司首領。Koz, Hakkoz

Terms.Localization: priest; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 可利（kě lì），《思》科勒。大衞時期的利未人，可拉的後裔，以比雅撒的兒子，沙龍的父親；聖幕守門人。Kore

Localization.Gloss: 可利（kě lì），《思》科辣黑。大衛時期的守門人，亞薩的兒子，米施利米雅的父親。Kore

Terms.Localization: son of Jimnah; gatekeeper; time of king Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 設網羅，設圈套。字面意思：設下陷阱或網羅；因此常用來形容人們用不義的方法來控制別人的行為。to entrap, ensare

Terms.Localization: literally: to lay a trap or snare; hence: to try to gain control over someone else in an unjust way

Localization.Gloss: 古沙雅（gǔ shā yǎ），《思》谷沙雅。米拉利族的利未人之一，聖殿的樂師以探的父親。Kushaiah

Localization.Gloss: 該隱（gāi yǐn），《思》卡因。猶大支派屬地的山地城鎮之一，位於希伯崙的東南方。Cain, Kain, Kenite

Localization.Gloss: 該南（gāi nán），《思》刻南。塞特的孫子，以挪士的兒子。Kenan

Localization.Gloss: 蓖麻。菊科有花植物；可長至 3 米高；深綠色的扇形葉片可達半米寬；莖上長有一簇簇多刺的圓形種子；豆油可用作藥物，常作瀉藥。castor oil plant

Terms.Localization: flowering plant in the spurge family; can grow to 3 m high; dark green fan-like leaves can reach half a meter across; produces bunches of prickly round seeds on a stalk; Ricinus communis - castor oil plant; oil of the bean was used for medicine, often as a purgative
