Localization.Gloss: 加們（jiā mén），《思》卡孟。位於基列的一座城鎮，士師睚珥埋葬在此。Kamon

Terms.Localization: town; Gilead

Localization.Gloss: 熱心，關心，激動，嫉妒。為他人的緣故而感到憤怒或強烈的關心，因為那人沒有得到應得的待遇；因他人擁有某種特質、特權或財產，覺得自己也應該擁有而對他人感到憤怒的一種情緒。be zealous, be concerned; be envious, be jealous

Terms.Localization: to experience a sentiment of anger or strong concern for the sake of someone else because that person does not receive the treatment they are entitled to; to experience a sentiment of anger toward someone else because that person has qualities, privileges, or possessions that one feels one should have as well

Localization.Gloss: 嫉妒，忌邪。堅持要得到與自己的地位匹配的關注和承諾。zealous, jealous

Terms.Localization: insisting on receiving the attention and commitment that is in keeping with one's status

Localization.Gloss: 熱心，熱情，激動，嫉妒。為他人的緣故而感到憤怒或強烈的關心，因為那人沒有得到應得的待遇；因他人擁有某種特質、特權或財產，覺得自己也應該擁有而對他人感到憤怒的一種情緒。ardour, passion, zeal; envy, jealousy

Terms.Localization: a feeling of anger or strong concern for the sake of someone else because that person does not receive the treatment they are entitled to; a feeling of anger toward someone else because that person has qualities, privileges, or possessions that one feels one should have as well

Localization.Gloss: 加拿（jiā ná），《思》卡納。位於以法蓮境內的一條溪流。Kanah

Terms.Localization: brook; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 加拿（jiā ná），《思》卡納。亞設支派屬地的城鎮之一，位於亞設地業的北端，推羅的東南方。Kanah

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 蘆葦／蘆荻。一種高大的草，有硬挺尖削葉子和羽毛狀頭形的花，可長至超過 2 米高；生長在湖泊和溪流中，根部橫越湖的底部，長出新葉子和莖；或生長在河畔；用於製造籃子、草蓆、笛子、筆、箭和房頂遮蓋物；象徵軟弱和不能靠賴，但也象徵有彈性。reed

Terms.Localization: a tall grass with stiff, sharply-pointed leaves and a plume-like flower head that reaches to more than 2 m; grows in lakes and streams, the roots creeping across the bottom of the lake to produce new leaves and stalks; or on riverbanks; used for baskets, mats, flutes, pens, arrows, and roof-coverings; symbol of weakness and undependability, but also flexibility

Localization.Gloss: 香菖蒲。一種芳香的草，一叢一叢生長至高約一米，有硬挺、劍狀的葉子；或是一種蘆葦，有硬挺的葉子，其特征是別具一格綠色的球狀花，長在高約 50 厘米的莖上；通過煮沸和蒸餾葉子來提取油份；用作膏抹祭司的膏油。aromatic cane; calamus

Terms.Localization: sweet-smelling grass that grows in clumps to more than a meter high and has stiff leaves like sword grass; Cymbopogon martinii - ginger grass; or, a type of reed with stiff leaves, distinguished by its green flower head that grows on a stalk to about 50 cm high; Acorus calamus - calumus; oil is extracted by boiling and distilling the leaves; used in the oil for anointing priests

Localization.Gloss: 天平。有繩子綁在木棒的中央，兩端各連接著一個盤子的一種裝置；用來稱物件的重量。balance; scales

Terms.Localization: contraption consisting of rod held by a cord in the middle and with pans attached to both ends; used for weighing objects

Localization.Gloss: 《現》木尺，《和》量度的竿。用作量度單位為六肘，即 3.1 米的蘆葦。measuring reed, stick

Terms.Localization: reed used as a linear measure six royal cubits, i.e. of 3.1 meters

Localization.Gloss: 嫉妒，忌邪。堅持要得到與自己的地位匹配的關注和承諾。zealous, jealous

Terms.Localization: insisting on receiving the attention and commitment that is in keeping with one's status

Localization.Gloss: 基納斯。以掃的長子以利法的兒子。Kenaz

Terms.Localization: son of Eliphaz, son of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 基納斯（jī nà sī），《思》刻納次。以東人的族長，以掃的孫子。Kenaz

Terms.Localization: chief of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 基納斯（jī nà sī），《思》刻納次。猶大支派迦勒的兄弟，俄陀聶的父親。Kenaz

Terms.Localization: father of Othniel; brother of Caleb

Localization.Gloss: 基納斯（jī nà sī），《思》刻納次。猶大支派人，迦勒的孫子，以拉的兒子。Kenaz

Terms.Localization: son of Elah, son of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 基尼洗人（jī ní xǐ rén），《思》刻納次人。散居於迦南各地的居民，是基納斯的後代，後來被列入猶大支派。Kenizzite

Terms.Localization: people

Localization.Gloss: 《現》基尼洗（族）人（jī ní xǐ (zú) rén），《和》基尼洗族（jī ní xǐ zú），《思》刻納次人。散居於迦南各地的居民，是基納斯的後代，後來被列入猶大支派。Kenizzite

Terms.Localization: clan; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 桂皮／香肉桂。肉桂樹，內樹皮用來製成香肉桂。cinnamon

Terms.Localization: cinnamon tree, of which the inner bark is used for the preparation of the spice cinnamon

Localization.Gloss: 基納（jī nà），《思》刻納特。位於加利利湖東面的一座城鎮。Kenath

Terms.Localization: town; east of sea of Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 行法術／占卜。用各種各樣的方法與靈界溝通，例如檢查動物的肝臟、搖箭、問神、抽籤等；通常被視為一種惡行，應受到譴責。practice divination; be a fortune-teller

Terms.Localization: communicate with the spirit world using a variety of means such as inspecting the liver of animals, shaking arrows, consulting teraphim, or casting lots, usually regarded as an evil practice that is to be condemned

Localization.Gloss: 占卜，算命。占卜或算命的行為或結果，通常被視為邪惡行為。oracle, divination

Terms.Localization: practice or result of divination or fortune-telling, usually regarded as an evil practice

Localization.Gloss: 占卜的費用。交給占卜者作為工作報酬的物品。fee for divination

Terms.Localization: object that is given to a diviner in return for his work

Localization.Gloss: 筆墨盒。用來裝筆和墨的一種小盒子。writing case

Terms.Localization: small box for carrying pens and ink

Localization.Gloss: 基伊拉。位於猶大支派地業內的一座城鎮。Keilah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 貓頭鷹。身份不確定；可能指：貓頭鷹的一種；與黑暗和毀滅有關；有些譯本作「刺猬」或「豪豬」。owl

Terms.Localization: identification uncertain; possibly a type of owl; associated with doom and destruction; Some translations have "hedgehog" or "porcupine."

Localization.Gloss: 貓頭鷹。身份不確定；可能指：貓頭鷹的一種；參 קִפֹּד。owl

Terms.Localization: identification uncertain; perhaps a type of owl; cf. קִפֹּד

Localization.Gloss: 肉豆蔻花；黑小茴香。一種種植植物，可長到30公分高，有像大茴香或胡蘿蔔的葉子，開五個花瓣藍綠色的花；花的基部變成花莢，含有許多圓、黑、味道辛辣的種子；用於烹飪。nutmeg flower (black cummin)

Terms.Localization: a cultivated plant that grows to around 30 cm high and has a lacy leaf like dill or carrot and a greenish-blue flower with five petals; base of the flower becomes a seedpod that contains many round, black, sharp-smelling seeds; used in cooking

Localization.Gloss: 肉桂樹。一種生長在印度和斯里蘭卡的樹，樹皮可用來製作香薰和膏油；這種樹的花苞用作調味料；葉子和豆莢可能有藥用價值。cassia tree

Terms.Localization: tree found in India and Sri Lanka; Cinnamomum cassia - cassia tree; bark is used as spice and for the preparation of perfume and anointing oil; the buds are used to flavor and season food; its leaves and pods may have medicinal qualities

Localization.Gloss: 基洗亞（jī xǐ yà），《思》刻漆雅。約伯的女兒。Keziah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Job

Localization.Gloss: 鷓鴣。岩鷓鴣、黑鷓鴣和沙鷓鴣這三種鷓鴣中的任何一種；名字的意思是「呼叫者」，指雄鳥鳴叫的聲音，牠們通常站在岩石上鳴叫；群居在一種叫鵪鶉的小鳥中，下很多蛋，遇到危險時更傾向於奔跑，只在必要時才飛行。partridge

Terms.Localization: any one of three types of partridge: Alectoris graeca (rock partridge), Francolinus francolinus (black francolin), or Ammoperdix heyi (sand partridge); name means “the caller,” a reference to the ringing crowing of the males, typically while standing on top of a rock; lives in small flocks called coveys, lays a great many eggs, and prefers to run when in danger, flying only when necessary

Localization.Gloss: 奉獻；供物；禮物。奉獻；供物；禮物。offering, gift

Terms.Localization: offering, gift

Localization.Gloss: 斧子。有金屬刀頭連在木柄上，一邊有刀刃，與木柄垂直；用來砍樹和修整木材。adze

Terms.Localization: wooden handle with a metal blade, sharpened on one face, perpendicular to the handle; used for cutting down trees and shaping timber

Localization.Gloss: 加利亞（jiā lì yà），《思》卡勒亞。被擄歸回後，猶大的官長約哈難和約拿單的父親。Kareah

Terms.Localization: father of Johanan, army officer of Judah, time of exile

Localization.Gloss: 可拉（kě lā），《思》科辣黑。以掃的兒子。Korah

Terms.Localization: son of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 可拉（kě lā），《思》科辣黑。以東的族長之一。Korah

Terms.Localization: chief of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 可拉（kě lā），《思》科辣黑。利未支派哥轄的後裔，以斯哈的兒子。Korah

Terms.Localization: son of Izhar; descendant of Kohath; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 可拉（kě lā），《思》科辣黑。猶大支派人，迦勒的後裔，希伯崙的兒子。Korah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 可拉人，《思》科辣黑人。利未支派哥轄的子孫。Korahite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Korah; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 加略。位於摩押的一座城鎮。Kerioth

Terms.Localization: town; Moab

Localization.Gloss: 加略。猶大支派地業內的一座城鎮。Kerioth

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 基列‧亞巴。猶大支派地業內的一座城鎮，分配給利未人。Kiriath-Arba

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 基列‧巴力（jī liè-bā lì），《思》克黎雅特巴耳。猶大支派的城鎮之一，位於耶路撒冷以西。Kiriath-Baal

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》胡瑣城 （hú suǒ chéng），《和》基列‧胡瑣（jī liè-hú suǒ），《思》克黎雅特胡祚特。摩押境內的一座城鎮。Kiriath-Huzoth

Terms.Localization: town; Moab

Localization.Gloss: 基列‧耶琳。猶大支派地業內的一座城鎮；קִרְיַת עָרִים。Kiriath-Jearim

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah; קִרְיַת עָרִים

Localization.Gloss: 基列‧薩拿。猶大支派地業內的一座城鎮；分配給利未支派的亞倫宗族。Kiriath-Sannah

Terms.Localization: town; for priests; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 基列‧西弗（jī liè-xī fú），《思》克黎雅特色費爾。猶大支派地業內的一座城鎮；分配給利未人。Kiriath-Sepher

Terms.Localization: town; for priests; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 基列‧耶琳。猶大支派地業內的一座城鎮；קִרְיַת יְעָרִים。Kiriath-Jearim

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah; קִרְיַת יְעָרִים

Localization.Gloss: 基列亭。呂便支派地業內的一座城鎮，位於約旦河東岸；後歸摩押。Kiriathaim

Terms.Localization: town east of Jordan; territory of Reuben, Moab

Localization.Gloss: 基列亭（jī liè tíng），《思》克黎雅特塔殷。拿弗他利支派地業內的城鎮之一，分配給利未支派的革順族，位於基低斯以西。Kiriathaim

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 角。力量和勇氣的象徵。horn

Terms.Localization: horn, as symbol of: strength, courage

Localization.Gloss: 《現》基蓮‧哈樸（jī lián-hā pǔ），《和》基連‧哈樸（jī lián-hā pǔ），《思》刻楞哈普客。約伯的女兒。Keren-Happuch

Terms.Localization: daughter of Job

Localization.Gloss: 《現》加寧（jiā níng），《和》角（jiǎo），《思》卡爾納殷。基列以北的城鎮；「兩個角」。Karnaim

Terms.Localization: location; "two horns"

Localization.Gloss: 牛虻。一種蠅，以人和其他溫血動物的血為生；代表一種成功製造麻煩的小敵人。gadfly

Terms.Localization: fly that feeds on the blood of humans and other warm-blooded animals; represents a minor enemy that succeeds in creating trouble

Localization.Gloss: 甲加（jiǎ jiā），《思》卡爾卡。猶大支派屬地的城鎮之一，位於別是巴的西南。Karka

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 加各（jiā gè），《思》卡爾科爾。位於約旦河東岸的一座小城。Karkor

Terms.Localization: location; east of Jordan

Localization.Gloss: 加珥他（jiā ěr tā），《思》卡爾達。西布倫支派屬地的城鎮之一，分配給利未支派的米利拉族。Kartah

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 加珥坦（jiā ěr tǎn），《思》卡爾堂。拿弗他利支派屬地的堅固城，為利未支派的革順族所得。Kartan

Terms.Localization: town of refuge; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 甜瓜，香瓜。一種生長在藤蔓上的果實，這種植物有圓形葉子和沿著地面生長的捲鬚，就像南瓜或青瓜一般；植物有藤蔓和黃色花朵；果實直徑可達 10-40 厘米，成熟後變成黃色或淺綠色。muskmelon, cantaloupe

Terms.Localization: fruit that grows on a vine with round leaves and tendrils that creeps along the ground like a pumpkin or cucumber; vine has tendrils and yellow flowers; fruit grows to 10-40 cm in diameter and becomes yellowish or light green when ripe

Localization.Gloss: 頑固，悖逆。字面意思：硬著頸項；因而指頑固和悖逆。stubborn, rebellious

Terms.Localization: literally: stiff-necked; hence: stubborn, rebellious

Localization.Gloss: 基善（jī shàn），《思》克史雍。以薩迦支派地業內的一座城鎮，分配給利未支派人，位於伯善的西北方。Kishion

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 先見；異象。先見；異象。seer, vision

Terms.Localization: seer, vision

Localization.Gloss: 呂便人（lǚ biàn rén），《舊》呂便人，《思》勒烏本人。雅各的兒子，呂便支派的始祖。Reuben

Terms.Localization: son of Jacob; founder of tribe of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 呂便支派（lǚ biàn zhī pài），《思》勒烏本支派。呂便支派的成員。Reubenite

Terms.Localization: member of tribe of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 流瑪（liú mǎ），《思》勒烏瑪。亞伯拉罕的兄弟拿鶴之妾。Reumah

Terms.Localization: concubine of Nahor

Localization.Gloss: 利亞雅（lì yà yǎ），《思》勒阿雅。從被擄之地歸回的尼提寧（殿役）的家族族長之一。Reaiah

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 利亞雅（lì yà yǎ），《思》勒阿雅。猶大支派人，朔巴的兒子，雅哈的父親。Reaiah

Terms.Localization: son of Shobal; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 利亞雅（lì yà yǎ），《思》勒阿雅。呂便支派人，米迦的兒子，巴力的父親。Reaiah

Terms.Localization: son of Micah; tribe of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 野牛。具體身份不確定，指一種野生、不可馴服的有角動物，而且非常強壯；可能是野牛、水牛或犀牛；象征力量、野性和權力。wild ox

Terms.Localization: identification uncertain, but designates a wild, untameable animal with horns, and very strong; perhaps wild ox, buffalo, or rhinocerus; symbol of strength, wildness, and power

Localization.Gloss: 拉末（lā mò），《思》辣摩特。迦得支派地業內的一座逃城，分配給利未人。Ramoth

Terms.Localization: town of refuge; for Levites; Gilead; territory of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 拉末（lā mò），《思》辣摩特。以薩迦支派地業內的一座城鎮。Ramoth

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 雅提珥的拉末；拉末‧雅提珥。西緬支派地業內的一座城鎮。Ramah of the Negeb

Terms.Localization: village; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 鐵杉；有毒植物；毒草。一種有毒植物，可能是毒芹，屬於傘形科植物；也可能是網眼蓮；也用來泛指毒藥。hemlock; poisonous plant; poison

Terms.Localization: a poisonous plant; perhaps either Conium maculatum (poison hemlock), a member of the carrot family; or Hyoscyamus reticulatus (veined henbane); also used to denote poison in a more generic sense

Localization.Gloss: 羅實（luó shí），《思》洛士。便雅憫的兒子。Rosh

Terms.Localization: son of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 羅施（luó shī）。一個地點；另有一些人把這個詞語理解為普通的名詞，意為「首領」。Rosh

Terms.Localization: location; others understand the word as a common noun meaning "chief"

Localization.Gloss: 將軍，拉墨。亞述帝國重要的政治或軍事官員的官職頭銜。chief officer, Rabmag

Terms.Localization: Title of an important political or military official in Assyria

Localization.Gloss: 將軍，拉伯‧撒利。亞述帝國重要的政治或軍事官員的官職頭銜；另見סָרִיס。chief officer, Rabsaris

Terms.Localization: Title of an important political or military official in Assyria; see also סָרִיס

Localization.Gloss: 將軍，首席顧問，拉伯‧沙基。亞述和巴比倫宮廷或軍隊中的高級官員。chief officer, chief adviser, Rabshakeh

Terms.Localization: high official in the Assyrian and Babylonian court or army

Localization.Gloss: 拉巴。一座城鎮，亞捫人的都城。Rabbah

Terms.Localization: town; capital of Ammon

Localization.Gloss: 拉巴（lā bā），《思》阿辣巴。猶大支派屬地的山地城鎮之一，位於耶路撒冷以西。Rabbah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 拉璧（lā bì），《思》多貝辣特。以薩迦支派地業內的城鎮之一。Rabbith

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 利比拉（lì bǐ lā），《思》黎貝拉。神所定應許之地的東方邊界。Riblah

Terms.Localization: MT; HOTTP הַרְבֵּלָה: "to Harbelah"

Localization.Gloss: 利比拉（lì bǐ lā），《思》黎貝拉。古代軍事重鎮，在巴比倫的奧朗特斯（Orontes）河岸。Riblah

Terms.Localization: town; on the Orontes river

Localization.Gloss: 利巴（lì bā），《思》勒巴。摩西時期的五個米甸王之一。Reba

Terms.Localization: king of Midian

Localization.Gloss: 《現》麗百加（lì bǎi jiā），《和》利百加，《思》黎貝加。以撒的妻子，雅各和以掃的母親。Rebekah

Terms.Localization: wife of Isaac

Localization.Gloss: 羅基琳（luó jī lín），《思》洛革林。位於基列的鄉村。Rogelim

Terms.Localization: village; Gilead

Localization.Gloss: 利健（lì jiàn），《思》勒根。雅代的兒子，猶大支派迦勒家族的族長之一。Regem

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 利堅‧米勒（lì jiān - mǐ lè）。先知撒迦利亞的伯特利人之一。Regem-Melech

Terms.Localization: man; from Bethel; time of prophet Zechariah

Localization.Gloss: 拉代（lā dài），《思》辣待。猶大支派耶西的第五子，大衞的兄長。Raddai

Terms.Localization: son of Jesse; brother of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 羅迦（luó jiā），《思》洛赫加。亞設支派人，朔默的兒子。Rohgah

Terms.Localization: son of Shemer; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 《現》羅德人（luó dé rén），《和》多單（duō dān）／底但人（dǐ dàn rén），《思》多丹／德丹人。雅弗之孫，雅完之子多單的後裔。Rodanim

Terms.Localization: descendants of Javan, son of Japheth

Localization.Gloss: 魯瑪（lǔ mǎ）／度瑪（dù mǎ），《思》魯瑪／杜瑪。以法蓮支派地業內的一座城鎮。Rumah

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 羅幔提‧以謝（luó màn tí-yǐ xiè），《思》洛瑪默提厄則爾。希幔的兒子，大衞時代聖殿第24班次的樂師首領。Romamti-Ezer

Terms.Localization: son of Heman; temple singer; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 路得（lù dé），《思》盧德。摩押女子，以利米勒和拿俄米的兒媳，瑪倫的妻子。Ruth

Terms.Localization: from Moab; wife of Mahlon, son of Elimelech

Localization.Gloss: 利遜（lì xùn），《思》勒宗。以利亞大的兒子，所羅門時期的亞蘭王，以色列的敵人。Rezon

Terms.Localization: son of Eliada; king of Syria; adversary of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 喇合（lǎ hé），《思》辣哈布。耶利哥城的妓女。Rahab

Terms.Localization: prostitute from Jericho

Localization.Gloss: 利河伯（lì hé bó），《思》寬大。以撒的僕人所挖的一口井的名字，位於別是巴的西南方。Rehoboth

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 利河伯（lì hé bó），《思》勒曷波特。位於美索不達米亞的一個城鎮，寧錄所建的城鎮之一，尼尼微遺址的附近。Rehoboth

Terms.Localization: Rehoboth-Ir; town in Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 利河伯（lì hé bó），《思》勒曷波特。大河上的利河伯；位於美索不達米亞上的一座城鎮。Rehoboth

Terms.Localization: Rehoboth on the River; town in Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 利哈比雅（lì hā bǐ yǎ），《思》勒哈彼雅。以利以謝的兒子，摩西的孫兒，利未家族的族長之一。Rehabiah

Terms.Localization: son of Eliezer; chief; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 利哈比雅（lì hā bǐ yǎ），《思》勒哈彼雅。以利以謝的兒子，摩西的孫兒，利未家族的族長之一。Rehabiah

Terms.Localization: son of Eliezer; chief; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 羅波安（luó bō ān），《思》勒哈貝罕。南國猶大的君王（公元前931/930-913年在位），所羅門的兒子。Rehoboam

Terms.Localization: son of Solomon; king of Judah (931/30-913)

Localization.Gloss: 利合（lì hé），《思》勒曷布。位於但與亞蘭邊境上的一座城鎮。Rehob

Terms.Localization: town; on border bewteen Dan and Syria

Localization.Gloss: 利合（lì hé），《思》勒曷布。亞設支派地業內的一座城鎮，分配給利未人。Rehob

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 利合（lì hé），《思》勒曷布。瑣巴王，哈大底謝的父親。Rehob

Terms.Localization: father of Hadadezer, king of Zobah

Localization.Gloss: 利合（lì hé），《思》勒曷布。被擄歸回時期的利未人之一。Rehob

Terms.Localization: man; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 利合。亞設支派地業內的一座城鎮，分配給利未人。Rehob

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 利宏。被擄歸回時期的一個省長。Rehum

Terms.Localization: governor; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 憐憫的，關愛的。上帝的屬性；充滿母性的溫柔。compassionate, loving

Terms.Localization: attribute of God; full of maternal tenderness

Localization.Gloss: 利宏。被擄歸回後的一個男子。Rehum

Terms.Localization: man; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 母綿羊。אַיִל 的母羊；與順服相關。ewe

Terms.Localization: female of אַיִל; associated with submissiveness

Localization.Gloss: 《現》蕾潔（lěi jié），《和》拉結（lā jié），《思》辣黑耳。拉班的女兒，雅各的妻子，約瑟和便雅憫的母親。Rachel

Terms.Localization: daughter of Laban; wife of Jacob

Localization.Gloss: 拉含（lā hán），《思》辣罕。迦勒的後裔；猶大支派人。Raham

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 埃及禿鷹。一種黑色和白色的猛禽；可能是埃及禿鷹或魚鷹；不潔淨，所以不可吃。Egyptian vulture

Terms.Localization: refers to a bird of prey that is black and white; either the Neophron percnopterus (Egyptian vulture) or the Pandion haliatus (osprey); unclean, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 揚淨穀物的鏟子。一種木製工具，長手柄上連著一個又長又扁的刀片，用來把穀物拋到空中，借住風力把穀粒和莖、穀殼分開；揚淨穀物常用來比喻區分好與壞的過程。winnowing shovel

Terms.Localization: wooden implement with a long, flat blade attached to a long handle, for throwing threshed grain into the air so that the wind might separate the straw and chaff from the grain; winnowing is often used as a figure of speech to denote the process of distinguishing between good and bad

Localization.Gloss: 利拜（lì bài），《思》黎拜。便雅憫支派基比亞人，大衛的勇士以太的父親。Ribai

Terms.Localization: father of Ithai, Ittai, warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 馨香之氣；令人愉悅的氣味。用火所獻的祭物所發出的馨香氣味。pleasing odor; soothing aroma

Terms.Localization: the pleasing aroma of offerings and sacrifices made by fire

Localization.Gloss: 利法。歌篾的兒子；雅弗的後代；另見דִּיפַת。Riphath

Terms.Localization: son of Gomer; descendant of Japheth; see also דִּיפַת

Localization.Gloss: 利甲（lì jiǎ），《思》勒加布。臨門的兒子，伊施波設的謀殺者。Rechab

Terms.Localization: son of Rimmon; murderer of king Ishbosheth

Localization.Gloss: 利甲（lì jiǎ），《思》勒加布。約拿達的父親，利甲人的先祖。Rechab

Terms.Localization: father of Jehonadab; ancestor of Rechabites

Localization.Gloss: 利甲（lì jiǎ），《思》勒加布。尼希米時期的官長之一瑪基雅的父親或先祖。Rechab

Terms.Localization: father of Malchijah, ruler of district; time of Nehemiah

Localization.Gloss: 利甲族人（lì jiǎ zú rén）／利甲人，《思》勒加布人。利甲的後裔。Rechabite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Rechab

Localization.Gloss: 利迦（lì jiā），《思》勒加布。猶大支派地業內的一座城鎮，確實位置不詳。Recah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 拉哈勒（lā hā lè），《思》加爾默耳。猶大南部的城鎮之一，位置不詳。Racal

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 快馬。為求速度而選擇性地繁殖的一種快馬。fast horse

Terms.Localization: a fast horse, selectively bred for speed

Localization.Gloss: 蘭（lán），《思》蘭。猶大支派人，希斯崙的兒子。Ram

Terms.Localization: son of Hezron; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 蘭（lán），《思》蘭。猶大支派人，希斯崙的長子耶拉篾的兒子。Ram

Terms.Localization: son of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 蘭（lán），《思》蘭。布西人以利戶所屬家族的族長。Ram

Terms.Localization: ancestor of Elihu

Localization.Gloss: 欺騙，背叛。使某人相信不真實的事情，或對某人實施欺騙行為。deceive, betray

Terms.Localization: cause someone to believe something that is not true, or commit an act of deception against someone

Localization.Gloss: 拉瑪（lā mǎ），《思》辣瑪。便雅憫支派的城鎮，位於耶路撒冷以北。Ramah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 拉瑪（lā mǎ），《思》辣瑪。以法蓮山區的城鎮，位於示羅以西。Ramah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 拉瑪（lā mǎ），《思》辣瑪。亞設支派的城鎮，位於推羅的東南方。Ramah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 拉瑪（lā mǎ），《思》辣瑪。拿弗他利支派的堅固城，位於基尼烈城的西北方。Ramah

Terms.Localization: fortified town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 拉末（lā mò），《思》辣摩特。位於基列的一座城鎮。Ramah

Terms.Localization: town; Gilead

Localization.Gloss: 《現》蛆蟲，《和》蟲子。一種柔軟、無腳、管狀的小生物，沒有骨頭或殼；他們通常吃用過熟的水果、腐爛的肉和類似的東西；大多數是由蒼蠅或甲蟲產下的卵孵化而成的幼蟲；象征不潔淨、腐朽和死亡。worm, maggot

Terms.Localization: small, soft, legless, tube-shaped creatures that have no bones or shells. They typically feed on overripe fruit, rotting meat, and similar things; most are larvae that hatch from the eggs laid by flies or some beetles; symbols of uncleanness, decay, and death

Localization.Gloss: 石榴。一種小樹，生長至高 3-5 米，葉窄，深綠色；樹枝有刺；開紅色花朵，圓形的果子有堅硬的果皮，裡面擠滿一囊囊種子；種子有時被製成酒；是以色列人在迦南地找到的其中“特別”食物中的一種；石榴的末端呈花朵狀，在石上和聖殿中都是一種很有吸引力的裝飾圖形。pomegranate

Terms.Localization: small tree 3-5 m tall, with narrow, dark green leaves and thorny branches; Punica granatum; red flower; round fruit has a hard skin, with tightly-packed pockets of seeds inside; seeds were sometimes made into wine; one of the seven “special” foods mentioned that the Israelites would find in Canaan; flower-shaped end of the pomegranate fruit made it an attractive decoration on stone and in the temple

Localization.Gloss: 臨門（lín mén）／利門（lì mén），《思》黎孟。西緬支派的城鎮之一，位於別是巴以北。Rimmon

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 臨門（lín mén）／臨摩挪（lín mó nuó），《思》黎孟。西布倫支派地業內的城鎮之一，分配給利未人。Rimmon

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 臨門（lín mén），《思》黎孟。便雅憫支派比錄人，伊施波設的謀殺者巴拿和利甲的父親。Rimmon

Terms.Localization: father of Baanah and Rechab, murderers of king Ish-Bosheth

Localization.Gloss: 臨門（lín mén），《思》黎孟。敘利亞人的神明。Rimmon

Terms.Localization: Syrian deity

Localization.Gloss: 拉末（Qere)；耶列末（Ketib）。巴尼的後裔；娶了外邦女子為妻；被擄歸回時期的人物。Ramoth (Qere); Jeremoth (Ketib)

Terms.Localization: descendant of Bani; married a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 尼革夫的拉末。位於尼革夫的一個地點；可能就是巴拉‧比珥。Ramoth of the Negeb

Terms.Localization: location; Negeb; perhaps Baalath-beer

Localization.Gloss: 懶惰，懶散，懶惰的行為。懶惰，懶散，懶惰的行為。laziness, slackness, sluggish behaviour

Terms.Localization: laziness, slackness, sluggish behaviour

Localization.Gloss: 拉米（lā mǐ），《思》辣米雅。巴錄的子孫，被擄歸回後聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人之一。Ramiah

Terms.Localization: man; married a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 欺騙，背叛。欺騙某人的行為。deceit, betrayal

Terms.Localization: act of deception against someone

Localization.Gloss: 利瑪利。以色列王比加的父親。Remaliah

Terms.Localization: father of Pekah, king of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 臨門‧帕烈（lín mén-pà liè），《思》黎孟培勒茲。在出埃及的路線上，以色列人在曠野安營之地，位置不詳。Rimmon-Perez

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 爬蟲，爬行動物。爬行的東西，指不潔淨的小動物，尤其是爬行動物。reptiles, creeping things

Terms.Localization: creeping [things], referring to small unclean creatures, reptiles in particular.

Localization.Gloss: 利篾（lì miè），《思》勒默特。以薩迦支派屬地的城鎮之一，位於伯善以北。Remeth

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 拉末‧利希。位於非利士邊界上的一個地點；לְחִי。Ramath-Lehi

Terms.Localization: location; on the boundary of Philistea; לְחִי

Localization.Gloss: 拉瑪。拉瑪的居民。Ramathite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Ramah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》拉瑪城（的蘇弗人）（lā mă chéng (de sū fú rén)），《和》拉瑪‧瑣非（lā mă-suŏ fēi），《思》辣瑪（的族弗人）。以法蓮山地的一個城鎮，位於示羅以西。Ramathaim-Zophim

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 林拿（lín ná），《思》陵納。猶大支派人，示門的兒子。Rinnah

Terms.Localization: son of Shimon; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 鴕鳥。現存最大型的鳥類；雙翼不發達，因而不能飛；脖子和雙腳很長，約 2 米高；雄鳥的身體呈黑色，翅膀上有白色的長羽毛；雌鳥呈灰棕色；主要吃種子、落果，和嫩芽，有時也吃蜥蜴、青蛙；它們以二十隻左右的小群生活；與殘忍無情有關，因為大多數雌鳥不孵化自己下的蛋，也不照顧幼鳥。ostrich

Terms.Localization: largest living bird; with underdeveloped wings so that it cannot fly; long neck and legs; about 2 m tall; male's body is black with long white feathers on its wings; females are a uniform grayish brown; feeds mainly on seeds, fallen fruit, and shoots, occasionally lizards or frogs; lives in small flocks of about twenty; Struthio camelus; associated with heartless cruelty because most females do not hatch their own eggs and do not take care of their own young

Localization.Gloss: 勒撒（lè sā），《思》黎撒。在出埃及的路線上，以色列人在曠野安營之地，位置不詳。Rissah

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 嚼環／轡頭。一套由繩子或皮帶編成的器具；連於嚼環套在馬頭上，用來控制馬匹前行的方向。bridle

Terms.Localization: set of ropes or leather straps; fitted over the head of a horse and connected to the bit; used to steer the horse

Localization.Gloss: 利鮮（lì xiān），《思》勒森。寧錄所建造的城鎮之一，在美索不達米亞。Resen

Terms.Localization: town in Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 拉吳（lā wú），《思》勒伍。閃的後裔，法勒的兒子，西鹿的父親。Reu

Terms.Localization: son of Peleg; descendant of Shem

Localization.Gloss: 流珥（liú ěr），《思》勒烏耳。以掃的兒子。Reuel

Terms.Localization: son of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 流珥（liú ěr），《思》勒烏耳。米甸的祭司，摩西的岳父。Reuel

Terms.Localization: father-in-law of Moses; Midianite

Localization.Gloss: 丟珥（diū ěr），《思》勒烏耳。迦得支派首領以利雅薩的父親。Reuel

Terms.Localization: father of Eliasaph; tribe of Gad; see also [d.uveel]

Localization.Gloss: 流珥（liú ěr），《思》勒烏耳。便雅憫支派人，米書蘭的先祖，伊比尼雅的兒子，示法提雅的父親。Reuel

Terms.Localization: son of Ibnijah; ancestor of Meshullam; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 利以（lì yǐ），《思》勒依。大衞王朝的官員之一。Rei

Terms.Localization: official; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 利來雅（lì lái yǎ），《思》勒厄拉雅。與所羅巴伯一同返回巴勒斯坦的以色列人之一。Reelaiah

Terms.Localization: man; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 拉瑪（lā mǎ），《思》辣阿瑪。含的後裔，古實的兒子，示巴和但底的父親。Raamah

Terms.Localization: son of Cush; descendant of Ham

Localization.Gloss: 《現》拉末（lā mò），《和》拉米（lā mǐ），《思》乃赫米雅。與所羅巴伯一同從巴比倫返回巴勒斯坦的以色列人之一。Raamiah

Terms.Localization: man; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 蘭塞（lán sāi），《思》辣默色斯。埃及的一個地區和城鎮；位於尼羅河三角洲的東北部。Rameses

Terms.Localization: region, town; in Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 拉法。便雅憫的兒子。Rapha

Terms.Localization: son of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 拉法；巨人。一個巨人族的祖先。Raphah

Terms.Localization: giant, ancestor of Rephaites

Localization.Gloss: 利乏音人。拉法的後裔；巨人族。Rephaim

Terms.Localization: descendants of Raphah; tribe of giants

Localization.Gloss: 陰魂。死者的靈魂。shades

Terms.Localization: spirits of the dead

Localization.Gloss: 利法益。示瑪雅的兒子；守門人；屬利未支派。Rephael

Terms.Localization: son of Shemaiah; gatekeeper; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 《現》巨人(jù rén)，《和》偉人(wěi rén)，《思》辣法巨人。迦特的巨人族的祖先。Raphah

Terms.Localization: ancestor of tribe of giants

Localization.Gloss: 拉法（lā fǎ），《思》勒法雅。比尼亞的兒子，以利亞薩的父親，便雅憫支派掃羅的後裔。Raphah

Terms.Localization: son of Binea; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 拉孚（lā fú），《思》辣富。便雅憫支派的探子帕提的父親。Raphu

Terms.Localization: father of Palti, spy; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 利法（lì fǎ），《思》勒法黑。以法蓮的子孫，約書亞的先祖。Rephah

Terms.Localization: son of Ephraim; ancestor of Joshua

Localization.Gloss: 利非訂（lì fēi dìng），《思》勒非丁。以色列人出埃及時安營之地，位於汛曠野和西奈曠野之間。Rephidim

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 利法雅（lì fǎ yǎ），《思》勒法雅。猶大支派人，耶篩亞的兒子，亞珥難的父親，所羅巴伯的後裔。Rephaiah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 利法雅（lì fǎ yǎ），《思》勒法雅。西緬支派人，以示的兒子。Rephaiah

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 利法雅（lì fǎ yǎ），《思》勒法雅。以薩迦支派人，陀拉的兒子。Rephaiah

Terms.Localization: son of Tola; tribe of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 《現》拉法（lā fǎ），《和》利法雅（lì fǎ yǎ），《思》勒法雅。便雅憫支派掃羅的後裔，比尼亞的兒子，以利亞薩的父親。Rephaiah

Terms.Localization: son of Binea; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 利法雅（lì fǎ yǎ），《思》勒法雅。戶珥的兒子，尼希米時期管理半個耶路撒冷區和協助修築耶路撒冷城牆的人。Rephaiah

Terms.Localization: son of Hur; chief of half of the district of Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 圈；牲畜棚。畜舍內餵飼牲口的地方（穀倉的一部分）；或：戶外餵飼牲口的地方，一般在一個半圓形的圍欄內，通常在房子附近，甚或在裡面。stall; animal pen

Terms.Localization: (part of a) barn where animals are fed; or: place where animals are fed outside, often in a semi-circular enclosure; usually located near, or even inside, the house

Localization.Gloss: 悅納／喜悅／滿足／善意。悅納／喜悅／滿足／善意。delight, satisfaction; will, pleasure; goodwill, favour

Terms.Localization: delight, satisfaction; will, pleasure; goodwill, favour

Localization.Gloss: 利寫（lì xiě），《思》黎茲雅。亞設支派的族長，烏拉的兒子。Riziah

Terms.Localization: son of Ulla; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 利汛（lì xùn），《思》勒斤。公元前8世紀大馬士革的亞蘭王。Rezin

Terms.Localization: king of Syria

Localization.Gloss: 利汛（lì xùn），《思》勒斤。從被擄之地歸回的尼提寧（殿役）的家族族長之一。Rezin

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 利色（lì sè），《思》勒責夫。亞述王所征服的一座城鎮，位於哈馬的東北。Rezeph

Terms.Localization: town; conquered by king of Assyria

Localization.Gloss: 利斯巴（lì sī bā），《思》黎茲帕。愛亞〔愛雅〕的女兒，掃羅的妃嬪。Rizpah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Aiah; concubine of king Saul

Localization.Gloss: 拉昆（lā kūn），《思》辣孔。但支派屬地的城鎮之一。Rakkon

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 利堅（lì jiān），《思》勒耿。便雅憫支派屬地的城鎮之一。Rakem, Rekem

Terms.Localization: town; Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 利金（lì jin），《思》勒耿。摩西時期的米甸首領之一。Rakem, Rekem

Terms.Localization: king of Midian

Localization.Gloss: 利肯（lì kěn），《思》勒耿。猶大支派人，迦勒的後裔。Rakem, Rekem

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 利金（lì jīn），《思》勒耿。毗利施的兒子；瑪拿西支派人。Rakem, Rekem

Terms.Localization: son of Peresh; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 繡花的衣服；刺繡。有人手刺繡之圖案的布料，所以是昂貴的；被視為漂亮和珍貴的物品。embroidered cloth; needlework

Terms.Localization: cloth with decorative patterns sewn into it by hand and therefore expensive; regarded as beautiful and valuable

Localization.Gloss: 拉甲（lā jiǎ），《思》辣卡特。拿弗他利支派屬地中的堅固城之一，位於加利利湖的西岸。Rakkath

Terms.Localization: fortified town; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 有罪。由於（據稱）做了一些違背律法的事，因而在上帝或在人面前被認為有罪。to be guilty

Terms.Localization: to be or be considered guilty before God or humans, as a result of (alleggedly) having acted in a way that is contrary to the law

Localization.Gloss: 定罪。由於（據稱）某人做了一些違背律法的事，因而在上帝或在人面前宣佈他為有罪。to declare guilty; to condemn as guilty

Terms.Localization: to declare someone guilty before God or humans, as a result of (alleggedly) having acted in a way that is contrary to the law

Localization.Gloss: 有罪的人；邪惡的；不敬神的。與義人相對，指因拒絕遵守上帝的律法而永遠活在罪愆中的人。wicked; godless

Terms.Localization: person who lives in a perpetual state of guilt because of refusing to heed God's laws; opposite of righteous

Localization.Gloss: 作惡／行惡。行為與（上帝的）律法相反，因而處於有罪的狀態。to act wickedly

Terms.Localization: to act in a way that is contrary to (God's) law, resulting in a state of guilt

Localization.Gloss: 利悉（lì xī），《思》勒舍夫。以法蓮支派人，比利亞的兒子，他拉的父親，約書亞的祖先。Resheph

Terms.Localization: son of Beriah; ancestor of Joshua; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 網。形狀和大小不詳，用來捕獵雀鳥和其他野獸，也用來打漁；常指攻擊和控制。net

Terms.Localization: net of unknown size and shape; used for hunting birds and other animals, and also for fishing; associated with aggression and control

Localization.Gloss: 羅騰。一種在沙漠生長的粗壯灌木，約高 2 米；有許多細小枝幹，葉子稀少，長出一簇簇白色的花。broom

Terms.Localization: a tough desert shrub, up to 2 m tall; many small branches, few leaves, clusters of white flowers; Retama raetam

Localization.Gloss: 利提瑪（lì tí mǎ），《思》黎特瑪。在出埃及的路線上，以色列人在曠野中安營之地，位於加低斯。Rithmah

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 網羅。一種陷阱，用粗細不一的樹枝遮蓋和隱藏一個地洞或深坑；用來捕獵野獸；常指攻擊和控制。pitfall

Terms.Localization: network of branches and twigs which covers and hides a hole or pit; used for catching animals; associated with aggression and control

Localization.Gloss: 示班（shì bān），《思》色班。呂便支派的城鎮之一，位於希實本的西南。Sebam

Terms.Localization: village; territory of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 西比瑪（xī bǐ mǎ），《思》息貝瑪。呂便支派屬地的城鎮之一，位於希實本的西南。Sibmah

Terms.Localization: village; territory of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 西割（xī gē），《思》色古布。重建耶利哥城的伯特利人希伊勒的幼子。Segub

Terms.Localization: son of Hiel, rebuilder of Jericho

Localization.Gloss: 西割（xī gē），《思》色古布。猶大支派人，希斯崙的兒子，睚珥的父親。Segub

Terms.Localization: son of Hezron; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 羊。羊群中單獨的個體，可以指綿羊或山羊。sheep

Terms.Localization: the individual animal of a flock, whether sheep or goat

Localization.Gloss: 梭哥（suō gē），《思》索苛／索哥。猶大支派在高原的城鎮之一，位於希伯崙的西北。Soco

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 梭哥（suō gē），《思》索苛。猶大支派在高原的城鎮之一，位於希伯崙的西南。Soco

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 蘇甲（族）人（sū jiǎ (zú) rén），《思》穌加人。居於雅比斯的文士家族名稱。Sucathite

Terms.Localization: clan of scribes of Jabez

Localization.Gloss: 西提拿（xī tí ná），《思》仇恨。以撒的僕人挖的一口水井。Sitnah

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 《現》西連山（xī lián shān），《和》西雲山（xī yún shān），《思》息爾翁（山）。以色列東北部的一座山，即黑門山。Sion

Terms.Localization: range of mountains, north-east of Israel; Hermon; Sirion

Localization.Gloss: 塗上，粉刷。用石灰水刷在牆上，使之變白以遮蓋其難看的表面。to whitewash

Terms.Localization: to cover a surface with whitewash, to make it white and cover ugly rough surfaces

Localization.Gloss: 石灰水。石灰與水的混合物；刷在牆上，使之變白以遮蓋其難看的表面。whitewash

Terms.Localization: lime mixed with water; painted on walls to make them white and cover ugly rough surfaces

Localization.Gloss: 魚叉，長矛，倒鈎槍。約與一個人高度相等的木棒；一端有銳利和帶倒鈎的金屬或骨尖，另一端綁著一條繩子，用來拋向海裡的魚或海洋生物以捕殺牠們。harpoon; fishing spear

Terms.Localization: wooden rod about the length of a man, with a metal or bone point with barbs on one end, and a rope on the other end; thrown at fish or aquatic animals to kill and catch them

Localization.Gloss: 西沽（xī gū），《思》色雇。便雅憫支派的地業之一，位於拉瑪北面的一個小山上。Secu

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 雄雞。意思不確定；家養的公雞；一大早就啼叫，宣告黎明的來臨；還有人提出這是一種天象，或心思。rooster

Terms.Localization: meaning uncertain; male of the domestic chicken; crows very early in the morning, announcing the coming dawn; others propose: celestial phenomenon; mind

Localization.Gloss: 沙迦（shā jiā），《思》撒基雅。便雅憫支派的族長之一，沙哈連和賀得的兒子。Sachia

Terms.Localization: son of Shaharaim; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 洞察，明辨。有超強的辨別的理解能力。have insight, prudence

Terms.Localization: have a superior mental power of discernment and understanding

Localization.Gloss: 智慧，精明。超強的辨別和理解能力。insight, sense

Terms.Localization: superior power of discernment and understanding

Localization.Gloss: 沙甲。亞希暗的父親，大衛王時期的戰士。Sachar

Terms.Localization: father of Ahiam, warrior, time of king David; שָׁרָר

Localization.Gloss: 沙甲（shā jiǎ），《思》撒加爾。大衛時期利未支派的可拉人，俄別以東的兒子。Sachar

Terms.Localization: son of Obed-Edom; Levite; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 鵪鶉。黃白相間的褐色小鳥，最小的狩獵鳥；像是小型的鷓鴣，喙下端有白色的斑點，眼睛和頸部也各有一條白色條紋；與出埃及期間上帝仁慈的供應有關。quail

Terms.Localization: small brown bird streaked with white, smallest of the game birds; looks like a miniature partridge, with a small white patch beneath its beak, a white stripe above its eye, and another around its neck; Coturnix coturnix; associated with God’s merciful provision during the Exodus from Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 撒們（sā mén），《思》撒耳瑪。猶大支派人，拿順的兒子。Salma

Terms.Localization: son of Nahshon; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 薩瑪（sà mǎ），《思》撒耳瑪。猶大支派迦勒的後裔，伯利恒的始祖。Salma

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah; founder of Bethlehem

Localization.Gloss: 撒門（sā mén），《思》撒耳孟。猶大支派人，拿順的兒子。Salmon

Terms.Localization: son of Nahshon; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 撒門（sā mén），《思》撒耳孟。猶大支派人，拿順的兒子，波阿斯的父親。Salmon

Terms.Localization: son of Nahshon; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 桑拉（sāng lā），《思》撒默拉。古代以色列人未有君王時，以東的一個君王。Samlah

Terms.Localization: king of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 《現》壁虎，《和》守宮。一種小型蜥蜴，約長 10 釐米，腳趾的吸盤長有細毛，使牠可以倒立走在天花板；是唯一會發出聲音的蜥蜴；以昆蟲為食；各種壁虎的統稱；有些種類的壁虎也常出現在屋內；不潔淨的動物，因此不能吃。gecko

Terms.Localization: small type of lizard about 10 centimeters (4 inches) long with pads at the end of its toes with small hairs, enabling it to walk upside down on ceilings and overhangs; only type of lizard that produces sound; feeds on insects; Hemidactylus turcicus, or a general word for all kinds of gecko; some varieties of geckos are often found inside buildings; unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 示尼珥 （shì ní ěr），《思》色尼爾。以色列北部的一座山脈。Senir

Terms.Localization: range of mountains, north-east of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 公山羊。公山羊，通常用於獻祭；在《以賽亞書》13:21和34:14中，可能指野山羊；其餘見 שָׂעִיר-2 的解釋。he-goat

Terms.Localization: male goat, usually in the context of being used as a sacrifice; ISA 13:21; 34:14 may refer to goats that have become wild; others interpret as שָׂעִיר-2

Localization.Gloss: 鬼魔；山羊鬼魔。山羊形狀的鬼魔，或根據山羊形狀製成的偶像；有些人把《以賽亞書》13:21和34:14也包括在這裡。見שָׂעִיר-1。satyr, goat idol

Terms.Localization: a demon with the shape of a goat, or an idol made in the shape of a goat; some include ISA 13:21; 34:14 here. See שָׂעִיר-1.

Localization.Gloss: 西珥，《思》色依爾。人，民族，地點。Seir

Terms.Localization: man, people, location

Localization.Gloss: 《現》以東（山區）（yĭ dōng (shān qū)），《和》西珥（山）（xī ěr (shān)），《思》色依爾（山）。猶大支派北界的山地，可能是在耶琳山與巴拉之間的小山。Seir

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 母山羊。用於獻祭的母山羊；見שָׂעִיר。she-goat

Terms.Localization: female goat as sacrificial animal; see שָׂעִיר

Localization.Gloss: 西伊拉（xī yī lā），《思》色依辣。便雅憫支派的城鎮之一。Seirah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 大麥。一種像麥或水稻耕作的植物；不到 1 米高；每根莖上都有一個穗，穗上有幾排子粒；穀物被用來做麵包、啤酒或動物飼料。barley

Terms.Localization: type of cultivated grass like wheat or rice; less than 1 m tall; has a single head on each stalk, with rows of kernels; Hordeum distichum or Hordeum vulgare; grain was used to make bread or beer, or for animal feed

Localization.Gloss: 梭琳（suō lín），《思》色敖陵。大衞時代在聖殿供職的第四班次祭司首領。Seorim

Terms.Localization: priest; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 息末（xī mò），《思》息弗摩特。猶大支派的地業之一，位置不詳，可能在南地之內。Siphmoth

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 袋子／口袋／布袋。比較大的容器，用皮革或布料製成，用來貯藏及運送食物和其他物品。bag, sack

Terms.Localization: relatively large receptacle, made out of leather or cloth, used for the storage and transportation of food and possibly other objects as well

Localization.Gloss: 臣宰，軍長，護衛長，首領。臣宰，軍長，護衛長，首領。chief, prince

Terms.Localization: chief, prince

Localization.Gloss: 元帥；守護天使；天上的元帥。地位高的超自然生物；有時指上帝。patron-angel; guardian angel; heavenly commander; (God as) prince

Terms.Localization: supernatural being of high status; sometimes denoting God Himself

Localization.Gloss: 撒西金。巴比倫王尼布甲尼撒的首領之一。Sarsechim

Terms.Localization: official; time of king Nebuchadnezzar

Localization.Gloss: 沙利色（shā lì sè），《思》沙勒責爾。亞述王西拿基立的兒子。Sharezer

Terms.Localization: son of Sennacherib, king of Assyria

Localization.Gloss: 《現》沙利色（shā lì sè），《和》沙利亞（shā lì yà），《思》撒辣責爾。先知撒迦利亞時期的伯特利人。Sharezer

Terms.Localization: man; from Bethel; time of prophet Zechariah

Localization.Gloss: 尖筆，標記。一件削尖的工具或一種紅色粉筆；可以用來在木上做記號，幫助木匠計劃他希望製作之物品的形狀。stylus; marker

Terms.Localization: either a tool with a sharp point or a type of red chalk; used to make marks on wood to help the carpenter plan out the shape of the object he wants to make

Localization.Gloss: 《現》莎拉（shā lā），《和》撒拉（sā lā），《思》撒辣。亞伯拉罕的妻子，以撒的母親。Sarah

Terms.Localization: wife of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 西鹿（xī lù），《思》色魯格。閃的後裔，拉吳的兒子。Serug

Terms.Localization: son of Reu; descendant of Shem

Localization.Gloss: 西拉（xī lā），《思》色辣黑。亞設的女兒。Serah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 《現》莎萊（shā lái），《和》撒萊（sā lái），《思》撒辣依。亞伯拉罕妻子撒拉的原名。Sarai

Terms.Localization: wife of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 枝子；藤蔓。從植物的樹幹或莖部延伸出來的一部分。branch, tendril

Terms.Localization: small extension from the trunk or stem of a plant

Localization.Gloss: 撒立（sā lì），《思》沙杜得。西布倫支派地業的城鎮之一，位於米吉多的東北方。Sarid

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 西萊雅（xī lái yǎ），《思》沙委沙。大衛時期的書記。Seraiah

Terms.Localization: secretary; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 西萊雅（xī lái yǎ），《思》色辣雅。西底家時期的祭司長，亞撒利雅的兒子，希勒家的孫子。Seraiah

Terms.Localization: son of Azariah; high priest; time of king Zedekiah

Localization.Gloss: 西萊雅（xī lái yǎ），《思》色辣雅。猶大支派人，尼陀法人單戶蔑的兒子，接受基大利管治的軍長之一。Seraiah

Terms.Localization: son of Tanhumeth; army officer of Judah; time of exile

Localization.Gloss: 西萊雅（xī lái yǎ），《思》色辣雅。希勒家的兒子，聖被擄歸回後的一個祭司。Seraiah

Terms.Localization: son of Hilkiah; priest; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 西萊雅（xī lái yǎ），《思》色辣雅。猶大支派人，基納斯的兒子，約押的父親。Seraiah

Terms.Localization: son of Kenaz; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 西萊雅（xī lái yǎ），《思》色辣雅。西緬支派人，耶戶的祖父，亞薛的兒子。Seraiah

Terms.Localization: son of Asiel; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 西萊雅（xī lái yǎ），《思》色辣雅。被擄歸回後的三個人：(1)隨同所羅巴伯歸回巴勒斯坦的人（拉2.2），極可能是「亞撒利雅」（尼7.7）；(2)簽署了以斯拉之約的祭司之一（尼10.2）；(3)希勒家的兒子，聖殿的祭司之一。Seraiah

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 西萊雅（xī lái yǎ），《思》色辣雅。猶大支派人，尼利亞的兒子，巴錄的兄弟，西底家時期的官長之一。Seraiah

Terms.Localization: son of Neriah; official; time of king Zedekiah

Localization.Gloss: 西萊雅（xī lái yǎ），《思》色辣雅。亞斯列的兒子，約雅敬時期的官長之一。Seraiah

Terms.Localization: son of Azriel; official; time of Jehoiakim

Localization.Gloss: 《現》西連（xī lián）／黑門山（hēi mén shān），《和》西連（xī lián），《思》息爾翁。以色列東北部的一座山，即黑門山。Sirion

Terms.Localization: range of mountains, north-east of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 毒蛇。一種毒蛇；不潔淨的動物；與潛伏的危險和生育能力關聯。。viper

Terms.Localization: a kind of venemous snake (viper); unclean animal; associated with lurking danger and with fertility, since the young are carried alive inside the female viper, which then gives birth to large numbers of well-developed young, all at the same time

Localization.Gloss: 撒拉弗。撒拉弗。seraph

Terms.Localization: seraph

Localization.Gloss: 薩拉（sà lā），《思》撒辣弗。猶大的後裔，示拉的兒子。Saraph

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 葡萄樹。備受青睞的葡萄藤；שֹׂרֵקָה。vine

Terms.Localization: highly valued grapevine; שֹׂרֵקָה

Localization.Gloss: 梭烈（suō liè），《思》芍勒克。位於非利士地的一處山谷。Sorek

Terms.Localization: valley; Philistia

Localization.Gloss: 葡萄樹。備受青睞的葡萄藤；שֹׂרֵק。vine

Terms.Localization: highly valued grapevine; שֹׂרֵק

Localization.Gloss: 掃羅。基士的兒子；便雅憫支派人；以色列第一個王。Saul, Shaul

Terms.Localization: son of Kish; king of Israel; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 《現》少羅（shào luó），《和》掃羅（sǎo luó），《思》沙烏耳。以色列有君王前，古代以東君王之一。Saul, Shaul

Terms.Localization: king of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 《現》少羅（shào luó），《和》掃羅（sǎo luó），《思》沙烏耳。西緬和迦南女子所生的兒子。Saul, Shaul

Terms.Localization: son of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 少羅（shào luó），《思》沙烏耳。利未支派人，哥轄的後裔，烏西雅的兒子。Saul, Shaul

Terms.Localization: son of Uzziel; descendant of Kohath; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 《現》少羅宗族（shào luó zōng zú），《和》掃羅族（sǎo luó zú），《思》沙烏耳家族。西緬和迦南女子所生的兒子掃羅的後裔。Shaulite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Shaul, son of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 示押（shì yā），《思》舍阿耳。巴尼的子孫，被擄歸回後聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人之一。Sheal

Terms.Localization: descendant of Bani; married a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 撒拉鐵。約雅斤的兒子；所羅巴伯的父親；猶大支派人。Shealtiel

Terms.Localization: son of Jehoiachin; father of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 撒拉鐵。約雅斤的兒子；所羅巴伯的父親；猶大支派人。Shealtiel

Terms.Localization: son of Jehoiachin; father of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 施亞雅述（shī yà yǎ shù），《思》舍阿爾雅叔布。以賽亞長子的名字，希伯來文的意思是「餘民將要歸回」。Shear-Jashub

Terms.Localization: son of Isaiah; "A remnant shall return"

Localization.Gloss: 舍伊拉（shè yī lā），《思》舍厄辣。以法蓮的女兒。Sheerah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 示巴；示巴人。(1)含的後裔，拉瑪的兒子（創10.7）；(2)閃的後裔，約坍的兒子（創10.28）；(3)閃的後裔，亞伯拉罕與妾基土拉所生的子孫，約珊的兒子；(4)所羅門時代的一個國家，確實地點有幾個可能性，最可能是阿拉伯半島西南岸的也門，但也有可能是埃塞俄比亞的地區。Sheba, Sabeans

Terms.Localization: son of Raamah, Jokshan, Joktan; descendant of Shem, Ham; land

Localization.Gloss: 示巴人（shì bā rén），《思》舍巴人。示巴地的居民或示巴的後裔。Sabean

Terms.Localization: descendant or inhabitant of Sheba

Localization.Gloss: 瑪瑙。（半）寶石，有幾層不同的顏色；可能是玉髓的一種；瑪瑙。agate

Terms.Localization: (semi-)precious stone with various curved layers of different colors; possibly variety of chalcedony: agate

Localization.Gloss: 細布業。革舜的兒子，暗蘭的後裔，利未支派人，管理庫房；與書巴業（שְׁבוּאֵל-1）是同一個人。Shebuel

Terms.Localization: descendant of Gershom; chief; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 細布業（xì bù yè），《思》叔巴耳。利未支派希幔的兒子，大衛王時期的聖殿樂師，與書巴業（שְׁבוּאֵל-2）是同一個人。。Shebuel

Terms.Localization: son of Heman; temple singer; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 誓言。一個莊嚴的承諾。oath

Terms.Localization: a solemn promise

Localization.Gloss: 《現》支族，《和》支派。在同一位領袖的帶領下團結起來的氏族群。tribe

Terms.Localization: group of clans united by a common leader

Localization.Gloss: （牧羊人的）杖。牧人所用的直木棍，長約1－2米，直徑的寬度剛好適合用手握住。(shepherd's) staff

Terms.Localization: straight wooden stick of about 1-2 meters in length; its diameter allowed it to fit comfortably in a person’s hand; used by shepherds

Localization.Gloss: 朔拜（shuò bài），《思》芍拜。利未支派的族長之一，被擄歸回後負責看守殿門。Shobai

Terms.Localization: family head; gatekeepers; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 朔比（shuò bǐ），《思》芍彼。亞捫王，拿轄的兒子。Shobi

Terms.Localization: son of Nahash, king of Ammon

Localization.Gloss: 蝸牛。一種陸栖軟體動物，通常有螺旋狀的殼；身體的一部分叫足，從殼中伸出，使蝸牛前進；沿路會留下分泌出來的黏液。snail

Terms.Localization: a land mollusk, usually with a spiral shell; part of the body called the foot extends out of the shell and propels the snail; excretes a slime along which it travels

Localization.Gloss: 舍伯那（shè bó nà），《思》舍布納。猶大王希西家的書記。Shebna, Shebnah

Terms.Localization: official; time of king Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 示巴尼（shì bā ní），《思》舍巴尼雅。被擄歸回後的三個人：(1)尼希米時代的利未人之一；(2)兩個在以斯拉之約上簽名的利未人。Shebaniah

Terms.Localization: various Levites; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 示巴尼（shì bā ní），《思》舍巴尼雅。被擄歸回後的祭司之一。Shebaniah

Terms.Localization: priest; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 示巴尼。大衛王時期的一個祭司。Shebaniah

Terms.Localization: priest; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 起誓。莊嚴地承諾。swear

Terms.Localization: to promise solemnly

Localization.Gloss: 示巴（shì bā），《思》舍巴。西緬支派地業內的一座城鎮。Sheba

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 示巴（shì bā），《思》舍巴。大衛時期的便雅憫支派人，比基利的兒子。Sheba

Terms.Localization: son of Bichri; tribe of Benjamin; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 示巴（shì bā），《思》舍巴。迦得支派人，亞比孩的兒子，巴珊地的領袖之一。Sheba

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 示巴（shì bā），《思》誓約。以撒的僕人所挖的井。Shibah

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 七七收穫節。以色列人在逾越節的七個星期後慶祝的節日，也叫初熟節。Feast of Weeks; feast of firstfruits

Terms.Localization: Israelite festival celebrating the firstfruits of the crops, seven weeks after Passover

Localization.Gloss: 示別（shì bié），《思》舍貝爾。猶大支派人，迦勒和他的妾瑪迦所生的兒子。Sheber

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 安息日。休息的聖日；一周的第七日，以色列人在這天不做工。sabbath, (day of) rest

Terms.Localization: a holy day of rest; seventh day of the week, on which no work is to be done

Localization.Gloss: 沙比太（shā bǐ tài），《思》沙貝泰。被擄歸回時期的利未人族長之一，也是管理神殿外事的其中一人。Shabbethai

Terms.Localization: Levite(s); after exile

Localization.Gloss: 沙基（shā jī），《思》沙革。哈拉人，大衛的勇士約拿單的父親。Shagee

Terms.Localization: Hararite; father of Jonathan, warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 《現》假神，《和》鬼魔。鬼魔。demon

Terms.Localization: demon

Localization.Gloss: 全能者；全足者。傳統譯為：全能者；最好譯為：全足者（一切美善與完全的恩賜都是從他而來）。Almighty One; All-sufficient One

Terms.Localization: traditionally: Almighty One; better: All-sufficient One (the One every good and perfect gift comes from)

Localization.Gloss: 示丟珥（shì diū ěr），《思》舍德烏爾。曠野漂流時呂便支派的首領以利蓿的父親。Shedeur

Terms.Localization: father of Elizur, chief; tribe of Reuben

Localization.Gloss: 沙得拉。但以理的朋友哈拿尼雅的迦勒底名字。Shadrach

Terms.Localization: Chaldean name of Hananiah, friend of Daniel

Localization.Gloss: 沙得拉。但以理的朋友哈拿尼雅的迦勒底名字。Shadrach

Terms.Localization: Chaldean name of Hananiah, friend of Daniel

Localization.Gloss: 寶石；縞瑪瑙。一種（半）寶石，具有白色直紋分層，也有黑色、棕色和紅色分層的品種；可能是玉璽的變種：縞瑪瑙。onyx

Terms.Localization: (semi-)precious stone with straight layers of a white color, alternating with black, brown, or red; possibly variety of chalcedony: onyx

Localization.Gloss: 朔含。米拉利的後代；利未支派人。Shoham

Terms.Localization: descendant of Merari; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 示法。大衛時期的書記。Sheva

Terms.Localization: secretary; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 示法（shì fǎ），《思》舍瓦。迦勒與妾瑪迦生的兒子，抹比拿和基比亞的祖先。Sheva

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah; founder of Machbenah and Gibea

Localization.Gloss: 書巴業（shū bā yè），《思》叔巴耳。暗蘭的後裔，利未支派人；與（שְׁבוּאֵל-1）是同一個人。Shubael

Terms.Localization: descendant of Amram; tribe of Levi; apparently the same person as שְׁבוּאֵל-1.

Localization.Gloss: 書巴業（shū bā yè），《思》叔巴耳。利未支派希幔的兒子，大衛時期負責聖殿音樂的第13班首領；與（שְׁבוּאֵל-2）是同一個人。Shubael

Terms.Localization: from the tribe of Levi; temple musician; time of king David; apparently the same person as שְׁבוּאֵל-2.

Localization.Gloss: 朔罷（shuò bà），《思》芍巴布。猶大支派人，大衞的兒子之一。Shobab

Terms.Localization: son of David; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 朔罷（shuò bà），《思》芍巴布。猶大支派人，迦勒與妻子阿蘇巴所生的兒子。Shobab

Terms.Localization: son of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 朔法（shuò fǎ），《思》芍巴客。大衛時期瑣巴王哈大底謝的將軍。Shobach

Terms.Localization: army commander of Hadadezer, king of Zobah

Localization.Gloss: 朔巴（shuò bā），《思》芍巴耳。西珥的第二兒子，何利人家族的族長。Shobal

Terms.Localization: son of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 朔巴（shuò bā），《思》芍巴耳。猶大支派迦勒的子孫，戶珥的兒子，基列耶琳的創建者。Shobal

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah; founder of Kiriath-Jearim

Localization.Gloss: 朔百（shuò bǎi），《思》芍貝克。被擄歸回後在尼希米的帶領下立約簽名的民眾首領之一。Shobek

Terms.Localization: chief; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 沙微谷（shā wēi gǔ），《思》沙委山谷。靠近耶路撒冷的東面的一個地點，又名「王谷」。Shaveh

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 書亞。亞伯拉罕和基土拉所生的兒子。Shuah

Terms.Localization: son of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 書哈。基綠的兄弟；猶大支派人。Shuhah

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 書亞人（shū yà rén），《思》叔亞人。書亞的後裔。Shuhite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Shuah

Localization.Gloss: 書含（shū hán），《思》叔罕。但的兒子，書含族的先祖。Shuham

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 書含族（shū hán zú），《思》叔罕家族。但支派人，書含的後裔。Shuhamite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Shuham; tribe of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 官長／領班。官長／領班。officer, foreman, supervisor

Terms.Localization: officer, foreman, supervisor

Localization.Gloss: 《現》書拉蜜（的女子）（shū lā mì (de nǚ zǐ)），《和》書拉密女（shū lā mì nǚ），《思》叔拉米特。《雅歌》提及的女子，所居地位置不詳。Shulammite

Terms.Localization: woman; inhabitant of Shulem (Shunem?)

Localization.Gloss: 蒜。一種有類似於洋蔥的球莖的植物，但比洋蔥小，分為四、五瓣；有特殊的味道和氣味；用作食品調味和藥物。garlic

Terms.Localization: plant with a bulb something like that of an onion, but smaller, and divided into four or five parts; Allium sativum; distinctive taste and smell; used for seasoning food and as medicine

Localization.Gloss: 朔默。希別的兒子，亞設支派人。Shomer

Terms.Localization: son of Heber; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 書尼。迦得的兒子。Shuni

Terms.Localization: son of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 書尼支族（shū ní zhī zú），《思》叔尼家族。迦得的第三個兒子書尼的子孫。Shunite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Shuni, son of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 書念（shū niàn），《思》叔能。以薩迦支派地業的城鎮之一，位於耶斯列谷的東北方。Shunem

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 書念婦人（shū niàn fù rén）／書念女子（shū niàn nǚ zǐ），《思》叔能女子／叔能婦人。指書念地區的女子，舊約中有二人：(1)大衞年老時伺候他的亞比煞（王上1.3及下）；(2)接待先知以利沙的婦人（王下4.12, 25, 36）。Shunammite

Terms.Localization: woman; inhabitant of Shunem

Localization.Gloss: 書亞（shū yà），《思》叔亞。迦南人，猶大的妻子的父親。Shua

Terms.Localization: father of wife of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 書亞人（shū yà rén），《思》芍亞人。先知以西結預言中所提及的名字，所指地方不詳，可能是美索不達米亞一個遊牧民族的名稱。Shoa

Terms.Localization: people

Localization.Gloss: 書雅（shū yǎ），《思》叔亞。亞設支派人，希別的女兒。Shua

Terms.Localization: daughter of Heber; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 狐狸；豺狼。一種看起來像長毛狗的動物，有尖鼻子和毛茸茸的尾巴；顏色是紅背白肚子（狐狸），或背毛黃褐色而毛尖帶紅色（豺）；食腐動物；令人聯想到毀滅與破壞，以及微不足道而妄自尊大；聰明機敏但也狡猾。jackal, fox

Terms.Localization: animal looking like a longhaired dog with a pointed nose and a bushy tail; either reddish with white underparts (fox) or yellowish brown with red tips to the fur on the back (jackal); scavenger; associated with destruction and devastation, and also with being insignificant but self-important

Localization.Gloss: 書亞（shū yà），《思》叔阿耳。便雅憫支派所得的城鎮之一，位於密抹以北。Shual

Terms.Localization: region; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 書阿勒（shū ā lè），《思》叔阿耳。亞設支派人，瑣法的第三兒子。Shual

Terms.Localization: son of Zophah; tribe of Asher

Localization.Gloss: 朔法（shuò fǎ），《思》芍法客。大衞時期的瑣巴王哈大底謝的將軍。Shophach

Terms.Localization: army commander of Hadadezer, king of Zobah

Localization.Gloss: 書反（宗）族（shū fǎn (zōng) zú），《思》舍孚番家族。便雅憫人，書反的後裔。Shuphamite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Shephupham; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 書珥（shū ěr），《思》叔爾。埃及東部地區，是古代以埃及的安城為起點的大道。Shur

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 公牛。牛的統稱，包括公牛和母牛。cow, bull

Terms.Localization: general word for individual cattle; may be male or female

Localization.Gloss: 沙威沙（shā wēi shā），《思》沙委沙。大衞的書記。Shavsha

Terms.Localization: secretary; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 百合花。開花的植物，莖筆直，葉子長而窄；可長到 1.5 米高；有球狀的根和椎體形狀的花，通常有五六個花瓣，從莖直直突出或微微向下；跟無與倫比的美有關。lily

Terms.Localization: flowering plant with erect stem and long narrow leaves; can grow to 1.5 m high; bulbous root; cone-shaped flowers, usually with 5-6 petals, protrude straight out or slightly downward from the stem; Lilium candidum; associated with unsurpassed beauty

Localization.Gloss: 書珊（shū shān），《思》穌撒。波斯帝國的首都。Susa

Terms.Localization: town; capital of Persia

Localization.Gloss: 書珊（shū shān），《思》穌撒。書珊城的居民。Susa

Terms.Localization: inhabitants of Susa

Localization.Gloss: 書提拉。以法蓮的兒子。Shuthelah

Terms.Localization: son of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 書提拉（shū tí lā），《思》叔特拉。以法蓮支派人，撒拔的兒子。Shuthelah

Terms.Localization: son of Zabad; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 書提拉族（shū tí lā zú），《思》叔特拉家族。以法蓮的兒子書提拉的後裔。Shuthelahite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Shuthelah, son of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 猛獅／公獅。確切含義不明；可能指：不再威風凜凜地生活，而是獨自遊蕩的公獅子。wandering male lion

Terms.Localization: exact meaning uncertain; possibly: male lion that is no longer living with its pride and wanders around alone

Localization.Gloss: 《現》香螺，《和》施喜列。一種用在香料混合物中的東西，可能是軟體動物腳上好像指甲的覆蓋物，或某種花朵。onycha

Terms.Localization: something used in mixture of spices, either nail-like covering on foot of mollusk, or a type of flower (see Plants and Trees in the Bible 4.2.5)

Localization.Gloss: 海鷗。海鳥，包括海鷗、燕鷗、賊鷗等；大多數為白色，背部和上翼面為灰色或黑色；有靈活的長翅膀；以魚類或浮游動物為食；不潔淨，因此不能吃。seagull

Terms.Localization: seabird, including gull, tern, skua, courser, shearwater; most are white with gray or black backs and upper wing surfaces; long flexible wings; feeds on fish or plankton; unclean, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 狂傲的野；獅子。狂傲行走的動物（可能是獅子）。proud beast; lion

Terms.Localization: proudly walking animal (possibly lion)

Localization.Gloss: 沙哈洗瑪（shā hā xǐ mǎ），《思》沙哈漆瑪。以薩迦支派地業邊區的城鎮之一，位於他泊山東面。Shahazumah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 示哈利（shì hā lì），《思》舍哈黎雅。耶羅罕的兒子，便雅憫人的族長之一。Shehariah

Terms.Localization: son of Jeroham; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 沙哈連（shā hā lián），《思》沙哈辣殷。便雅憫支派人。Shaharaim

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 《現》金合歡木，《和》皂莢木。沙漠中的一種矮樹，高 3-5 米，樹冠寬闊；有鋒利的刺，細緻分開的葉子，白黃色的小花整串下垂；花朵會長出豆莢，乾燥後可編成圈環。acacia tree

Terms.Localization: short desert tree, reaching 3-5 m tall, with a wide crown; has sharp spines, finely divided leaves, and tiny pale yellow flowers arranged in drooping bunches; produces a bean pod that is twisted and looped when dry; member of Mimosa family, Acacia tortilis or Acacia raddiana

Localization.Gloss: 什亭（shí tíng），《思》史廷。位於約旦河谷的一個地點。Shittim

Terms.Localization: location; Jordan Valley

Localization.Gloss: 施提賚（shī tí lài），《思》史特賴。沙崙人，大衞時期掌管牧放牛羣的官長。Shitrai

Terms.Localization: official; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 示按（shì àn），《思》史雍。以薩迦支派屬地的城鎮之一，位置不詳。Shion

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 示撒（shì sā），《思》史匝。呂便支派人，大衛的勇士亞第拿的父親。Shiza

Terms.Localization: father of Adina, chief, tribe of Reuben, warrior, time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 希曷‧立納（xī hé-lì nà），《思》里貝納特河。亞設支派屬地的南界，源自迦密山，向西流入地中海。Shihor-Libnath

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Asher

Localization.Gloss: （供物？）。見詞典的討論。(tribute?)

Terms.Localization: see discussion in dictionary

Localization.Gloss: 示羅。以法蓮支派地業內的一座城鎮。Shiloh

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 示羅人。示羅的居民。Shilonite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Shiloh

Localization.Gloss: 示羅人。示羅的後裔，猶大支派人。Shilonite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Shelah; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 示門（shì mén），《思》史孟。猶大支派的族長之一。Shimon

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 示沙（shì shā），《思》史沙。大衞王的高級官員，所羅門的書記以利何烈和亞希亞的父親。Shisha

Terms.Localization: father of Elihoreph, official, time of king Salomon

Localization.Gloss: 示撒（shì sā），《思》史沙克。埃及第22王朝的法老。Shishak

Terms.Localization: king of Egypt; time of Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 示劍（shì jiàn），《思》舍根。瑪拿西支派人，基列的後裔。Shechem

Terms.Localization: son of Gilead; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 示劍（shì jiàn），《思》舍根。瑪拿西支派示米大的兒子。Shechem

Terms.Localization: son of Shemida; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 示劍（shì jiàn），《思》舍根。以法蓮支派地業內的一座城鎮，分配給利未人，位於耶路撒冷以北。Shechem

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 示劍（shì jiàn），《思》舍根。希未人哈抹的兒子；示劍的族長。Shechem

Terms.Localization: son of Hamor; chief of Shechem

Localization.Gloss: 示劍族（shì jiàn (zú)），《思》舍根家族。瑪拿西支派示劍的後裔。Shechemite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Shechem; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 示迦尼（shì jiā ní），《思》舍加尼雅。猶大支派大衞的後裔，所羅巴伯的子孫。Shecaniah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 示迦尼（shì jiā ní），《思》則加黎雅／舍加尼雅。被擄歸回後的四個人：(1)與以斯拉一起歸回的雅哈悉所屬的家族；(2)以攔的子孫，耶歇的兒子；(3)尼希米時期示瑪雅的父親；(4)與所羅巴伯一起歸回的一個祭司家族的族長。Shecaniah

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 示迦尼（shì jiā ní），《思》舍加尼雅。亞捫人多比雅的岳父，亞拉的兒子。Shecaniah

Terms.Localization: son of Arah; father-in-law to Tobiah

Localization.Gloss: 示迦尼（shì jiā ní），《思》舍加尼雅。大衛時期的祭司之一。Shecaniah

Terms.Localization: priest; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 示迦尼雅（shì jiā ní yǎ），《思》舍加尼雅。希西家時期的祭司之一。Shecaniah

Terms.Localization: priest; time of Hezekiah

Localization.Gloss: 施基崙（shī jī lún），《思》史加龍。猶大支派地業北邊的城鎮，位於約帕的東南方。Shikkeron

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 示拉（shì lā），《思》舍拉。猶大與書亞所生的第三個兒子。Shelah

Terms.Localization: son of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 沙龍（shā lóng），《思》沙隆。北國以色列的君王（公元前752年在位），雅比的兒子。Shallum

Terms.Localization: son of Jabesh; king of Israel (752)

Localization.Gloss: 沙龍（shā lóng），《思》沙隆。特瓦的兒子，女先知戶勒大的丈夫。Shallum

Terms.Localization: husband of Huldah, prophetess

Localization.Gloss: 沙龍（shā lóng），《思》沙隆。西斯買的兒子，耶加米雅的父親，耶拉篾的後裔，猶大支派人。Shallum

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 沙龍（shā lóng），《思》沙隆。西緬支派人，掃羅的兒子，米比衫的父親。Shallum

Terms.Localization: son of Saul; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 沙龍（shā lóng），《思》沙隆。猶大王約西亞的兒子，即「約哈斯」（公元前609年在位）。Shallum

Localization.Gloss: 沙龍（shā lóng），《思》沙隆。先知耶利米的叔叔，哈拿篾的父親。Shallum

Terms.Localization: father of Hanamel; uncle of prophet Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 沙龍（shā lóng），《思》沙隆／撒隆。撒督的兒子，希勒家的父親，祭司長，利未支派人。Shallum

Terms.Localization: son of Zadok; high priest; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 沙龍（shā lóng），《思》沙隆。拿弗他利的兒子。Shallum

Terms.Localization: son of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 沙龍（shā lóng），《思》沙隆。被擄歸回後守門的利未人，可利的兒子。Shallum

Localization.Gloss: 沙龍（shā lóng），《思》沙隆。利未支派的可拉人，瑪他提雅的父親。Shallum

Terms.Localization: father of Mattitiah, Levite

Localization.Gloss: 沙龍（shā lóng），《思》沙隆。希西家的父親，亞哈斯時期以法蓮人的族長之一。Shallum

Terms.Localization: father of Hezekiah, chief; tribe of Ephraim; time of Ahaz

Localization.Gloss: 沙龍（shā lóng），《思》沙隆。被擄歸回之後的四個人：(1)可拉人，可利的兒子，守門人；(2)聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的利未人之一；(3)聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人之一；(4)哈羅黑的兒子。Shallum

Terms.Localization: various men; after exile

Terms.Localization: father of Maaseiah; tribe of Levi; time of Jeremiah

Localization.Gloss: 完好的狀態；不擔心；興旺；平安；和平；友好；救恩。完好的狀態；不擔心；興旺；平安；和平；友好；救恩。intact state; unconcern, ease; prosperity; welfare, condition; peace; friendship; peace, salvation

Localization.Gloss: 示羅密。底伯利的女兒。Shelomith, Shelomoth

Localization.Gloss: 示羅密（shì luó mì），《思》舍羅米特。猶大支派人，所羅巴伯的女兒。Shelomith, Shelomoth

Terms.Localization: daughter of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 示羅密（shì luó mì），《思》舍羅米特。大衛時期利未支派革順的子孫，示每的兒子。Shelomith, Shelomoth

Terms.Localization: descendant de Izhar; Levite; time of king David

Terms.Localization: son of Zichri; Levite; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 沙拉。亞法撒的兒子；閃的後裔。Shelah

Terms.Localization: son of Arpachshad; descendant of Shem

Localization.Gloss: 西羅亞池。位於耶路撒冷的一個水池。Shelah

Localization.Gloss: 西羅亞池。位於耶路撒冷的一個水池。Shiloah

Terms.Localization: pool in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 示利希（shì lì xī），《思》史肋希。猶大王約沙法的母親阿蘇巴的父親。Shilhi

Terms.Localization: father of Azubah, mother of Jehoshaphat

Localization.Gloss: 《現》實欣（shí xīn），《和》實忻（shí xīn），《思》史耳新。猶大支派的城鎮之一，位於別是巴以西。Shilhim

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 鸕鶿或魚鷹。鷹類飛禽。身份不確定；一種不潔淨的禽鳥，不可吃；可能是一種像鷹的鳥類，以魚為食。osprey or cormorant

Localization.Gloss: 示羅米（shì luó mǐ），《思》舍羅米。亞設支派的首領亞希忽的父親。Shelomi

Terms.Localization: gatekeeper; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 示利米雅（shì lì mǐ yǎ），《思》舍肋米雅。被擄歸回後聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人之一。Shelemiah

Terms.Localization: man; married a foreign wife; after exile
