Localization.Gloss: 撒馬利亞人（sā mǎ lì yà rén），《舊》撒瑪利亞人，《思》撒瑪黎雅人。住在北國以色列的首都撒瑪利亞的居民。Samaritan

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Samaria

Localization.Gloss: 申拉（shēn lā），《思》史默辣特。便雅憫支派的族長之一，示每的兒子。Shimrath

Terms.Localization: son of Shimei; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 參孫（cān sūn），《思》三松。以色列人的士師，但支派人，瑪挪亞的兒子。Samson

Terms.Localization: son of Manoah; judge of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 伸帥。被擄歸回時期的書記。Shimshai

Terms.Localization: scribe; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 珊示莱。耶羅罕的兒子；便雅憫支派的家族族長之一。Shamsherai

Terms.Localization: son of Jeroham; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 舒瑪人（shū mǎ rén），《思》叔瑪人。基列耶琳諸族之一。Shumatite

Terms.Localization: clan of Kiriath-Jearim

Localization.Gloss: 善（shàn），《思》耶撒納。米斯巴附近的一個地點。Shen

Terms.Localization: location; near Mizpah

Localization.Gloss: 示納（shì nà），《思》史納布。亞伯拉罕時代的押瑪王。Shinab

Terms.Localization: king of Admah

Localization.Gloss: 示拿薩（shì ná sà），《思》舍納匝爾。猶大支派人，耶哥尼雅（約雅斤）的兒子，所羅巴伯的叔伯。Shenazzar

Terms.Localization: son of Jehoiachin; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》巴比倫（bā bĭ lún），《和》示拿（shì ná），《思》史納爾。位於美索不達米亞的一個地點。Shinar

Terms.Localization: region in Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: 沙賓（shā bīn），《思》沙耳賓。但支派地業內的一座城鎮。Shaalbim

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 沙拉賓（shā lā bīn），《思》沙阿拉賓。但支派屬地的城鎮之一，位於伯特利的西南。Shaalabbin

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 沙本人（shā běn rén），《思》沙阿耳賓人。住在沙本的居民。of Shaalbon

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Shaalbim, Shaalabbin

Localization.Gloss: 沙琳（shā lín），《思》沙阿林。便雅憫支派的地業之一。Shaalim

Terms.Localization: region; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 沙亞弗（shā yà fú），《思》沙阿夫。猶大支派迦勒的後裔，雅代的兒子。Shaaph

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 沙亞弗（shā yà fú），《思》沙阿夫。猶大支派迦勒與妾瑪迦所生之兒子，麥瑪拿的始祖。Shaaph

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah; founder of Madmannah

Localization.Gloss: 示亞利雅（shì yà lì yǎ），《思》沙黎雅。便雅憫支派人，掃羅王兒子約拿單的後裔，亞悉的兒子。Sheariah

Terms.Localization: son of Azel; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 沙拉音（shā lā yīn），《思》沙阿辣因。猶太支派屬地的城鎮，位於梭哥附近。Shaaraim

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 沙拉音（shā lā yīn），《思》沙阿辣因。西緬支派地業內的一座城鎮，位於別是巴的西部。Shaaraim

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 沙甲（shā jiǎ），《思》沙市加次。波斯王亞哈隨魯時期掌管妃嬪的太監。Shaashgaz

Terms.Localization: eunuch; time of king Ahasuerus (Xerxes)

Localization.Gloss: 示玻（shì bō），《思》舍佛。朔巴的兒子，西珥的後裔。Shepho

Terms.Localization: son of Shobal, son of of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 書反（shū fǎn），《思》舍孚番。便雅憫支派人，比拉的兒子。Shephupham

Terms.Localization: son of Bela; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 示孚汛（shì fú xùn），《思》舍孚番。便雅憫支派人，比拉的兒子。Shephuphan

Terms.Localization: son of Bela; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 沙法（shā fǎ），《思》沙法特。西緬支派的探子，何利的兒子。Shaphat

Terms.Localization: son of Hori; spy; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 沙法（shā fǎ），《思》沙法特。先知以利沙的父親，亞伯米何拉人。Shaphat

Terms.Localization: father of prophet Elisha

Localization.Gloss: 沙法（shā fǎ），《思》沙法特。猶大支派所羅巴伯的後裔，示瑪雅的兒子。Shaphat

Terms.Localization: descendant of Zerubbabel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 沙法（shā fǎ），《思》沙法特。迦得支派人。Shaphat

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 沙法（shā fǎ），《思》沙法特。大衛王的官長亞第賚的兒子。Shaphat

Terms.Localization: son of Adlai; official; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 示法提雅（shì fǎ tí yǎ），《思》舍法提雅。大衛的兒子。Shephatiah

Terms.Localization: son of David

Localization.Gloss: 示法提雅（shì fǎ tí yǎ），《思》舍法提雅。便雅憫支派人，米書蘭的父親。Shephatiah

Terms.Localization: father of Meshullam; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 示法提雅（shì fǎ tí yǎ），《思》舍法提雅。被擄後跟隨所羅巴伯一同從巴比倫回歸以色列的家族族長之一。Shephatiah

Terms.Localization: family head; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 示法提雅（shì fǎ tí yǎ），《思》舍法提雅。跟隨所羅巴伯回到猶大的所羅門僕人家族的族長之一。Shephatiah

Terms.Localization: family head; Solomon's servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 示法提雅（shì fǎ tí yǎ），《思》舍法提雅。猶大支派法勒斯的子孫。Shephatiah

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 示法提雅（shì fǎ tí yǎ），《思》舍法提雅。西底家王時期的首領之一，瑪坦的兒子。Shephatiah

Terms.Localization: son of Mattan; official; time of king Zedekiah

Localization.Gloss: 示法提雅（shì fǎ tí yǎ），《思》舍法提雅。便雅憫支派的哈律弗人，大衞的勇士之一。Shephatiah

Terms.Localization: warrior; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 示法提雅（shì fǎ tí yǎ），《思》舍法提雅。大衛時期西緬支派的首領之一，瑪迦的兒子。Shephatiah

Terms.Localization: son of Maacah; chief; tribe of Simeon; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 示法提雅（shì fǎ tí yǎ），《思》舍法提雅。猶大王約沙法的兒子。Shephatiah

Terms.Localization: son of Jehoshaphat, king of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 拾弗但（shí fú dàn），《思》色弗堂。以法蓮支派的首領基母利的父親。Shiphtan

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 《現》示玻（shì bō），《和》示非（shì fēi），《思》舍非。何利人首領朔巴的第四個兒子，西珥的後裔，以東一個族的族長。Shephi

Terms.Localization: son of Shobal, son of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 書品（shū pǐn），《思》叔平。便雅憫支派人，以珥的兒子。Shuppim

Terms.Localization: son of Ir; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 書聘（shū pìn）。大衛時期負責看守聖殿西邊沙利基門的利未人。Shuppim

Terms.Localization: gatekeeper; tribe of Levi; time of David

Localization.Gloss: 《現》毒蛇，《和》虺。蝰蛇科的一種蛇。viper

Terms.Localization: type of snake in the viper family

Localization.Gloss: 沙斐（shā fěi），《思》沙非爾。以法蓮支派的城鎮之一。Shaphir

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 沙番（shā fān），《思》沙凡。迦得支派的一個人。Shapham

Terms.Localization: man; tribe of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 示番（shì fān），《思》舍番。以色列地東部邊界上的一個地點。Shepham

Terms.Localization: location along eastern boundary of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 實弗米人（shí fú mǐ rén），《思》史斐米人。示番的居民。Shiphmite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Shepham

Localization.Gloss: 《現》獾，《和》沙番。一種動物，耳朵小而圓，尾巴不明顯，腿短；以樹葉和草為生；兩顆門牙發育成小長牙；能夠在幾乎垂直的岩石上面奔跑，也能輕鬆爬上樹；不潔淨的動物；與身材矮小和智慧有關。hyrax or rock badger

Terms.Localization: animal with small round ears, no visible tail, and short legs; lives on leaves and herbs; two of the front teeth develop into small tusks; can run up almost vertical rock faces and climb trees with ease; Syrian Rock Hyrax - Procavia capensis syriaca; unclean animal; associated with small size and wisdom

Localization.Gloss: 沙番（shā fān），《思》沙番。亞薩利的兒子，猶大王約西亞的王室書記。Shaphan

Terms.Localization: son of Azaliah; secretary; time of king Josiah

Localization.Gloss: 示非（shì fēi），《思》史非。西緬支派的族長之一，亞龍的兒子，細撒的父親。Shiphi

Terms.Localization: son of Allon; tribe of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 沙斐山（shā fěi (shān)），《思》舍斐爾山。在出埃及之路上的一座山，以色列人在曠野安營之地，位置不詳。Shepher

Terms.Localization: mountain along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 施弗拉（shī fú lā），《思》史斐辣。出埃地兩個希伯來的接生婆之一。Shiphrah

Terms.Localization: midwife

Localization.Gloss: 羊圈。用石牆或籬笆圍封的區域，是羊群晚上休息的地方，以保護牠們免遭盜賊或野獸的傷害。sheep pen; sheepfold

Terms.Localization: area enclosed by a stone wall or hedge, to protect sheep at night from thieves or wild animals; מִשְׁפְּתַיִם

Localization.Gloss: 杏樹。一種樹，屬於桃科；生長在野外，可高達 4.5 至 6 米，葉子呈橢圓形；冬天落葉，開白色或粉紅色的花朵，而且花期很早；葉子更晚才長出來；肉質果實裡面包著堅硬的果核；果核中的百分之五十含油，可以生吃或烤著吃。almond (tree)

Terms.Localization: tree belonging to the peach family; grows wild, reaching a height of 4.5 to 6 m; Prunis dulcis; sheds its oblong leaves in winter; produces white or pink flowers and blooms as early as January; the leaves appear much later; the seed is fifty percent oil, and can be eaten raw or roasted

Localization.Gloss: 可憎的事物，偶像。可憎的，通常指的是偶像。detested thing, idol

Terms.Localization: abomination, something detestable; usually referring to idol

Localization.Gloss: 桑樹。樹高可達 10 米，從很低的樹幹處開始分枝，樹枝很大，往外延伸；果實可吃，但不如常見的無花果那般多汁；果實一簇簇長在樹枝和樹幹上，而不是在樹葉中；有富裕豐饒的意象。sycomore tree

Terms.Localization: tree up to 10 m high with large low, spreading branches; Ficus sycomorus; fruit is edible but not as juicy or sweet as the more common variety of fig; fruit grows in bunches on the trunk and branches of the tree rather than among the leaves; image of something plentiful

Localization.Gloss: 示利比（shì lì bǐ），《思》舍勒彼雅／舍肋彼雅。被擄之後的幾個利未人：(1)抹利的後裔，被擄後和家人跟隨以斯拉歸回以色列（拉8.18, 24-25）；(2)協助講解律法，帶領百姓認罪，並且在以斯拉的約上簽名（尼8.7，9.4-5，10.12）；(3)屬利未家族，被擄後與所羅巴伯一同歸回以色列（尼12.8）；這是在約雅金時期的利未人首領的名字（尼12.24）。Sherebiah

Terms.Localization: Levite; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 沙魯險（shā lǔ xiǎn），《思》沙魯恒。西緬支派自猶大支派地業中所得的城鎮，位於別是巴以西。Sharuhen

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 沙崙（shā lún）／拉沙崙（lā shā lún），《思》沙龍／原野／拉沙龍。地中海沿岸的一個平原。Sharon

Terms.Localization: plain along the coast of the Mediterranean

Localization.Gloss: 沙崙（shā lún），《思》息黎雍。迦得的後裔所住之地。Sharon

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Gad

Localization.Gloss: 沙崙人（shā lún rén），《思》沙龍人。沙崙的居民。Sharonite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Sharon

Localization.Gloss: 施提賚（shī tí lài），《思》史特賴。沙崙人，大衞時期掌管牧放牛羣的官長。Shitrai

Terms.Localization: Sharonite; official; time of king David

Localization.Gloss: 沙賴（shā lài），《思》沙賴。被擄歸回後聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人之一。Sharai

Terms.Localization: man; married a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 成群移動的生物。字面意思：成群移動的東西；指成群靠近地面的哺乳動物或爬行動物。swarming creatures

Terms.Localization: literally: swarming things; refers to mammals and reptiles that move close to the ground in groups or swarms

Localization.Gloss: 沙拉（shā lā），《思》沙辣爾。哈拉人，大衞的勇士亞希暗的父親；1- שָׂכָר。Sharar

Terms.Localization: father of Ahiam, warrior, time of king David; 1- שָׂכָר

Localization.Gloss: 示利施（shì lì shī），《思》舍勒士。瑪吉的兒子，瑪拿西支派一個家族的族長。Sheresh

Terms.Localization: son of Machir; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 《現》麻紗，《和》細麻布。用亞麻植物的莖部纖維製成的高品質編織材料；比許多其他布料更吸汗，用來生產布料和做衣服，由富人和祭司所穿；也用於建造帳幕；與優質、韌性和涼快有關。fine linen

Terms.Localization: high quality woven material made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; used for production of cloth and clothes; worn by the rich and by priests; used for the construction of the tabernacle; associated with quality, strength, and coolness

Localization.Gloss: 設巴薩。被擄歸回後的猶大省長，居魯士任命他送聖殿的器皿回耶路撒冷。Sheshbazzar

Terms.Localization: governor of Israel; tribe of Judah; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 設巴薩。被擄歸回後的猶大省長，居魯士任命他送聖殿的器皿回耶路撒冷。Sheshbazzar

Terms.Localization: governor of Israel; tribe of Judah; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 沙賽（shā sài），《思》沙瑟。被擄歸回後聽從以斯拉吩咐休了外邦妻子的以色列人之一。Shashai

Terms.Localization: man; married a foreign wife; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 示篩（shì shāi），《思》舍瑟。亞衲族人的後裔，是巨人。Sheshai

Terms.Localization: giant; descendant of Anak

Localization.Gloss: 《現》巴比倫（bā bĭ lún），《和》示沙克（shì shā kè），《思》舍沙客。美索不達米亞的城鎮，巴比倫的象征名字。Sheshach

Terms.Localization: town in Mesopotamia; app. symbolic name for Babylon

Localization.Gloss: 示珊（shì shān），《思》舍商。猶大支派人，耶拉蔑的後裔。Sheshan

Terms.Localization: descendant of Jerahmeel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 沙煞（shā shā），《思》沙沙克。便雅憫支派的族長之一，比利亞的兒子。Shashak

Terms.Localization: son of Beria; family head; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 塞特（sāi tè），《思》舍特。亞當的兒子。Seth

Terms.Localization: son of Adam

Localization.Gloss: 《現》西珥人(xī ěr (rén))，《和》塞特人，《思》舍特子民。巴蘭的預言中所提到的人或民族。Seth

Terms.Localization: man or nation, mentioned in one of the oracles of Balaam

Localization.Gloss: 編織或針織材料。確實意義不詳；某種布料，可能是編織或針織而成的。woven or knitted material

Terms.Localization: exact meaning uncertain: type of cloth, either woven or knitted

Localization.Gloss: 示達（shì dá），《思》舍塔爾。亞哈隨魯王時代，波斯和瑪代的七個大臣之一。Shethar

Terms.Localization: adviser to Ahasuerus

Localization.Gloss: 示他‧波斯乃（shì tā-bō sī nǎi），《思》舍達波則乃。被擄歸回時期的一個官員。Shethar-Bozenai

Terms.Localization: official; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 羚羊。中等大小的羚羊，約驢子大小；細長的角通常超過一米；淺褐色，面部有深褐色斑紋；擅於奔跑；以力量和勇敢而聞名；屬潔淨的動物，因而可以吃。oryx

Terms.Localization: medium-sized antelope, about the size of a donkey; slender horns over a meter long; light color with dark markings on face; strong runner; Oryx leucoryx; known for strength and bravery; clean animal, may be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 無花果樹，無花果。一種樹，可高達 5 - 8 米，樹冠呈圓形，樹根很深；約雞蛋大小的果實，根據種類不同，有綠色、黃色、紫色或棕色，果實香甜軟糯；在以色列中，是和平幸福的象征：“人人都要在自己的葡萄園中，在無花果樹下”。fig tree, fig

Terms.Localization: grows 5-8 m high; round crown and very deep roots; Ficus carica; fruit is about the size of a hen’s egg and can be green, yellow, purple, or brown depending on the type, and is sweet and soft; image of peace and happiness in Israel was “every man under his vine and under his fig tree

Localization.Gloss: 他納‧示羅（tā nà-shì luó），《思》塔納特史羅。以法蓮支派屬地的城鎮之一，位於示羅的西北方。Taanath-Shiloh

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 他利亞（tā lì yà），《思》塔勒亞。便雅憫支派掃羅的後裔，米迦的兒子。Tarea

Terms.Localization: son of Micah; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 松樹／黃楊樹。身份不確定，可能是一種常綠喬木，9-15 米高，枝子分散，葉子呈小鱗片狀，果實是一個肉質的圓錐；產出耐用的木材，適用於建築用途。box-tree, cypress

Terms.Localization: exact identification unknown; possibly: evergreen tree, 9 to 15 m high, with spreading branches, small scale-like leaves and round cones; produces durable wood, suitable for building purposes

Localization.Gloss: 理解。理解的行為和能力。understanding

Terms.Localization: the act or faculty of understanding

Localization.Gloss: 他泊。西布倫支派地業內的一座城鎮。Tabor

Terms.Localization: town; for Levites; territory of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 他泊山（tā bó shān），《思》大博爾（山）。拿弗他利支派地業內的一座山。Tabor

Terms.Localization: mountain; territory of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: 提比尼（tí bǐ ní），《思》提貝尼。基納的兒子，北國以色列的君王（公元前885/884-880年在位）。Tibni

Terms.Localization: son of Ginath; king of Israel (885/84-880)

Localization.Gloss: 他備拉（tā bèi lā），《思》塔貝辣。在出埃及的路線上，因以色列人在曠野中發怨言引致上帝降火焚燒而命名的地方。Taberah

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 提備斯（tí bèi sī），《思》特貝茲。示劍附近的一座城鎮。Thebez

Terms.Localization: town; near Shechem

Localization.Gloss: 《現》提革拉‧比列色（tí gé lā-bǐ liè sè），《和》提革拉‧毗列色（tí gé lā-pí liè sè），《思》提革拉特丕肋色爾。亞述君王提革拉毗列色三世（公元前744-727年在位）。Tiglath-Pileser

Terms.Localization: Tiglath-Pileser III; king of Assyria (744-727)

Localization.Gloss: 陀迦瑪（tuó jiā mǎ），《思》托加爾瑪。雅弗之孫，歌篾的兒子。Togarmah

Terms.Localization: son of Gomer; descendant of Japheth

Localization.Gloss: 松樹／黃楊樹。常綠灌木，可高達3.5米高；葉子呈深綠色、有光澤，花朵呈白色，紫色的漿果有毒；一種原產於地中海地區的樹木。laurustinus; or, pine tree

Terms.Localization: sturdy evergreen shrub that reaches 3.5 m in height, with dark green, shiny leaves, white flowers, and poisonous purple berries; Viburnum tinus - laurustinus; or, Pinus brutia - Brutian pine, a pine tree native to the Mediterranean region

Localization.Gloss: 達莫（dá mò），《思》塔德摩爾／塔瑪爾。位於大馬士革和幼發拉底之間的一座城鎮。Tadmor

Terms.Localization: town; between Damascus and Euphrates

Localization.Gloss: 提達（tí dá），《思》提達耳。戈印王。Tidal

Terms.Localization: king of Goiim

Localization.Gloss: 土巴（tǔ bā），《思》突巴耳。雅弗的兒子之一。Tubal

Terms.Localization: son of Japheth

Localization.Gloss: 土八‧該隱（tǔ bā-gāi yǐn），《思》突巴耳加音。該隱的後裔，拉麥和洗拉的兒子。Tubal-Cain

Terms.Localization: son of Lamech; descendant of Cain

Localization.Gloss: 稱謝，讚美；合唱團；感恩祭。公開感謝上帝所作的一切；一個讚美的合唱團；在殿中表示感謝而獻上的祭物。praise; choir; thank-offering

Terms.Localization: a public profession of thanks for what God has done; a praise choir; a temple offering to give thanks

Localization.Gloss: 陀亞（tuó yà），《思》托亞。利未支派人，哥轄的後裔，蘇弗的兒子，撒母耳和希幔之先祖。Toah

Terms.Localization: son of Zuph; ancestor of Heman; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 陀臘（tuó là），《思》托拉得。西緬支派的城鎮之一，位置不詳。Tolad

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 陀拉（tuó lā），《思》托拉。以薩迦的兒子。Tola

Terms.Localization: son of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 陀拉（tuó lā），《思》托拉。以薩迦支派人，朵多的孫子，普瓦的兒子，以色列的士師（公元前1126年-1103年）。Tola

Terms.Localization: judge of Israel (1126-1103)

Localization.Gloss: 蛆蟲。各類蠕蟲的統稱；象征不潔淨、腐朽和無意義。worm, maggot

Terms.Localization: general term for worms of all kinds; symbol of uncleanness, decay, and insignificance

Localization.Gloss: 陀拉支族（tuó lā zhī zú），《思》托拉家族。以薩迦的兒子陀拉的後裔。Tolaite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Tola, son of Issachar

Localization.Gloss: 可憎的或可厭惡的事物。可憎的或可厭惡的事物。horror, abomination

Terms.Localization: horror, abomination

Localization.Gloss: 牛。牛的統稱；可以是公牛或母牛。bull, cow

Terms.Localization: general word for individual cattle; may be male or female

Localization.Gloss: 斑鳩。一種比烏鶇略大、灰藍色的鳥，胸部呈粉色；屬候鳥，每年四月來到以色列；主要吃種子；象征和平和溫柔；屬潔淨的動物，可以吃；用作祭品。turtle dove

Terms.Localization: bird slightly larger than blackbird; blue-gray with a pinkish chest; migratory, arrives in Israel in April; eats seeds; Streptopelia turtur - turtle dove; symbol of peace and gentleness; clean, may be eaten; used for sacrifices

Localization.Gloss: 寄居者。寄居者。sojourner

Terms.Localization: sojourner

Localization.Gloss: 謀劃，智慧，知識。謀劃，智慧，知識。sound wisdom

Terms.Localization: sound wisdom

Localization.Gloss: 淫亂。淫亂。fornication

Terms.Localization: fornication

Localization.Gloss: 指引，開導，策略，智謀。指引，開導，策略，智謀。guidance

Terms.Localization: guidance

Localization.Gloss: 託戶（tuō hù），《思》托胡。利未支派人，蘇弗的兒子，撒母耳的先祖。Tohu

Terms.Localization: son of Zuph; ancestor of Samuel; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 他革捫人（tā gé mén rén），《思》哈革摩尼人。他革捫的居民。Tahkemonite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Tachemon

Localization.Gloss: 短耳貓頭鷹；夜鷹；貓頭鷹。身份不確定；可能指貓頭鷹的一種——短耳貓頭鷹，一種中等大小的棕色貓頭鷹；不潔淨，因此不可吃。short-eared owl

Terms.Localization: identification uncertain; perhaps: type of owl, possibly Asio flammeus - short-eared owl, a medium-sized brown owl; unclean, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 他罕（tā hǎn），《思》塔罕。以法蓮支派人，約書亞的先祖，他拉的兒子，拉但的父親。Tahan

Terms.Localization: son of Telah; ancestor of Joshua; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 懇求，祈求。以一種非常謙卑的方式接近某人，以贏得對方的好感。supplication

Terms.Localization: effort to try to win a favorable attitude from someone else by approaching that person in a very humble way

Localization.Gloss: 提欣拿。伊施屯的兒子；珥拿轄（拿辖）的始祖；猶大支派人。Tehinnah

Terms.Localization: son of Eshton; founder of Ir-Nahash; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 懇求，祈求。以一種非常謙卑的方式接近某人，以贏得對方的好感。supplication

Terms.Localization: effort to try to win a favorable attitude from someone else by approaching that person in a very humble way

Localization.Gloss: 他罕宗族（tā hǎn zōng zú），《思》塔罕家族。以法蓮的兒子他罕的後裔。Tahanite

Terms.Localization: descendant of Tahan; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 答比匿（dá bǐ nì），《思》塔黑培乃斯。埃及地的一個城鎮。Tahpanhes, Tehaphnehes

Terms.Localization: town; Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 《現》答比妮（dá bǐ nī），《和》答比匿（dá bǐ nì），《思》塔培乃斯。所羅門時期的埃及王后。Tahpenes

Terms.Localization: queen of Egypt; time of king Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 他利亞（tā lì yà），《思》塔勒亞。便雅憫人掃羅的後裔，米迦的兒子。Tahrea

Terms.Localization: son of Micah; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 海狗。大型水生哺乳動物，長約 3 米，有腳蹼和柔軟的絨毛；游得很慢，以水下的雜草為食；十二至十五只一起成群生活；它們的皮可製作成很好的皮料。dugong

Terms.Localization: large water mammal about 3 m long; has flippers; soft fur; Dugong dugong; swims slowly and feeds on underwater weeds; lives in small herds of twelve to fifteen animals; skins make high-quality leather

Localization.Gloss: 他轄（tā xiá），《思》塔哈士。拿鶴的兒子。Tahash

Terms.Localization: son of Nahor

Localization.Gloss: 他哈（tā hā），《思》塔哈特。在出埃及的路線上，以色列人在曠野中的營地之一，位置不詳。Tahath

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 他哈（tā hā），《思》塔哈特。利未支派的哥轄人，亞惜的兒子，烏列的父親，希幔的先祖。Tahath

Terms.Localization: son of Assir; descendant of Kohath; ancestor of Heman; tribe of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 他哈（tā hā），《思》塔哈特。以法蓮支派人，比列的兒子。Tahath

Terms.Localization: son of Bered; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 他哈（tā hā），《思》塔哈特。以法蓮支派人，以拉大的兒子。Tahath

Terms.Localization: son of Eleadah; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 提倫（tí lún），《思》提隆。示門的兒子，猶大支派的族長之一。Tilon

Terms.Localization: son of Shimon; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 提瑪（tí mǎ），《思》特瑪。以實瑪利的兒子；民族和土地。Tema

Terms.Localization: son of Ishmael; people, land

Localization.Gloss: 《現》提幔（tí màn）／以東（yĭ dōng），《和》提幔，《思》特曼。以掃的孫子，以利法的兒子；民族及土地。Teman

Terms.Localization: son of Eliphaz, son of Esau; people, land

Localization.Gloss: 提幔（tí màn），《思》特曼。以利法的兒子，以掃和亞大的後裔，以東的族長之一。Teman

Terms.Localization: chief of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 《現》提幔人（tí màn rén）／提幔地區的，《和》提幔人（tí màn rén）／提幔地的人，《思》特曼人／特曼地人。提幔的居民，或提幔的後裔。Temanite

Terms.Localization: descendant or inhabitant of Teman

Localization.Gloss: 提米尼（tí mǐ ní），《思》特曼人。猶大支派人，亞施戶和拿拉所生的兒子。Temeni

Terms.Localization: son of Ashhur; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 提洗人（tí xǐ rén），《思》提漆人。提洗的居民。Tizite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Tiz

Localization.Gloss: 提利（tí lì），《思》提黎雅。猶大支派人，耶哈利勒的兒子。Tiria

Terms.Localization: son of Jehallelel; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 提拉（tí lā），《思》提辣斯。雅弗之子。Tiras

Terms.Localization: son of Japheth

Localization.Gloss: 公山羊。公山羊。male goat

Terms.Localization: male goat

Localization.Gloss: 猿猴。體型相對較小的長尾猴，灰色皮毛略帶淺綠色或藍色；以水果和嫩葉等素食為主，偶爾吃昆蟲和蜘蛛；它們大部分時間生活在樹上，但也會在地上尋找草籽和掉落的水果；被當成寵物飼養；從塔西斯引入以色列。monkey

Terms.Localization: relatively small, long-tailed monkey; gray fur with a greenish or bluish tinge; mainly vegetarian, eating fruit and young leaves with occasional insects and spiders; spends most of its time in trees, but also forages for grass seeds and fallen fruit on the ground; Guenon; kept as pet; brought to Israel from Tarsis

Localization.Gloss: 陀健（tuó jiàn），《思》托庚。西緬支派的城鎮之一。Tochen

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Simeon

Localization.Gloss: 《現》提勒亞筆（tí lè yà bǐ），《和》提勒‧亞畢（tí lè-yà bì），《思》特耳阿彼布。巴比倫古城以東，迦巴魯河邊的一個地方。Tel-Abib

Terms.Localization: location; near river Chebar; Babylonia

Localization.Gloss: 特‧哈薩（tè-hā sà），《思》特耳哈爾沙。猶太人被擄至巴比倫後所居住的城鎮之一。Tel-Harsha

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 特‧米拉（tè-mǐ lā），《思》特耳默拉。猶太人被擄至巴比倫後所居住的城鎮之一。Tel-Melah

Terms.Localization: location

Localization.Gloss: 《現》提拉撒（tí lā sā），《和》提‧拉撒（tí-lā sā），《思》特拉撒爾。亞述帝國曾毀滅之地，位於哈蘭以西的獨立王國。Telassar

Terms.Localization: land; conquered by king of Assyria

Localization.Gloss: 《現》提革拉‧比列色（tí gé lā-bǐ liè sè），《和》提革拉‧毗列色（tí gé lā-pí liè sè），《思》提革拉特丕肋色爾。亞述君王提革拉毗列色三世（公元前744-727年在位）。Tilgath-Pilneser

Terms.Localization: Tiglath-Pileser III; king of Assyria (744-727)

Localization.Gloss: 他拉（tā lā），《思》特拉黑。以法蓮支派人，利悉的兒子，約書亞的先祖。Telah

Terms.Localization: son of Resheph; ancestor of Joshua; tribe of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 撻買（tà mǎi），《思》塔耳買。亞衲的後裔；巨人。Talmai

Terms.Localization: giant; descendant of Anak

Localization.Gloss: 達買（dá mǎi），《思》塔耳買。基述王，大衞的妻子瑪迦的父親。Talmai

Terms.Localization: king of Geshur

Localization.Gloss: 《現》提拉撒（tí lā sā），《和》提‧拉撒（tí-lā sā），《思》特拉撒爾。亞述帝國曾毀滅之地，位於哈蘭以西的獨立王國。Telassar

Terms.Localization: land; conquered by king of Assyria

Localization.Gloss: 搭模斯（dā mó sī），《思》塔慕次。美索不達米亞的神明。Tammuz

Terms.Localization: Mesopotamian deity

Localization.Gloss: 答瑪（dá mǎ），《思》特瑪赫／塔瑪赫。從被擄之地歸回的尼提寧（殿役）的家族族長之一。Temah

Terms.Localization: head of a family of temple servants; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 完全；無可指責；無缺點；和平的；正直的。完全；無可指責；無缺點；和平的；正直的。complete, blameless, right, peaceful; integrity

Terms.Localization: complete, blameless, right, peaceful; integrity

Localization.Gloss: 完全，顯為無可指責；使完全。完全，顯為無可指責；使完全。be complete, finished; show oneself blameless; complete, make perfect

Terms.Localization: be complete, consumed (qal); show oneself to be perfect (hith.); to terminate, complete (hiph.)

Localization.Gloss: 亭拿（tíng ná）／亭納（tíng nà），《思》提默納黑。猶大南部山地的城市，位於希伯崙以北。Timnah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》亭拿（tíng ná）／亭納（tíng nà），《和》亭拿他（tíng ná tā）／亭納（tíng nà）／亭拿（tíng ná），《思》提默納。但支派屬地南方邊境的城鎮。Timnah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Dan

Localization.Gloss: 亭拿人（tíng ná rén），《思》提默納人。住在猶大南部山地的城市亭拿的居民。Timnah

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Timnah

Localization.Gloss: 亭納（tíng nà），《思》提默納。何利人羅坍的妹子，以掃的兒子以利法的妾，亞瑪力的母親。Timna

Terms.Localization: concubine of Eliphaz, son of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 亭納（tíng nà），《思》提默納。西珥的女兒，羅坍的妹子，以掃的兒子以利法的妾，亞瑪力的母親。Timna

Terms.Localization: sister of Lotan, son of Seir

Localization.Gloss: 亭納（tíng nà），《思》提默納。以掃的子孫，以利法的兒子。Timna

Terms.Localization: son of Eliphaz, son of Esau

Localization.Gloss: 亭納（tíng nà），《思》提默納。以東的族長。Timna

Terms.Localization: chief of Edom

Localization.Gloss: 《現》亭拿‧西拉（tíng ná-xī lā），《和》亭拿‧希烈（tíng ná xī liè），《思》提默納赫勒斯。以法蓮支派的城鎮之一，位於伯特利的西北方。Timnath-Herec

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 亭拿‧西拉（tíng ná-xī lā），《思》提默納特色辣黑。以法蓮支派的城鎮之一，位於伯特利的西北方。Timnath-Serah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Ephraim

Localization.Gloss: 棗椰樹。棕櫚科開花植物，高達 10-20 米，頂部有一簇大葉子；種植目的是為了獲得它可食用的甜水果，果子約拇指大小，成串生長；象徵優雅；棕櫚枝象征和平和勝利。date palm

Terms.Localization: flowering plant species in the palm family Arecaceae; grows to 10-20 m tall; cluster of large leaves at top; Phoenix dactylifera - date palm; cultivated for its edible sweet fruit, about the size of a human thumb; symbol of elegance and grace; palm branch is symbol of peace and also victory

Localization.Gloss: 《現》塔瑪（tǎ mǎ），《和》她瑪（tā mǎ），《舊》他瑪，《思》塔瑪爾。猶大的兒子珥的妻子，法勒斯和謝拉的母親。Tamar

Terms.Localization: wife of Er, son of Judah; mother of Perez and Zerah

Localization.Gloss: 《現》塔瑪（tǎ mǎ），《和》她瑪（tā mǎ），《舊》他瑪，《思》塔瑪爾。大衛的女兒，押沙龍的妹妹。Tamar

Terms.Localization: daughter of David

Localization.Gloss: 《現》塔瑪（tǎ mǎ），《和》她瑪（tā mǎ），《舊》他瑪，《思》塔瑪爾。押沙龍的女兒。Tamar

Terms.Localization: daughter of Absalom

Localization.Gloss: 他瑪（tā mǎ）／達莫（dá mò），《思》塔瑪爾。猶大支派的城鎮之一，位於別是巴東南。Tamar

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 椰棗。1- תָּמָר。date palm
＜陰＞狐狸；豺狼。一種看起來像長毛狗的動物，長著長鼻子；棕黃色，背部的毛髮尖端有為紅色，尾巴濃密；會發出哀鳴的聲音；主要在詩歌中出現，與死亡、毀滅和破壞有關，但也與哀悼和哭泣有關。jackal

Terms.Localization: animal that resembles a long-haired dog with a pointed nose; yellowish brown in color with red tips to the fur on the back and a bushy tail; produces mournful sounds; used mainly in poetry and associated with death, destruction, and devastation, but also with mourning and weeping

Localization.Gloss: 搖祭。搖祭。wave-offering

Terms.Localization: wave-offering

Localization.Gloss: 《現》單戶默（dān hù mò），《和》單戶蔑（dān hù miè），《思》堂胡默特。被擄時期猶大的軍長西萊雅的父親。Tanhumeth

Terms.Localization: father of Seraiah, army officer of Judah, time of exile

Localization.Gloss: 蛇。蛇的一種，或是蛇的通用詞彙。serpent, snake

Terms.Localization: a type of snake, or generic word for snake

Localization.Gloss: 《現》海獸／海怪，《和》大魚。神話中的海怪的統稱；巨獸和力威亞探是這種怪物的兩個名字；與創世之初的混亂有關，也與與以色列為敵的國家有關。sea monster

Terms.Localization: generic word for mythical sea monster; behemoth and livyathan are the names of two such monsters; associated with the chaos that existed in the primary stages of creation, and with the nations that were enemies of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 蒼鷺／白鷺／角鴟。貓頭鷹的一種，顏色較淺，翅膀和背部呈淺黃褐色或灰色，胸部和翅膀下面幾乎是白色；眼睛很小，相對於自身體型來說，頭很大，面部有一個非常醒目、白色的心形形狀，心形邊緣為棕色；經常棲息於穀倉、廢棄的房屋、洞穴和墳墓；發出各種奇怪的聲音，包括尖叫聲、嘶嘶聲、啾啾聲和呼嚕聲；主要以大鼠、老鼠和其他夜間活動的小動物為食；不潔淨，因而不可吃；與墳墓和死亡有關。barn owl

Terms.Localization: type of owl; pale color, light fawn or gray on wings and back, almost white on chest and under the wings; small eyes, large head for its size, and a striking heart-shaped white facial disk outlined in brown; Tyto alba - barn owl; often roosts in barns, deserted houses, caves, and tombs; utters a variety of strange sounds, from a screech to various hissing, chirruping, and snoring sounds; feeds on rats, mice, and other small nocturnal creatures; unclean, not to be eaten; associated with tombs and death

Localization.Gloss: 《現》蜥蜴，《和》蝘蜓／守宮。一種蜥蜴，大體呈綠色，但能根據環境改變顏色；堅硬的皮膚上有小鱗片和腫塊狀疙瘩，脊柱上有一排尖尖的鱗片；有些品種的頭部和面部有角狀的突起物；住在植被之中；以昆蟲為食；不潔淨，因而不可吃。chameleon

Terms.Localization: a type of lizard; green but can change color to match its environment; has small scales and small wart-like lumps on its tough skin; has a row of pointed scales down its spine; some species have horn-like protrusions on their heads and faces; Chamaeleo chamaeleon; lives in vegetation; feeds on insects; unclean, not to be eaten

Localization.Gloss: 《現》陀以（tuó yĭ），《和》陀烏（tuó wū），《思》托烏。大衞時期的哈馬王。Tou

Terms.Localization: king of Hamath

Localization.Gloss: 陀以（tuó yǐ），《思》托烏。大衞時期的哈馬王。Toi

Terms.Localization: king of Hamath

Localization.Gloss: 他納（tā nà），《思》塔納客。瑪拿西支派地業內的一座城鎮。Taanach

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 剃頭刀；刀。利刀，用來刮去皮膚上的毛髮；也用來把筆削尖。razor; knife

Terms.Localization: sharp knife, used to shave hair from the skin; also used to sharpen a pen

Localization.Gloss: 刀鞘；護套。與刀劍形狀大小相約的盒子或袋子，用皮革、布、金屬，甚或木製成；繫在一個圓形的皮條或皮帶上，皮條或皮帶又可以掛在肩上或繫在腰帶上；用來保護和攜帶刀劍。sheath, scabbard

Terms.Localization: case or bag about the size and shape of a sword; made of leather, cloth, metal, or wood; attached to a circular strap or belt that could be hung over the shoulder or tied around the waist; used to cover and to carry a sword

Localization.Gloss: 杏；蘋果。身份不確定；可能是野生蘋果樹或杏樹的果子；是一種圓形、香甜的肉質水果；被認為美麗，是一種特殊的款待。apricot, apple

Terms.Localization: identification uncertain; perhaps either the fruit of the wild apple tree (Malus sylvestris) or of the apricot tree; round, fleshy, sweet fruit; considered beautiful and a special treat

Localization.Gloss: 他普亞。猶大支派地業內的一個地點。Tappuah

Terms.Localization: location; territory of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 他普亞。猶大支派地業內的一個地點。Tappuah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 石灰水，粉飾。石灰與水的混合物，刷在墻壁上使其變成白色，並覆蓋墻壁粗糙的表面；它不強化結構，僅起美化作用，因此常與使事物看起來與實際不同的努力有關。whitewash

Terms.Localization: lime mixed with water; painted on walls to make them white and cover ugly rough surfaces; it does not strengthen a structure but only beautifies it; for that reason it is often associated with efforts to make something appear different from what it actually is

Localization.Gloss: 陀弗（tuó fú），《思》托費耳。以東某地，位置不詳。Tophel

Terms.Localization: location; Edom

Localization.Gloss: 提弗薩。位於所羅門王國東北邊界的一座城鎮。Tiphsah

Terms.Localization: town; at north-eastern boundary of kingdom of Solomon

Localization.Gloss: 提弗薩。瑪拿西支派地業內的一座城鎮。Tiphsah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 陀斐特。在欣嫩子山谷的一個地點。Topheth

Terms.Localization: location; in the valley of the sons of Hinnom

Localization.Gloss: 特瓦（tè wǎ），《思》提刻瓦。女先知戶勒大的丈夫沙龍的父親。Tokhath

Terms.Localization: father of Shallum, husband of Huldah, prophetess

Localization.Gloss: 盼望，指望。盼望，指望。hope

Terms.Localization: hope

Localization.Gloss: 特瓦（tè wǎ），《思》提刻瓦。女先知戶勒大的丈夫沙龍的父親。Tikvah

Terms.Localization: father of Shallum, husband of Huldah, prophetess

Localization.Gloss: 特瓦（tè wǎ），《思》提刻瓦。被擄歸回之後，雅哈謝的父親。Tikvah

Terms.Localization: father of Jahzeiah, after exile

Localization.Gloss: 提哥亞（tí gē yà），《思》特科亞。猶大支派的一個城鎮，位於伯利恆以南。Tekoa

Terms.Localization: town; Judah

Localization.Gloss: 提哥亞人（tí gē yà rén），《思》特科亞人。住在伯利恆以南的城鎮提哥亞的居民。Tekoa

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Tekoa

Localization.Gloss: 他拉拉（tā lā lā），《思》塔辣拉。便雅憫支派屬地城鎮之一，位於古耶路撒冷城以北。Taralah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 特哈加（tè hā jiā），《思》提爾哈卡。希西家時期古實王。Tirhakah

Terms.Localization: king of Ethiopia

Localization.Gloss: 禮物，祭物，供物。禮物，祭物，供物。offering, contribution

Terms.Localization: offering, contribution

Localization.Gloss: 禮物，祭物，供物。禮物，祭物，供物。offering, contribution

Terms.Localization: offering, contribution תְּרוּמָה

Localization.Gloss: 石松，松樹。松樹的一種；可高達 10 米，通常呈傘狀，因此得名“傘松”；唯一一種能結出可食用種子的松樹。stone pine

Terms.Localization: type of pine tree; grows to 10 m tall; often shaped like an umbrella, which gives it the nickname “umbrella pine”; only pine to produce edible seeds; Pinus pinea

Localization.Gloss: 他拉。位於西奈半島，在他哈和密迦之間；以色列人出埃及前往迦南地時曾在那裡扎營。Terah

Terms.Localization: location along route of exodus

Localization.Gloss: 他拉。拿鶴的兒子；閃的後裔；亞伯拉罕的父親。Terah

Terms.Localization: son of Nahor; descendant of Shem; father of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 特哈拿。迦勒和他的妾瑪迦所生的兒子；示別的兄弟；猶大支派人。Tirhanah

Terms.Localization: descendant of Caleb; tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 欺騙，背叛。欺騙某人的行為。deceit, betrayal

Terms.Localization: act of deception against someone

Localization.Gloss: 欺騙，背叛。欺騙某人的行為。deceit, betrayal

Terms.Localization: act of deception against someone

Localization.Gloss: 特拉人；特拉族人。雅比斯的文士宗族。Tirathite

Terms.Localization: clan of scribes of Jabez

Localization.Gloss: 家中的神像。代表神明的一組雕像，用於占卜和敬拜。household idols

Terms.Localization: set of one of more figurines representing a god; used for divination and worship

Localization.Gloss: 得撒。西羅非哈的女兒；瑪拿西支派人。Tirzah

Terms.Localization: daughter of Zelophehad; tribe of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 得撒（dé sā），《思》提爾匝。瑪拿西支派的城鎮之一。Tirzah

Terms.Localization: town; territory of Manasseh

Localization.Gloss: 提列（tí liè），《思》特勒士。波斯王亞哈隨魯宮中守門的太監之一。Teresh

Terms.Localization: eunuch; servant of Ahasuerus

Localization.Gloss: 綠寶石，水蒼玉，綠玉石。（半成品）寶石，可能是一種綠寶石；它的純淨形態沒有任何顏色。beryl

Terms.Localization: (semi-)precious stone, possibly kind of beryl, which is colorless in its pure form

Localization.Gloss: 他施。雅弗的後裔；雅完的兒子；西班牙？Tarshish

Terms.Localization: son of Javan; descendant of Japheth; Spain?

Localization.Gloss: 他施。比勒罕的兒子；便雅憫支派人。Tarshish

Terms.Localization: son of Bilhan; tribe of Benjamin

Localization.Gloss: 他施斯。波斯王亞哈隨魯的顧問。Tarshish

Terms.Localization: adviser to Ahasuerus

Localization.Gloss: 元帥。在亞述帝國中地位極高的人。commander in chief; Tartan

Terms.Localization: person with an extremely high position in the Assyrian kingdom

Localization.Gloss: 他珥他。亞瓦人敬拜的神明。Tartak

Terms.Localization: deity of Avvites

Localization.Gloss: 提斯比人（tí sī bǐ rén），《思》提市貝人。基列雅比以西的提斯比的居民。Tishbite

Terms.Localization: inhabitant of Tishbe

Localization.Gloss: 拯救；解救；得救；得勝；勝利。人類或神明拯救需要幫助之人。salvation

Terms.Localization: salvation

Localization.Gloss: 達乃（dá nǎi），《思》塔特乃。波斯王大利烏時期河西的總督。Tattenai

Terms.Localization: governor; after exile

Localization.Gloss: 亞倫（yà lún），《思》亞郎。摩西的兄長，以色列人的第一位大祭司。Aaron

Terms.Localization: the elder brother of Moses and Israel's first high priest

Localization.Gloss: 亞巴頓（yà bā dùn），《思》阿巴冬。音譯自希伯來字，意思是「毀滅者」，指地獄或無底坑的天使／掌權者的名字。Abaddon; Destroyer

Terms.Localization: the Hebrew name for the ruling angel in Hell

Localization.Gloss: 阿爸；父親。（上帝的稱號；字面意思：父親）一個結合了超自然權威和對子民的關懷的稱號。abba; father

Terms.Localization: (title for God; literally: father) one who combines aspects of supernatural authority and care for his people

Localization.Gloss: 亞比亞他（Yà bǐ yà tā）；《思》厄貝雅塔爾。大衛時代的祭司。Abiathar

Terms.Localization: a priest to David

Localization.Gloss: 亞比雅（yà bǐ yǎ），《思》阿彼雅。耶穌家譜中的一員。Abijah

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 亞比雅（yà bǐ yǎ），《思》阿彼雅。二十四個祭司家族的其中一個創始人。Abijah

Terms.Localization: a founder of a class of priests

Localization.Gloss: 亞比利尼（yà bǐ lì ní），《思》阿彼肋乃。在大馬士革的西北邊，亞比拉城附近的地區，由呂撒聶統治。Abilene

Terms.Localization: a territory around the city of Abila, northwest of Damascus and ruled over by Lysanias

Localization.Gloss: 亞比玉（yà bǐ yù），《思》阿彼烏得。耶穌家譜中的一員。Abiud

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 亞伯拉罕（yà bó lā hǎn），又名亞伯蘭，《思》亞巴辣罕，又名亞巴郎。是以色列民族的祖先，信心之父。亞伯蘭的意思是「尊貴的父親」。亞伯拉罕的意思是「多國的父親」。Abraham

Terms.Localization: the patriarch of the Israelite nation and father of the faithful

Localization.Gloss: 行善，做善事。去做良善的事。do good; perform good deeds

Terms.Localization: to engage in doing what is good

Terms.Localization: to engage in doing what is good

Localization.Gloss: 做好事的人；使別人得益的人。慣常做好事的人。one who does good; one who benefits others

Terms.Localization: one who customarily does good

Localization.Gloss: 好的，善的；良善；善行。最一般意義上的良好道德品格。good; goodness; good act

Terms.Localization: positive moral qualities of the most general nature

Localization.Gloss: 好的，善的；良善；善行。最一般意義上的良好道德品格。good; goodness; good act

Terms.Localization: positive moral qualities of the most general nature

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞愛（主要是基督教所指的愛）；表明或證明一個人的愛；渴望，愛慕。對某人或某物的愛，基於真誠的欣賞和高度的尊重。to love

Terms.Localization: to have love for someone or something, based on sincere appreciation and high regard

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞所愛的；親愛的。關於被愛的人或物的。beloved; dear

Terms.Localization: pertaining to one who or that which is loved

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞愛（主要是基督教所指的愛）。對某人或某物的愛，基於真誠的欣賞和高度的尊重。love

Terms.Localization: a feeling of love for someone or something, based on sincere appreciation and high regard

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞愛筵；愛席。早期基督徒集體享用的一種特別聚餐，他們以此表達相互的關愛和關心。fellowship meal

Terms.Localization: a special type of communal meal having particular significance for early Christians as an expression of their mutual affection and concern

Localization.Gloss: 夏甲（xià jiǎ），《思》哈加爾。埃及人，撒拉的女僕，亞伯拉罕的妾，以實瑪利的母親。Hagar

Terms.Localization: the handmaid of Sarah and the concubine of Abraham and mother of Ishmael

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞容器，器皿。主要用來盛載液體或濕的物件；體積相對較小，容量不超過一公升。container; vessel

Terms.Localization: a container, primarily for liquids or wet objects; relatively small, containing not more than a liter

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞分別為聖歸上帝；聖潔；成聖。獻身以服事和效忠上帝。consecration; dedication

Terms.Localization: dedication to the service of and to loyalty to a deity

Localization.Gloss: 奉獻；分別為聖。獻身服事和效忠上帝。dedicate; consecrate

Terms.Localization: to dedicate to the service of and to loyalty to a deity

Localization.Gloss: 使聖潔；分別為聖。使某人擁有聖潔的品質。make holy; sanctify

Terms.Localization: to cause someone or something to have the quality of holiness

Localization.Gloss: 祝聖；視為聖潔。崇敬或尊崇為聖潔。hallow, regard as holy

Terms.Localization: to feel reverence for or to honor as holy

Localization.Gloss: 聖潔。聖潔的品質，表達與人性品質相對比的神性品質。holiness

Terms.Localization: the quality of holiness as an expression of the divine in contrast with the human

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞聖潔；聖善。聖潔的品質，表達與人性品質相對比的神性品質。holiness

Terms.Localization: the quality of holiness as an expression of the divine in contrast with the human

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞純潔的；沒有缺陷的。指沒有道德上的缺陷或污點，因此是純潔的。pure; without defect

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being without moral defect or blemish and hence pure

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞道德上沒有缺點；純潔。道德純潔的品質。being without moral defect; purity

Terms.Localization: the quality of moral purity

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞法庭；法院；（在街市中心公開舉行的）審判庭。一個地方或社會機構；在這裡，人被帶到法官面前，以判定其在某件事情上有罪或無罪。court; court of justice

Terms.Localization: a place or social institution that involves a person being brought before a judge to determine that person's guilt or innocence in a matter

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞買贖，救贖；釋放，使自由。字面意思：以一定的價格來買；因而指：用一個對被釋放的人來說代價高昂的方法，使其得到釋放或自由。redeem; set free

Terms.Localization: literally: to buy for a price; hence: to cause the release or freedom of someone by a means which proves costly to the individual causing the release

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞野橄欖樹。有些人（也許是錯誤地）認為這是果園種植之橄欖樹的原種；樹形較細小，果實較細小，油量也較少。wild olive tree

Terms.Localization: a tree regarded by some (though probably wrongly) as the ancestor of the domestic olive tree; smaller, produces smaller fruit with less oil than domestic variety; Olea europaea sylvestris

Localization.Gloss: 亞基帕（yà jī pà），《思》阿格黎帕。希律亞基帕二世，是希律亞基帕一世的兒子，大希律的曾孫，公元 1 世紀希律家族的統治者。Agrippa

Terms.Localization: Herod Agrippa II, the son of Herod Agrippa I

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞生活態度，行事為人；行為表現；品行。一個人的行為方式，焦點顯然放在外顯的日常行為上。behavior; conduct

Terms.Localization: a person's way of behaving, with apparent focus upon overt daily behavior

Localization.Gloss: 亞當（yà dāng），《思》亞當。人類的始祖。希伯來文的意思是「人」或「人類」。Adam

Terms.Localization: ancestor of the human race

Localization.Gloss: 亞底（yà dǐ），《思》阿狄。耶穌家譜中的一員；哥桑的兒子，麥基的父親。Addi

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞（在基督裡）的姊妹。字面意思：與所提到的人有同父同母關係的女性；因而也指：在基督裡同作信徒的人。sister (in Christ)

Terms.Localization: literally: a female having the same father and mother as the reference person; hence also: fellow believer in Christ

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞（在基督裡）的弟兄。群體中的親密夥伴，群體的成員均有清楚界定的身份和資格（在《新約》中，指在基督裡同作信徒的人）。brother (in Christ)

Terms.Localization: a close associate of a group of persons having a well-defined membership (in the NT, fellow believers in Christ)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞兄弟；教中的弟兄。有強烈的合一意識的社群。brotherhood

Terms.Localization: an association of persons having a strong sense of unity

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞不公正地做事；做錯誤的事；虐待，虧待。做不公正或不公義的事；虧待某人，不公正地對待他。act unjustly; do what is wrong; mistreat

Terms.Localization: to do that which is unjust or unrighteous; to mistreat by acting unjustly toward someone

Terms.Localization: an activity which is unjust

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞不義的行為；過犯；罪惡。以不公義或不公正的方式所做的事。unrighteous act; crime

Terms.Localization: what is done in an unrighteous or unjust manner

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞不公正的；不公正地；不義的。形容不正確或不公正。unjust; unjustly; unrighteous

Terms.Localization: pertaining to not being right or just

Localization.Gloss: 《現》亞民（yà mín），《思》阿得明；耶穌家譜中的一員。由於所根據的原文版本不同，《和合本》沒有記載這個名字。Admin

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 亞大米田（yà dà mǐ tián）的；《思》阿得辣米特的。（Ἀδραμύττιον「亞大米田」的衍生詞；原詞沒有出現在《新約》中）與每西亞省的重要港口亞大米田有關的；位於今日土耳其的西岸北方。保羅曾乘這地方的船自耶路撒冷往羅馬去。of Adramyttium

Terms.Localization: (derivative of Ἀδραμύττιον Adramyttium, not occurring in the NT) pertaining to Adramyttium, a seaport in Mysia

Localization.Gloss: 亞得里亞海（yà dé lǐ yà hăi），《思》亞得里亞海。保羅被解往羅馬途中，船遇暴風後漂流所經之海域，是在馬耳他和克里特島之間的一段地中海。Adriatic Sea

Terms.Localization: Adriatic Sea, Map 4 B-2

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞老鷹，兀鷹。大型捕食鳥的統稱；也可能包括其他的鳥，尤其是禿鷲。eagle; vulture

Terms.Localization: generic word for a large bird of prey; genus Aquila, but may include others, esp. vulture

Localization.Gloss: 亞所（yà suǒ），《思》阿左爾。耶穌家譜中的一員，以利亞敬的兒子。Azor

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞令人憎惡的；壞的。指壞的和令人憎惡的，因為不被允許。disgusting; bad

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being bad and disgusting on the basis of not being allowed

Localization.Gloss: 《現》雅典人（yǎ diǎn rén）／雅典的居民，《和》雅典人，《思》雅典人。在雅典居住或是出生的人；或是屬於雅典的人。Athenian; person from Athens

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Athens; or: pertaining to Athens

Localization.Gloss: 雅典（yǎ diǎn），《思》雅典。希臘的主要城市；位於羅馬帝國亞該亞省，是現今希臘的首都。希臘帝國被羅馬帝國取代以後，雅典一直是藝術、文學和哲學的中心。Athens

Terms.Localization: a principal city of Greece

Localization.Gloss: 埃及人（āi jí rén），《思》埃及人。埃及本地的人；出生或居住於埃及的人。Egyptian; person from Egypt

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 《和2010》埃塞俄比亞人；《現》衣索匹亞人；《和》埃提阿伯人；《思》厄提約丕雅人。（Αἰθιωπία「埃塞俄比亞」的衍生詞；原詞沒有出現在《新約》中）埃塞俄比亞的本地人；在埃塞俄比亞出生或居住的人。Ethiopian

Terms.Localization: (derivative of Αἰθιωπία Ethiopia, not occurring in the NT) a person who is a native of Ethiopia

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞流血。使血流出來的過程。shedding of blood

Terms.Localization: the process of causing blood to flow out

Localization.Gloss: 流血；患血漏；患血崩。經受失血之苦。bleed

Terms.Localization: to experience or suffer a loss of blood

Localization.Gloss: 以尼雅（Yǐ ní yǎ）；《思》艾乃阿。彼得施行神跡治好的一個人。Aeneas

Terms.Localization: a person who was healed by Peter

Localization.Gloss: 哀嫩（āi nèn），《思》艾農。施洗約翰施洗的地方，可能是耶路撒冷以南的一處水泉，在約旦河附近。Aenon

Terms.Localization: a place where John the Baptist was baptizing

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞宇宙；時代，世代。宇宙，或許帶有「萬古」或「世代」的相關含義，因為宇宙是短暫性的。universe; age; era

Terms.Localization: the universe, perhaps with some associated meaning of eon or age in the sense of the transitory nature of the universe

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞永恆的（尤指品質上的）；無始無終的，永久的，永遠的。指一段無限地持續的時間。eternal

Terms.Localization: pertaining to an unlimited duration of time

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞山羊的。（αἴξ「山羊」的衍生詞，原詞沒有出現在《新約》）與山羊相關或由山羊構成的（山羊是較細小的四足有蹄馴養動物；山羊屬；給人類提供肉、奶、皮、毛和角）。of a goat

Terms.Localization: (derivative of αἴξ goat, not occurring in the NT) pertaining to or consisting of a goat (smaller domesticated four-footed animal with hooves; genus Capra; source of meat, milk, hides, hair, and horns)

Localization.Gloss: 埃及（āi jí），《思》埃及。古代文明帝國之一，位於非洲大陸的東北部，尼羅河流入地中海所途經的地區。Egypt

Terms.Localization: Egypt, Maps 3 B-4 and 4 F-5

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞永恆的；永遠的；永久的；永存的。指一段無限地持續的時間。eternal

Terms.Localization: pertaining to an unlimited duration of time

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞血；殺害，謀殺；死亡。（a）血；（b）引申義：一個人的死亡，通常由於暴力或死刑所致；（c）引申義：為獻祭的目的而死；（d）字面意思：肉和血，指與神相對而言的人。blood; murder; death

Terms.Localization: (a) blood; (b) figuratively: the death of a person, generally as the result of violence or execution; (c) figuratively: death for a sacrificial purpose; (d) literally: flesh and blood, i.e. a human being in contrast with a divine being

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞不純潔，不道德；污穢。不道德，尤其與淫亂的罪有關。impurity; uncleanness

Terms.Localization: the state of moral impurity, especially in relationship to sexual sin

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞無可指責的。指不能批評的事物。beyond reproach

Terms.Localization: pertaining to what cannot be criticized

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞不潔的，污穢的。在禮儀上不被接納的，或者是因為被玷污，或者是因為本身的性質（例如禮儀上不潔淨的牲畜）。unclean; impure

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being ritually unacceptable, either as the result of defilement or because of the nature of the object itself (for example, ritually unacceptable animals)

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞荊棘的。（ἄκανθα「有刺植物」的衍生詞）指用荊棘做成的物件，或帶刺的物件。thorny; of thorns

Terms.Localization: (derivative of ἄκανθα, thorn plant) pertaining to, being made of, or consisting of thorns

Localization.Gloss: 亞革大馬（yà ɡé dà mǎ），《思》哈刻達瑪。（亞蘭語，意思是「血田」）祭司們用猶大出賣耶穌得來的銀子買下的地，傳統認為就在耶路撒冷城外、欣嫩子谷的南側。Akeldama

Terms.Localization: (an Aramaic term meaning field of blood) a piece of land, probably south of the valley of Hinnom outside Jerusalem, which was bought with Judas' money

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞純潔的。形容沒有混合邪惡，因此是純潔的。pure

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being without a mixture of evil and hence to being pure

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞蝗蟲，蚱蜢。六腿有翅的昆蟲，其特徵是第三對腿特別長，適合跳躍；成群遷徙並開拓新的領域；其他時候是單獨或三五成群地生活；人們用燒烤油炸等方法烹煮，但在某些地方也會生吃；由於數目龐大和成群出動的特性，蝗蟲常用來象徵龐大的軍隊，難以防禦，同時也象徵上帝的懲罰。grasshopper; locust

Terms.Localization: six-legged winged insect characterized by the fact that its third pair of legs is elongated and adapted to hopping; Acrididae family; moves in swarms that migrate to new areas, which they colonize; at other times lives solitary or in small groups; eaten cooked by toasting, grilling, frying, or broiling, though in some places they are also eaten raw; because of their large numbers and swarming characteristics, locusts were a symbol of a vast attacking army against which there was no defense and also a symbol of divine punishment

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞大廳；會堂；禮堂。比較大的建築物，通常用來進行審訊，但可能也用作一般的用途。audience hall; auditorium

Terms.Localization: a relatively large building normally used for legal hearings, though possibly also employed for more general purposes

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞未受割禮的人；外邦人；外邦世界。對未受割禮之人的統稱。uncircumcised; Gentiles; the Gentile world

Terms.Localization: a collective for those who are uncircumcised

Localization.Gloss: ＜名＞建築物的房角石（奠基石）或壓頂石，對其結構至關重要（在《新約》中，這詞只用來比喻基督）cornerstone; important stone

Terms.Localization: the cornerstone or capstone of a building, essential to its construction (these terms occur in the NT only figuratively in reference to Christ)

Localization.Gloss: 亞居拉（yà jū lā），《思》阿桂拉。哥林多的猶太基督徒，保羅的好友及同工；他的妻子是百基拉。Aquila

Terms.Localization: a friend of Paul and the husband of Priscilla

Localization.Gloss: 玉瓶。用雪花石造成的瓶子。alabaster jar

Terms.Localization: a jar made of alabaster stone

Localization.Gloss: 抹油；用油塗抹；用香膏抹。用液體（通常是油或香液）倒在某人身上，通常是在頭上、臉上或腳上，作為禮儀的一部分，或以禮儀的方式進行。anoint

Terms.Localization: to pour a liquid, normally oil or perfume, on someone's body, often on the head, face, or feet, as part of a ritual or in a ritual manner

Localization.Gloss: 亞歷山大（yà lì shān dà）人，《思》亞歷山大里亞人。（Ἀλεξανδρία 「亞歷山大」的衍生詞，原詞没有出現在《新約》中）亞歷山大城的本地人或住在該城的人。Alexandrian

Terms.Localization: (derivative of Ἀλεξανδρία Alexandria, not occurring in the NT) a person who lives in or is a native of Alexandria

Localization.Gloss: 亞歷山大（yà lì shān dà）的，從亞歷山大來的，《思》亞歷山大里亞的。（Ἀλεξανδρία 「亞歷山大」的衍生詞，原詞没有出現在《新約》中）指與亞歷山大相關的。Alexandrian

Terms.Localization: (derivative of Ἀλεξανδρία Alexandria, not occurring in the NT) pertaining to Alexandria

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞公雞。雄性家禽，顏色是深棕紅，頸部有橙紅色的羽毛，頭頂上是紅色的小肉冠，嘴兩邊有紅色的垂肉；母雞是較淺的棕紅色，肉冠細小；在《聖經》中的重要性，似乎在於公雞會晨早啼叫，宣佈黎明即將到來。rooster; cock

Terms.Localization: male domestic fowl, dark brownish red, with orange-red neck hackles, a smallish red comb on the top of the head, and red lappets on each side under the beak; the hen is a lighter brownish red and has a smaller comb; significance in the Bible seems related to the fact that cocks crow very early in the morning, announcing the coming dawn

Localization.Gloss: 亞歷山大（yà lì shān dà），《思》亞歷山大。為耶穌背十字架的古利奈人西門的兒子。Alexander

Terms.Localization: the son of Simon of Cyrene

Localization.Gloss: 亞歷山大（yà lì shān dà），《思》亞歷山大。猶太人的大祭司，負責審訊彼得和約翰。Alexander

Terms.Localization: a member of the high-priestly family

Localization.Gloss: 亞歷山大（yà lì shān dà），《思》亞歷山大。以弗所城一名猶太人，在以弗所的暴亂中被推出來向群眾發言。Alexander

Terms.Localization: a Jew of Ephesus

Localization.Gloss: 亞歷山大（yà lì shān dà），《思》亞歷山大。以弗所教會的一名異端教師，與舒米乃（《和》許米乃）一同被保羅指斥。有學者認為他與提後 4.14 的亞歷山大為同一人，但卻不能肯定。Alexander

Terms.Localization: a false teacher in the church of Ephesus; some scholars have suggested that (4) and (5) refer to the same person, but this is by no means certain

Localization.Gloss: 亞歷山大（yà lì shān dà），《思》亞歷山大。反對和加害保羅的一個銅匠。有學者認為他與提前 1.20 的亞歷山大為同一人，但卻不能肯定。Alexander

Terms.Localization: a coppersmith and opponent of Paul; some scholars have suggested that (4) and (5) refer to the same person, but this is by no means certain

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞說實話；持守真理。傳達真實的消息。speak the truth; hold to the truth

Terms.Localization: to communicate what is true

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞真實的；誠實的，可信的。形容人誠實可信。true; truthful

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being truthful and honest

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞真的；真實的；真正；確實。是真實的，而不是想象出來的；與歷史事實相符的。true; real

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being real and not imaginary, or in accordance with historical fact

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞真的，實在地，確實地。是真實的，而不是想象出來的。truly; genuine

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being real and not imaginary

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞真理；真實；真相。那內容是真實的，因此與實際發生的事情一致。truth; truthfulness

Terms.Localization: the content of that which is true and thus in accordance with what actually happened

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞被玷污的物；不潔淨的東西；污穢。一些已經獻給偶像因而變得污穢、不潔淨的東西。a thing defiled

Terms.Localization: something that has been devoted to idols and so made unclean

Localization.Gloss: 異族人；外邦人；別國的人。一個不屬於所談論的民族的人（從猶太人的觀點看，即不是猶太人，而是外邦人）。foreigner, Gentile, heathen, pagan

Terms.Localization: a person not belonging to the ethnic group in question (from the specifically Jewish point of view, one who is not a Jew, but a Gentile)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞沉香，蘆薈。百合花屬植物的芳香樹脂，常用於屍體防腐。aloes

Terms.Localization: an aromatic resin of a lily-like plant, often used for embalming a corpse

Localization.Gloss: 亞勒腓（yà lè féi），《思》阿耳斐。耶穌的門徒雅各的父親。Alphaeus

Terms.Localization: the father of James

Localization.Gloss: 亞勒腓（yà lè féi），《思》阿耳斐。稅吏利未（即使徒馬太）的父親。Alphaeus

Terms.Localization: the father of Levi

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞狐狸；豺狼。一種看起來像長毛狗的動物，有尖鼻子和毛茸茸的尾巴；顏色是紅背白肚子（狐狸），或背毛黃褐色而毛尖帶紅色（豺）；食腐動物；令人聯想到毀滅與破壞，以及微不足道而妄自尊大；聰明機敏但也狡猾。fox, jackal

Terms.Localization: animal looking like a longhaired dog with a pointed nose and a bushy tail; either reddish with white underparts (fox) or yellowish brown with red tips to the fur on the back (jackal); scavenger; associated with destruction and devastation, and also with being insignificant but self-important; also intelligent and quick-witted, crafty

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞犯罪，做錯，得罪。行事為人違背上帝的旨意和律法。sin, do wrong

Terms.Localization: to act contrary to the will and law of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞罪；過犯。違背上帝的旨意和律法的行為。sin, wrongdoing

Terms.Localization: an act that is contrary to the will and law of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞有罪的；罪人。違背上帝的旨意和律法的罪惡行為；有這種行為的人。sinful; sinner

Terms.Localization: pertaining to behavior that is contrary to the will and law of God; a person who practices such behavior

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞罪；罪行。某人違背上帝的旨意和律法所做的事。sin, wrongdoing

Terms.Localization: that which someone has done in violating the will and law of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞不後悔的。不因自己所做的事情感到後悔的。not to be regretted, not regretful

Terms.Localization: pertaining to not feeling regret as the result of what one has done

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞無可指責地。指沒有過犯或可責之處。blamelessly

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being without fault or blame

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞真實地；實在；確實地；阿們，誠心所願（禱告後）。強烈地肯定所宣告或聲明的。truly, indeed; amen

Terms.Localization: strong affirmation of what is declared

Localization.Gloss: 亞米拿達（yà mǐ ná dá），《思》阿米納達布。大衛的先祖，亞蘭的兒子，他的女兒以利沙巴是亞倫的妻子，兒子拿順是猶大支派的族長。Amminadab

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞純潔的，沒有玷污的；沒有污穢的。沒有在禮儀上被玷污的，暗示伴隨著道德污穢。undefiled

Terms.Localization: pertaining to not being ritually defiled, with implications of accompanying moral defilement

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞羔羊，小羊。綿羊的幼崽；常作獻祭之用。lamb

Terms.Localization: young of sheep; often used for ritual sacrifice

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞葡萄園。（ἄμπελος「葡萄樹」的衍生詞）在果園或田地種植的一些葡萄樹。vineyard; orchard of grapevines

Terms.Localization: (derivative of ἄμπελος, grapevine) a number of grapevines growing in a garden or field

Localization.Gloss: 暗伯利（àn bó lì），《思》安僕里雅。在《羅馬書》16章的問安名單中出現的一個基督徒，保羅稱他為「在主裡面所親愛的」。這是當時羅馬皇帝宮中的奴僕常用的名字。Ampliatus

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞漁網。一種圓形的網，附有重物，邊緣有拉繩；是捕魚的工具。casting-net

Terms.Localization: a circular net with weights and a draw rope around its edge; used in fishing

Localization.Gloss: 暗妃坡里（àn fēi pō lǐ），《思》安非頗里。馬其頓東南面的一個重鎮，愛琴海以北重要的軍事和商業中心。保羅往帖撒羅尼迦的途中曾經過此城。Amphipolis

Terms.Localization: the capital of southeast Macedonia

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞無可指責的，無缺點的。指沒有可責之處，因此道德上無可指摘。blameless

Terms.Localization: pertaining to not being subject to blame and hence morally irreproachable

Localization.Gloss: 亞們（yà mén），《思》阿孟。約西亞的父親。猶大王，22歲時繼承父親瑪拿西的王位，在位兩年，即公元前642至640年。他和父親一樣行惡，拜偶像。Amon

Terms.Localization: the father of Josiah

Localization.Gloss: 亞摩斯（yà mó sī），《思》阿摩斯。瑪他提亞的父親。Amos

Terms.Localization: the father of Mattathias (Ματταθίας 1)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞台階，階梯。單數指一段階梯的一個台階，複數指多級的台階。step; flight of steps; stairs

Terms.Localization: in the singular, a step in a flight of steps, and in the plural, a series of steps

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞查考，查問；判斷；審訊，審問。嘗試通過仔細研究、評價和判斷來了解某事物的本質或真相。examine, question, discern, judge; be discerned (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to try to learn the nature or truth of something by the process of careful study, evaluation and judgment

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞無罪的，清白的。形容沒有罪責。without sin, guiltless

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being without guilt

Localization.Gloss: 亞拿尼亞（yà ná ní yà），《思》阿納尼雅。撒非喇的丈夫。耶路撒冷的基督徒。他和妻子撒非喇賣了田產後，欺騙使徒已奉獻所有。使徒彼得責備他欺哄聖靈，他就被神擊殺而死。Ananias

Terms.Localization: the husband of Sapphira

Localization.Gloss: 亞拿尼亞（yà ná ní yà），《思》阿納尼雅。大馬士革的基督徒。主差遣他去按手在掃羅身上，使掃羅恢復視力，並為他施行洗禮。Ananias

Terms.Localization: a Christian in Damascus

Localization.Gloss: 亞拿尼亞（yà ná ní yà），《思》阿納尼雅。希律王任命的大祭司。他曾在總督腓力斯面前控告保羅。Ananias

Terms.Localization: a Jewish high priest

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞活態度；行事為人；行為表現。行事為人，焦點顯然放在外顯的日常行為上。conduct oneself; behave

Terms.Localization: to conduct oneself, with apparent focus upon overt daily behavior

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞行事為人；生活方式。一個人的行為方式，焦點顯然放在外顯的日常行為上。conduct; manner of life

Terms.Localization: the way that one conducts oneself, with apparent focus upon overt daily behavior

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞樓上的房間。在首層以上的房間（美式用法稱為二樓，在許多其他語言中稱為一樓）。upstairs room

Terms.Localization: a room on the level above the ground floor (second story in American usage and first story in most other languages)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞初步審問或聽取說明，調查。進行司法調查的行為。investigation

Terms.Localization: the act of conducting a judicial inquiry

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞復活。人死了之後又復活的事件。resurrection

Terms.Localization: the event of coming back to life after having once died

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞販賣奴隸的人；綁架者；拐賣人口的人。把人賣為奴隸的人，包括綁架人並將其售賣的人。slave dealer

Terms.Localization: one who sells persons as slaves, including one who kidnaps persons and sells them

Localization.Gloss: 安得烈（ān dé liè），《思》安德肋。西門彼得的兄弟，耶穌的十二門徒之一。伯賽大人，約翰的兒子。Andrew

Terms.Localization: the brother of Simon Peter and one of the twelve apostles

Localization.Gloss: 安多尼古（ān duō ní gǔ），《思》安得洛尼科。在《羅馬書》16章的問安名單中出現的一個基督徒，與猶尼亞同被稱為保羅在羅馬的親屬，可能是指他們有密切的血緣關係或親密的基督徒同伴關係。Andronicus

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞不憐憫的，不同情的。形容沒有憐憫或者拒絕發憐憫。merciless

Terms.Localization: pertaining to the lack of mercy or the refusal to be merciful

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞無可指責的；無可非議的。指完美、美好、不能批評的事物。without fault; beyond reproach

Terms.Localization: pertaining to what is so perfect or good it cannot be criticized

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞無可指責的，沒有過錯的。指不能指責他有任何錯誤的人。without reproach; blameless

Terms.Localization: pertaining to one who cannot be accused of anything wrong

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞無憐憫的；不仁慈的。形容沒有憐憫或者拒絕發憐憫。merciless

Terms.Localization: pertaining to the lack of mercy or the refusal to be merciful

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞邪惡，不法，惡行。完全無視社會法律法規的行為。lawlessness; lawless deeds

Terms.Localization: behavior that completely disregards the laws or regulations of a society

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞沒有「律法」；在律法之外。沒有「律法」（尤指《舊約》首五卷書）。without the Law

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being without the Law (specifically the first five books of the OT)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞法律上的互告者，對頭；仇敵。魔鬼，被形容為一個活躍而持續地與別人敵對的人。adversary; enemy

Terms.Localization: the Devil, described as someone who is actively and continuously hostile towards others

Localization.Gloss: 安提阿人（ān tí ā rén），《思》安提約基雅人。安提阿城的本地人或住在該城的人Antiochean

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Antioch

Localization.Gloss: 安提阿（ān tí ā），《思》安提約基雅。敘利亞的一個城市。建於公元前三百年。在新約時代，它是羅馬帝國敘利亞省的首都，位於現今土耳其的東南部。它僅次於羅馬和亞歷山大，是羅馬帝國中的第三大城市。Antioch

Terms.Localization: a city in Syria

Localization.Gloss: 安提阿（ān tí ā），《思》安提約基雅（丕息狄雅的）。彼西底的一個城市，屬於新約時代的弗呂家，位於現今的土耳其，是希臘文化的中心。Antioch

Terms.Localization: a city in Pisidia

Localization.Gloss: 安提帕底（ān tí pà dǐ），《思》安提帕特。猶太境內的一個城，位於巴勒斯坦海邊、約帕的東北。保羅從耶路撒冷被押送至該撒利亞途中，某夜裡曾停留於此。Antipatris

Terms.Localization: a city in Judea

Localization.Gloss: 安提帕（ān tí pà），《思》安提帕。別迦摩教會的殉道者。Antipas

Terms.Localization: a martyr in Pergamum

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞贖金，贖價；換取自由的代價（方法）。使人得以獲釋或得救的方法或途徑。ransom, means of release

Terms.Localization: the means or instrument by which release or deliverance is made possible

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞敵基督者；敵基督的；敵對基督者。與基督為敵的人，意思是要奪取基督地位的人。antichrist

Terms.Localization: one who is opposed to Christ, in the sense of usurping the role of Christ

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞沒有虛假的；真誠的，真實的。真摯誠懇的，因此是沒有假裝或做作的。unhypocritical; without hypocrisy; genuine

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being genuine and sincere, and hence lacking in pretense or show

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞斧頭。由一個手柄和一個鋒利刀頭組成的用具，用來砍木頭。axe

Terms.Localization: an instrument with a sharp-edged head and a handle, used in chopping wood

Localization.Id: ἀπ᾽ αἰῶνος, (ἀπὸ) τῶν αἰώνων, ἐκ τοῦ αἰῶνος
Localization.Gloss: 從古時，創世以來，歷代以來。一段極長的時間，從一個假定的開始，直至現在。since all time; from all ages past; from the beginning of time

Terms.Localization: an exceedingly long period of time from an assumed beginning up to the present

Localization.Gloss: 解脫；釋放；解決，和解。解除控制，釋放（通用的含義適用於各種各樣的情況，包括監禁、政治控制、罪惡、疾病）。set free; release; settle with

Terms.Localization: to release from control, to set free (generic meaning for a wide variety of circumstances, including confinement, political domination, sin, sickness)

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞不能被試誘的。指不能被試探或誘惑。not tempted

Terms.Localization: pertaining to not being able to be tempted

Localization.Gloss: 亞比利（yà bǐ lì），《思》阿培肋。在《羅馬書》16章的問安名單中出現的一個基督徒，他被形容為「在基督裡經過試驗的」。Apelles

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞不信；不信任。相信某事不是真的；拒絕信任或依靠某事或某人。disbelieve; be unfaithful

Terms.Localization: to believe that something is not true; to refuse to put one's trust or reliance in something or someone

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞不信；不信實。拒絕信任或依靠某事或某人的一種態度。unbelief

Terms.Localization: the attitude of refusing to put one's trust or reliance in something or someone

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞登記，戶口登記。與人口普查一起進行的戶口登記。census

Terms.Localization: the event of registering persons in connection with taking a census

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞登記，列入人口普查名單。登記某人，通常與人口普查有關。register, put on a census list

Terms.Localization: to register someone, often in connection with taking a census

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞製造紛爭。造成或煽動人與人之間的分裂、不和。creating divisions

Terms.Localization: to cause or instigate divisions between people

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞拒絕；棄絕；丟棄。判斷某人或某物為不真誠或不值得的，因而被棄絕。reject

Terms.Localization: to judge someone or something as not being worthy or genuine and thus something to be rejected

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞穀倉，倉庫。儲存農作物的小型建築物；通常用石頭搭建而成。barn; storehouse

Terms.Localization: small structure for storing agricultural produce; normally made of stone

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞和解，和好。在人際關係受到擾亂或破壞後，重新建立恰當的友好關係。reconcile

Terms.Localization: to reestablish proper friendly interpersonal relations after these have been disrupted or broken

Localization.Gloss: 亞玻倫（yà bō lún），《思》阿頗隆。掌管地獄或無底坑的天使的希臘名字；意思是「毀滅者」。Apollyon; Destroyer

Terms.Localization: the Greek name for the ruling angel in Hell; name means Destroyer

Localization.Gloss: 亞波羅尼亞（yà bō luó ní yà），《思》阿頗羅尼雅。馬其頓境內的一個城市，屬於羅馬帝國。保羅與西拉在傳道旅程中曾經過此地，位於帖撒羅尼迦東面，在今日希臘的北部。Apollonia

Terms.Localization: a city in Macedonia

Localization.Gloss: 亞波羅（yà bō luó），《思》阿頗羅。亞歷山太城的猶太基督徒，早期教會的領袖，熱心事奉，擅長講解聖經，先後在以弗所、哥林多等地傳道。Apollos

Terms.Localization: a Christian of Alexandria who worked in Ephesus and Corinth

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞釋放，救贖，拯救。釋放的行為，與釋放奴隸的過程相類似。liberation, deliverance, redemption

Terms.Localization: the act of releasing or setting free, with the implied analogy to the process of freeing a slave

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞釋放，使自由；解散，叫人走開；離婚；饒恕；＜中間＞離開。forgive, pardon

Terms.Localization: to remove the guilt resulting from wrongdoing

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞使徒的職份。被委任並差派作特派信使的人所擔當的角色。apostleship

Terms.Localization: the role of one who has been commissioned and sent as a special messenger

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞被開除的或被趕出會堂的。被逐出會堂、開除教籍的狀態。expelled from the synagogue

Terms.Localization: a state of having been excommunicated from membership in a synagogue

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞宣判或判決。正式的判決，經常涉及法律裁決。verdict, sentence

Terms.Localization: an official decision, frequently involving a legal verdict

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞使徒；使者。被差遣去發送消息的人；指直接跟隨耶穌的信徒：履行特派信使職責的人。messenger; apostle

Terms.Localization: one who is sent with a message; referring to the immediate followers of Jesus: one who fulfills the role of being a special messenger

Localization.Gloss: 《現》亞比烏市場（yà bǐ wū shì chǎnɡ），《和》亞比烏市（yà bǐ wū shì），《思》阿丕約市場。羅馬南部的一個集鎮；位於羅馬帝國亞比烏大道第43號里程碑處，即羅馬以南63.5公里。Forum of Appius

Terms.Localization: a market town south of Rome

Localization.Gloss: 亞腓亞（yà féi yà），《思》阿丕雅。歌羅西的女信徒，可能是腓利門的妻子；保羅稱呼她為「妹子」。傳說她是與腓利門一同殉道而死的，希臘教會定11月22日為她的紀念日。Apphia

Terms.Localization: a Christian woman, probably the wife of Philemon

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞毀滅；浪費。造成人、物或機構的破壞。destruction

Terms.Localization: an act causing the ruin of persons, objects, or institutions

Localization.Gloss: 阿拉伯（ā lā bó），《舊》亞拉伯，《思》阿剌伯。（大概是指西奈半島）位於埃及和亞洲之間，即今日的阿拉伯半島，在約旦河以東。Arabia

Terms.Localization: Arabia (probably a reference to the Sinai Peninsula)

Localization.Gloss: 亞蘭（yà lán），《思》阿蘭。耶穌家譜中的一員。Aram

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞無所事事；懶惰的；閒，廢（話）；無效的，無用的。不工作的，無效的，或形容人慣常地拒絕工作；沒有仔細考慮某事的idle, unemployed, lazy, useless; careless, ineffective

Terms.Localization: pertaining to not working or habitually refusing to work; pertaining to not giving careful consideration to something

Localization.Gloss: 亞哩達（yà lǐ dá），《思》阿勒達。指亞哩達四世斐羅帕特里（Aretas IV Philopatris），他是希律安提帕的岳父，約在公元前9年至公元40年管轄拿巴提人的地區。羅馬凱撒可能曾把大馬士革交給他管理。Aretas

Terms.Localization: a king of Nabatean Arabia

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞小羊，羔羊。綿羊的幼崽；完全依賴母羊的滋養和牧羊人的保護；無助、無防備、無辜。lamb

Terms.Localization: the young of sheep; fully dependent on its mother for nourishment and on the shepherd for protection; helpless, defenseless, innocent

Localization.Gloss: 亞利馬太（yà lì mǎ tài），《思》阿黎瑪特雅。猶太境內的一個城，位於示羅以西的地方，即舊約時代撒母耳的故鄉拉瑪瑣非，簡稱「拉瑪」。Arimathea

Terms.Localization: a city in Judea

Localization.Gloss: 亞利多布（yà lì duō bù），《思》阿黎斯托步羅。在《羅馬書》16 章出現的基督徒，保羅向他一家問安。Aristobulus

Terms.Localization: a person whose family is greeted in |sROM.16:10|s*

Localization.Gloss: 亞里達古（yà lǐ dá ɡǔ），《思》阿黎斯塔苛。帖撒羅尼迦人，初期教會的外邦基督徒，保羅的忠心同工。Aristarchus

Terms.Localization: a companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 哈米吉多頓（hā mǐ jí duō dùn），《思》阿瑪革冬。一個神秘的地方，《啟示錄》預言世界末日眾王將聚集在這裡進行一場善惡較量的大戰。它的位置不詳，可能是指著名的古戰場米吉多山（Mount Megiddo）。Armageddon

Terms.Localization: a cryptic place name designating the territory which will be the scene of the final battle of the forces of good and evil

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞許配婚嫁。和某人訂下婚約。promise in marriage; betrothe

Terms.Localization: to promise a person for marriage

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞羔羊，羊。綿羊的幼崽；完全依賴母羊的滋養和牧羊人的保護；無助、無防備、無辜；常作獻祭之用。lamb

Terms.Localization: the young of sheep; fully dependent on its mother for nourishment and on the shepherd for protection; helpless, defenseless, innocent; often used for ritual sacrifice

Localization.Gloss: 《現》亞尼（yà ní），《和》亞蘭（yà lán），《思》阿爾乃。耶穌家譜中的一員，希斯崙的兒子。在某些譯本中，英文拼寫為 Aram。Arni

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 亞提馬（yà tí mǎ），《思》阿爾特瑪。保羅的同伴，保羅計劃把他差遣去革哩底接替提多。Artemas

Terms.Localization: a friend of Paul

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞頭蓬，船頭的帆。一塊布，繫於船的上方，藉以兜風，讓風來推動船隻在水中前行。sail

Terms.Localization: a cloth attached above a boat in such a way as to catch the wind and thus propel the boat through the water

Localization.Gloss: 亞法撒（yà fǎ sā），《思》阿帕革沙得。耶穌家譜中的一員，是閃的兒子。Arphaxad

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 亞基老（yà jī lǎo），《思》阿爾赫勞。公元1世紀希律家族的統治者，他是大希律的兒子，繼承父位統治猶大和撒馬利亞。Archelaus

Terms.Localization: the son of Herod I

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞統治者；治理者。統治者或治理者。ruler

Terms.Localization: one who rules or governs

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞大祭司，祭司長；主要祭司，祭司長家族的人。chief priest; high priest

Terms.Localization: a principal priest, in view of belonging to one of the high-priestly families

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞會堂主管。領導會堂、負責管理會堂事務的人。leader of a synagogue

Terms.Localization: one who is the head of and who directs the affairs of a synagogue

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞稅吏長。稅吏長，意指監管其他稅吏工作的人。chief tax collector

Terms.Localization: chief tax collector, in the sense of one who controlled activities of certain other tax collectors

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞總管；主管筵席的人。負責管理所有在宴席或宴會中服務的人員的總管。head steward, master of feast

Terms.Localization: the head servant in charge of all those who served at meals or feasts

Localization.Gloss: 亞撒（yà sā），《思》阿撒。耶穌家譜中的一員，猶大王，在以色列王耶羅波安第20年時登位，在耶路撒冷統治41年（公元前913-873年）。他行耶和華眼中看為正的事。Asaph

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 亞設（yà shè），《思》阿協爾。雅各與利亞的使女悉帕所生的兒子，也是亞設支族的先祖。Asher

Terms.Localization: a son of Jacob and ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 亞細亞人（yà xì yà rén），《舊》亞西亞人，《思》亞細亞人。亞細亞本地的人；在亞細亞出生或居住的人。Asian

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Asia

Localization.Gloss: 亞細亞（yà xì yà），《舊》亞西亞，《思》亞細亞。羅馬帝國的省份，在現今土耳其的西部。保羅在第三次旅程期間住在以弗所超過兩年，使福音傳遍亞細亞。Asia

Terms.Localization: the Roman province of Asia, primarily the western part of present-day Turkey

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞皮製酒袋。用動物皮或皮革製成的袋子；用於暫時貯存和攜帶葡萄酒。wineskin

Terms.Localization: a bag made of skin or leather; used for temporarily storing and carrying wine

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞小毒蛇；眼鏡蛇；毒蛇。毒蛇類；令人聯想到潛伏的危險。asp; cobra; viper

Terms.Localization: kind of poisonous snake; associated with lurking danger

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞銅錢。羅馬帝國的銅幣，約值一個銀幣（得拿利）的十六分之一。assarion; penny

Terms.Localization: a Roman copper coin worth 1/16 of a denarius

Localization.Gloss: 亞朔（yà shuò），《思》阿索。是亞細亞省每西亞地區的重要港口城市，位於今日土耳其境內。Assos

Terms.Localization: a city of Mysia

Localization.Gloss: 亞遜其土（yà xùn qí tǔ），《思》阿松黎托。在《羅馬書》16章的問安名單中出現的一個基督徒。Asyncritus

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞確實的；安全的。指確定的，因此完全可信。something definite; secure

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being certain and thus completely believable

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞確實地；安全地。指確定的，因此完全可信。something definite; secure

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being certain and thus completely believable

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞確實，毫無疑問。一種對信仰或信念的確定。certainty; being without doubt

Terms.Localization: a state of certainty with regard to a belief

Localization.Gloss: 亞大利（yà dà lì），《思》阿塔肋雅。旁非利亞的海港城市，在今日土耳其境內。Attalia

Terms.Localization: a seaport in Pamphylia

Localization.Gloss: 奧古斯都（ào ɡǔ sī dū），《舊》亞古士督，《思》奧古斯都。羅馬皇帝奧大維（Gaius Octavian）的拉丁名稱，相當於一個專有名詞；他的統治時期是從公元前 27 年至公元 14 年。Augustus

Terms.Localization: a Latin title given to Emperor Octavian and equivalent to a proper name

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞管轄，控制，壓制。專橫地控制。have authority, control

Terms.Localization: to control in a domineering manner

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞吹笛。αὐλός「笛子」的衍生詞。play a flute

Terms.Localization: derivative of αὐλός flute

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞吹笛的人。αὐλέω「吹笛」的衍生詞。flutist

Terms.Localization: (derivative of αὐλέω to play a flute) one who plays the flute

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞院子，羊圈。有圍牆或圍欄的地方，為的是圍住人類的活動場所或保護牲畜。sheepfold

Terms.Localization: a walled enclosure to protect livestock

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞庭院；住宅；宮殿；大宅。廟宇、宮殿、大宅等建築群內用建築物圍起來的露天區域；或指任何有這種圍蔽之露天區域的住宅（通常是比較講究的建築）。courtyard; or dwelling, palace, mansion

Terms.Localization: an open area enclosed by structures within a building complex, such as the temple, a palace, or a house; or any dwelling having such an enclosed open area (often a relatively elaborate structure)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞笛子。吹奏樂器，開有多個指孔用以改變音調的長管。flute

Terms.Localization: a musical wind instrument consisting of a tube with a series of finger holes used to alter the tone

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞自己給自己定罪的。因自己的行為而受到譴責的。self-condemned

Terms.Localization: pertaining to one who is condemned as the result of his own actions

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞廁所，便坑。latrine; toilet

Terms.Localization: latrine, toilet

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞不滅的；不朽壞的。指不會朽壞和死亡。imperishable; immortal

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being not subject to decay and death

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞不貪財的；不貪婪的。不渴慕或貪愛金錢的。not a lover of money; not greedy

Terms.Localization: pertaining to not being desirous or greedy for money

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞赦免，饒恕，除去（罪或債）。除去作惡所帶來的罪責；免去某人償還債務的義務。forgive; forgive a debt

Terms.Localization: to remove the guilt resulting from wrongdoing; to release a person from the obligation of repaying what is owed

Localization.Gloss: 亞該亞（yà ɡāi yà），《思》阿哈雅。希臘哥林多灣南岸地區，曾經是一個獨立的國家，新約時代是羅馬帝國的一個省，包括希臘最重要的地區；位於馬其頓以南，首府是哥林多城。Achaia

Terms.Localization: a Roman province including the most important parts of Greece

Localization.Gloss: 亞該古（yà gāi gǔ），《思》阿哈依科。哥林多教會的一名基督徒。Achaicus

Terms.Localization: a Christian at Corinth

Localization.Gloss: 亞哈斯（yà hā sī），《思》阿哈次。耶穌家譜中的一員，猶大王約坦的兒子，南國猶大的君王，約在公元前735至716/5年在位。Ahaz

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 亞金（yà jīn），《思》阿歆。耶穌家譜中的一員，所羅巴伯的後裔。Achim

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 亞伯（yà bó），《思》亞伯爾。亞當和夏娃的第二個兒子，該隱的兄弟。Abel

Terms.Localization: the second son of Adam and Eve and the brother of Cain

Localization.Gloss: 無底坑，深淵，陰間。是死人所在的地方，也是囚禁魔鬼的處所，是作為敵基督的獸以及陰間使者亞巴頓的住處。abyss; abode of evil spirits; very deep place

Terms.Localization: a location of the dead and a place where the Devil is kept, the abode of the beast as the antichrist, and of Abaddon, as the angel of the underworld

Localization.Gloss: 亞迦布（yà jiā bù），《思》阿加波。來自猶太的基督徒先知。Agabus

Terms.Localization: a Christian prophet from Judea

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞天使；使者。超自然的存在者，至高超自然存在者的差役和使者。angel

Terms.Localization: a supernatural being that attends upon or serves as a messenger of a superior supernatural entity

Localization.Gloss: 容器；器皿；桶。主要用來盛載液體或濕的物件；體積相對較大，容量約 15 至 19 公升。container; vessel

Terms.Localization: a container, primarily for liquids or wet objects; rather large, containing 15-19 liters

Localization.Gloss: 聖潔的；純潔的；神聖的。聖潔的，意思是具有高超的道德品格，並且擁有一些本質上神聖的品格，與人的品格相對。holy; pure; divine

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being holy in the sense of superior moral qualities and possessing certain essentially divine qualities in contrast with what is human

Localization.Gloss: 聖所。可移動的會幕或耶路撒冷的聖殿，作為一個神聖的場所。sanctuary

Terms.Localization: the movable tabernacle or the temple in Jerusalem as a consecrated place

Localization.Gloss: （至）聖所。耶路撒冷聖殿或早期的會幕、或相應的屬靈聖地的內部，可指其中的外室（聖所）或內室（至聖所），可能被認為是在天堂。(Most) Holy Place

Terms.Localization: the interior (either the outer or the inner of the two rooms) of the sanctuary of the Jerusalem Temple or of the earlier tabernacle or of a corresponding spiritual holy place, perhaps regarded as being in heaven

Localization.Gloss: 魚鈎。細小的弧形金屬片或骨頭，甚或是一根硬刺，一端是尖的，通常帶有倒鈎，另一端是環狀或彎曲的，用以繫釣絲；在尖鈎上穿上魚餌，吸引魚兒上釣。fish hook

Terms.Localization: small, curved piece of metal or bone or even a strong thorn, with a sharp point on one end, usually with a barb just behind the point, and a loop or bend on the other end to which a fishing line can be attached; used with some bait attached to it in order to attract a fish

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞錨。用繩子或鐵鏈繫在船上的重物，這重物墜到水底之後，可以防止或限制船隻的移動。anchor

Terms.Localization: a heavy object attached to a boat by a rope or chain and dropped to the bottom of a body of water in order to prevent or restrict the movement of the boat

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞非信徒；不是基督的追隨者。不屬於基督徒群體的人，其含義可能是不義的人或沒有與上帝建立正確關係的人。unbeliever; not a follower of Christ

Terms.Localization: a person who is not a member of the Christian community and by implication possibly unjust or not in a right relation with God

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞純淨的；無雜質的。是純潔的，有未被摻入雜質的含意。unadulterated; pure

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being pure, with the implication of not being adulterated

Localization.Gloss: 亞鎖都（yà suǒ dū），《思》阿左托。是古代的「亞實突」城（Ashdod），位於耶路撒冷以西，巴勒斯坦南部沿岸的一個城市。Azotus

Terms.Localization: a city on the coast of southern Palestine

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞無神的，沒有上帝的。指與上帝沒有任何關係。without God

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being without any relationship to God

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞不法的；不遵守法律的；不服約束的。形容拒絕服從法律要求。lawless; unruly; not complying with law

Terms.Localization: pertaining to refusing to be subjected to legal requirements

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞有刺植物；荊棘；蒺藜。任何在莖部和／或枝條上有尖刺的植物；被視為無用的；象徵艱難困苦。thorn plant; thistle; brier

Terms.Localization: any kind of plant with sharp projections on its stem and/or branches; regarded as useless; symbol of hardship

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞鐵鏈，鎖鏈。一串連接著的金屬鏈環；用來捆綁物件或約束囚犯。chain

Terms.Localization: a series of connected metal links; used for binding objects together or restraining prisoners

Localization.Gloss: 打穀場，碾禾場。堅硬地面或石頭地的表面，人們通過拍打或讓牲畜踩在上面把穀物脫粒。threshing floor

Terms.Localization: a surface of hard ground or stone where grain was threshed out, either by beating or having animals trample upon it

Localization.Gloss: 無可指責的；無過失的；無辜的。指沒有過犯或可責之處。faultless, blameless, innocent

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being without fault or blame

Localization.Gloss: 葡萄，葡萄樹。匍匐植物，成熟時會形成木質的梗；沿著地面生長，直至找到可以用捲鬚攀附的樹或其他物件；會長出一掛一掛的圓形小果，果實甜而多汁；象徵祝福、繁榮和幸福grapevine

Terms.Localization: creeping plant that develops a woody stem when it matures; Vitis vinifera; grows along the ground until it finds a tree or other object to climb, using tendrils; bears bunches of small round fruit that are sweet and juicy; symbol of blessing, prosperity, and happiness

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞無缺點的；無可指責的。沒有缺陷或瑕疵的；引申義：形容沒有缺點，因此在道德上無可指責。unblemished; blameless

Terms.Localization: pertaining to having no defect or blemish; figuratively: pertaining to being without fault and hence morally blameless

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞大茴香，蒔蘿。一年生植物，高度可達 50 釐米；葉子纖細；黃色花朵，花形像蓋杯；葉子和種子有宜人的辛辣氣味；園子栽種的草本植物，用於烹飪。dill

Terms.Localization: annual plant that can reach 50 cm in height; has fine leaves; yellow flowers form a shape like a covered cup; leaves and seeds have a pleasant, spicy smell; Anethum graveolens; garden herb, used in cooking

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞花。植物上的花flower

Terms.Localization: the blossom of a plant

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞木炭。一種炭，在很少空氣或沒有空氣的環境中加熱木頭或骨頭而產生；用作燃料。charcoal

Terms.Localization: A form of carbon produced by heating wood or bone in little or no air; used as a fuel

Localization.Gloss: 亞那（yà nà），《思》亞納斯。敘利亞總督委任的耶路撒冷大祭司。Annas

Terms.Localization: a Jewish high priest

Localization.Gloss: 安娜（ān nà），《和》亞拿（yà ná），《思》亞納。女先知，是亞設族人法內力的女兒。Anna

Terms.Localization: a prophetess

Localization.Gloss: 不法的。指無視法律的生活，意思是拒絕遵守法律。lawless

Terms.Localization: pertaining to living without regard to law, in the sense of refusing to obey laws

Localization.Gloss: 外邦人；異教徒。一個完全不遵守猶太律法的非猶太人。Gentile, heathen, pagan

Terms.Localization: a non-Jew who lives completely without reference to the Jewish Law

Localization.Gloss: 桶。用來汲水的容器或器具。pail, bucket

Terms.Localization: a container or vessel for drawing water

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞不信實的，不信的；無法相信的。指不信，有拒絕相信的含義。faithless; unbelieving

Terms.Localization: pertaining to not believing, with the implication of refusing to believe

Localization.Gloss: 阿拉伯人（ā lā bó rén），《思》阿剌伯人。來自阿拉伯本地的人，居住或出生在阿拉伯的人。Arab; person from Arabia

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Arabia

Localization.Gloss: 《和2010》《和》亞略巴古（Yà lüè bā gǔ），《现》亞略‧巴古，《思》阿勒約帕哥；亞略·巴古的議會。（直譯：戰神之山）雅典法院的所在地，傳統認為亞略巴古是靠近雅典衛城的一座石山，但它更可能是在山腳下的集市上；或：雅典城的顧問委員會，負責處理道德、文化和宗教的事務。Areopagus; council of the Areopagus

Terms.Localization: (literally hill of Mars) the location of an Athenian court, traditionally associated with a rocky hill close to the Acropolis, though probably located in the marketplace at the foot of the hill; or, an advisory council of Athens dealing with ethical, cultural, and religious matters

Localization.Gloss: 熊。野生的大型四足哺乳動物，有厚厚的皮毛和狗的臉；用四足走路，也可以用後足站立起來以取得更闊的視野；站著約有兩米高，體重超過二百公斤；以樹根、漿果、野果、老鼠和蜥蜴為食，偶爾也吃小家畜；被激怒或幼崽被搶走時，會變成一種危險的動物；令人聯想到暴力和危險。bear

Terms.Localization: large wild four-footed mammal with thick fur and doglike face; walks on all fours but may stand up on its back legs to get a better view; may be 2 m. tall when standing up and weigh over 200 kilos; feeds on roots, berries, wild fruit, mice, and lizards, and, occasionally, small livestock; Ursus arctos syriacus; dangerous when provoked or robbed of cubs; associated with violence and danger

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞戰車。兩輪或四輪的敞篷車；用軛與馬匹套在一起，並由馬匹拉動；用於戰爭或旅行。chariot

Terms.Localization: open vehicle with two or four wheels; harnessed to and pulled by horses; used in war or for travelling

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞犁。用硬質木材或金屬製成的三角形平刀（犁頭），連於手柄；用來破土，作為播種或種植幼苗的準備。plow

Terms.Localization: a flat triangular blade (the “plowshare”) made of hard wood or metal, connected to a handle; used to cut the soil in preparation for the sowing of seed or the planting of seedlings

Localization.Gloss: 亞底米（yà dǐ mĭ），《思》阿爾特米。新約時代的希臘女神，在小亞細亞地區廣受供奉敬拜。Artemis

Terms.Localization: a Greek goddess worshiped especially in Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 亞基布（yà jī bù），《思》阿爾希頗。保羅的同工，歌羅西的猶太基督徒。Archippus

Terms.Localization: a Christian in Colossae

Localization.Gloss: 統治者；領袖；掌權者。統治者或治理者。ruler; leader; authority

Terms.Localization: one who rules or governs

Localization.Gloss: 官員；法官；審判官。擔任法官的小官吏。official; judge; magistrate

Terms.Localization: a minor government official serving as a judge

Localization.Gloss: 芳香的藥膏；香膏。百合屬植物的芳香樹脂，通常用來給屍體防腐。aromatic salves; perfumed ointment

Terms.Localization: aromatic oils or salves used especially in embalming the dead

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞無可指責的；無可非議的。指無可批評或挑剔的東西。above criticism; beyond reproach

Terms.Localization: pertaining to what cannot be criticized

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞不肯和解的；不願意與人和睦相處的。不願意與他人和解。irreconcilable; unwilling to be at peace with others

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being unwilling to be reconciled to others

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞饒恕；寬恕。消除因犯罪行為而產生的內疚和罪責。forgiveness

Terms.Localization: the act of removing the guilt resulting from wrongdoing

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞糠秕，穀殼。穀粒的外殼。chaff

Terms.Localization: the outer cover or husk of grain

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞或＜陰＞苦艾，茵蔯。一種有藥用價值的特別苦的草本植物。wormwood

Terms.Localization: a particularly bitter herb with medicinal value

Localization.Gloss: 地獄；陰間。死人（包括義人和不義的人）的住處（在大多數情況下，ᾅδης[a] 相等於希伯來語的 Sheol）。world of the dead; Hades

Terms.Localization: a place or abode of the dead, including both the righteous and the unrighteous (in most contexts ᾅδης[a] is equivalent to the Hebrew term Sheol)

Localization.Gloss: 巴比倫。巴比倫的首都 ；也象徵惡魔似的世界強國。Babylon

Terms.Localization: the capital of Babylonia; it also occurs as a symbol of demonic world power

Localization.Gloss: 巴蘭（bā lán），《思》巴郎。摩西時代亞蘭的先知，受摩押王巴勒委託詛咒以色列人，使他們不能得勝；在計謀失敗之後，引誘以色列人偏離正路，叫以色列人得罪上帝。Balaam

Terms.Localization: a sorcerer and prophet summoned by Balak to curse Israel

Localization.Gloss: 巴勒（bā lè），《思》巴拉克。與亞蘭先知巴蘭狼狽為奸的摩押王；在以色列人離開埃及向迦南進發期間，他要求先知巴蘭詛咒以色列人，上帝卻使巴蘭三次祝福以色列人。Balak

Terms.Localization: a king of Moab involved with Balaam

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞錢包；錢袋。用皮革或布料製作的袋子，用來放置金錢或其他財物。purse; money bag

Terms.Localization: a receptacle for carrying money or other possessions; made of leather or cloth

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞潔淨儀式，洗禮。用水清潔的禮儀，以便使物品在禮儀上成為可接納的。(ritual) washing; baptism

Terms.Localization: a ritual washing with water to make objects ritually acceptable

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞施洗者；施洗的。給人施洗的人，約翰專用的頭銜。Baptist

Terms.Localization: one who baptizes, a title used exclusively for John

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞施洗；洗。在宗教儀式中使用水，象徵基於真誠悔改帶來的潔淨和加入群體。baptize

Terms.Localization: to employ water in a religious ceremony designed to symbolize purification and initiation on the basis of repentance

Localization.Gloss: 巴拉巴（bā lā bā），《思》巴辣巴。在耶穌受審期間，彼拉多應猶太人的要求釋放的一個囚犯。Barabbas

Terms.Localization: a prisoner released by Pilate at the request of the Jews during the trial of Jesus
