Localization.Gloss: 巴拉加（bā lā jiā），《思》貝勒基雅。馬太福音提到他是在殿和壇中間被殺的撒迦利亞的父親，這可能是指歷代志下記載的事件，後者記載撒迦利亞的父親是耶何耶大。學者一般認為，《馬太福音》的記載是筆誤。Barachiah

Terms.Localization: the father of a man killed in the Temple

Localization.Gloss: 巴拉（bā lā），《思》巴辣克。亞比挪菴的兒子，士師時代以色列人的領袖。他和女先知底波拉一同打敗迦南王耶賓的統帥西西拉。Barak

Terms.Localization: an Israelite general

Localization.Gloss: 巴多羅買（bā duō luó mǎi），《思》巴爾多祿茂。耶穌的十二門徒之一。聖經中甚少提到他，而且他的名字只出現在符類福音中。Bartholomew

Terms.Localization: one of the twelve apostles

Localization.Gloss: 巴‧耶穌（bā-yē sū），《思》巴爾耶穌。帕弗一個行法術和假充先知的猶太人。希臘名字是以呂馬。Bar-Jesus

Terms.Localization: a false prophet

Localization.Gloss: 約翰的兒子（yuē hàn de ér zǐ），《和》巴．約拿（bā-yuē ná），《思》約納的兒子。「巴．約拿」是西門彼得的亞蘭姓氏，意思是「約拿的兒子」或「約翰的兒子」。Bar-Jona; Bar-Jonas

Terms.Localization: the family name of the apostle Simon Peter

Localization.Gloss: 巴拿巴（bā ná bā），《思》巴爾納伯。原名約瑟，塞浦路斯的利未人，保羅最早期的傳道同工。Barnabas

Terms.Localization: an additional name of a certain Joseph, a Levite from Cyprus who was an associate of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 巴撒巴（bā sā bā），《思》巴爾撒巴。通常稱為「猶士都」的約瑟，巴撒巴是他的姓氏或別號，他是替補加略人猶大作使徒的兩名候選人之一。Barsabbas

Terms.Localization: the family name of a certain Joseph (often called Justus) who was one of two candidates for the place of Judas Iscariot

Localization.Gloss: 巴撒巴（bā sā bā），《思》巴爾撒巴。耶路撒冷教會的領袖猶大的別號。他和西拉被選派跟從保羅和巴拿巴，到安提阿、敘利亞、基利家的教會去宣告耶路撒冷大會的決定。Barsabbas

Terms.Localization: the family name of a certain Judas who was appointed as a companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 巴底買（bā dǐ mǎi），《思》巴爾提買。一個討飯的瞎子。耶穌離開耶利哥城時醫好他，說是他的信心救了他。Bartimaeus

Terms.Localization: a blind man

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞王國；統治，王權。國王統治的地區；引申義：作王（或由上帝）統治和掌權的行為。kingdom; rule, reign

Terms.Localization: an area or district ruled by a king; by extension, the act of ruling or reigning by a king (or God)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞王；君王；國王。一個國家或地區的男性統治者；有時用來指上帝、耶穌或撒但等具有王的能力和權威的存在者。king

Terms.Localization: male ruler of a nation or area; sometimes used to refer to God, Jesus, or Satan as beings with the power and authority of a king

Localization.Gloss: 皇宮。君王或統治者的居所；通常比普通人的居所大和講究。palace

Terms.Localization: the dwelling of a king or ruler; usually larger and more elaborate than the dwelling of an average person

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞女王；王后。一個國家或地區的女性統治者。queen

Terms.Localization: female ruler of a nation or area

Localization.Gloss: 巴力（bā lì），《思》巴耳。一個閃族的神，是古代近東迦南民族敬拜的對象，專司繁殖生育；它是眾神中最重要的神靈，其名字的意思是「主」。Baal

Terms.Localization: a Semitic deity

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞棕樹枝；棕櫚枝。棕櫚樹的枝子。palm branch

Terms.Localization: branch of the palm tree

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞洗禮。用水進行清洗的宗教儀式，象徵基於真誠悔改帶來的潔淨和加入群體。baptism

Terms.Localization: a religious ceremony involving washing with water, symbolizing purification and initiation on the basis of repentance

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞外國人，非希臘人的；未開化的人。不參與希臘文化和文明的人；某個地區的土人，他們不說希臘語或拉丁語；在新約時代，人們認為這些人是未開化的。foreigner, non-Greek; uncivilized

Terms.Localization: a person not participating in Greek culture and civilization; person from an area in which a language other than Greek or Latin was spoken; regarded as being outside the civilized world of NT times

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞樹叢；荊棘叢。任何種類的荊棘叢林或灌木。thorn bush; bush

Terms.Localization: any type of thorn bush or shrub

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞青蛙。無尾兩棲動物，身體採蹲坐姿勢，皮膚濕潤光滑，長後腿用於跳躍；身長約 70 毫米；棕色或橄欖綠色；蝌蚪長大而成青蛙。frog

Terms.Localization: tailless amphibian with a squat body, moist smooth skin, and long hind legs for jumping; about 70 mm long; brown or olive-green; develops from tadpole; Rana esculenta (Edible frog) or Rana punctata (Spotted frog)

Localization.Gloss: 可憎之物。極其可憎可惡的行為。abomination

Terms.Localization: an act that is utterly detestable and abhorrent

Localization.Gloss: 玷污；褻瀆；冒犯。使某事物變成不潔凈的、污穢的，或在禮儀上不可接受的。desecrate

Terms.Localization: to cause something to become unclean, profane, or ritually unacceptable

Localization.Gloss: 別西卜（bié xī bǔ），《思》貝耳則步。鬼王別西卜，是魔鬼的名字。Beelzebul

Terms.Localization: the name of the Devil as the prince of the demons

Localization.Gloss: 《現》魔鬼（mó ɡuǐ），《和》彼列（bǐ liè），《思》貝里雅耳。魔鬼撒但或敵基督的稱謂。舊約中原稱為「匪類」（士20:13），在兩約中間時期，猶太啟示文學中逐漸指撒但，保羅在新約中按此意使用。Beliar

Terms.Localization: a name given to the Devil or to the Antichrist

Localization.Gloss: 針。細長的縫紉工具，一端是尖的，另一端有穿線的孔，用來把線穿過布料。needle

Terms.Localization: a small, slender tool, pointed on one end and with a hole at the other end, used in passing thread through cloth in sewing

Localization.Gloss: 便雅憫；《思》本雅明。雅各的小兒子，是便雅憫支族的先祖。Benjamin

Terms.Localization: a son of Jacob and ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 《現》貝妮絲（bèi nī sī），《和》百妮基（bǎi nī jī），《舊》百尼基，《思》貝勒尼切。希律亞基帕一世的女兒，約生於公元28年。她與兄弟亞基帕二世發生亂倫關係。Bernice

Terms.Localization: the daughter of Herod Agrippa I and sister of Herod Agrippa II

Localization.Gloss: 庇哩亞人（bì lǐ yà rén），《思》貝洛雅人。庇哩亞本地人；出生或居住在庇哩亞的人。Berean

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Berea

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞不敬虔的人，荒唐的，貪戀世俗的。指世俗的，意思是貪戀世界或不敬上帝。profane; irreligious (person)

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being profane in the sense of worldly or godless

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞箭；標槍。尖頭的細直竿；（箭）可以用弓或（標槍）用手來推動；用作打獵或打仗的武器。arrow; dart

Terms.Localization: thin straight rod with a sharp point; may be propelled by a bow (arrow) or by hand (dart); used as a weapon in hunting or battle

Localization.Gloss: 庇哩亞（bì lǐ yà），《思》貝洛雅。馬其頓的一個小城，在今希臘境內，是保羅與西拉曾到之地。Berea

Terms.Localization: a city in Macedonia

Localization.Gloss: 伯大尼（bó dà ní），《思》伯達尼。約旦河東面的一處地方，約翰曾在那裡施洗。Bethany

Terms.Localization: a place on the east side of the Jordan where John baptized

Localization.Gloss: 伯大尼（bó dà ní），《思》伯達尼。耶路撒冷城外的一個鄉鎮，在橄欖山東南坡，是通往耶利哥城的必經之地。Bethany

Terms.Localization: a village on the Mount of Olives

Localization.Gloss: 畢士大（bì shì dà），《思》貝特匝達。耶路撒冷東北面、羊門附近的一個水池，池邊有五個走廊，能容納大量群眾。傳說天使會按時攪動池水，這時第一個下水的人，無論患甚麼病都會得著痊愈，所以那裡躺着很多病人。Bethzatha

Terms.Localization: a pool in the northeast part of Old Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 伯利恆（bó lì héng），《思》白冷。字面意思是「糧食之家」，是一個山區小鎮，位於耶路撒冷南方約8公里處。Bethlehem

Terms.Localization: a town south of Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 伯賽大（bó sài dà），《思》貝特賽達。字面的意思是「漁鄉」。新約時代，它是加利利北岸的一座城；該城的西側有約旦河流入加利利海。Bethsaida

Terms.Localization: a place northeast of the Lake of Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 伯法其（bó fǎ qí），《思》貝特法革。耶路撒冷附近的一個村莊，可能在伯大尼以東；是耶路撒冷通往耶利哥的必經之地。Bethphage

Terms.Localization: a village near Jerusalem, perhaps east of Bethany

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞審判台，法庭。有台階的高台，通常有座位；官員用這種高台向群眾講話，一般涉及司法事務，尤其是審判。judgement seat

Terms.Localization: a raised platform mounted by steps and usually furnished with a seat; used by officials to address an assembly, often on judicial matters, with a focus on judgement

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞小書卷。從 βιβλίον[a] 衍生出來的指小詞，指小尺寸的卷軸。small scroll

Terms.Localization: a diminutive derivative of βιβλίον[a], thus, a scroll of small size

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞書冊；卷軸；文書。以卷軸或書冊展現的文件。scroll; roll; book

Terms.Localization: a document in the form of a scroll or book

Localization.Gloss: 庇推尼（bì tuī ní），《思》彼提尼雅。小亞細亞北面的一個省。Bithynia

Terms.Localization: a province in northern Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞度日子，生活。行事為人，焦點放在日常的活動上。live

Terms.Localization: to conduct oneself, with focus upon everyday activity

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞今生的（事情）。與日常生活或生存有關的。(things of) of this life

Terms.Localization: pertaining to daily life or existence

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞書冊；卷軸；文書。以卷軸或書冊展現的文件。scroll; roll; book

Terms.Localization: a document in the form of a scroll or book

Localization.Gloss: 財產；產業。人賴以維生的資源。property; means

Terms.Localization: the resources which one has as a means of living

Localization.Gloss: 日常生活。行事為人，焦點放在日常的活動上。daily life

Terms.Localization: a person's conduct, with a focus upon everyday activity

Localization.Gloss: 生活，生存。一個人生存的時間長度。life, existence

Terms.Localization: the span of a person's existence

Localization.Gloss: 生活方式，行為。行事為人，焦點放在日常的活動上。manner of life, conduct, way of living

Terms.Localization: a person's conduct, with a focus upon everyday activity

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞褻瀆；毀謗，侮辱。說別人的壞話，藉以傷害或毀壞其名譽（可以是針對人或針對神明）。blaspheme; revile; defame

Terms.Localization: to speak against someone in such a way as to harm or injure his or her reputation (occurring in relation to persons as well as to divine beings)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞褻瀆；毀謗，侮辱。說別人壞話的行為，藉以傷害或毀壞其名譽（可以是針對人或針對神明）slander; blasphemy

Terms.Localization: the act of speaking against someone in such a way as to harm or injure his or her reputation (occurring in relation to persons as well as to divine beings)

Localization.Gloss: 伯拉斯都（bó lā sī dū），《思》布拉斯托。希律王亞基帕一世的宮廷總管，泰爾和西頓的人託他向王求和。Blastus

Terms.Localization: a court official of Herod Agrippa I

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞褻瀆的，誹謗的；褻瀆者，誹謗者。指具有侮辱性和誹謗性；誹謗某人或某事的人。blasphemous, slanderous; blasphemer, slanderer

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being insulting and slanderous; a person who defames someone or something

Localization.Gloss: 半尼其（bàn ní qí），《思》波納爾革。耶穌給西庇太的兒子雅各和約翰取的綽號，意思是「雷霆之子」，可能是因為他們性情暴烈。Boanerges; Sons of Thunder

Terms.Localization: a nickname given by Jesus to the sons of Zebedee

Localization.Gloss: 比珥（bǐ ěr），《思》貝敖爾。先知巴蘭的父親（民22.5）。Beor; Bosor

Terms.Localization: the father of Balaam (Numbers 22.5)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞植物，草。任何細小的綠色植物（在通用希臘化時期的希臘文中，這詞往往指那些用作動物飼料的植物）。plant; grass

Terms.Localization: any of the smaller green plants (in Hellenistic Greek often used in contexts referring to plants as fodder for animals)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞或＜陰＞公牛，母牛，牛。牛的通用詞；可指雄性或雌性。bull; ox; cow; cattle

Terms.Localization: general word for individual cattle; may be male or female

Localization.Gloss: 波阿斯（bō ā sī），《思》波阿次。耶穌家譜中的一員；伯利恆城的財主，拿俄米的丈夫以利米勒的親族。他盡了親屬的本分，娶路得為妻，為她死去的丈夫留名。他和路得所生的兒子俄備得成為大衞的祖父。Boaz

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞葡萄，葡萄串。葡萄樹的果子。grape; bunch of grapes

Terms.Localization: the fruit of grapevines

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞硝皮匠；皮革匠；皮匠。鞣獸皮以製作皮革的人。tanner; maker of leather

Terms.Localization: one who tans hides to make leather

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞細麻布的。（βύσσος「細麻布」的衍生詞）用亞麻布製成的布匹。cloth of fine linen

Terms.Localization: (derivative of βύσσος fine linen) cloth consisting of fine linen

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞細麻布。一種用亞麻植物的莖製成的高品質布料，以其堅韌耐磨和涼爽而聞名。fine linen

Terms.Localization: a high quality cloth made from the stems of the flax plant, known for its strength and coolness

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞祭壇。有底座的祭壇。altar

Terms.Localization: an altar with a base or pedestal

Localization.Gloss: 《現》加巴大（jiā bā dà），《和》厄巴大（è bā dà），《思》加巴達。亞蘭名字，意思是「石砌階」（《和》稱之為「鋪華石處」），指彼拉多府邸外一片鋪石的區域，是耶穌接受公開審訊的地方。Gabbatha

Terms.Localization: the Aramaic name for a paved area outside the residence of Pontius Pilate and the setting for the public trial of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 加百列（jiā bǎi liè），《思》加俾額爾。猶太教傳統的天使長之一。加百列在舊約中兩次向但以理講解異象，在新約中則宣佈施洗約翰和耶穌的誕生。Gabriel

Terms.Localization: an archangel

Localization.Gloss: 加大拉人（jiā dà lā rén），《思》加達辣人。出生或居住在加大拉的人；加大拉是加利利湖東岸的城鎮，另稱「格拉森」。Gadarene

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Gadara

Localization.Gloss: 奉獻箱。用以投放奉獻的大箱子。offering box

Terms.Localization: a large box in which offerings were placed

Localization.Gloss: 庫房；聖殿庫房。聖殿當中用作庫房的房間。treasury, Temple treasury

Terms.Localization: a room in the Temple used as a treasury

Localization.Gloss: 加拉太的（jiā lā tài）；《思》迦拉達的。與加拉太相關的。Galatian

Terms.Localization: pertaining to Galatia

Localization.Gloss: 加拉太（jiā lā tài），《思》迦拉達。羅馬帝國亞細亞省的一個地區，在現今的土耳其境內，省內有一些重要的城市，例如彼西底的安提阿、以哥念、特庇、路司得等。Galatia

Terms.Localization: a district in the Roman province of Asia

Localization.Gloss: 加拉太人（jiā lā tài rén），《思》迦拉達人。出生或居住在加拉太的人。Galatian

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Galatia

Localization.Gloss: 加利利（jiā lì lì），《思》加里肋亞。巴勒斯坦北部的一個地區，羅馬帝國的一省。在新約時代，加利利屬於羅馬帝國敘利亞省的一區。Galilee

Terms.Localization: a district in the northern part of Palestine

Localization.Gloss: 《現》加利利湖（jiā lì lì hú），《和》加利利海，《思》加里肋亞海。位於加利利境內、約旦河流域的一個內陸淡水湖，又稱為「革尼撒勒湖」或「提比哩亞海」，舊約時代稱為「基尼烈海」。Galilee

Terms.Localization: the Lake of Galilee, also called Tiberias and Gennesaret

Localization.Gloss: 加利利人（jiā lì lì rén），《思》加里肋亞人。居住或出生於加利利地區的人。Galilean

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 迦流（jiā liú），《思》加里雍。羅馬帝國派駐亞該亞省的總督（《和》譯作「方伯」）。Gallio

Terms.Localization: a Roman proconsul of Achaia

Localization.Gloss: 迦瑪列（jiā mǎ liè），《思》加瑪里耳。他是法利賽人，希列的孫子，耶路撒冷公會的議員，精通猶太律法，也是保羅的老師。Gamaliel

Terms.Localization: a renowned Pharisee in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 好吃懶做，又饞又懶，貪口腹的懶漢。字面意思：懶惰的胃；因而指：只對食物感興趣的懶人。lazy gluttons

Terms.Localization: literally: "lazy stomachs"; hence: lazy people who are only interested in food

Localization.Gloss: 迦得（jiā dé），《思》加得。雅各的第七子，是他和利亞的女僕悉帕所生的兒子，是迦得支族（Gadites）的先祖，其後裔居住在約旦河東的地方。Gad

Terms.Localization: a son of Jacob and ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 迦薩（jiā sà），《思》迦薩。巴勒斯坦西南部的城鎮，在通往埃及的一條要道上、希伯崙以西，距離地中海海岸大約5公里，是迦南地的南界。Gaza

Terms.Localization: a city in southwest Palestine on a principal road to Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 結婚禮堂。比較大的房間，常常用作婚禮場地。wedding hall

Terms.Localization: a relatively large room, often serving as a place for a wedding

Localization.Gloss: 該猶（gāi yóu）；《思》加約。跟隨保羅旅行傳道的馬其頓人。Gaius

Terms.Localization: a Macedonian companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 該猶（gāi yóu），《思》加約。跟隨保羅旅行傳道的特庇人。Gaius

Terms.Localization: a Christian from Derbe

Localization.Gloss: 該猶（gāi yóu），《思》加約。接受保羅施洗的一個哥林多基督徒，當地教會在他家中聚會；他也是在保羅撰寫《羅馬書》期間接待保羅的人。Gaius

Terms.Localization: a man from Corinth who was baptized by Paul

Localization.Gloss: 該猶（gāi yóu），《思》加約。《約翰三書》的收信人，作者稱他按真理而行，忠心接待客旅。Gaius

Terms.Localization: the recipient of 3 John

Localization.Gloss: 基甸（jī diàn），《思》基德紅。以色列的士師，約阿施的兒子，另稱「耶路巴力」或「耶路比設」。Gideon

Terms.Localization: a military leader and hero of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 客西馬尼（kè xī mǎ ní），《思》革責瑪尼。橄欖山上的一個園子，在耶路撒冷汲淪溪的對面，確切位置不詳。Gethsemane

Terms.Localization: a garden at the foot of the Mount of Olives

Localization.Gloss: 革尼撒勒（gé ní sā lè），《思》革乃撒勒。迦百農以南一塊肥沃的平原。Gennesaret

Terms.Localization: a fertile plain south of Capernaum

Localization.Gloss: 革尼撒勒湖（gé ní sā lè hú），《思》革乃撒勒湖。「加利利海」的別稱，因靠近革尼撒勒城而得名，亦名「基尼烈海」或「提比哩亞海」。Gennesaret

Terms.Localization: a name for the Lake of Galilee, also called the Lake of Tiberias

Localization.Gloss: 格拉森人（gé lā sēn rén），《思》革辣撒人。居住或出生於格拉森的人。格拉森是約旦河東、加利利湖東岸的城鎮，另稱「加大拉」（Gadara）。Gerasene

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Gerasa, a city in Peraea, east of the Jordan

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞地獄；欣嫩子谷。懲罰死人的地方。Gehenna, hell

Terms.Localization: a place of punishment for the dead

Localization.Gloss: 陸地；土地；地面；大地。人類居住的地面，對比於上面的天空和下面的世界。land; soil; ground; earth

Terms.Localization: the surface of the earth as the dwelling place of mankind, in contrast with the heavens above and the world below the surface

Localization.Gloss: 陸地。旱地，對比於海。land

Terms.Localization: dry land, in contrast with the sea

Localization.Gloss: 泥土；土地。用於種植的土壤、植物生長的土地或人腳下的自然表面。soil, ground

Terms.Localization: soil for planting, or ground for plants, or the natural surface beneath one's feet

Localization.Gloss: 區域，領土，土地。地上某個或某些地區，通常與某一民族或地理中心有關，但不一定構成政府的行政單位。region, territory, land

Terms.Localization: region or regions of the earth, normally in relation to some ethnic group or geographical center, but not necessarily constituting a unit of governmental administration

Localization.Gloss: 甜酒。發酵過程中一種新的甜酒。sweet wine

Terms.Localization: a new, sweet wine in process of fermentation

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞錢箱。存放金錢的盒子。money box

Terms.Localization: a box in which money was kept

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞真正地，真實地。形容擁有傳聞中的良好品格或素質的。genuinely, truly

Terms.Localization: pertaining to possessing purported good character or quality

Localization.Gloss: 各各他（gè gè tā），《思》哥耳哥達。亞蘭名稱，意思是「髑髏地」，耶路撒冷城外的一處山丘地，是處決死囚的地方，其確切位置有很多不同的傳統說法。Golgotha

Terms.Localization: the Aramaic name of a hill near Jerusalem where executions took place

Localization.Gloss: 蛾摩拉（é mó lā），《思》哈摩辣。位於死海南面的一個城，因罪惡盈貫被上帝毀滅。Gomorrah

Terms.Localization: a city located at the southern part of the Dead Sea and destroyed because of its evil

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞學者，經學教師；精通摩西律法的人。在某類文學或學科領域受過高等教育的人，包括猶太律法（聖經正典及律法傳統）。scholar, teacher; expert in the Law (traditionally: scribe)

Terms.Localization: a person who has acquired a high level of education in a certain body of literature or discipline, including Jewish law (both canonical and traditional laws and regulations)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞書記。負責城鎮或城市記錄的市政官員，顯然對維護法律和秩序也有一定的責任。town clerk

Terms.Localization: a city official with responsibility for the records of a town or city and apparently certain responsibilities for maintaining law and order

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞經文（單數），舊約聖經（複數）。＜陰＞經文。《舊約》或《舊約》的某個段落。Scripture, Scripture passage

Terms.Localization: the writings of the OT, or a particular passage of the OT

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞字母，文字；寫作；聖經；信件。任何一種書面文件，無論是書還是手稿，焦點在於其內容；寫給一人或多人的、包含文字的物件。letter; writing; Scripture

Terms.Localization: any kind of written document, whether in book or manuscript form, with focus upon the content; an object containing writing addressed to one or more persons

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞寫；記錄；著作。用鋼筆或類似的工具，和墨或類似的材料，在紙張等平面上標記字母、數字或詞語。write

Terms.Localization: to mark letters, numbers, or words on a surface such as paper, using a pen or similar instrument and ink or similar material

Localization.Gloss: 歌革（gē gé），《思》哥格。一個神秘的名字，用來指明一個將被彌賽亞征服的敵人；這名字含有隱意，先知以西結預言歌革要領導北方的侵略者來攻擊以色列，但她的力量敵不過有上帝保護的以色列。在歷史上，我們無法確定歌革是何者，只視她為敵對上帝和逼迫以色列選民的惡勢力。Gog

Terms.Localization: a cryptic name to designate an enemy to be conquered by the Messiah

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞屬惡魔的；邪惡的。與惡魔有關的。demonic, devilish

Terms.Localization: pertaining to a demon

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞被邪靈附身。被魔鬼附身和控制。be demon possessed

Terms.Localization: to be possessed by a demon

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞鬼，邪靈；鬼神。邪惡的超自然生物或靈體。demon, evil spirit

Terms.Localization: an evil supernatural being or spirit

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞鬼，邪靈。邪惡的超自然生物或靈體。demon, evil spirit

Terms.Localization: an evil supernatural being or spirit

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞戒指。指環，通常用金或銀製成，一般刻有物主的印章，用來標記所有權以及在公文上蓋章。ring

Terms.Localization: a ring for the finger, normally made of gold or silver and usually containing the signet of the owner by which he could mark ownership and seal documents

Localization.Gloss: 大瑪努他（dà mǎ nǔ tā），《思》達瑪奴達。靠近加利利湖西岸的一個地方，地點不能確定。Dalmanutha

Terms.Localization: a place of uncertain location near the western shore of the Lake of Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 撻馬太（tà mǎ tài），《思》達耳瑪提雅。以利哩古南部；羅馬帝國的一省，在今日的南斯拉夫、阿爾巴尼亞的北部，亞底亞海東岸的一個地區。Dalmatia

Terms.Localization: the southern part of Illyricum

Localization.Gloss: 《和》大馬士革（dà mǎ shì gé）人，《舊》大馬色人，《思》大馬士革人，《現》沒有把這詞譯出。在大馬士革居住或出生的人。Damascene

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Damascus

Localization.Gloss: 大馬士革（dà mǎ shì gé），《舊》大馬色，《思》大馬士革。敘利亞的首府；在新約時代，大馬士革屬於羅馬的敘利亞省。Damascus

Terms.Localization: the capital of Syria

Localization.Gloss: 但以理（dàn yǐ lǐ），《思》達尼爾。舊約一位大先知，其名字的意義是「上帝是我的審判」。Daniel

Terms.Localization: a major OT prophet

Localization.Gloss: 大衛（dà wèi），《思》達味。以色列的第二位君王，耶穌基督的先祖，其名字的意義是「所愛的」。David

Terms.Localization: a king of Israel and an ancestor in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞小母牛。雌性牛犢。heifer

Terms.Localization: the young female of cattle

Localization.Gloss: 大馬哩（dà mǎ lǐ），《思》達瑪黎。聽保羅講道後信主的一個雅典婦人。Damaris

Terms.Localization: an Athenian woman converted by Paul

Localization.Gloss: 《現》十邑（shí yì），《和》低加坡里（dī jiā pō lĭ），《舊》低加波利，《思》十城區。這是羅馬帝國的行政區，位於約旦河東，由十個希臘文化城市組成。主要的城市有希波斯、西古提波利、大馬士革、加大拉等。Decapolis

Terms.Localization: a league of ten cities in a region east of the Jordan

Localization.Gloss: 特庇人（tè bì rén），《思》德爾貝人。居住在或出生於特庇的人。Derbe

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Derbe

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞皮革的。（δέρμα「皮」的衍生詞）指用毛皮或皮革製作的。leather; of leather

Terms.Localization: (derivative of δέρμα skin) pertaining to being made of skin or leather

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞捆鎖；鎖鏈；腳鐐。任何捆綁的工具或途徑。bonds; chains; fetters

Terms.Localization: any instrument or means of binding or tying

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞監牢。拘留囚犯的地方。jail; prison

Terms.Localization: a place of detention

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞祈求；請求；禱告。基於假定的需求而進行緊急請求的行為。prayer; supplication; petition

Terms.Localization: the act of asking with urgency based on presumed need

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞樹；灌木。任何一種相對較大的木質植物。tree; bush

Terms.Localization: any kind of relatively large woody plant

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞要求，乞求；祈求；懇求。迫切地求，暗示有假定的需要。ask, beg; pray

Terms.Localization: to ask for with urgency, with the implication of presumed need

Localization.Gloss: 特庇（tè bì），《思》德爾貝。在呂高尼境內，位於大數以西、小亞細亞中部、加拉太省邊境上的一個城。Derbe

Terms.Localization: a city in Lycaonia

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞皮；獸皮；皮革。動物的皮，通常包括附著的毛髮，有時會用鞣酸來處理。skin; hide

Terms.Localization: skin of an animal, normally including attached hair and sometimes tanned

Localization.Gloss: 底馬（dǐ mǎ），《思》德瑪斯。原是保羅的同工，後來因「貪愛現今的世界」而跟保羅分手，到帖撒羅尼迦去。Demas

Terms.Localization: a companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 《現》底米特（dĭ mĭ tè），《和》底米丟（dǐ mǐ diū），《思》德默特琉。在以弗所製造亞底米女神廟模型的銀匠。Demetrius

Terms.Localization: a silversmith in Ephesus

Localization.Gloss: 《現》底米特（dĭ mĭ tè），《和》低米丟（dī mǐ diū），《思》德默特琉。一個熱心行善的基督徒，也是教會領袖。Demetrius

Terms.Localization: a church leader

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞得拿利；一錢銀子。一種羅馬銀幣，約值一般工人一天的工資。denarius

Terms.Localization: a Roman silver coin equivalent to a days wage of a common laborer

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞詳細審查；決定，判決。獲得準確和全面的信息；對法律事務作出判斷，帶有徹底審查的含義。examine thoroughly; determine, decide a case

Terms.Localization: to obtain accurate and thorough information about; to make a judgment on legal matters, with the implication of thorough examination

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞約，契約；＜複＞契約條文或單指契約。兩人或兩方之間協議的口頭內容，指明相互的利益和責任。covenant

Terms.Localization: the verbal content of an agreement between two persons or parties specifying reciprocal benefits and responsibilities

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞揚淨，打掃乾淨。徹底清理或清潔。clean out

Terms.Localization: to clean out or to clean off thoroughly

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞揚淨，打掃乾淨。徹底清理或清潔。clean out

Terms.Localization: to clean out or to clean off thoroughly

Localization.Gloss: 服事，服務，照顧，管理；服事的人，執事。通過提供服事來照顧；提供食物和飲料；以特別的方式事奉上帝。serve, care for, administer; one who serves, minister

Terms.Localization: to take care of by rendering service to; to serve food or drink; to serve God in some special way

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞服侍，服務；貢獻，幫助，支持；宣教事工；事奉。服侍的角色或位置；照顧人們的需要的行為。service; ministry; support

Terms.Localization: the role or position of serving; act of taking care of the needs of people

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞辨認，分辨，區別；疑惑，動搖，猶豫。判斷為有分別或區別。discern, distinguish; doubt, waver, hesitate

Terms.Localization: to judge that there is a difference or distinction

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞和解；和好；與……講和。在與某人爭執或決裂後，重新建立友好的人際關係。be reconciled

Terms.Localization: to reestablish friendly interpersonal relations with someone after a dispute or rupture

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞聲明，堅稱，作證；鄭重勸告；警告；堅持。基於假定的個人知識作出嚴肅的聲明；針對將來發生的事情或行動進行告誡或指導，暗示出於個人的知識或經驗；以加強的語氣說出觀點或願望。declare, assert, charge under solemn oath; warn; insist

Terms.Localization: to make a serious declaration on the basis of presumed personal knowledge; to admonish or instruct with regard to some future happening or action, with the implication of personal knowledge or experience; to be emphatic in stating an opinion or desire

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞拯救，救援；醫治，治愈，使痊愈，救治。從危險，包括疾病中完全解救出來；save; cure

Terms.Localization: to rescue completely from danger, including illness

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞保護，保障安全。保護某物以保證其安全或免受傷害。protect, keep safe

Terms.Localization: to guard or protect something in order to keep it safe or free from harm

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞魔鬼。邪惡超自然生物的首腦；有許多魔鬼撒但的特徵的邪惡的人。devil

Terms.Localization: the principal supernatural evil being (with article); a wicked person who has a number of characteristics typical of the Devil

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞誹謗者；好說閒話的，散播謠言的，搬弄是非的。（διαβάλλω「誹謗」的衍生詞）愛誹謗別人的人；與誹謗者有關的。slanderer; slanderous

Terms.Localization: (derivative of διαβάλλω to slander) one who engages in slander; pertaining to slander

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞斷定，審判。對法律事務作出判斷，帶有徹底審查的含義。decision, verdict

Terms.Localization: the act of making a judgment on legal matters, with the implication of thorough examination

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞王冠，冠冕。一種王冠，用以象徵在某個特定地區的最高統治權，因此往往令人聯想到王權。diadem crown

Terms.Localization: a type of crown employed as a symbol of the highest ruling power in a particular area and therefore often associated with kingship

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞或＜陰＞僕人，傭人；執事；服侍者。擔任執事的人，負責照顧信徒的需要。servant; deacon; minister

Terms.Localization: one who serves as a deacon, with responsibility to care for the needs of believers

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞辨別的能力；分辨；主張。評估和判斷的能力。discernment; distinguishing; opinion

Terms.Localization: the ability to evaluate and judge

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞心思，理智；思想；計謀；意念。理解、推理、思考和決定的心理能力；思考和推理的內容。mind; understanding; thoughts

Terms.Localization: the psychological faculty of understanding, reasoning, thinking, and deciding; the content of thinking and reasoning

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞公義的審判。正確或公正的裁決或審判。righteous judgment

Terms.Localization: a right or just verdict or judgment

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞做上帝要求的事，做正確的事；義，公義；使……與上帝和好。做上帝要求的事情或得以與上帝和好。doing what God requires, doing what is right; righteousness, justice; being put right with God

Terms.Localization: the act of doing what God requires or of being put right with God

Localization.Gloss: 恢復正常關係。使某人與另一個人（通常指上帝）保持適當或正確的關係。put right with

Terms.Localization: to cause someone to be in a proper or right relation with someone else (usually God)

Localization.Gloss: 顯為公義，證明為公義。證明某事在道德上是正確的。show to be right, prove to be right

Terms.Localization: to demonstrate that something is morally right

Localization.Gloss: 宣判無罪，除去罪名；被判為義；釋放，無罪釋放。除去過犯；使脫離某種狀態或情況的控制，而這些狀態或情況涉及道德問題。acquit, remove guilt; release, set free

Terms.Localization: to clear of transgression or cause to be released from some state or situation involving moral issues

Localization.Gloss: 服從義的命令。遵守正義、公正的命令。obey righteous commands

Terms.Localization: to conform to righteous, just commands

Localization.Gloss: 誡命，公義的要求；稱義；公義的成為。關於正確或正義行為的規則；符合上帝要求的行為。regulations, just requirements, justification; righteous act

Terms.Localization: a regulation concerning right or just action; an act which is in accordance with what God requires

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞活該的，理所當然的，公正地，正當地。形容是正義的，因為是合理的和應得的。justly; righteously

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being right as the result of being justified and deserved

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞宣判無罪，釋放。清除某人的過犯。acquittal, setting free

Terms.Localization: the act of clearing someone of transgression

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞審判者，法官。主持法庭審訊並宣佈判決的人。judge

Terms.Localization: one who presides over a court session and pronounces judgment

Localization.Gloss: （現》杜尼修（dù ní xiū），《和》丟尼修（diū ní xiū），《思》狄約尼削。雅典人，亞略‧巴古議會的成員，聽保羅講道而信主。Dionysius

Terms.Localization: an Athenian and a member of the Areopagus who was converted by Paul

Localization.Gloss: 《現》狄特腓（dí tè féi），《和》丟特腓（diū tè féi），《思》狄約勒斐。想作教會領袖又不行善、在《約翰三書》1:9中受使徒約翰責備的一個基督徒。Diotrephes

Terms.Localization: a Christian who is criticized in 3 John

Localization.Gloss: 《現》雙神（shuāng shén），《和》宙斯雙子（zhòu sī shuāng zǐ），《思》彫斯雇黎。宙斯雙子是希臘羅馬神話中的雙生兄弟卡斯妥和波陸可斯，他們被稱為航海者的神明。Twin Brothers

Terms.Localization: a joint name for Castor and Pollux, pagan deities of an Alexandrian ship, meaning heavenly twins

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞聖殿稅，丁稅。每個猶太男子二十歲以上都需要繳納的稅；用以資助聖殿的運作；字面義是兩個希臘銀幣，約等於兩個羅馬銀幣。two-drachma piece; temple tax

Terms.Localization: the tax required of every male Jew from the age of twenty onward; to support the temple

Localization.Gloss: 雙胞胎（shuāng bāo tāi），《和》低土馬（dī tŭ mă），《思》狄狄摩。是使徒多馬的希臘名字。Didymus

Terms.Localization: the Greek name of the apostle Thomas (93.155)

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞公義的，公正的；與……有正確的關係。與上帝的要求相符或與某人（通常指上帝）有正確的關係。just, righteous; being right with

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being in accordance with what God requires or being in a right relationship with someone (usually God)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞天理（上天的公理）；天理（女神）。根據應得的基礎施行獎賞或懲罰；希臘神話中的正義女神，她找到有罪者並加以懲罰。justice; (the goddess) Justice

Terms.Localization: reward or punishment on the basis of what is rightly deserved; the goddess who delivers such action in seeking out and punishing the guilty

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞網；漁網。指任何一種網，但在《新約》只用來指捕魚的網。net; fishnet

Terms.Localization: any kind of net, but in the NT referring only to nets used for catching fish

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞一口兩舌的，不誠實的，假冒為善的。形容基於偽裝或偽善的矛盾行為。double-tongued, hypocritical

Terms.Localization: pertaining to contradictory behavior based upon pretense or hypocrisy

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞省察，察驗；試驗，考驗；明辨，洞察；認為對的，認可。嘗試通過檢驗和測試來了解事物的真實程度，通常透過實際使用來進行測試；根據試驗而認為某事物是真實的。interpret, examine, test; judge to be genuine, approve

Terms.Localization: to try to learn the genuineness of something by examination and testing, often through actual use; to regard something as genuine on the basis of testing

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞試驗，察驗，考驗；真實，真實的，堅定的。試驗以確定某事的真實性；或，經過試驗證明是真實的。testing, proving; genuineness

Terms.Localization: the act of testing to determine is something is genuine; or, genuineness on the basis of having been tested

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞大樑，樑木。粗木柱；用來支撐屋頂。beam

Terms.Localization: thick wooden poles; used to support a roof

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞讚美，頌讚；榮耀；尊崇，敬重。說某事異常美好，值得讚美；使某人擁有榮耀；通過尊崇某人而賦予他很高的地位。praise; glorify; honor

Terms.Localization: to speak of something as being unusually fine and deserving honor; to cause someone to have glorious greatness; attribute high status to someone by honoring

Localization.Gloss: 多加（duō jiā），《思》多爾卡。希臘名字，意思是「羚羊」，亞蘭名字是「大比大」。一個女基督徒，住在約帕，為人十分慷慨，熱心行善。她害病而死，後來經彼得禱告而復活。Dorcas

Terms.Localization: a Christian woman in Joppa who was known for charitable works; meaning gazelle, deer; her Aramaic name was Ταβιθά

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞為服務做好準備。準備好某物或使某物可以用來提供服務。make ready for service

Terms.Localization: to prepare or make something available for service

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞奴役，奴隸。屈從的狀態或情況slavery

Terms.Localization: a state or condition of subservience

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞伺候，事奉，服事；作奴隸，受奴役。作某人的 奴隸或僕人而工作；或喻指受某種影響的控制。serve; be enslaved

Terms.Localization: to do work as a slave or servant of someone; or (figuratively) to be under the control of some influence

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞奴役，使…作奴隸。使某人成為奴隸。enslave

Terms.Localization: to cause someone to become a slave

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞婢女，使女，女僕。受約束服務於某人的女性。bondmaid; female slave

Terms.Localization: a woman or girl who is bound in service to someone

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞奴僕，臣僕，僕人，奴隸。作奴僕有成為主人的財產的含義，但古時候奴僕經常都可以重獲自由。slave; servant

Terms.Localization: one who is a slave in the sense of becoming the property of an owner (though in ancient times it was frequently possible for a slave to earn his freedom)

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞作奴僕的，屈從的，受控制。指一種完全受某人或某事控制的狀態。subservient to; controlled by

Terms.Localization: pertaining to a state of being completely controlled by someone or something

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞值得稱讚的，經得起考驗的；被認為是有價值的，可敬的，受尊敬的。根據試驗被判斷為有價值的。approved; regarded as worthy, respected

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being judged worthy or genuine on the basis of testing

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞榮耀，燦爛，榮華顯赫；光榮，明亮，光輝；偉大，榮耀。輝煌的品質、引人注目的外觀；明亮或發光的狀態；偉大而美妙的狀態。glory, splendor; brightness, radiance; greatness

Terms.Localization: the quality of splendid, remarkable appearance; state of brightness or shining; state of being great and wonderful

Localization.Gloss: 榮耀的大能，奇妙的力量；奇妙的存在者。榮耀的能力的超自然彰顯。glorious power, amazing might; glorious being

Terms.Localization: a supernatural manifestation of power characterized by glory

Localization.Gloss: 讚美，頌揚；尊榮，尊敬。說某事異常美好，值得讚美；顯示尊榮，作為確定某人身分的一個要素。praise; honor, respect

Terms.Localization: the act of speaking of something as being unusually fine and deserving honor; the act of showing honor as an element in the assignment of status to a person

Localization.Gloss: 銀幣（音譯：德拉克馬）。希臘銀幣，價值與羅馬錢幣得拿利大致相同。drachma

Terms.Localization: a Greek silver coin with approximately the same value as the denarius

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞龍。傳說中的動物，通常被認為是一種醜陋的翼蛇或蜥蜴。dragon

Terms.Localization: a legendary animal, usually regarded as being a kind of monstrous winged serpent or lizard

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞鐮刀。一種大彎刀，用來收割成熟的穀物。sickle

Terms.Localization: a large, curved knife employed in cutting ripe grain

Localization.Gloss: 土西拉（tǔ xī lā），《思》得魯息拉。希律亞基帕一世的小女兒，猶太巡撫腓力斯的妻子，聖經稱她為「猶太的女子」。據歷史學家約瑟夫的記載，她大約生於公元38年，腓力斯是她第二任丈夫。Drusilla

Terms.Localization: the youngest daughter of Herod Agrippa I who was married to Felix the procurator

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞重要的，有影響力的人。重要人士，基於他們的權力或影響力。prominent man

Terms.Localization: important person, based upon power or influence

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞統治者；主宰；高級官員。處於指揮別人的權威地位的人。ruler; court official; sovereign

Terms.Localization: one who is in a position of authority to command others

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞中傷，毀謗，侮辱。使人得著壞名聲。defame, slander

Terms.Localization: to attribute ill repute or bad reputation to

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞大能的作為；神蹟，奇事。大能、奇妙的作為。mighty work; miracle

Terms.Localization: act of power, miracle

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞能力；權能，大能，力量；統治者，有能者。做某一特定活動或經歷一些事情的能力；在執行某種功能時施加力量的潛力。ability; power; ruler

Terms.Localization: the ability to perform a particular activity or to undergo some experience; the potential to exert force in performing some function

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞屋頂。平頂房屋的屋頂。housetop

Terms.Localization: the area on the top of a flat-roof house

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞禮物；供物，祭物；捐款，所賜的。所給或授予的東西。gift, offering

Terms.Localization: that which is given or granted

Localization.Gloss: 希伯來語（xī bó lái yǔ），《思》希伯來話。以色列的通用語言。希伯來語是以色列人在舊約時代所用的語言，屬於西北閃族語系的一支，與古代烏加列、腓尼基等語言關係密切。傳統希伯來字體包括22個輔音字母，書寫方向是從右至左。Hebrew (language)

Terms.Localization: language of the Hebrews Hebrew language

Localization.Gloss: 希伯來人（xī bó lái rén），《思》希伯來人。聖經中的民族猶太人最古老的種族名稱，原文字義是「從那方來的」，指亞伯拉罕從迦南的東方過來。在舊約裡，希伯來人是以色列人的另一個名稱，聖經用這詞來形容亞伯拉罕和經以撒及雅各而出的後裔。《現》在徒6.1 譯作「希伯來土話的猶太人」。Hebrew (person)

Terms.Localization: the oldest ethnic name for a Jew or the Jewish people

Localization.Gloss: 希伯來話（xī bó lái huà），《思》希伯來話。以色列的通用語言，希伯來文原是以色列人在舊約時代所用的語言，屬於西北閃族語系的一支，與古代烏加列、腓尼基等語言關係密切。傳統希伯來字體包括22個輔音字母，書寫方向是從右至左。in Hebrew

Terms.Localization: expressed in the Hebrew language, in Hebrew

Localization.Gloss: ＜主動＞（死而）復活；＜被動＞使復活，使活過來。使人死而復活。act.: raise (from the dead); pass.: be raised (from the dead)

Terms.Localization: cause someone who is dead to come back to life

Localization.Gloss: 擦上；塗抹。擦上、塗抹藥膏或油之類的物質。rub on

Terms.Localization: to smear or rub on substances such as salve or oil ‎

Localization.Gloss: 希西家（xī xī jiā），《思》希則克雅。耶穌家譜中的一員。南國猶大的王，公元前715至687年統治猶大國，在耶路撒冷作王29年。Hezekiah

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞自定的宗教；自己想出來的宗教；隨己意敬拜。出於某人自己的願望和意念的一套宗教信念和做法。self-imposed religion, self-created religion

Terms.Localization: a set of religious beliefs and practices resulting from one's own desires and initiative

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞異教徒的，不信上帝的，外邦人的。指不是猶太人的人。Gentile, heathen, pagan

Terms.Localization: pertaining to one who is not a Jew

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞偶像的廟。安放偶像的廟宇或聖所。temple of an idol

Terms.Localization: a temple or sanctuary which houses an idol

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞拜偶像的事。敬拜偶像。idolatry

Terms.Localization: the worship of idols

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞拜偶像的人。idolater

Terms.Localization: a person who worships idols

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞祭過偶像的肉。獻祭給偶像的動物的肉。sacrificial meat

Terms.Localization: the meat of animals sacrificed to idols

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞像，形像。造成人、神明、動物等形象的物件（不一定是立體的）。likeness; image

Terms.Localization: an object (not necessarily three-dimensional) which has been formed to resemble a person, god, animal, etc.

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞純潔的；真誠的；誠實的。形容真誠，意即動機純潔。pure; sincere

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being sincere in the sense of having pure motivation

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞和平相處，和睦。與別人和平相處。be at peace; live in peace

Terms.Localization: to live in peace with others

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞平安的，和平的；愛好和平的。從焦慮和內心混亂中解脫出來的。peaceful; peace-loving

Terms.Localization: pertaining to freedom from anxiety and inner turmoil

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞成就和平。使人處於和平或和解的狀態。make peace

Terms.Localization: to cause a state of peace or reconciliation between persons

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞使人和睦的人，促進和平的人。使人與人之間恢復和平的人。peacemaker

Terms.Localization: a person who restores peace between people

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞和平，平安，和睦；安全。和平、安寧的有利環境；從焦慮中解脫出來。peace

Terms.Localization: a set of favorable circumstances involving peace and tranquility, freedom from anxiety

Localization.Id: εἰς αἰῶνα, εἰς τὸν αἰῶνα, εἰς τοὺς αἰῶνας, εἰς ἡμέραν αἰῶνος, εἰς τοὺς αἰῶνας τῶν αἰώνων, εἰς τὸν αἰῶνα τοῦ αἰῶνος, εἰς αἰῶνας αἰώνων, εἰς πάντας τοῦ αἰῶνας, τοῦ αἰῶνος τῶν αἰώνων
Localization.Gloss: 時常，永遠，永恆。無限的時間，特別聚焦於未來。always; forever; forever and ever; eternally

Terms.Localization: unlimited duration of time, with particular focus upon the future

Localization.Gloss: 落空的，徒然的。指完全沒有目的。in vain

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being totally without purpose

Localization.Gloss: 帶入；使，帶進，導致。搬運或攜帶物件進入某個地區或建築物；使某人進入特定的事件或狀態。bring in, carry in; cause to, bring in to, lead to

Terms.Localization: carry or bring something into an area or structure; cause someone to enter into a particular event or state

Localization.Gloss: 引起注意，說起。通過言語引起人們的注意，但可能不是以正式或公開的方式。bring to the attention of, speak about to

Terms.Localization: bring something to the attention of people by means of speech, but probably not in a formal or open manner

Localization.Gloss: 在基督裡。一種表達。in Christ

Terms.Localization: expression

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞偶像，像，假神。仿照人、動物、神明等造成的物件，是人所敬拜的對象。idol

Terms.Localization: an object which resembles a person, animal, god, etc. and which is an object of worship

Localization.Gloss: 命令，要求。命令式有時具有命令或請求的效果（通常譯為“說”、“講”、“告訴”）。to command, to bid, to request

Terms.Localization: The imperative sometimes has the force of commanding or requesting (usually rendered "say", "speak", "tell")

Localization.Gloss: 百夫長；隊長；軍官。指揮大約一百個士兵的羅馬軍官。centurion; captain

Terms.Localization: a Roman officer in command of about one hundred men

Localization.Gloss: 為某人伸冤，公正對待某人；報復，報償。為受冤枉的人討回公道。grant justice; avenge

Terms.Localization: to give justice to someone who has been wronged

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞公義；伸冤；懲罰，報應。為受冤枉的人討回公道的過程；以傷害還傷害，假定最初的傷害是不合理的，因此該受懲罰。justice; vengeance; punishment

Terms.Localization: the process of giving justice to someone who has been wronged; the act of repaying harm with harm, on the assumption that the initial harm was unjustified and that retribution is therefore called for

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞除掉，除淨；清理，潔淨。除去不潔淨的東西，從而使某物變得潔淨。purge out; cleanse

Terms.Localization: to make clean by removing that which is unclean

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞教會；會眾；大會。基督徒的集會群眾，暗示其成員是交流互動的；或，全體基督徒會眾。church; assembly; congregation

Terms.Localization: a group of Christians, implying interacting membership; or, the totality of Christian groups

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞被揀選的；精選的，貴重的；傑出的。已被揀選的。chosen; chosen one

Terms.Localization: that which has been chosen or selected

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞揀選，選。從可能的選項中作出選擇。choose

Terms.Localization: to make a selection from among possible alternatives

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞揀選；所揀選的人。從可能的選項中作出選擇，或，基於顯著的偏好而作出特別的選擇。selection; elect; election

Terms.Localization: act or result of making a selection from possible alternatives, or of making a special selection based upon significant preference

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞試驗，試探；設圈套。通過全面和廣泛的試驗，嘗試了解某人的品格或某事物的性質；試圖使某人犯錯。put to the test; entrap

Terms.Localization: to try to learn the nature or character of someone or something by submitting such to thorough and extensive testing; to try to cause someone to make a mistake

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞橄欖林；橄欖園。ἐλαία「橄欖樹」的衍生詞，指種著許多橄欖樹的園子或果樹園。olive grove; olive orchard

Terms.Localization: (derivative of ἐλαία[a] olive tree) a number of olive trees planted in a garden or grove

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞橄欖樹。可以生長至高達十米的樹，但通常會修剪到五米左右；葉子表面呈灰綠色，葉底呈白色；橄欖果實長約二釐米，厚約一厘米多一點，果核堅硬，果皮柔軟，果肉多油；橄欖果實用作食物，橄欖油用來煮食、點燈、擦身，也可作藥用，以及在宗教儀式中使用（抹油）。olive tree

Terms.Localization: tree reaching up to 10 m. high, but usually pruned to around 5 m.; leaves are grayish green above, and whitish underneath; fruit of the olive is about 2 cm. long and a bit more than a cm thick with a hard stone inside and a soft skin that covers the oily flesh; fruit is used for food and oil for cooking, for lamps, for rubbing on the body, for medicine, and in religion (anointing)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞橄欖。橄欖樹的果子。橄欖樹的果子；果實長約二釐米，厚約一厘米多一點，果核堅硬，果皮柔軟，果肉多油；橄欖果實用作食物，橄欖油用來煮食、點燈、擦身，也可作藥用，以及在宗教儀式中使用（抹油）。olive

Terms.Localization: fruit of the olive tree; about 2 cm. long and a bit more than a cm thick with a hard stone inside and a soft skin that covers the oily flesh; used for food and oil for cooking, for lamps, for rubbing on the body, for medicine, and in religion (anointing)

Localization.Gloss: 以攔人（yǐ lán rén），《思》厄藍人。出生或居住在以攔本地的人。以攔是挪亞的孫子、閃的長子及其後裔的領土，即古代的以攔。Elamite; person from Elam

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Elam

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞撒（yǐ lì yà sā），《思》厄肋阿匝爾。耶穌家譜中的一員。Eleazar

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 發憐憫，憐憫，得憐憫。對於有極大需要的人給予憐憫或關懷。have, show, or receive mercy

Terms.Localization: to show kindness or concern for someone in serious need

Localization.Gloss: 可憐的。指值得同情，因為某人的境遇可憐。pitiful; be pitied

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being deserving of pity in view of one's miserable condition

Localization.Gloss: 發憐憫，憐憫，得憐憫。對於有極大需要的人給予憐憫或關懷。have, show, or receive mercy

Terms.Localization: to show kindness or concern for someone in serious need

Localization.Gloss: ＜所有＞仁慈的。對亟需幫助的人表示善意或關心。merciful

Terms.Localization: pertaining to showing kindness or concern for someone in serious need

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞敬（yǐ lì yà jìng），《思》厄里雅金。《馬太福音》記載耶穌家譜中的一員，亞比玉的兒子。Eliakim

Terms.Localization: the son of Abiud in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞敬（yǐ lì yà jìng），《思》厄里雅金。《路加福音》記載耶穌家譜中的一員，米利亞的兒子。Eliakim

Terms.Localization: the son of Melea in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 以利以謝（yǐ lì yǐ xiè），《思》厄里厄則爾。《路加福音》記載耶穌家譜中的一員。Eliezer

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 以律（yǐ lǜ），《思》厄里烏得。《馬太福音》記載耶穌家譜中的一員。Eliud

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 以利沙（yǐ lì shā），《思》厄里叟。沙法的兒子，公元前9世紀北國以色列的先知。他繼承以利亞為先知，其傳道工作約有50年，歷經幾朝君王，一生充滿神蹟。他也是先知團體的領袖。Elisha

Terms.Localization: a major OT prophet

Localization.Gloss: 伊利莎白（yī lì shā bái），《舊》以利沙伯，《思》依撒伯爾。施洗約翰的母親，撒迦利亞的妻子，亦是祭司家亞倫的後裔。Elizabeth

Terms.Localization: the wife of Zechariah the priest and mother of John the Baptist

Localization.Gloss: 希臘（xī là），《思》希臘。歐洲最東南的一個國家。公元前第8世紀開始，由許多城邦組成；到公元前第4世紀，馬其頓王腓利浦二世才統一各城邦。腓利浦二世的兒子亞歷山大繼承王位後，遠征埃及、伊朗和印度，建立了希臘帝國。Greece

Terms.Localization: Greece

Localization.Gloss: 希臘人（xī là rén）／說希臘話的猶太人（shuō xī là huà de yóu tài rén），《思》希臘化的猶太人／希臘人。有猶太血統但住在希臘、受希臘文化影響，又講希臘話的人，對比於說閃族語言的猶太人。Hellenist; Greek-speaking Jew

Terms.Localization: a Greek-speaking Jew in contrast to one speaking a Semitic language

Localization.Gloss: 希臘（文）（xī là (wén)），《思》希臘（文）。希臘文字；希臘語文。Greek (language)

Terms.Localization: in the Greek language, in Greek

Localization.Gloss: 希臘婦女；異教婦女。承襲希臘文化和語言的女人；引申義：身為希臘人而被視作異教徒的人。Greek woman; Gentile woman

Terms.Localization: a woman of Greek culture and language; or, by extension, a woman who is Greek, therefore a Gentile

Localization.Gloss: 以摩當（yǐ mó dāng），《思》厄耳瑪丹。《路加福音》記載耶穌家譜中的一員。Elmadam

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞希望，盼望；指望；仰望。滿懷信心地期待那美好和有益的。hope

Terms.Localization: to look forward with confidence to that which is good and beneficial

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞盼望，希望；所希望的。所盼望的。hope; what is hoped for

Terms.Localization: that which is hoped for

Localization.Gloss: 以呂馬（yǐ lǚ mǎ），《思》厄呂瑪。塞浦路斯的猶太術士，敵擋保羅。這個希臘名字的意思是「術士」，他的猶太名字是「巴耶穌」。Elymas

Terms.Localization: a magician of Cyprus

Localization.Gloss: 虛己；自願放棄一切，放棄自己所擁有的。通過放棄崇高身分或地位的所有特權，來完全除去該身分或地位的全部涵義。give up or lay aside what one possesses

Terms.Localization: to completely remove or eliminate elements of high status or rank by eliminating all privileges or prerogatives associated with such status or rank

Localization.Gloss: 以馬內利（yǐ mǎ nèi lì），《思》厄瑪奴耳。希伯來文音譯字，意為「上帝與我們同在」，源自舊約以賽亞書的預言，是給耶稣基督的名字。「以馬內利」成為了猶太教和基督教信徒的問安語。Emmanuel

Terms.Localization: a name attributed to Jesus Christ

Localization.Gloss: 以馬忤斯（yǐ mǎ wǔ sī），《思》厄瑪烏。離耶路撒冷不遠的一個猶太鄉鎮。Emmaus

Terms.Localization: a village in Judea, not far from Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 哈抹（hā mò），《思》哈摩爾。示劍的父親，亞伯拉罕向他的子孫買了一塊墳地；示劍人被稱為「哈抹的後裔」。Hamor

Terms.Localization: a man from whose sons Abraham bought a burial place

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞水族；魚。任何活在海裡的生物。sea creature; fish

Terms.Localization: any creature living in the sea

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞得榮耀，受尊重。成為得到極大尊榮的對象。be glorified, be honored

Terms.Localization: to be the object of great honor

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞建築材料。建造房屋所用的物料。building material

Terms.Localization: material used in the construction of buildings

Localization.Gloss: 吩咐，命令，囑付。發出明確的命令，暗示權威或官方的批准。to command

Terms.Localization: to give definite orders, implying authority or official sanction

Localization.Gloss: 誡命，吩咐，命令。權威的命令。commandment, order

Terms.Localization: that which is authoritatively commanded

Localization.Gloss: 以挪士（Yǐ nuó shì）；《思》厄諾士。耶穌家譜中的一員，是塞特的兒子，該南的父親。Enos

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 以諾（yǐ nuò），《思》哈諾客。耶穌家譜中的一員，是信心與順服的榜樣。亞當的七世孫，雅列之子，瑪土撒拉之父。Enoch

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus and an example of obedience and faith

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞買回，救贖，釋放。付出高昂的代價以取得某人的釋放或自由。redeem; set free

Terms.Localization: to cause the release or freedom of someone by a means which proves costly to the individual causing the release

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞拯救，救拔。從困境中把某人解救出來。rescue, deliver

Terms.Localization: to take someone out of a bad situation

Localization.Gloss: 使復活，使活過來。使人死而復活。raise (from the dead)

Terms.Localization: to cause someone who is dead to return to life

Localization.Gloss: 統治，治理，管轄。藉著行使權力來統治。be in authority; rule

Terms.Localization: to rule or reign by exercising authority over

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞權柄，權利；控制。控制或管治的權柄；控制某人或某事物的狀態。authority; control

Terms.Localization: the right to control or govern over; a state of control over someone or something

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞應許；所答應的（事物）；同意或決定，答應。所同意或批准的事情。a promise; agreement

Terms.Localization: the content of one's agreement or approval

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞應許；斷言，聲稱，宣稱。肯定地宣佈自己將會做的事。to promise; profess

Terms.Localization: to announce with certainty as to what one will do

Localization.Gloss: 以拜尼土（yǐ bài ní tǔ），《思》厄派乃托。在《羅馬書》16章的問安名單中出現的一個基督徒，他是小亞細亞第一個歸信主的人。Epaenetus

Terms.Localization: the first Christian in Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 以巴弗（yǐ bā fú），《思》厄帕夫辣。保羅的同工，曾和保羅一起坐牢。他是歌羅西教會的基督徒，在歌羅西、老底嘉和希拉坡里等城市辛勞工作。Epaphras

Terms.Localization: a Christian of Colossae

Localization.Gloss: 以巴弗提（yǐ bā fú tí），《思》厄帕洛狄托。腓立比教會的基督徒。當保羅在羅馬坐牢時，腓立比教會派以巴弗提把教會的禮物帶給保羅。Epaphroditus

Terms.Localization: a messenger sent to Paul from the Philippian church

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞應許。所應許的事情，承諾了的事情a promise

Terms.Localization: the content of what is promised

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞斗篷，外套，長袍。任何樣式的外衣。cloak; coat; robe

Terms.Localization: any type of outer garment

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞溫和的，謙讓的，和平的。形容仁慈寬容。gentle; forbearing; considerate

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being gracious and forbearing

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞慈祥，寬容，恩惠。仁慈寬容的品格。kindness; forbearance; graciousness

Terms.Localization: the quality of gracious forbearing

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞稱呼，命名；祈求，上訴。以一個人的屬性來談及這個人；叫喚名字。call upon, appeal to

Terms.Localization: to use an attribution in speaking of or to a person; to call by name

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞赦免，饒恕。使罪得赦免。forgive

Terms.Localization: to cause sin to be forgiven

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞決定，宣判。在思考的過程中得出結論，因而可以作出決定。decided

Terms.Localization: to come to a conclusion in the process of thinking and thus to be in a position to make a decision

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞渴望；切慕，渴慕。渴望某些東西，暗示意識到有缺乏。long for; desire deeply

Terms.Localization: to long for something, with the implication of recognizing a lack

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞肩負責任的職位；服事的職分。負責照顧某些人的人的職位。position of responsibility; position of service

Terms.Localization: the position of one who has responsibility for the care of someone

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞權柄，職權。指揮的權力或權柄。authority

Terms.Localization: the right or authority to command

Localization.Gloss: 斥責；責備。表達強烈反對某人。to rebuke, denounce

Terms.Localization: to express strong disapproval of someone

Localization.Gloss: 命令，吩咐，囑咐。命令某人做某時候，帶有威脅的意味。to command

Terms.Localization: to tell someone to do something, with the implication of a threat

Localization.Gloss: 膏抹，塗抹。擦上、塗抹藥膏或油之類的物質。anoint

Terms.Localization: to smear or rub on substances such as salve or oil ‎

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞布，補丁。縫在衣服上以遮蓋破洞的一塊布片。patch

Terms.Localization: a piece of cloth sewed on clothing to repair a hole or tear

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞監督，教會領袖，監護者。有責任去關心別人屬靈需要的人；在教會中作領袖的人。guardian, overseer; church leader

Terms.Localization: one who has the responsibility of caring for spiritual concerns; one who serves as a leader in a church

Localization.Gloss: 天上的，天空的；天體。位於天上的或與天空有關的；天空中的發光體：太陽、月亮，以及其他行星和恆星。heavenly body, celestial body

Terms.Localization: related to or located in the sky; the luminous objects in the sky: sun, moon, and other planets and stars

Localization.Gloss: 天上的，在天上，屬天的；從天上來的，從上帝來的。與天堂有關的或位於天上的；指源於上帝的。heavenly, in heaven; from heaven, from God

Terms.Localization: related to or located in heaven; pertaining to being derived from God

Localization.Gloss: 小山羊，雄山羊，山羊。單數詞是小山羊或雄山羊，複數詞是山羊（複數形式的時候，所指的就包括雄性和雌性山羊）。kid; he-goat; goat

Terms.Localization: kid, he-goat in the singular and goats in the plural (in the plural form both male and female goats are included in the reference)

Localization.Gloss: 黑馬（Hēi mǎ），《思》赫爾瑪。在《羅馬書》16章的問安名單中出現的基督徒。Hermas

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 希耳米（xī ěr mǐ），《思》赫爾默斯。希臘希臘的神，具有流利的口才，司商業、發明、運動及旅行。Hermes

Terms.Localization: a Greek god

Localization.Gloss: 黑米（hēi mǐ），《思》赫爾默斯。在《羅馬書》16章的問安名單中出現的一個基督徒。Hermes

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 黑摩其尼（hēi mó qí ní），《思》赫摩革乃。小亞細亞的基督徒領袖。Hermogenes

Terms.Localization: a Christian from Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞爬行動物，爬蟲，蛇。creeping animal; reptile; snake

Terms.Localization: general word for reptile that includes snakes and lizards

Localization.Gloss: 問；請求，要求。資料詢問；問問題；請求。ask; request

Terms.Localization: ask for information; ask a question; ask for

Localization.Gloss: 衣服；服裝。任何種類的衣服。clothing; apparel

Terms.Localization: any kind of clothing

Localization.Gloss: 以斯利（Yǐ sī lì），《思》厄斯理。耶穌家譜中的一員。Esli

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 沒藥調和的酒。加了沒藥的酒，用作麻醉藥。myrrhed wine

Terms.Localization: wine drugged with myrrh and used as a stupefying potion

Localization.Gloss: 沒藥調和的酒。加了沒藥的酒，用作麻醉藥。myrrhed wine

Terms.Localization: wine drugged with myrrh and used as a stupefying potion

Localization.Gloss: 希斯崙（Xī sī lún）；《思》赫茲龍。耶穌家譜中的一員。Hezron

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞配合錯誤，不相配者同負一軛。錯誤地或不協調地聯合在一起。be unequally yoked

Terms.Localization: to be wrongly or poorly matched in an association

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞傳好消息；傳福音。傳達關於耶穌的好消息。tell the good news; announce the gospel

Terms.Localization: to communicate the good news about Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞好消息；福音，佳音。關乎耶穌之好消息的內容。good news; gospel

Terms.Localization: the content of good news about Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞鼓起勇氣，得到鼓勵，保持喜樂。得到鼓勵，因此感到高興。be encouraged, cheerful, happy

Terms.Localization: to be or to become encouraged and hence cheerful

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞直的；正直的，對的。直的，與彎曲的對比；公正的和公義的。straight; upright

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being straight in contrast to what is crooked; pertaining to being just and right

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞公義。正直的品格。righteousness

Terms.Localization: the quality of uprightness

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞祝福，恩待，賜福；頌讚；感謝。祈求上帝給予恩惠，也暗示口頭祝福本身已經是一個極大的恩惠。bless (act.); be blessed (pass.); praise, give thanks

Terms.Localization: to ask God to bestow divine favor on, with the implication that the verbal act itself constitutes a significant benefit

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞受祝福的；配受讚美的，受頌讚的。指值得讚揚或表揚的。blessed; worthy of praise

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being worthy of praise or commendation

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞該受稱頌的那位。上帝的一個稱謂。Blessed One

Terms.Localization: a title that refers to God

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞福氣，恩典；頌讚，感謝。祝福的內容。blessing; praise

Terms.Localization: the content of the act of blessing

Localization.Gloss: 友妮基（yǒu nī jī），《舊》友尼基，《思》歐尼刻。提摩太的母親，本身是猶太人，嫁給了希臘人。Eunice

Terms.Localization: the mother of Timothy

Localization.Gloss: 友阿蝶（yǒu ā dié），《舊》友阿爹，《思》厄敖狄雅。腓立比教會的女基督徒，曾在福音的事工上與保羅同工。Euodia

Terms.Localization: a Christian woman in the church of Philippi

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞敬拜。用態度和禮儀來表明自己對神明的效忠和尊敬。to worship

Terms.Localization: to express in attitude and ritual one's allegiance to and regard for deity

Localization.Gloss: 幼發拉底（yòu fā lā dǐ），《舊》伯拉，《思》幼發拉的。美索不達米亞平原西界的一條大河，是亞洲西部最長的河流，約長2800公里。Euphrates

Terms.Localization: a major river in Mesopotamia

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞禱告，祈禱。向上帝說話或祈求的行為或內容。prayer

Terms.Localization: the act or content of speaking to or making requests of God

Localization.Gloss: 夏娃（xià wá），《思》厄娃。字音跟希伯來語的「生命」相近，是人類的先祖。Eve

Terms.Localization: ancestor of the human race

Localization.Gloss: 友布羅（yǒu bù luó），《思》歐步羅。羅馬的基督徒，保羅在《提摩太後書》中代他向提摩太問安。Eubulus

Terms.Localization: a Christian who sent greetings in 2 Timothy

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞富有同情心的，憐憫的，仁慈的。富有愛心和同情心的。tenderhearted

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being affectionate and compassionate

Localization.Gloss: 猶推古（yóu tuī gǔ），《思》厄烏提曷。在特羅亞聽保羅講道到半夜的少年人，他打盹的時候從三層樓的高處掉下來死了，後來保羅使他從死裡復活。Eutychus

Terms.Localization: a young man who fell out of a window in Troas

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞盼望，願意；祈求；禱告。向上帝說話或提出請求。to wish; pray

Terms.Localization: to speak to or to make requests of God

Localization.Gloss: 以弗所人（yǐ fú suǒ rén），《思》厄弗所人。以弗所本地的人，在以弗所居住或出生的人；或屬於以弗所的人。Ephesian; person from Ephesus

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Ephesus; or: pertaining to Ephesus

Localization.Gloss: 以法蓮（yǐ fǎ lián），《思》厄弗辣因。位置不確定的一個城鎮。以法蓮支族分得的土地，位於耶路撒冷北方的山區，在境內有伯特利、示劍等主要城市。Ephraim

Terms.Localization: a city of uncertain location

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞敵人，仇敵。與人為敵的。enemy

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being at enmity with someone

Localization.Gloss: 希伯（xī bó），《思》厄貝爾。耶穌家譜中的一員。是閃的後代，法勒和約坍的父親。Eber

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞復活。死而復活。resurrection

Terms.Localization: the event of coming back to life after having once died

Localization.Gloss: 國家，民族，人民。劃分全世界的人的最大單位，以他们所構成的社會政治群體為依據。nation; people

Terms.Localization: the largest unit into which the people of the world are divided on the basis of their constituting a socio-political community

Localization.Gloss: 外邦人，異教徒。不相信猶太教的人。Gentiles; heathen

Terms.Localization: those who do not belong to the Jewish community of faith

Localization.Gloss: 橄欖油。從橄欖樹果實中提取的油，可用作食物、藥物，用來點燈，或混合一些芳香的物質造成香水或香膏。olive oil

Terms.Localization: oil extracted from the fruit of olive trees, used as food; medicine; for burning in lamps; and as perfume when mixed with sweet-smelling substances

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞仁慈，憐憫。對於有極大需要的人給予憐憫或關懷。mercy

Terms.Localization: the act of showing kindness or concern for someone in serious need

Localization.Gloss: 希臘人；異教徒，非猶太人。歐洲東南部的古代民族。一個參與希臘文化並且會說希臘語的人，但不一定是個有希臘民族背景的人；引申義：因身為希臘人而被視作異教徒的人。Greek; Gentile, non-Jew

Terms.Localization: a person who participates in Greek culture and in so doing would speak the Greek language, but not necessarily a person of Greek ethnic background; or, by extension, a person who is Greek, therefore a Gentile

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞應該的，應得的；正義的，公正的。形容是正義的，因為是合理的和應得的。deserved; just

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being right as the result of being justified and deserved

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞榮耀的，榮美的，奇妙的，華麗的；有尊榮的，受敬重的。輝煌的、榮耀的；形容身分地位很高，受人尊崇和敬重。glorious; honorable

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being splendid or glorious; pertaining to high status, involving both honor and respect

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞衣服，服裝。任何種類的衣服。clothing; apparel

Terms.Localization: any kind of clothing

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞合法的；在法律之下的，受法律約束的。指依照法律的。lawful; within the law

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being in accordance with law

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞代求，代禱。代表其他人向某人說話。intercession

Terms.Localization: the act of speaking to someone on behalf of someone else

Localization.Gloss: 可能；許可的，准許的，允許的。標記某事件從通常意義上來說有可能發生。be possible; be permissible

Terms.Localization: to mark an event as being possible in a highly generic sense

Localization.Gloss: 合法的。必須履行的；合法的。be lawful

Terms.Localization: to be obligatory or required by law

Localization.Gloss: 宅地；房子；住宅。預期有人居住的物業，居住者具有物業的擁有權，或持有相關的法律契約。homestead; house; residence

Terms.Localization: property in which a person was expected to reside, either as the result of ownership or legal contract

Localization.Gloss: 以拉都（yǐ lā dū），《思》厄辣斯托。保羅的助手，和提摩太一起往馬其頓去。Erastus

Terms.Localization: a companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 以拉都（yǐ lā dū），《思》厄辣斯托。哥林多城內管銀庫的基督徒。Erastus

Terms.Localization: a city treasurer

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞小山羊；雄山羊；山羊。單數詞是小山羊或雄山羊，複數詞所指的就包括雄性和雌性山羊；常用作家庭膳食中肉類。kid; he-goat; goat

Terms.Localization: the young of a goat; kid he-goat in the singular and in the plural both male and female goats are included in the reference; commonly used to supply meat for household meals

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞鏡子。高度抛光的平面金屬，利用反射作用做成影像。mirror

Terms.Localization: a flat piece of highly polished metal used to reflect an image

Localization.Gloss: 以弗所（yǐ fú suǒ），《思》厄弗所。羅馬帝國亞細亞省的一個港口，是最大的城市，為商路的交匯地，當地教會是啟示錄作者致函的小亞細亞七個教會之一。Ephesus

Terms.Localization: a seaport in the western part of the Roman province of Asia

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞蛇，眼鏡蛇，毒蛇。各種有毒的蛇；令人聯想到潛伏的危險。asp; cobra; viper

Terms.Localization: a kind of venemous snake; associated with lurking danger

Localization.Gloss: 西布倫（xī bù lún），《思》則步隆。雅各和利亞所生的第六子，以色列其中一個支族的先祖；或：西布倫支族的領地。Zebulun

Terms.Localization: a son of Jacob and ancestor of an Israelite tribe; or: the territory of the tribe of Zebulun

Localization.Gloss: 撒該（sā gāi），《思》匝凱。耶利哥城一個很有錢的稅務長，身材矮小。Zacchaeus

Terms.Localization: a chief tax collector of Jericho

Localization.Gloss: 撒迦利亞（sā jiā lì yà），《思》匝加利亞。施洗約翰的父親，是祭司，熱心事奉上帝。Zechariah

Terms.Localization: a priest who was the father of John the Baptist

Localization.Gloss: 撒迦利亞（sā jiā lì yà），《思》則加黎雅。舊約時代，猶大王約阿施時期的一個先知（大約在公元前837-800年），是祭司耶何耶大的兒子。約阿施王不歡迎他的信息，於是命令群眾在聖殿內用石頭打死他。Zechariah

Terms.Localization: an OT prophet killed in the Temple

Localization.Gloss: 謝拉（xiè lā），《思》則辣黑。耶穌家譜中的一員，猶大從塔瑪生的雙生兄弟之一。Zerah

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞（縮寫為 ζῶ；＜過未完＞ἔζην）活，活著，生活；復活。活著或繼續或者；從死裡復活。to live; to come back to life

Terms.Localization: to be or continue to be alive; to come back to life after having once died

Localization.Gloss: 西庇太（xī bì tài），《思》載伯德。耶穌的門徒雅各和約翰的父親，是一名漁夫。Zebedee

Terms.Localization: the father of the apostles James and John

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞繩子。把物件（通常兩件）綁起來的用具。bands

Terms.Localization: an instrument for joining together objects (normally two)

Localization.Gloss: 宙斯（zhòu sī），《舊》丟斯，《思》則烏斯。希臘神話中的眾神之首。人們視他為雷電之神，負責掌管天氣。Zeus

Terms.Localization: the chief Greek deity

Localization.Gloss: 狂熱者，熱心的人。致力於某事並因此變得熱心的人。enthusiast, zealous person

Terms.Localization: one who is deeply committed to something and therefore zealous

Localization.Gloss: 奮銳黨，激進黨。某個猶太民族主義群體的成員，該群體尋求脫離羅馬統治而獨立。Zealot

Terms.Localization: a member of a Jewish nationalistic group seeking independence from Rome

Localization.Gloss: 西納（Xī nà），《思》則納。一位基督徒律師。Zenas

Terms.Localization: a Christian lawyer

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞忌恨；嫉妒。對某人特別強烈的怨恨和嫉妒情緒。resentment; jealousy

Terms.Localization: a particularly strong feeling of resentment and jealousy against someone

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞極度，激烈，劇烈，烈。在程度量表上的一個高點，暗示涉及強度。extremely, intensely, fierce

Terms.Localization: a high point on a scale of extent and implying intensity of involvement

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞毒麥，稗子（看似麥子）。一種極不受歡迎的野草，它看似麥子，但種子卻是有毒的。darnel grass

Terms.Localization: a particularly undesirable weed resembling wheat and possessing a seed which is poisonous

Localization.Gloss: 所羅巴伯（suǒ luó bā bó），《思》則魯巴貝耳。耶穌家譜中的一員，是被擄歸回時期、波斯大利烏王年間（公元前522-486年）的一個猶大省長。他回到耶路撒冷後，和大祭司約書亞一同負責重建聖殿的工作。Zerubbabel

Terms.Localization: a governor in postexilic Jerusalem who was mentioned in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞軛。一根橫木或一個木框，架在兩隻役畜頭上或頸上，讓牠們有效地拉動犁、耙，或運貨車。yoke

Terms.Localization: a bar or frame of wood by which two draft animals are joined at the head or neck in order to work together effectively in pulling a plow, harrow, or wagon

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞天平。用來稱物件的用具。balance scale

Terms.Localization: an instrument for weighing objects

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞生命。區別有生命軀體和死去的尸體的特性或力量。life

Terms.Localization: the quality or force that distinguishes animate bodies from dead ones

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞帶；腰帶。綁在腰間的皮帶或布帶，露在衣服外面。belt; girdle

Terms.Localization: a band of leather or cloth worn around the waist outside of one's clothing

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞保全，存活 ；賜給生命。使活著或使繼續或者。preserve; give life

Terms.Localization: to cause to live or continue to live

Localization.Gloss: 使活著；賜生命，帶來生命。使活著。make alive; give life

Terms.Localization: to cause to live

Localization.Gloss: 牲畜，野獸；動物。 任何動物，野生的或馴養的（對比於植物）。living creature; animal

Terms.Localization: any living creature, whether wild or domesticated (in contrast with plants)

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞活物。圍繞著上帝寶座的天上的活物，出現在《啟示錄》的異象中。living being

Terms.Localization: a supernatural being surrounding the throne of God in visions of the book of Revelation

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞薄荷。芳香植物（薄荷屬）；高達兩米；葉子細小柔軟，邊緣呈鋸齒狀；用於煮食、泡茶，或作藥用。mint

Terms.Localization: fragrant plant (genus Mentha); up to 2 m high; small, soft leaves with sawlike margins; used in cooking, tea, medicine

Localization.Gloss: 以利亞（yǐ lì yà），《思》厄里亞。公元前第九世紀，北國以色列亞哈王和亞哈謝王時代的先知。Elijah

Terms.Localization: a major OT prophet

Localization.Gloss: 希里（xī lǐ），《思》赫里。耶穌家譜中的一員。Heli

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 希律黨人。在政治上追隨和擁護大希律及其家族的人。Herodians

Terms.Localization: the political followers and adherents to Herod the Great and his family

Localization.Gloss: 希羅底（Xī luó dǐ）；《思》黑落狄雅。大希律的孫女，希律安提帕的妻子。Herodias

Terms.Localization: a granddaughter of Herod I and wife of Herod Antipas

Localization.Gloss: 希羅天（xī luó tiān），《思》黑落狄雍。在《羅馬書》16章的問安名單中出現的一個基督徒。Herodion

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 希律（xī lǜ），《思》黑落德。希律王，就是大希律。從公元前40年至4年統治加利利和撒馬利亞。Herod

Terms.Localization: Herod I, known as Herod the Great

Localization.Gloss: 希律（xī lǜ），《思》黑落德。希律安提帕，大希律的兒子，從公元前4年至公元39年統治加利利。把施洗約翰處決的希律就是他。Herod

Terms.Localization: Herod Antipas, son of Herod I, who had John the Baptist executed

Localization.Gloss: 希律（xī lǜ），《思》黑落德。希律亞基帕一世，大希律的孫子，公元41至44年統治巴勒斯坦。Herod

Terms.Localization: Herod Agrippa I, grandson of Herod I

Localization.Gloss: 以賽亞（yǐ sài yà），《思》依撒意亞。舊約時代一位重要的先知，名字的意義是：「耶和華是拯救者」。他大約在公元前742年烏西雅王至公元前701年希西家王統治期間，作南國猶大的先知。Isaiah

Terms.Localization: a major OT prophet

Localization.Gloss: 以掃（yǐ sǎo），《思》厄撒烏。以撒和利百加的長子，和雅各是雙胞胎兄弟，得父親的偏愛。Esau

Terms.Localization: a son of Isaac and the elder twin brother of Jacob

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞平安的，安寧的，和平的。形容安寧的、和平的狀態或態度。tranquil, quiet, peaceful

Terms.Localization: pertaining to a quiet, peaceful existence or attitude

Localization.Gloss: 珥（ěr），《思》厄爾。耶穌家譜中的一員。Er

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞釘子，大釘。一根細長的金屬（通常是鐵），其中一頭是削尖的（在《新約》中只用來指釘十字架的釘子）。nail, spike

Terms.Localization: a thin piece of metal (usually iron) sharpened on one end (in the NT used only in connection with nails employed in the crucifixion)

Localization.Gloss: 達太（dá tài），《思》達陡。耶穌的十二門徒之一，很可能就是雅各的兒子猶大。Thaddaeus

Terms.Localization: one of the twelve apostles

Localization.Gloss: 《現》塔瑪（tǎ mǎ），《和》她瑪（tā mǎ），《舊》他瑪，《思》塔瑪爾。雅各的兒子猶大的媳婦，耶穌家譜中的一員。Tamar

Terms.Localization: the daughter-in-law of Judah in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞勇敢；有勇氣；坦然無懼；充滿信心；放心；打起精神；鼓起勇氣。在危險和考驗面前有信心和堅定的目標。cheer up; have courage; be cheerful; be courageous

Terms.Localization: to have confidence and firmness of purpose in the face of danger or testing

Localization.Gloss: 他拉（tā lā），《思》特辣黑。亞伯拉罕的父親，耶穌家譜中的一員。Terah

Terms.Localization: the father of Abraham in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞女神。女性神明。goddess

Terms.Localization: a female deity

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞神祇，神性。上帝的本性或狀態。divinity

Terms.Localization: pertaining to having the nature of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞上帝的，神聖的。指有著上帝的本質。divine

Terms.Localization: pertaining to having the nature of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞立根基。鋪設或建造地基。lay a foundation; found something upon

Terms.Localization: to lay or construct a foundation

Localization.Gloss: 基石。用作建築物地基的石頭。foundation stone

Terms.Localization: a stone used in the construction of a foundation

Localization.Gloss: 根基。建築物的地基。foundation

Terms.Localization: that on which a structure is built

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞基礎，根基；基石。用作建築物地基的石頭。foundation stone

Terms.Localization: a stone used in the construction of a foundation

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞由上帝教導，受教於上帝。指由上帝教導。taught by God, instructed by God

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being taught by God

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞攻擊上帝的，敵對上帝，與上帝為敵。攻擊上帝的。opposing God

Terms.Localization: pertaining to fighting against God

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞虔誠的，敬虔的，敬拜上帝的。竭力正確地表達自己的宗教信仰。God-fearing, devout, pious

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being devoted to a proper expression of religious beliefs

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞敬虔，敬上帝；虔誠。對神明和超自然力量的適當信念並虔誠地履行相關義務。godly reverence; piety

Terms.Localization: appropriate beliefs and devout practice of obligations relating to supernatural persons and powers

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞憎恨上帝，憎恨上帝的人。形容對上帝存著恨意。God-hater

Terms.Localization: pertaining to hatred towards God

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞受上帝的靈感動的。指一種受上帝的靈感動而有的信息。God-breathed

Terms.Localization: pertaining to a communication which has been inspired by God

Localization.Gloss: 上帝。那唯一至高的超自然存在者，是宇宙的創造者和維持者。God

Terms.Localization: the one supreme supernatural being as creator and sustainer of the universe

Localization.Gloss: 神。撒但的稱號，它被稱為這個時代的神。god

Terms.Localization: a title applied to Satan as the god of this age

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞神格，神性。上帝的本性或狀態。godhead, divine nature

Terms.Localization: the nature or state of being God

Localization.Gloss: 提阿非羅（tí ā fēi luó），《思》德敖斐羅。一名德高望重的基督徒，《路加福音》和《使徒行傳》的受信人，其名字的意義為「上帝所愛的」或「上帝的朋友」。Theophilus

Terms.Localization: an important Christian to whom the books of Luke and Acts were dedicated; his names means: friend of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞家僕，僕人。在特定家庭中工作的一群僕人。group of servants

Terms.Localization: the group of servants working in a particular household

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞醫治，使痊愈，治療；照顧；服事，服務，供奉。使某人恢復健康，通常意味著照顧這樣的人；藉著履行某些職責來提供幫助，通常是一些卑微或低賤的工作。heal, cure, take care of; serve, render service, help

Terms.Localization: cause someone to recover health often with the implication of having taken care of such a person; render assistance or help by performing certain duties, often of a humble or menial nature

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞僕人。提供服務的人。servant

Terms.Localization: a person who renders service

Localization.Gloss: 帖撒羅尼迦人（tiē sā luó ní jiā rén）／帖撒羅尼迦的（tiē sā luó ní jiā de），《思》得撒洛尼人。在帖撒羅尼迦居住或出生的人。Thessalonican

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Thessalonica

Localization.Gloss: 帖撒羅尼迦（tiē sā luó ní jiā），《思》得撒洛尼。羅馬帝國統治下的馬其頓首府，原名是德瑪。Thessalonica

Terms.Localization: a city of Macedonia

Localization.Gloss: 杜達（dù dá），《舊》丟大，《思》特烏達。公元一世紀，加利利之猶大叛亂前的暴亂分子領袖。Theudas

Terms.Localization: a Jewish insurrectionist

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞戲園，戲院，劇場。相當大的露天建築物，通常呈半圓形，可容納數千人，經常用作公眾集會場地。theater

Terms.Localization: a rather large, normally semicircular open structure capable of seating several thousand people and often used for public assemblies

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞動物，野獸，走獸。任何四足動物，無論是野生的還是馴養的。animal; beast

Terms.Localization: any four-footed animal, either wild or domesticated

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞野獸，壞人，邪惡的人。（ θηρίον「（野）獸」的引申義）惡人，意指這種惡人既有害又危險。bad person; wicked person; evil beast

Terms.Localization: a figurative extension of the meaning of θηρίον (wild) animal: a bad person, in the sense of being both harmful and dangerous

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞野獸。敵基督，被描繪為危險的野獸。Beast

Terms.Localization: antichrist, depicted as a wild and dangerous animal

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞庫房。存放貴重物品的房間。storeroom

Terms.Localization: a room for the storage of valuables

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞寶盒。存放金錢或貴重物品的箱子。treasure box

Terms.Localization: a box in which valuables are stored

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞ 財寶，寶物，寶貝。具有非凡價值並保管穩妥的東西。treasure, wealth, riches

Terms.Localization: that which is of exceptional value and kept safe

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞刀鞘；護套。與刀劍形狀大小相約的盒子或袋子，用來保護和攜帶刀劍；用皮革、布、金屬，甚或木製成；連到肩帶或腰帶上，可以掛在肩膀或繫在腰間。sheath

Terms.Localization: a case or bag about the size and shape of a sword, used to cover and to carry the sword; made of leather, cloth, metal, or even wood; attached to a strap or belt that could be hung over the shoulder or tied around the waist

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞陷阱，圈套。用來誘捕動物（除雀鳥之外）的裝置。trap; snare

Terms.Localization: an device used for trapping, especially of animals other than birds

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞牲畜。馴養的四足動物，主要是牲畜。livestock; cattle

Terms.Localization: domesticated four-footed animals, primarily livestock

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞宗教，崇拜，虔誠。對神明和超自然力量的適當信念並虔誠地履行相關義務。veneration, piety

Terms.Localization: appropriate beliefs and devout practice of obligations relating to supernatural persons and powers

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞寶座。相對較大和設計精緻的座位，是統治者在正式場合上的尊座。throne

Terms.Localization: a relatively large and elaborate seat upon which a ruler sits on official occasions

Localization.Gloss: 推雅推喇（tuī yǎ tuī lǎ），《思》提雅提辣。位於呂底亞和每西亞邊界，士每拿東北的一個城鎮，以青銅和染織業著名，是啟示錄作者致函的小亞細亞七個教會之一。Thyatira

Terms.Localization: a city in Lydia

Localization.Gloss: 香爐；香壇。相對細小、用來焚香的祭壇；是木製的。incense altar

Terms.Localization: a relatively small altar used for burning incense; made of wood

Localization.Gloss: 香；香料。任何燃燒時會產生香味，因而為人所用的芳香物質（通常是樹脂）。incense

Terms.Localization: any aromatic substance (usually a resin) burned for its pleasing aroma

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞盾牌。矩形的長盾牌；在戰鬥中用來保護全身；用木、金屬、皮革繃在木上做成，或用木條或蘆葦條編織而成。shield

Terms.Localization: a long, oblong shield; used to protect the entire body in battle; made of wood, metal, leather stretched over wood, or plaited strips of wood or reeds

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞窗戶，窗口。牆壁上可以透光的開口，同時讓室內空氣流通，內外視野不受阻擋。window

Terms.Localization: an opening in a wall for the entrance of light and air and for the purpose of seeing in or out

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞或＜陰＞看門的人，門房。守衛通往房屋或建築物的門的人。doorkeeper

Terms.Localization: one who guards the door giving access to a house or building

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞祭壇。任何類型的聖壇或類似物體，人們在其上獻禮，然後舉行宗教儀式向神明表示敬意。altar

Terms.Localization: any type of altar or object where gifts may be placed and ritual observances carried out in honor of supernatural beings

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞犧牲，祭物；牲祭。用作獻祭的物品。sacrifice; offering

Terms.Localization: that which is offered as a sacrifice

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞香櫞木製的，香櫞木的。指由香櫞木製成的，或包含香櫞木的東西（即來自香櫞樹，一種針葉樹，如柏樹、松樹、雪松；樹高達九米；鱗狀葉，樹皮紅褐色，木質氣味芳香）。of citron wood

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being made or consisting of citron wood (that is, from a citron tree, a coniferous tree related to cypresses, pines, and cedars; up to 9 m high; scaly leaves, reddish brown bark, sweet-smelling wood)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞門，大門。房子或建築物的門，通常是複數形式，表明雙扇門或雙閘門。door; gate

Terms.Localization: the door to a house or building (often occurring in plural form and designating double doors or gates)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞門口；入口。通往房屋或建築物的入口。entrance; entranceway; portal

Terms.Localization: the entranceway into a building or structure

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞宰殺；獻祭。按照儀式宰殺祭牲來向神明獻祭。sacrifice

Terms.Localization: to slaughter an animal in a ritual manner as a sacrifice to deity

Localization.Gloss: 多馬（duō mǎ），《思》多默。耶穌的十二門徒之一，又名「低土馬」，希臘文的意思是「雙生子」。Thomas

Terms.Localization: one of the twelve apostles

Localization.Gloss: 雅各（yǎ gè），《思》雅各伯。以撒的兒子，以掃的孿生弟弟，以色列人的族長和先祖。Jacob

Terms.Localization: the patriarch Jacob, a son of Isaac

Localization.Gloss: 雅各（yǎ gè），《思》雅各伯。馬但的兒子，《馬太福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員。Jacob

Terms.Localization: the father of Ἰωσήφ (2) in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 《現》洋布雷（yáng bù léi），《和》佯庇（yáng bì），《思》楊布勒。在法老面前與雅尼一起對抗摩西的埃及術士。Jambres

Terms.Localization: an Egyptian sorcerer who together with Jannes opposed Moses before Pharaoh

Localization.Gloss: 雅拿（yǎ ná），《思》雅乃。耶穌家譜中的一員。Jannai

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 雅各（yǎ gè），《思》雅各伯。耶穌的十二門徒之一，是西庇太的兒子。他和兄弟約翰一起捕魚的時候蒙耶穌的呼召，並被取名為「半尼其」。James

Terms.Localization: one of the twelve apostles and the son of Zebedee and brother of John

Localization.Gloss: 雅各（yǎ gè），《思》雅各伯。耶穌的弟弟。耶穌在世的時候，他的兄弟似乎不是很活躍；但在耶穌復活以後，他們都進入了基督徒的行列中。James

Terms.Localization: a brother of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 雅各（yǎ gè），《思》雅各伯。耶穌的十二門徒之一，是亞勒腓的兒子。有學者認為，此雅各跟《馬太福音》27:56提到的「雅各和約瑟的母親馬利亞」中的雅各是同一人。James

Terms.Localization: the son of Alphaeus and one of the twelve apostles; some scholars consider (3) and (4) to be the same person

Localization.Gloss: 雅各（yǎ gè），《思》雅各伯。馬利亞的兒子，有時被稱為「小雅各」。有學者認為，此雅各跟《馬太福音》10:3提到的「亞勒腓的兒子雅各」是同一人。James

Terms.Localization: the son of Μαρία (4) and also called "the younger"; some scholars consider (3) and (4) to be the same person

Localization.Gloss: 雅各（yǎ gè），《思》雅各伯。耶穌的門徒猶大（不是賣主的加略人猶大）的父親。James

Terms.Localization: the father of Judas, one of the twelve apostles

Localization.Gloss: 雅尼（yǎ ní），《思》雅乃斯。在法老面前與洋布雷一起對抗摩西的埃及術士。Jannes

Terms.Localization: an Egyptian sorcerer who together with Jambres opposed Moses before Pharaoh

Localization.Gloss: 雅列（yǎ liè），《思》耶勒得。耶穌家譜中的一員，瑪勒列的兒子，以諾的父親。Jared

Terms.Localization: the father of Enoch in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 《現》葉魯（yè lǔ），《和》睚魯（yá lǔ），《思》雅依洛。一名會堂主管，耶穌使他的女兒從死裡復活。Jairus

Terms.Localization: a synagogue official

Localization.Gloss: 耶孫（yē sūn），《思》雅松。帖撒羅尼迦的一個基督徒，由於接待保羅和西拉而受到猶太人的攻擊。Jason

Terms.Localization: the host of Paul and Silas in Thessalonica

Localization.Gloss: 耶孫（yē sūn），《思》雅松。在《羅馬書》16章發出問安的一個人。Jason

Terms.Localization: a person who sends greetings in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 以土買（yǐ tǔ mǎi），《思》依杜默雅。在猶太地南部的山區，即舊約時代的以東。Idumea

Terms.Localization: a mountainous region south of Judea (Edom of the OT)

Localization.Gloss: 《現》耶洗碧（yē xĭ bì），《和》耶洗別（yē xǐ bié），《思》依則貝耳。腓尼基公主，西頓王謁巴力的女兒，北國以色列王亞哈的妻子。熱衷巴力崇拜，壓制打擊以色列人敬拜耶和華。Jezebel

Terms.Localization: King Ahab's notorious queen

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞祭司職分，祭司職位。擔任祭司的角色。priestly office, priesthood

Terms.Localization: the role of being a priest

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞執行祭司的職務，作祭司。作為祭司去進行宗教儀式和執行職務。serve as a priest, be a priest

Terms.Localization: to serve as a priest in the performance of religious rites and duties

Localization.Gloss: 希拉坡里（xī lā pō lǐ），《思》耶辣頗里。古代小亞細亞的重要城市，位於弗呂家，在今日土耳其的西南部，此處有保羅所認識的教會。Hierapolis

Terms.Localization: a city in Phrygia

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞祭司（集合名詞）。擔任祭司的角色。priesthood

Terms.Localization: the role of being a priest

Localization.Gloss: 耶利米（yē lì mǐ），《思》耶肋米亞。猶大末年最重要的先知之一。在猶大王約西亞十三年奉召為先知（公元前627年），作先知超過40年，直至耶路撒冷陷落（公元前587/6年）和被擄初期。Jeremiah

Terms.Localization: a major OT prophet

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞祭司。替別人舉行宗教儀式和執行職務的人。priest

Terms.Localization: one who performs religious rites and duties on behalf of others

Localization.Gloss: 耶利哥（yē lì gē），《思》耶里哥。猶太地的一個城市，位於死海北端不遠處。耶利哥在新舊約時代都是一個重要的城市，是南約旦河谷的古城，又稱為棕樹城。Jericho

Terms.Localization: a city in Judea, not far from the north end of the Dead Sea

Localization.Gloss: 耶路撒冷人（yē lù sā lěng rén），《思》耶路撒冷人。耶路撒冷的居民。Jerusalem (person from)

Terms.Localization: an inhabitant of Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 耶路撒冷（yē lù sā lěng），《思》耶路撒冷。指耶路撒冷城，包括其中的居民。字義為「平安之城」，位於迦南山區，古名耶布斯，大衛攻取之後，便以此為首都，取名為「大衛城」或「錫安」。新約時代，耶路撒冷更是猶太人的宗教中心。Jerusalem

Terms.Localization: the city of Jerusalem, including its inhabitants

Localization.Gloss: 耶路撒冷（yē lù sā lěng），《思》耶路撒冷。指將來天上的聖城耶路撒冷。Jerusalem

Terms.Localization: the heavenly Jerusalem of the future

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞作祭司，擔當神聖的職務。作為祭司去進行宗教儀式和執行職務。serve as a priest, administer in sacred service

Terms.Localization: to serve as a priest in the performance of religious rites and duties

Localization.Gloss: 聖殿。聖殿或聖所以及周圍的神聖區域。temple

Terms.Localization: a temple or sanctuary (ναός[a]) and the surrounding consecrated area

Localization.Gloss: 祭司職分；祭司職任。作祭司的角色。priesthood; priestly office

Terms.Localization: the role of being a priest

Localization.Gloss: 耶西（yē xī），《思》葉瑟。大衛的父親，耶穌家譜中的一員。他屬於猶大支族，住在伯特利附近。Jesse

Terms.Localization: the father of King David in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 耶弗他（yē fú tā），《思》依弗大。以色列的士師，基列的勇士。他是妓女所生，因此被同父異母的兄弟趕出家門。Jephthah

Terms.Localization: one of the judges of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 《現》約雅斤（yuē yǎ jīn），《和》耶哥尼雅（yē gē ní yǎ），《思》耶苛尼雅。耶穌家譜中的一員，猶大國的一個王。Jechoniah

Terms.Localization: a king of Judah mentioned in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 耶穌（yē sū），《思》耶穌。拿撒勒的耶穌基督。新約的中心人物，他的生、死，和復活，是上帝為拯救罪人而有的行動。Jesus

Terms.Localization: Jesus Christ of Nazareth

Localization.Gloss: 約細（yuē xì），《思》耶蘇。耶穌家譜中的一員，以利以謝的兒子。Joshua

Terms.Localization: the son of Eliezer mentioned in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 耶數（yē shù），《思》耶穌。保羅的同伴，別名是猶士都。Jesus

Terms.Localization: an additional name assigned to Justus, a companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 約書亞（yuē shū yà），《思》若蘇厄。摩西的繼承人。以法蓮人，嫩的兒子，原名「何西阿」，摩西稱他為約書亞。Joshua

Terms.Localization: Joshua, the successor of Moses

Localization.Gloss: 以哥念（yǐ gē niàn），《思》依科尼雍。羅馬帝國加拉太省的一座城，位於呂高尼，在現今土耳其境內。Iconium

Terms.Localization: a city in Lycaonia

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞罪得赦免的方法，挽回祭，贖罪祭。罪得赦免的方法。the means of forgiveness, propitiation, expiation

Terms.Localization: the means by which sins are forgiven

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞罪得赦免的方法；赦罪的地方。罪得赦免的方法；罪得赦免的地點或地方（傳統的譯本作施恩座）。propitiation; place where sins are forgiven

Terms.Localization: the means by which sins are forgiven; the location or place where sins are forgiven (in traditional translations rendered mercy seat)

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞仁慈，憐憫；赦免。對處在困境中的人表示同情和關切，儘管那人犯了道德方面的罪。have mercy; forgive

Terms.Localization: to show compassion and concern for someone in difficulty, despite that persons having committed a moral offense

Localization.Gloss: 以利哩古（yǐ lì lǐ gǔ），《思》依里黎苛。馬其頓北部的地區，羅馬帝國的一個省份，在今日的前南斯拉夫和阿爾巴尼亞境內。Illyricum

Terms.Localization: a district to the north of Macedonia

Localization.Gloss: 衣服；服裝。任何種類的衣服。clothing; apparel

Terms.Localization: any kind of clothing

Localization.Gloss: 帶子；鞋帶。皮帶（用作涼鞋或鞋的繫帶，或用作鞭子的皮條）。strap; thong

Terms.Localization: leather strap or thong (used in binding sandals or shoes and as thongs in a whip)

Localization.Gloss: 衣服；服裝。任何種類的衣服。clothing; apparel

Terms.Localization: any kind of clothing

Localization.Gloss: 斗篷；外套；長袍。任何類型的外衣。cloak; coat; robe

Terms.Localization: any type of outer garment

Localization.Gloss: 約旦河；《和》《思》約但河。約旦河從加利利海的北邊流下，流過加利利海，又穿過約旦河谷，最後流入的死海。Jordan River

Terms.Localization: river that flows through the Sea of Galilee into the Dead Sea

Localization.Gloss: 猶太（yóu tài），《思》猶大／猶太。巴勒斯坦的南部，大部分是山區，東部是沙漠。由於耶路撒冷位於猶太，這地因而成為猶太人生活的中心。或指猶太民族居住的較廣闊的地區。Judea

Terms.Localization: the southern part of Palestine, or: the wider region occupied by the Jewish nation

Localization.Gloss: 猶太（yóu tài），《思》猶太。屬於猶太的；與猶太有關的。Judean

Terms.Localization: pertaining to Judea

Localization.Gloss: 猶太人（yóu tài rén），《思》猶太人。種族名稱，指屬於猶太民族的人。《新約》常用οἱ Ἰουδαῖοι這術語來指猶太人民、耶路撒冷和周圍地區的居民、耶路撒冷的當權者，甚至是與耶穌敵對的人。Jew

Terms.Localization: the ethnic name of a person who belongs to the Jewish nation. In NT usage the reference of the term οἱ Ἰουδαῖοι may be either the Jewish people as such, the inhabitants of Jerusalem and environs, the authorities in Jerusalem, or even the people hostile to Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 猶太人（yóu tài rén）／猶太化（yóu tài huà），《思》猶太人／猶太化。與猶太民族有關的。猶太人原指王國時期南國猶大的人民，由猶大支派和便雅憫支派組成。到了被擄之後和新約時代，猶太人是指被擄歸回者的後裔，和散居在各地的以色列人。Jewish

Terms.Localization: pertaining to the Jewish nation

Localization.Gloss: 像猶太人的，以猶太人的方式的。與猶太民族有關的。like a Jew, in a Jewish manner

Terms.Localization: pertaining to the Jewish nation

Localization.Gloss: 猶利亞（Yóu lì yà）；《思》猶里雅。在《羅馬書》的問安名單出現的一名女信徒。Julia

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 猶尼亞（yóu ní yà），《思》猶尼雅。在《羅馬書》16章的問安名單中出現的一名猶太基督徒。Junias

Terms.Localization: a Jewish Christian greeted in Romans 16
