Localization.Gloss: 猶大（yóu dà），《思》猶達斯。耶穌十二門徒之一，來自加略城。在門徒之中，他是負責管理錢財的。猶大為了金錢出賣耶穌，事後又後悔，上吊自殺。Judas

Terms.Localization: Judas Iscariot, the betrayer of Jesus and one of the twelve apostles

Localization.Gloss: 猶大（yóu dà），《思》猶大。猶大支族的領土，界於鹽海和地中海岸的非利士人地區之間，其中主要城市有耶路撒冷、希伯崙，和伯利恆。Judah

Terms.Localization: the territory of the tribe of Judah

Localization.Gloss: 猶大（yóu dà），《思》猶達。雅各的兒子，耶穌十二門徒之一。Judas

Terms.Localization: Judas the son of James, and one of the twelve apostles

Localization.Gloss: 猶大（yóu dà），《思》猶達。耶穌的弟弟。Judas, Jude

Terms.Localization: Judas, Jude, a brother of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 猶大（yóu dà），《思》猶大。居於大馬士革直街的一個人，保羅在路上遇見主之後去到大馬士革，便住在他的家中。Judas

Terms.Localization: Judas, Paul’s host in Damascus

Localization.Gloss: 猶大（yóu dà），《思》猶達。別號巴撒巴，是耶路撒冷教會的領袖。耶路撒冷教會差派他和西拉代表教會，一同與保羅和巴拿巴往安提阿去視察。Judas

Terms.Localization: Judas, called Barsabbas, a leading Christian in Jerusalem and a companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 猶大（yóu dà），《思》猶達。加利利的猶大，在公元7年，居里扭進行人口普查時造反的革命領袖。Judas

Terms.Localization: Judas, a revolutionary leader

Localization.Gloss: 猶大（yóu dà），《思》猶達。耶穌家譜中的一員。Judah

Terms.Localization: Judah, a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 猶大（yóu dà），《思》猶大。耶穌家譜中的一員，雅各的兒子，以色列猶大支族的先祖。Judah

Terms.Localization: Judah, a son of Jacob in the genealogy of Jesus and an ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 猶大（yóu dà），《思》猶大。猶大支族。Judah

Terms.Localization: the tribe Judah

Localization.Gloss: 猶流（yóu liú），《思》猶里約。御營的羅馬軍官。Julius

Terms.Localization: a Roman centurion

Localization.Gloss: 猶士都（yóu shì dū），《思》猶斯托。別號巴撒巴，名叫約瑟，與馬提亞同被提名為使徒的繼任人。Justus

Terms.Localization: an additional name of Joseph Barsabbas, one of two candidates for the place of Judas Iscariot

Localization.Gloss: 猶士都（yóu shì dū），《思》猶斯托。提多猶士都，哥林多的猶太歸信者。Justus

Terms.Localization: an additional name of Titius, a Jewish proselyte

Localization.Gloss: 猶士都（yóu shì dū），《思》猶斯托。耶數的別名；保羅的同伴。Justus

Terms.Localization: Jesus called Justus, a companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 約帕（yuē pà），《思》約培。巴勒斯坦沿岸的一個港口，今稱「耶法」。有一段時期，約帕曾是地中海地區唯一的港口，此城距離耶路撒冷約56公里，也作為耶路撒冷的港口。Joppa; Jaffa

Terms.Localization: a seaport on the coast of Palestine

Localization.Gloss: 以撒（yǐ sā），《思》依撒格。字義「笑聲」，他是亞伯拉罕一百歲、撒拉九十歲時所生的兒子，是雅各和以掃的父親。Isaac

Terms.Localization: a son of Abraham and father of Jacob and Esau

Localization.Gloss: 加略人（jiā luè rén），《思》依斯加略人。這名稱用以識別出賣耶穌的猶大（可能是根據一個地方名）。Iscariot

Terms.Localization: an identifying name (probably based on a place name) of Judas, the betrayer of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞同心的。有相同想法或態度的。likeminded

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being of the same mind or attitude

Localization.Gloss: 《現》以色列人（yǐ sè liè rén）／以色列同胞（yǐ sè liè tóng bāo）／上帝的選民（shànɡ dì de xuǎn mín），《和》以色列人（yǐ sè liè rén），《思》以色列人。種族名稱，指屬於以色列民族的人。Israelite

Terms.Localization: the ethnic name of a person belonging to the nation of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 以色列（yǐ sè liè），《思》以色列。即先祖雅各；上帝給雅各起的另一個名字。Israel

Terms.Localization: the patriarch Jacob

Localization.Gloss: 以色列（yǐ sè liè），《思》以色列。以色列民族，雅各和他十二個兒子的後裔。他們被稱為上帝的百姓或以色列民。Israel

Terms.Localization: the nation of Israel

Localization.Gloss: 上帝的子民／上帝的選民（shàng dì de zǐ mín/shàng dì de xuǎn mín），《和》以色列人／以色列民（yǐ sè liè rén/yǐ sè liè mín），《思》真以色列人／新以色列。基督徒，比喻為真正的以色列人。Israel

Terms.Localization: a figurative reference to Christians as the true Israel

Localization.Gloss: 以薩迦（yǐ sà jiā），《思》依撒加爾。利亞給雅各生的第五個兒子，以色列十二支族的祖先之一。Issachar

Terms.Localization: a son of Jacob and ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 有力氣；有足夠力量去做。身體足夠強壯去做某事。have power, be strong enough to

Terms.Localization: to be physically strong enough for some purpose

Localization.Gloss: 健康的。健康的狀態，有健壯和充滿活力的含義。be healthy

Terms.Localization: a state of being healthy, with the implication of robustness and vigor

Localization.Gloss: 能，能夠。具有做或經歷某事的特殊個人能力。be able to, be capable of

Terms.Localization: to have special personal ability to do or experience something

Localization.Gloss: 意大利的。屬於意大利的，與意大利有關的。Italian

Terms.Localization: pertaining to Italy

Localization.Gloss: 意大利（yì dà lì），《舊》義大利，《思》意大利。新約時代，意大利隸屬羅馬帝國，境內的羅馬城是當時的世界中心。其他的城鎮有利基翁、部丟利、亞比烏和三館。Italy

Terms.Localization: Italy

Localization.Gloss: 以土利亞（省）（yǐ tǔ lì yà (shĕng)），《思》依突勒雅（省）。與以土利亞有關的；以土利亞是羅馬帝國的一省，希律的兄弟分封王腓力的屬地，在加利利湖的東北。Ituraean

Terms.Localization: pertaining to Ituraea

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞小魚。ἰχθύς「魚」的指小詞，指任何比較小的魚。small fish

Terms.Localization: diminutive of ἰχθύς fish: any kind of relatively small fish

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞魚。任何冷血水生脊椎動物的統稱，有鰓，通常有鰭，細長的身體上有鱗片；重要的食物來源。fish

Terms.Localization: general word for various cold-blooded, aquatic vertebrates, having gills, usually fins, and typically an elongated body covered with scales; important source of food

Localization.Gloss: 約坦（yuē tǎn），《思》約堂。耶穌家譜中的一員。猶大王（約公元前750-734年），在位十六年，行上帝眼中看為正的事。Jotham

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 約亞拿（yuē yà ná），《思》約哈南。耶穌家譜中的一員。Joanan

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 《現》約亞娜（yuē yà nà），《和》約亞拿（yuē yà ná），《思》約安納。希律安提帕官邸的官員苦撒的妻子。Joanna

Terms.Localization: the wife of Chuza, an official of Herod Antipas

Localization.Gloss: 約翰（yuē hàn），《思》若翰。施洗者約翰，他住在約旦河的曠野，傳揚上帝國的臨近和悔改赦罪的信息，並且給人施洗。John

Terms.Localization: John the Baptist

Localization.Gloss: 約翰（yuē hàn），《思》若望。耶穌的十二門徒之一，他是西庇太的兒子。約翰和兄弟雅各在打魚的時候，蒙耶穌呼召，跟從了他。John

Terms.Localization: one of the twelve apostles and the son of Zebedee and brother of James; some persons consider (2) and (3) to be the same

Localization.Gloss: 約翰（yuē hàn），《思》若望。教會傳統認為，約翰是《約翰福音》、《約翰書信》和《啟示錄》的作者。John

Terms.Localization: the author of the book of Revelation; some consider (2) and (3) to be the same

Localization.Gloss: 約翰（yuē hàn），《思》若望。約翰‧馬可，保羅的同工馬可的別稱。John

Terms.Localization: a companion of Paul who was also called Mark

Localization.Gloss: 約翰（yuē hàn），《思》若望。西門彼得和安德烈的父親。John

Terms.Localization: the father of Peter and Andrew

Localization.Gloss: 約翰（yuē hàn），《思》若望。猶太議會的成員，一同在議會中審訊使徒。John

Terms.Localization: a member of the Sanhedrin

Localization.Gloss: 俄備得（é bèi dé），《思》敖貝得。耶穌家譜中的一員，波阿斯和路得的兒子，耶西的父親，大衞的祖父。Obed

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 約大（yuē dà），《和》猶大（yóu dà），《思》約達。《路加福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員，約亞拿的兒子。Joda

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 約珥（yuē ěr），《思》岳厄爾。毘土珥的兒子。舊約的先知，在南國猶大發預言。Joel

Terms.Localization: an OT prophet

Localization.Gloss: 約南（yuē nán），《思》約南。以利亞敬的兒子，《路加福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員。Jonam

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 約拿（yuē ná），《思》約納。迦特希弗人亞米太的兒子，耶羅波安二世時期北國以色列的先知。他約在公元前8世紀早期作先知。Jonah

Terms.Localization: an OT prophet

Localization.Gloss: 約蘭（yuē lán），《思》約蘭。猶大王（約公元前849-842年），耶穌家譜中的一員。Joram

Terms.Localization: a king of Judah mentioned in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 約令（yuē lìng），《思》約楞。瑪塔的兒子，《路加福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員。Jorim

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 約沙法（yuē shā fǎ），《思》約沙法特。耶穌家譜中的一員。南國猶大的君王（約公元前873-849年在位），統治25年。在位期間，他加強猶大的防禦工作，與以色列締結和約，除去國內的異教作風，派遣教師往各地教導摩西律法。Jehoshaphat

Terms.Localization: a king of Judah mentioned in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 約瑟（yuē sè），《思》若瑟。雅各和拉結所生的兒子，以色列其中一個支族的先祖。Joseph

Terms.Localization: a son of Jacob and ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 約瑟（yuē sè），《思》若瑟。耶穌的母親馬利亞的丈夫。Joseph

Terms.Localization: the husband of Mary the mother of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 約瑟（yuē sè），《思》若瑟。亞利馬太人，耶穌的門徒，猶太議會的成員；耶穌被埋葬在他的新墳墓裡。Joseph

Terms.Localization: a person from Arimathea who was a member of the Sanhedrin

Localization.Gloss: 《現》約瑟（yuē sè），《和》約西（yuē xī），《思》若瑟。耶穌的兄弟。Joseph

Terms.Localization: a brother of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 約瑟（yuē sè），《思》若瑟。又名巴拿巴，是在塞浦路斯出生的利未人。Joseph

Terms.Localization: a Levite from Cyprus, also called Barnabas

Localization.Gloss: 約瑟（yuē sè），《思》若瑟。初期教會的信徒，是繼承加略人猶大的使徒位置的侯選人之一。他的家族名字是巴撒巴，他又稱為猶士都。Joseph

Terms.Localization: a man whose family name was Barsabbas and who was also called Justus; he was one of two candidates for the place of Judas Iscariot

Localization.Gloss: 《現》約瑟（yuē sè），《和》約西（yuē xī），《思》若瑟。馬利亞的兒子，小雅各的兄弟。Joseph

Terms.Localization: a son of Mary (Μαρία 4)

Localization.Gloss: 約瑟（yuē sè），《思》約色夫。《路加福音》之耶穌家譜所記載的兩個人。Joseph

Terms.Localization: persons mentioned in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 《現》約色克（yuē sè kè），《和》約瑟（yuē sè），《思》約色黑。《路加福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員。Josech

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 《現》約瑟（yuē sè），《和》約西（yuē xī），《思》若瑟。耶穌的弟弟。Joses

Terms.Localization: a brother of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 《現》約瑟（yuē sè），《和》約西（yuē xī），《思》若瑟。小雅各的兄弟，馬利亞的兒子，這位馬利亞是在耶穌釘十字架的現場的婦女之一。Joses

Terms.Localization: a brother of James the younger

Localization.Gloss: 約西亞（yuē xī yà），《思》約史雅。耶穌家譜中的一員。南國猶大的王，在宗教上大行改革，把亞述的偶像從聖殿中除去；在政治上也有顯著的成就。Josiah

Terms.Localization: a king of Judah mentioned in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 約伯（yuē bó），《思》約伯。烏斯地的一個義人，因遭撒但攻擊而遇到家庭慘變及身體病患的極大苦楚。他與朋友對苦罪的問題的爭辯，構成了舊約聖經《約伯記》的主要篇幅。Job

Terms.Localization: the central figure of the book of Job

Localization.Gloss: 仁慈的，憐憫人的。表示憐憫。merciful

Terms.Localization: pertaining to showing mercy

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞馬。大型家養單蹄四足動物；比今天的馬矮而粗壯，頭較短，脖子較粗；高約 122-142 釐米，身長約有 2.1 米；毛色從深棕色至淺棕色不等；素食動物；用於戰場上，可以乘騎，也可以拉戰車；象徵軍事實力；與太陽相提並論，據說太陽是乘著戰車橫越天空的。horse

Terms.Localization: large domesticated solid-hoofed quadraped; Equus caballus; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; coat varies from dark to pale brown; eats plants; used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot

Localization.Gloss: 該亞法（gāi yà fǎ），《思》蓋法。公元18年，羅馬總督所任命的大祭司，在耶穌的定罪中起重要作用，又逼迫初期教會。Caiaphas

Terms.Localization: the high priest who played a prominent role in the condemnation of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞潔淨，潔淨禮。使某物變得潔淨；除去禮儀上的污穢或不潔。cleansing; purification

Terms.Localization: the action of causing something to become clean; the action of cleansing from ritual contamination or impurity

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞潔淨，洗淨，使潔淨。使某物變得潔淨；除去禮儀上的污穢或不潔。cleanse; be cleansed; purify, be purified

Terms.Localization: to cause something to become clean; to cleanse from ritual contamination or impurity

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞潔淨的，乾淨的；純潔的，無罪的。形容不骯髒的；在禮儀上是潔淨的或純潔的。clean; pure, innocent

Terms.Localization: pertaining to not being dirty; pertaining to being ritually clean or pure

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞純潔，潔淨。除去禮儀上的污穢或不潔。purity

Terms.Localization: a state of being cleansed of ritual contamination

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞座位；凳子；椅子。用來坐的家具；款式形狀和製作材料差別很大；通常是木製或藤製的框架，座椅用蘆葦編織，或由木材製成；有靠背或沒有靠背。seat; stool; chair

Terms.Localization: a piece of furniture used for sitting; differs widely in shape and materials; often made of a wooden or cane frame with the seat woven of reeds or made of wood; with or without a back

Localization.Gloss: 凱撒利亞·腓立比。位於黑門山山腳的凱撒利亞·腓立比。Caesarea Philippi

Terms.Localization: Caesarea Philippi, at the foot of Mount Hermon, named by Philip-2

Localization.Gloss: 凱撒利亞；《和》該撒利亞；《思》凱撒勒雅。巴勒斯坦沿岸、迦密山以南的凱撒利亞。Caesarea

Terms.Localization: Caesarea on the coast of Palestine, south of Mount Carmel

Localization.Gloss: 凱撒；《和》該撒。一個拉丁詞的希臘語翻譯，用作羅馬皇帝的名字和頭銜。Caesar; the Emperor

Terms.Localization: a title for the Roman Emperor

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞稻草，茅草，禾稭。穀物或蘆葦的乾莖。straw; thatch

Terms.Localization: the dry stalks of grain or reeds

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞受栽培的好橄欖樹。為收穫果實而培植的橄欖樹。cultivated olive tree

Terms.Localization: an olive tree that is cultivated for its fruit

Localization.Gloss: 佳澳（jiā ào），《思》良港。克里特島南部海岸的一個海灣，保羅被押往羅馬途中乘船經過這裡。Fair Havens

Terms.Localization: a bay on the south coast of Crete

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞誠實的；美好的。指積極的道德品質，有得到積極評價的含意。honest; good

Terms.Localization: pertaining to a positive moral quality, with the implication of being favorably valued

Localization.Gloss: 《現》激進黨（jī jìn dǎng），《和》奮銳黨（fèn ruì dǎng），《思》熱誠者。某個猶太民族主義群體的成員，該群體尋求脫離羅馬統治而獨立。Cananaean = Zealot

Terms.Localization: a member of a Jewish nationalistic group seeking independence from Rome

Localization.Gloss: 該南（gāi nán），《思》刻南。亞法撒的兒子，《路加福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員。Cainan

Terms.Localization: the son of Arphaxad in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 該南（gāi nán），《思》刻南。以挪士的兒子，《路加福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員。Cainan

Terms.Localization: the son of Enos in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 迦拿（jiā ná），《思》加納。新約時代，加利利的一個村莊，位於拿撒勒以北大約13公里的地方。Cana

Terms.Localization: a city in Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 甘大基（gān dà jī），《舊》干大基，《思》甘達刻。埃塞俄比亞女王的頭銜；有人認為這是埃塞俄比亞女王的名字。Candace

Terms.Localization: title of the queen of Ethiopia: the Candace, the female ruler of Ethiopia; interpreted by some as the name of the queen of Ethiopia

Localization.Gloss: 加帕多家（jiā pà duō jiā），《思》卡帕多細雅。新約時代，羅馬帝國的一個省份，位於加拉太的東部，在中亞細亞和黑海港口之間，是商隊的必經之地。Cappadocia

Terms.Localization: a province in the interior of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞知道人心的；洞察人心的。（直譯：知道心裡面的事）知道別人想法的人。knower of hearts

Terms.Localization: one who knows what someone else thinks (literally to know what is in the heart)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞心，內心；心意；心志。καρδία「心」的引申義）一個人心理生活各個方面的成因來源，但特別強調思想方面。heart, inner self, mind

Terms.Localization: (a figurative extension of the meaning of καρδία heart) the causative source of a person's psychological life in its various aspects, but with special emphasis upon thoughts

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞譴責，指責，責備。判斷某事是壞的。condemn

Terms.Localization: to judge something to be bad

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞譴責，定罪。判決某人確實有罪，因此要受刑罰。condemn

Terms.Localization: to judge someone as definitely guilty and thus subject to punishment

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞判刑，定罪。宣判某人確實有罪，因此要受刑罰。sentence of condemnation

Terms.Localization: the act of declaring someone as definitely guilty and thus subject to punishment

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞控制；使某人屈從於；使受奴役。控制某人，使這人屈從於自己的利益。gain control over, cause to someone to be subservient

Terms.Localization: to gain control over someone and thus make such an individual subservient to one's own interests

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞定罪；被判定有罪。判決某人確實有罪，因此要受刑罰。condemn; be condemned (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to judge someone as definitely guilty and thus subject to punishment

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞和解；和好。在人際關係受到擾亂或破壞後，重新建立恰當的友好關係。reconciliation

Terms.Localization: the reestablishment of proper friendly interpersonal relations after these have been disrupted or broken

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞和解；和好，復和。在人際關係受到擾亂或破壞後，重新建立恰當的友好關係。reconcile; be reconciled (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to reestablish proper friendly interpersonal relations after these have been disrupted or broken

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞帷幕；門簾；幔子。懸掛在進出通道上的布簾。drape; curtain; veil

Terms.Localization: a hanging of cloth over an opening

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞搭窩，棲息。（「窩」的衍生詞）搭窩（或尋找棲身之所）。to nest

Terms.Localization: (derivative of κατασκήνωσις nest) to make a nest (or possibly to find shelter)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞巢，窩。雀鳥搭建的居所，用來孵卵和養育雛鳥 。nest

Terms.Localization: a construction built by birds in connection with brooding and raising their young

Localization.Gloss: 封上；加封條；使安全。用封條封上或使某物安全牢固。to seal; put a seal on; make secure

Terms.Localization: to use a seal to close or to make something secure

Localization.Gloss: 定罪，被判有罪。判決某人確實有罪，因此要受刑罰。condemnation

Terms.Localization: the act of judging someone as definitely guilty and thus subject to punishment

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞定罪，譴責。判決某人確實有罪，因此要受刑罰。condemnation

Terms.Localization: the act of judging someone as definitely guilty and thus subject to punishment

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞客棧。供旅客住宿的地方。inn

Terms.Localization: a place for the lodging of travellers

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞房間，客房，飯廳。在頗為大的建築物（可能是客棧）內的一個房間，可以用作飯廳。room; quarters; dining room

Terms.Localization: a room in a relatively large structure (possibly an inn), which could serve as a dining room

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞充滿偶像的。指有許多偶像。full of idols

Terms.Localization: pertaining to numerous idols

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞管轄，支配。藉著行使權力來統治 。be in authority; rule

Terms.Localization: to rule or reign by exercising authority over

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞祝福。祈求上帝給予恩惠，也暗示口頭祝福本身已經是一個極大的恩惠。bless

Terms.Localization: to ask God to bestow divine favor on, with the implication that the verbal act itself constitutes a significant benefit

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞控告者。作為控告者的撒但。Accuser

Terms.Localization: Satan, as one who brings accusations against

Localization.Gloss: 高大（gāo dà），《思》克勞達。克里特島南面的一個小島。Cauda

Terms.Localization: a small island south of Crete

Localization.Gloss: 迦百農（jiā bǎi nóng），《思》葛法翁。加利利湖西北岸的一個城。這地方有羅馬軍隊駐守，在貫通東西的公路上設有收稅站。Capernaum

Terms.Localization: a city on the Lake of Galilee

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞蘆葦。長得高而直的草或莎草；生長在河邊及沼澤內或沼澤附近。reed

Terms.Localization: a tall straight grass or sedge; growing in or near rivers and marshes

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞蘆葦。蘆葦的莖部。reed

Terms.Localization: the stalk of a reed plant

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞筆。經過切削的蘆葦桿，蘸墨後可以在紙張或羊皮等物料上書寫；長度約為二十釐米，其中一頭是削尖的。pen

Terms.Localization: a reed especially cut for making marks with ink on writing material; abou 20 cm long, sharpened on one end

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞測量桿。一根用來量度的桿（可能是一根蘆葦）。measuring rod

Terms.Localization: a rod (possibly a reed) used for measuring length

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞帕子，面紗。蒙在臉上的透薄布料，蒙臉的人仍然看得見東西，但別人卻看不清其面貌。veil

Terms.Localization: a piece of material worn over the face, thin enough for the wearer to see through, but not for observers to recognize facial features through it

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞或＜陰＞駱駝。大型四足哺乳動物；有單峰駱駝和雙峰駱駝之分；雙峰駝可高達兩米；單峰駝體型較大，一律為淺黃褐色；雙峰駝顏色較深；適合在沙漠地區生活；駝峰能儲存多餘的食物，可以行走長時間也不用喝水；能在乾旱地區作長途旅行；被人乘騎，也用來運載重物和拉車；駱駝毛可以織成布，用於製作帳篷或外袍；奶可作食物和飲品；是財富和商業的象徵。camel

Terms.Localization: large quadraped mammal; Camelus dromedarius and Camelus bactrianus; bactrians may reach 2 m.; dromedaries are bigger and a uniform light fawn color; bactrians are darker; suited to life in desert areas; store excess food in their humps, can go without water for long periods; can make long journeys through dry areas; used for riding and for carrying heavy loads and pulling carts; hair woven into cloth used for making tents or outer robes; milk used as food and drink; symbol of wealth and commerce

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞火爐；窯。用於熔煉礦石和燒製陶瓷器皿的建築。furnace; kiln

Terms.Localization: a construction used for the smelting of ore and burning of ceramic ware

Localization.Gloss: 該隱（gāi yǐn），《思》加音。亞當和夏娃的長子，亞伯的哥哥。他因嫉妒而殺死弟弟亞伯，以致被放逐到外地。Cain

Terms.Localization: the first son of Adam and Eve and the brother of Abel

Localization.Gloss: 加布（jiā bù），《思》卡爾頗。保羅的朋友，特羅亞的基督徒。Carpus

Terms.Localization: a Christian of Troas

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞微粒，木屑。一小塊木片，穀殼，甚或是稻草。speck; splinter

Terms.Localization: a small piece of wood, chaff, or even straw

Localization.Gloss: 堅革哩（jiān gé lǐ），《思》耕格勒。哥林多東部的海港。Cenchrea

Terms.Localization: a seaport of the city of Corinth

Localization.Gloss: 汲淪（jí lún），《思》克德龍。界於耶路撒冷城和橄欖山之間的溪谷，在耶路撒冷東面。Kidron

Terms.Localization: a valley between Jerusalem and the Mount of Olives

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞布塊；布條。用來纏裹物件的小片布料。band of cloth; strip of cloth

Terms.Localization: small piece of cloth; used for wrapping something

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞自負，虛榮。沒有根據或理由的驕傲狀態。conceit; cheap desire to boast

Terms.Localization: a state of pride which is without basis or justification

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞愚蠢的談話，空談。缺乏重要內容的談話。foolish talk

Terms.Localization: talk which lacks significant content

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞自負的，驕傲的。指沒有根據或理由的驕傲。conceited; boastful

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being proud without basis or justification

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞空的；空手的；沒有目的的；沒有效果的；愚蠢的；虛妄的。什麼也沒有的。empty; emptyhanded; to no purpose; without result; foolish; senseless

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being without anything, having nothing

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞使失去能力；使失去效力，落空。取走某事物的能力或重要性。deprive of power; make of no meaning or effect

Terms.Localization: to take away the power or significance of something

Localization.Gloss: 百夫長；隊長；軍官。指揮大約一百個士兵的羅馬軍官。centurion; captain

Terms.Localization: a Roman officer in command of about one hundred men

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞陶匠。（κεράμιον「陶製容器」的衍生詞）製作陶製容器的人。potter

Terms.Localization: (derivative of κεράμιον earthenware vessel) one who makes earthenware vessels

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞罐，瓶。盛載或運送液體用的陶製容器。jar; vessel

Terms.Localization: an earthenware container for storing or carrying liquids

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞豆莢。（κέρας 「角」的指小詞）指角豆樹的豆莢（看像一個小角）。carob pod

Terms.Localization: (a diminutive derivative of κέρας horn) the pod of the carob tree (which closely resembles a small horn)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞書卷。一個書卷或一部巨著的一部份。section; scroll

Terms.Localization: section of a scroll or of a long composition

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞瓦片；屋面瓦。薄板型或彎曲型的烤製黏土；用以覆蓋屋頂。tile; roof tile

Terms.Localization: a thin slab or bent piece of baked clay; used to cover a roof

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞銀錢；小額錢幣。價值較低的錢幣。coin; change

Terms.Localization: coins of lesser value

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞宣講，通知，宣佈。由傳令官或起傳令官作用的人以正式或官方形式宣佈。proclaim, announce

Terms.Localization: to announce in a formal or official manner by means of a herald or one who functions as a herald

Localization.Gloss: 《現》磯法（jī fǎ）／彼得（bǐ dé），《和》磯法，《思》刻法。耶穌給西門彼得取的亞蘭語名字，相等於希臘名字Πέτρος「彼得」。這兩個名字都是「磐石」的意思。Cephas

Terms.Localization: the Aramaic equivalent of the Greek name Πέτρος Peter

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞所講的道，信息，宣道。講道的內容。proclamation, preaching

Terms.Localization: the content of what is preached or proclaimed

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞丁稅，人頭稅。每個成年男性向政府繳納的稅。poll tax

Terms.Localization: a tax paid by each adult male to the government

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞傳道者，報信的人。傳道或宣佈信息的人。proclaimer

Terms.Localization: a person who preaches or proclaims

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞大魚；巨魚。任何大型的海洋生物。big fish; huge fish

Terms.Localization: any large sea creature

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞船；方舟。一個盒狀的大型建築物（由挪亞建成的大船）。boat; ship; the ark

Terms.Localization: a large box-like structure (the vessel built by Noah)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞箱；（約）櫃；保險箱。普通的或精緻的盒狀容器；這裡是指那用來存放法版的箱子。box; chest; coffer

Terms.Localization: any box-like container, whether plain or elaborate; here, refers to the box used to hold the tablets of the Law

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞彈奏豎琴。κιθάρα「七弦琴，豎琴」的衍生詞。play a lyre; play a harp

Terms.Localization: (derivative of κιθάρα lyre, harp)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞豎琴師，彈琴者。κιθαρίζω「彈奏豎琴」的衍生詞，指彈奏豎琴或七弦琴的人。harpist

Terms.Localization: (derivative of κιθαρίζω to play a lyre) one who plays the lyre or harp

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞七弦琴；豎琴。一種像豎琴但小巧的弦樂器，可以握在手中彈奏。lyre; harp

Terms.Localization: a small stringed harp-like instrument held in the hands and plucked

Localization.Gloss: 基利家（jī lì jiā），《思》基里基雅。新約時代，羅馬帝國的一個行省，位於小亞細亞東南角，現今的土耳其境內。這地是敘利亞和小亞細亞之間重要的通商路線。Cilicia

Terms.Localization: a province in the southeast corner of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 基士（jī shì），《思》克士。便雅憫人，掃羅王的父親，是個大能的勇士。Kish

Terms.Localization: the father of King Saul

Localization.Gloss: 《現》喀勞底雅（kā láo dǐ yǎ），《和》革老底亞（kè lǎo dǐ yà），《思》克勞狄雅。羅馬的女基督徒，保羅在信函中提及她向提摩太問安。Claudia

Terms.Localization: a Christian woman who sent greetings in 2 Tim 4:21

Localization.Gloss: 克勞第（kè láo dì），《舊》革老丟，《思》喀勞狄。羅馬皇帝（公元41-54年在位），在他統治年間有大饑荒。他曾下令猶太人離開羅馬。Claudius

Terms.Localization: Tiberius Claudius Nero Germanicus, a Roman emperor

Localization.Gloss: 克勞第（kè láo dì），《舊》革老丟，《思》喀勞狄。克勞第‧呂西亞，是駐守耶路撒冷的千夫長。「呂西亞」是希臘名字，「克勞第」是羅馬名字。Claudius

Terms.Localization: Claudius Lysias, a Roman officer in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞枝子，樹枝。（大樹或木本灌木的）枝子。branch

Terms.Localization: branch (of a tree or woody shrub)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞鑰匙。用來鎖門和開鎖的工具。key

Terms.Localization: an instrument used for locking and unlocking doors and gates

Localization.Gloss: 革流巴（gé liú bā），《思》克羅帕。在以馬忤斯路上遇見復活的耶穌的兩個門徒之一。Cleopas

Terms.Localization: a believer whom Jesus met on the road to Emmaus

Localization.Gloss: 革利免（gé lì miǎn），《思》克肋孟。腓立比教會的信徒，保羅在腓立比的一個同工。保羅確定他是具有屬靈生命的基督徒。Clement

Terms.Localization: a member of the church at Philippi

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞（主要指葡萄樹的）枝子。一種比較柔軟和柔韌的枝子，如藤蔓的枝子。branch (principally of grapevines)

Terms.Localization: a more or less tender, flexible branch, as of a vine

Localization.Gloss: 小牀；牀墊；擔架。一種相對較小且通常是暫時使用的物件，人可以倚靠或躺臥在其上；用蘆葦或布料做成；輕薄方便攜帶。cot; pallet; stretcher

Terms.Localization: a relatively small and often temporary type of object on which a person may lie or recline; made of reeds or cloth; thin and light for carrying

Localization.Gloss: 小牀；牀墊；擔架。一種相對較小且通常是暫時使用的物件，人可以倚靠或躺臥在其上；用蘆葦或布料做成；輕薄方便攜帶。cot; pallet; stretcher

Terms.Localization: a relatively small and often temporary type of object on which a person may lie or recline; made of reeds or cloth; thin and light for carrying

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞火爐。用粘土製成的穹頂結構，裡面燒著木柴和乾草，燒熱後可用來烤餅。oven

Terms.Localization: a dome-like structure made of clay, in which wood and dried grass were burned, and then after being heated, was used for baking bread

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞床；床鋪；擔架；病床。供人倚靠或躺臥的家具。bed; couch; cot; stretcher; bier

Terms.Localization: any piece of furniture employed for reclining or lying on

Localization.Gloss: 革羅罷（gé luó bà），《思》克羅帕。馬利亞（Μαρία [e]）的丈夫，這馬利亞是耶穌釘十字架時站在十字架旁的其中一名婦人。Clopas

Terms.Localization: the husband of Μαρία (e), one of the women at the crucifixion

Localization.Gloss: 革尼土（gé ní tǔ），《思》克尼多。小亞細亞西南海岸的一個半島，保羅在前往意大利的航程中所經之地，是羅馬帝國的自由城。Cnidus

Terms.Localization: a peninsula on the southwest coast of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞一分錢。羅馬銅幣，約值 1/4 銅錢（音譯：阿撒利翁）或 1/64 銀錢（音譯：得拿利）。quadrans; penny

Terms.Localization: a Roman copper coin worth 1/4 of an assarion or 1/64 of a denarius

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞肚，腹；內臟。整個消化器官，包括胃和腸。belly, internal organs

Terms.Localization: the entire digestive apparatus, including stomach and intestines

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞共有的，公共的；分享的。指與他人分享財產，或意味著一種共同利益的關係。in common; shared

Terms.Localization: pertaining to sharing with someone else in a possession or a relationship implying mutual interest

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞凡俗的；不潔淨的；污穢的。在禮儀上不被接納的，或者是因為被玷污，或者是因為本身的性質（例如禮儀上不潔淨的牲畜）。impure; common; profane

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being ritually unacceptable, either as the result of defilement or because of the very nature of the object itself (for example, ritually unacceptable animals)

Localization.Gloss: 玷污；褻瀆；冒犯。使某事物變成不潔凈的、污穢的，或在禮儀上不可接受的。defile; be defiled (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to cause something to become unclean, profane, or ritually unacceptable

Localization.Gloss: 分享；分擔，有分。分享自己的財產，暗示有某種共同參與和共同利益。share; participate

Terms.Localization: to share one's possessions, with the implication of some kind of joint participation and mutual interest

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞慷慨的，樂意分享的，樂意助人的，隨時濟助的。樂意隨時分享的。willing to share

Terms.Localization: (derivative of κοινωνέω to share) pertaining to willing and ready sharing

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞團契，親密的關係；有份，分享；捐獻，禮物；幫助，救濟。有著密切的相互關係和參與的團體。fellowship; contribution; participation; sharing

Terms.Localization: an association involving close mutual relations and involvement

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞與＜陰＞同伴，夥伴，與…有份的人。與別人一起參與某項事業或共同關心的事情的人。partner; partaker; sharer

Terms.Localization: one who participates with another in some enterprise or matter of joint concern

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞臥室，睡房。屋内的睡房bedroom

Terms.Localization: a room in a house for sleeping

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞眼藥。擦眼用的藥膏。eye salve

Terms.Localization: an ointment for the eyes

Localization.Gloss: 歌羅西（gē luó xī），《思》哥羅森。在現今的土耳其境內，是小亞細亞弗呂家地區的一座城，位於通往以弗所和內陸的商業要道上，盛產羊毛。Colossae

Terms.Localization: a city in Phrygia in Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞水池，池子（主要用來洗澡）。用來蓄水的大型結構。pool (primarily used for bathing)

Terms.Localization: a relatively large construction for collecting water

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞庫房；聖殿庫房。聖殿當中用作庫房的房間。treasury; Temple treasury

Terms.Localization: a room in the Temple used as a treasury

Localization.Gloss: 哥林多人（gē lín duō rén），《思》格林多人。哥林多本地的人，居住或出生在哥林多的人。Corinthian

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Corinth

Localization.Gloss: 哥尼流（gē ní liú），《思》科爾乃略。指揮百名士兵的羅馬軍官，他派人邀請彼得到他家傳講耶穌基督的福音。Cornelius

Terms.Localization: a Roman centurion to whom Peter ministered

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞屬世的；地上的。指世界的系統或與世界的標準相關的。worldly

Terms.Localization: pertaining to the system or standards of the world

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞世界的統治者，宇宙間的勢力。統治全世界的人。world power; world ruler

Terms.Localization: one who rules over the whole world

Localization.Gloss: 括土（kuò tǔ），《思》夸爾托。另有中文譯本譯作「夸圖」。保羅在《羅馬書》16章代他向羅馬教會問安。Quartus

Terms.Localization: a Christian who sent greetings in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞朱紅色布。紫紅色的布，染色原料是從骨螺貝類中提取的物質；生產成本高；令人聯想到財富與王權。scarlet cloth

Terms.Localization: a reddish-purple cloth dyed with a substance obtained from the murex shellfish; expensive to produce; associated with wealth and royalty

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞種子，子粒。果實的核心部分，通常是穀粒或籽粒。seed

Terms.Localization: the kernel part of fruit, usually grain

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞烏鴉。黑色大鳥，喙較厚，腿相當短；非常聰明；鴉科。raven

Terms.Localization: large black bird with thick strong beak, and fairly short legs; highly intelligent; Corvus family

Localization.Gloss: 可拉（kě lā），《思》科辣黑。摩西帶領以色利人出埃及時一個反叛黨的領袖。Korah

Terms.Localization: the leader of a rebellion against Moses

Localization.Gloss: 哥林多（gē lín duō），《思》格林多。現稱「科林斯」。它是新約時代的希臘城市，在哥林多地峽南側，位於現今希臘境內，是羅馬帝國亞該亞省的首都，也是當時重要的商業中心。Corinth

Terms.Localization: a city in Greece

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞世界，天地，宇宙。宇宙，一個有序的結構。world

Terms.Localization: the universe as an ordered structure

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞籃子。用來裝食物或農產品的大籃子。large basket

Terms.Localization: a relatively large basket used primarily for food or produce

Localization.Gloss: 小牀；牀墊；擔架。一種相對較小且通常是暫時使用的物件，人可以倚靠或躺臥在其上；用蘆葦或布料做成；輕薄方便攜帶。cot; pallet; stretcher

Terms.Localization: a relatively small and often temporary type of object on which a person may lie or recline; made of reeds or cloth; thin and light for carrying

Localization.Gloss: 邊緣，繸子。用來裝飾長外衣底邊的流蘇；或者，可能與 κράσπεδον-2 的意思相同。fringe

Terms.Localization: decorative tassel attached to the bottom edge of a long outer garment; or perhaps, same as meaning (2)

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞流蘇，繸子。猶太人必須縫在外衣四角的衣裳繸子（參民15.37-41）。tassel

Terms.Localization: the tassels which Jews were obliged to wear on the four corners of the outer garment (see Numbers 15.37-41)

Localization.Gloss: 革勒士（gé lè shì），《思》克勒斯刻。保羅的同工。Crescens

Terms.Localization: a companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 克里特人（kè lǐ tè rén），《舊》革哩底人，《思》克里特人。克里特本地的人，在克里特出生或居住的人。Cretan

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Crete

Localization.Gloss: 克里特（kè lǐ tè），《舊》革哩底，《思》克里特。地中海東部的海島，位於今日希臘境內。保羅曾經過此地，其後留下提多在此建立教會，並在各城設立長老。Crete

Terms.Localization: an island south of Greece

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞大麥。一種與小麥有點相似的穀物，但被視為不太理想的食物。barley

Terms.Localization: a grain somewhat similar to wheat, but regarded as less desirable for food

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞案件，訴訟，告狀。在法院內針對某人所採取的法律行動。court case, lawsuit

Terms.Localization: legal action taken in a court of law against someone

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞法官，士師。主持法庭審訊並宣佈判決的人。judge

Terms.Localization: one who presides over a court session and pronounces judgment

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞能夠判斷的。具有審斷法律案件的能力。able to discern

Terms.Localization: pertaining to the ability or capacity to judge cases

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞大麥做的。κριθή「大麥」的衍生詞，用大麥製成或含有大麥的食物。of barley

Terms.Localization: (derivative of κριθή barley) pertaining to being made or consisting of barley

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞審判，裁判；判決；定罪。法官作出的法律判決，定被告為有罪或無罪；法官作出有罪方應受懲罰的法律判斷。judgment, verdict; condemnation

Terms.Localization: the legal decision rendered by a judge, whether for or against the accused; the legal decision of guilt liable to punishment rendered by a judge

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞野花。通常野生的花，可能是百合，也可能是其他品種。wild flower

Terms.Localization: any one of several types of flowers, usually uncultivated

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞統治；治理。統治人民。to rule, govern

Terms.Localization: to rule over people

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞審判；定罪；決定，下決心；判斷，以為，認為。在思考的過程中得出結論，因而可以作出決定。to judge; be judged (pass.); sue; decide; esteem; be considered (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to come to a conclusion in the process of thinking and thus to be in a position to make a decision

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞審判，裁判；判決；控告，定罪。法官作出的法律判決，定被告為有罪或無罪；法官作出有罪方應受懲罰的法律判斷。judgment, decision; accusation, condemnation

Terms.Localization: the legal decision rendered by a judge, whether for or against the accused; the legal decision of guilt liable to punishment rendered by a judge

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞正義；公正，公平 。施行正義。justice, fairness

Terms.Localization: the administration of justice

Localization.Gloss: 基利司布（jī lì sī bù），《思》克黎斯頗。哥林多一個會堂的主管，他全家人聽保羅講道後都信了主，並且接受保羅的施洗。Crispus

Terms.Localization: a leader of the synagogue in Corinth

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞牲口；牲畜；牛。較大的馴養動物，主要用來乘騎和運貨。beast of burden; riding animal; cattle

Terms.Localization: a larger type of domesticated animal, primarily one used for riding or carrying loads

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞狗。比較細小的淺棕色家畜，以生活垃圾、動物屍體甚至排洩物為食；令人聯想到各種污穢、侵略、貪婪和地位低微。dog

Terms.Localization: relatively small light brown domestic animal, feeding on anything from household refuse to animal carcasses and excreta; Canis familiaris putiatini; associated with all sorts of uncleanness, aggression, greediness, low status

Localization.Gloss: 古利奈人（gǔ lì nài rén），《思》基勒乃人。古利奈本地人，居住或出生於古利奈的人。Cyrenian

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Cyrene

Localization.Gloss: 古利奈（gǔ lì nài），《思》基勒乃。北非的一個港口城市，在利比亞境內。Cyrene

Terms.Localization: a city on the coast of north Africa

Localization.Gloss: 居里扭（jū lǐ niǔ），《思》季黎諾。公元6年以後的敘利亞省總督。Quirinius

Terms.Localization: the imperial governor of Syria

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞統治力量，掌權者；權威。超自然的統治力量；一種超自然的勢力，負責控制人類的命運和活動。ruling power, lordship, authority

Terms.Localization: a supernatural ruling power; a supernatural power having some particular role in controlling the destiny and activities of human beings

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞鈸。敲擊樂器，由兩個金屬圓盤組成，互相撞擊以發出尖銳的碰撞聲。cymbals

Terms.Localization: a percussion instrument consisting of two metal discs which were struck together in order to make a shrill, clashing sound

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞小茴香（作香料的植物）。可能是一種與胡蘿蔔同科的植物；從底部分枝，有相似的葉子和花，但種子氣味較濃烈；每年種植和收割，高度可達 50-60 釐米；種子用於烹飪和醫藥。cumin

Terms.Localization: probably the plant Cuminum cyminum; same family as carrot; branches from the base and has similar leaves and flowers, though seeds have a sharper smell; planted and harvested each year, reaching a height of about 50-60 cm; seeds are used in cooking and as medicine

Localization.Gloss: 塞浦路斯人（sāi pǔ lù sī rén），《舊》居比路人，《思》塞浦路斯人。出生在塞浦路斯的人。from Cyprus

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Cyprus

Localization.Gloss: 塞浦路斯（sāi pǔ lù sī），《舊》居比路，《思》塞浦路斯。小亞細亞南海岸外的一個海島，位於敘利亞海岸外約96公里的地方，島長約224公里，寬約96公里。Cyprus

Terms.Localization: an island off the south coast of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞主人，主；先生，大人。有權威的人；也用來指上帝，尤其是在希伯來文舊約使用“YHWH”的情況。master, owner, lord, Lord

Terms.Localization: person with authority; also used to refer to God, especially in cases where the OT would have used the Tetragrammaton "YHWH"

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞ 狗。比較細小的淺棕色家畜，以生活垃圾、動物屍體甚至排洩物為食；令人聯想到各種污穢、侵略、貪婪和地位低微。dog

Terms.Localization: relatively small light brown domestic animal, feeding on anything from household refuse to animal carcasses and excreta; Canis familiaris putiatini; associated with all sorts of uncleanness, aggression, greediness, low status

Localization.Gloss: 哥桑（gē sāng），《思》科散。以摩當的兒子，《路加福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員。Cosam

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞蚋，蚊。細小的飛蟲；吸食人類和動物的血；被視為害蟲。gnat; mosquito

Terms.Localization: small flying insect; feeds on human or animal blood; regarded as pest

Localization.Gloss: 哥士（島）（gē shì (dǎo)），《思》科斯（島）。位於米利都之南，在愛琴海上的一個小島，新約時代屬羅馬帝國的亞細亞省。Cos

Terms.Localization: an island in the Aegean Sea

Localization.Gloss: 火把。一根或一捆棍棒，可以隨身攜帶，點燃後握在手中作照明之用。torch

Terms.Localization: a stick or bundle of sticks carried about as a light

Localization.Gloss: 燈。油燈，把油和燈芯放進一個小容器內，燃燒浸透了油的燈芯可以發光。lamp

Terms.Localization: a light made by burning a wick saturated with oil contained in a relatively small vessel

Localization.Gloss: 老底嘉（lǎo dǐ jiā）人；《思》勞狄刻雅人。老底嘉的本地人，出生或居住在該城的人。Laodicean

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Laodicea

Localization.Gloss: 老底嘉（lǎo dǐ jiā），《思》勞狄刻雅。位於小亞細亞西南方，在弗呂家的一座大城，公元前約300年由安太阿卡斯二世建立，當地教會是啟示錄作者致函的小亞細亞七個教會之一。Laodicea

Terms.Localization: a city in Phrygia in Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞國家；民族；人民。劃分全世界的人的最大單位，以他们所構成的社會政治群體為依據。nation, people

Terms.Localization: the largest unit into which the people of the world are divided on the basis of their constituting a socio-political community

Localization.Gloss: 拉西亞（lā xī yà），《思》拉撒雅。位於克里特島南岸的一座城。Lasea

Terms.Localization: a city on the south coast of the island of Crete

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞事奉，敬拜；＜複＞作為敬拜的一部分而舉行的宗教儀式。service

Terms.Localization: religious rites performed as a part of worship

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞事奉，敬拜。舉行宗教儀式，作為敬拜的一部分。serve; worship

Terms.Localization: to perform religious rites as a part of worship

Localization.Gloss: 拉撒路（lā sā lù），《思》拉匝祿。馬大和馬利亞的兄弟，住在伯大尼。耶穌常到他們家去。他死了四天，耶穌叫他從死裡復活。Lazarus

Terms.Localization: the brother of Mary (b) and Martha

Localization.Gloss: 拉撒路（lā sā lù），《思》拉匝祿。耶穌比喻裡的一個乞丐，他死了以後，天使把他帶到亞伯拉罕的懷裡。Lazarus

Terms.Localization: a beggar in a parable

Localization.Gloss: 拉麥（lā mài），《思》拉默客。瑪土撒拉的兒子，挪亞的父親。耶穌家譜中的一員。Lamech

Terms.Localization: the father of Noah in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞栽培的植物，蔬菜。在園子裡栽種的任何較小的植物，如香草和蔬菜。garden plant

Terms.Localization: any one of the smaller plants cultivated in a garden, for example, herbs and vegetables

Localization.Gloss: 《現》大群（dà qún），《和》群（qún），《思》軍旅。一大群污靈的名字。Legion

Terms.Localization: the name of a host of demons

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞事奉；敬拜。在世俗領域或在宗教儀式中履行服事的職務。to minister; give service; serve

Terms.Localization: to perform duties of service, whether in the secular realm or in religious ceremonies

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞事奉的。與服事有關的。ministering

Terms.Localization: pertaining to giving service

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞服事；祭司的職務；禮拜。在世俗服務或在宗教儀式中服事的任務或角色。service; priestly service; divine service

Terms.Localization: an assignment or role in serving, whether in secular service or in religious ceremonies

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞僕人，公僕，供祭司職的人。提供特別服務的人。servant; public servant; priestly minister

Terms.Localization: a person who renders special service

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞麻風病人，患麻風病的。患了可怕皮膚病的人。leper; leprous

Terms.Localization: a person suffering from a dread skin disease

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞小銅錢。值一分錢（quadrans）的 1/2，或一銀錢（得拿利）的 1/128。lepton; tiny coin

Terms.Localization: a copper (or bronze) coin worth 1/2 of a quadrans or 1/128 of a denarius

Localization.Gloss: 《現》利未的（lì wèi de），《和》利未人（lì wèi rén），《思》肋未（的）。屬於利未子孫的，與利未子孫有關的。Levitical; of Levi

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being a descendant of Levi

Localization.Gloss: 利未（lì wèi），《思》肋未。一個收稅的人，耶穌的十二使徒之一，另稱為馬太。Levi

Terms.Localization: a tax collector and one of the twelve apostles, generally regarded as being the same as Matthew

Localization.Gloss: 利未（lì wèi），《思》肋未。雅各與利亞所生的第三個兒子，利未支族的先祖。Levi

Terms.Localization: a son of Jacob and ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 利未（lì wèi），《思》肋未。《路加福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員，是麥基的兒子，瑪塔的父親。Levi

Terms.Localization: the son of Melchi (a) in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 利未（lì wèi），《思》肋未。《路加福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員，是西緬的兒子，瑪塔的父親。Levi

Terms.Localization: the son of Simeon (e) in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 利未人（lì wèi rén），《思》肋未人。利未支派的成員，有責任擔任猶太祭司的助手。Levite

Terms.Localization: a member of the tribe of Levi and having the responsibility to serve as an assistant to Jewish priests

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞毛巾。大概指用亞麻布製成的毛巾，主要用來把物品擦乾。towel

Terms.Localization: a piece of cloth (probably made of linen) used primarily for drying

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞麻風病，皮膚病。可怕的皮膚狀況，包括現今所稱的麻風病，以及某些其他類型的傳染性皮膚病，導致病人被其他人視為在禮儀上不潔淨，因而不得與其他人有正常的社交生活 。leprosy

Terms.Localization: a dreaded condition of the skin, including what is now regarded as leprosy, as well as certain other types of infectious skin diseases, resulting in a persons being regarded as ceremonially unclean and thus excluded from normal relations with other people

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞獅子。最大型的貓科動物，身長從頭部到尾部通常約有 2.8 米，肩高達一米；淺黃褐色；成年雄性在頸部和肩膀上有長鬃毛，顏色比身上皮毛較深；不潔的動物；令人聯想到攻擊和力量。lion

Terms.Localization: largest of the great cats, often about 2.8 m from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 m at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; adult males have a mane around the neck and shoulders that is darker than the rest of their fur; Panthera leo; unclean animal; associated with aggression and strength

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞壓酒；酒榨。壓榨葡萄的工具；壓榨出來的葡萄汁用於釀造葡萄酒。wine press

Terms.Localization: an instrument for pressing out the juice of grapes for the making of wine

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞香爐。用來燒香的碗狀器皿。censer

Terms.Localization: a bowl in which incense is burned

Localization.Gloss: 《現》自由人（zì yóu rén），《和》利百地拿（lì bǎi dì ná），《思》自由人。（拉丁名）一群人，大概是猶太人，曾經是奴隸，後來獲得自由；他們的會堂也同樣以「自由人」這名為人所認識。Freedmen

Terms.Localization: (a Latin name) a group of people, presumably Jews, who had been slaves but later obtained their freedom; their synagogue was also known by the same name

Localization.Gloss: 利比亞（lì bǐ yà），《舊》呂彼亞，《思》利比亞。北非地中海沿岸地區，又稱路比、弗、路德，位於埃及的西面。Libya

Terms.Localization: a district in north Africa

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞鋪石路面，石砌階。耶路撒冷的一個地區，用扁平石塊鋪砌，形成一個庭院（不是一條通道）。Stone Pavement

Terms.Localization: an area in Jerusalem, paved with flat blocks of stone and forming a kind of courtyard (not a thoroughfare)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞乳香。某些樹木的芳香樹脂。frankincense

Terms.Localization: the aromatic resin of certain trees

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞亞麻；麻紗衣服，細麻衣。亞麻布，通常披搭成一件衣服。linen; linen garment

Terms.Localization: linen cloth, normally in the form of a garment

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞燈芯。放在油燈裡的一根麻繩，用來汲取燈油。wick

Terms.Localization: a linen cord in a lamp that draws up the oil

Localization.Gloss: 《現》利努（lì nǔ），《和》利奴（lì nú），《思》理諾。在《提摩太後書》4章中，與保羅一起向提摩太問安的基督徒。Linus

Terms.Localization: a Christian who sent greetings in |s2TI.4:21|s*

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞合理的；理所當然的；真實的；真的。形容是真實的，意思是符合事物的真實本質。rational, genuine, true

Terms.Localization: Pertaining to being genuine, in the sense of being true to the real and essential nature of something

Localization.Gloss: 路加（lù jiā），《思》路加。一名外邦基督徒，是一位醫生，曾經和保羅一起同工。歷代教會均認為他就是《路加福音》和《使徒行傳》的作者。Luke

Terms.Localization: a companion of Paul who is generally regarded as the author of Luke and the Acts of the Apostles

Localization.Gloss: 路求（lù qiú），《思》路基約。吉利奈人，安提阿教會的先知和教師。Lucius

Terms.Localization: a teacher and prophet at Antioch

Localization.Gloss: 路求（lù qiú），《思》路基約。在《羅馬書》16章與保羅一同發出問安的一位羅馬基督徒。Lucius

Terms.Localization: a person sending greetings in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞矛槍。有鋒利尖頭的長形武器，用來刺、插，或投擲。spear (or spear point)

Terms.Localization: a long weapon with sharpened end used for piercing by thrusting or as a projectile by hurling

Localization.Gloss: 呂底亞（lǚ dǐ yà），《思》里狄雅。腓立比一個賣紫色布匹的婦女，是推雅推喇城的人，素來敬拜上帝。她聽保羅講道歸信了基督，她和她一家的人都接受了洗禮。Lydia

Terms.Localization: a woman merchant of purple cloth from Thyatira who was converted by Paul

Localization.Gloss: 呂高尼話（lǚ gāo ní huà），《思》呂考尼雅話。呂高尼地方的人所說的語言。在希臘文原文，這個詞是副詞，意思是用吕高尼話（說）。Lycaonian

Terms.Localization: in the Lycaonian language, in Lycaonian

Localization.Gloss: 呂高尼（lǚ gāo ní），《思》呂考尼雅。小亞細亞内陸的一個省，在羅馬帝國加拉太的中部地區，今土耳其境內。Lycaonia

Terms.Localization: a province in the interior of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 呂家（lǚ jiā），《思》里基雅。羅馬帝國的省份，在小亞細亞南岸地區，現今土耳其的境內。Lycia

Terms.Localization: a projection on the south coast of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 呂撒聶（lǚ sā niè），《思》呂撒尼雅。施洗約翰傳道時期，亞比利尼的分封王。Lysanias

Terms.Localization: a tetrarch of Abilene

Localization.Gloss: 呂西亞（lǚ xī yà），《思》里息雅。克勞第‧呂西亞，在耶路撒冷駐守的一個羅馬軍官。「呂西亞」是希臘名字，他買了羅馬的國籍後，加上「克勞第」這個羅馬名字。Lysias

Terms.Localization: Claudius Lysias, a Roman officer in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞救贖，釋放，使自由。釋放，與釋放奴隸的過程相類似。redeem

Terms.Localization: to release or set free, with the implied analogy to the process of freeing a slave

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞釋放者，解救者。釋放或解救別人的人。deliverer, redeemer

Terms.Localization: a person who liberates or releases others

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞燈台。可以放置一盞燈或好幾盞燈的支架。lampstand

Terms.Localization: a stand designed to hold a single lamp or a series of lamps

Localization.Gloss: 呂大（lǚ dà），《思》里達。彼得醫治癱瘓的以尼雅的地方，即舊約時代的「羅德」，位於約帕的東南方。Lydda

Terms.Localization: a city southeast of Joppa

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞狼。野生的四足捕食犬科動物；淺棕色皮毛，類似於豺，但體型大很多；被視為貪婪和兇猛的動物；常常捕食羊群；是遍地遊行、機會主義、危險、兇猛，和靈巧盜賊的象徵。wolf

Terms.Localization: wild, four-footed, predatory canine; light-brown fur, similar to jackal, but much bigger; Canis lupus; regarded as ravenous and fierce; commonly prey on flocks; symbol of roaming, opportunistic, dangerous, fierce, and clever banditry

Localization.Gloss: 路司得（lù sī dé），《思》呂斯特辣。小亞細亞呂高尼省內的一個城市，位於以哥念和特庇之間。Lystra

Terms.Localization: a city in Lycaonia in Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞釋放的方法；贖金；贖價。使人得以獲釋或得救的方法或途徑。ransom, means of release

Terms.Localization: the means or instrument by which release or deliverance is made possible

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞救贖，釋放，自由。釋放的行為，與釋放奴隸的過程相類似。redemption, deliverance, liberation

Terms.Localization: the act of releasing or setting free, with the implied analogy to the process of freeing a slave

Localization.Gloss: 燈。油燈，把油和燈芯放進一個小容器內，燃燒浸透了油的燈芯可以發光。lamp

Terms.Localization: a light made by burning a wick saturated with oil contained in a relatively small vessel

Localization.Gloss: 羅以（Luó yǐ）；《現》羅綺；《思》羅依。提摩太的外祖母。Lois

Terms.Localization: the grandmother of Timothy

Localization.Gloss: 羅得（luó dé），《思》羅特。哈蘭的兒子，亞伯拉罕的侄子。他和亞伯拉罕一同遷往迦南。Lot

Terms.Localization: the nephew of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 馬加丹（mǎ jiā dān），《思》瑪加丹。在加利利湖西岸的一個地方，其確實地點無從考據。Magadan

Terms.Localization: a place of uncertain location on the Lake of Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 抹大拉（mǒ dà lā），《思》瑪達肋納。抹大拉（位於加利利湖西岸）的一個婦女馬利亞的屬性名字，表明她來自抹大拉。Magdalene

Terms.Localization: the attributive name of Μαρία (c), a woman of Magdala

Localization.Gloss: 瑪各（mǎ gè），《思》瑪哥格。一個含義隱晦的名字，用來指敵對上帝、將被彌賽亞征服的國家或人民。Magog

Terms.Localization: a cryptic name to designate an enemy to be conquered by the Messiah

Localization.Gloss: 米甸（mǐ diàn），《思》米德楊。西奈半島的一個地區，在阿拉伯沙漠的西南區。Midian

Terms.Localization: a region in the Sinai peninsula and nearby Arabia

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞作門徒；使人作門徒。作某人的跟隨者或門徒，意思是堅持領袖的教導或指示，並促進這位領袖的事業發展；使人作某個人的門徒或跟隨者。be or become a disciple; make disciples, cause people to become followers

Terms.Localization: to be a follower or a disciple of someone, in the sense of adhering to the teachings or instructions of a leader and in promoting the cause of such a leader; to cause someone to become a disciple or follower of

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞門徒，學生，跟隨者。某人的門徒或跟隨者。disciple

Terms.Localization: a person who is a disciple or follower of someone ‎

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞女門徒。女門徒。disciple (female)

Terms.Localization: a disciple who is a woman

Localization.Gloss: 馬太（mǎ tài），《思》瑪竇。一名稅吏，耶穌的十二門徒之一，一般認為他就是 Λευί[a]「利未」。Matthew

Terms.Localization: a tax collector and one of the twelve apostles, generally regarded as being the same as Λευί Levi

Localization.Gloss: 瑪塔（mǎ tǎ），《思》瑪塔特。《路加福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員。利未的兒子，希里的父親。Matthat

Terms.Localization: the father of Eli in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 瑪塔（mǎ tǎ），《思》瑪塔特。《路加福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員。利未的兒子，約令的父親。Matthat

Terms.Localization: the father of Jorim in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 馬提亞（mǎ tí yà），《思》瑪弟亞。耶穌的門徒，在耶穌升天之後，被揀選取代加略人猶大成為十二使徒之一。Matthias

Terms.Localization: the person elected to take the place of the apostle Judas Iscariot

Localization.Gloss: 瑪土撒拉（mǎ tǔ sā lā），《思》默突舍拉。耶穌家譜中的一員。以諾的兒子，拉麥的父親，挪亞的祖父。他是聖經中最長壽的人，共活了969歲。Methuselah

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞幸福，福澤，高興。快樂的狀態，暗指有利的環境。happiness, blessedness

Terms.Localization: a state of happiness, implying favorable circumstances

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞認為…是有福或快樂的，稱…為有福。由於有利的環境而認為某人是快樂或有福的。regard as happy, consider blessed, call blessed

Terms.Localization: to regard someone as happy or fortunate in view of favorable circumstances

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞有福的，快樂的；有福的那一位。有福的，暗示享受著有利的環境。happy, blessed; blessed one

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being happy, with the implication of enjoying favorable circumstances

Localization.Gloss: 馬其頓（mǎ qí dùn），《思》馬其頓。羅馬帝國的一省，位於亞該亞省的北部，就是現今希臘的東北部。Macedonia

Terms.Localization: a Roman province in Greece

Localization.Gloss: 馬其頓人（mǎ qí dùn rén），《思》馬其頓人。馬其頓本地的人，在馬其頓出生或居住的人。Macedonian

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Macedonia

Localization.Gloss: 瑪勒列（mǎ lè liè），《思》瑪拉肋耳。耶穌家譜中的一員。塞特的後裔，該南的兒子，雅列的父親，約瑟（耶穌的父親）的先祖。Mahalaleel

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 馬念（mǎ niàn），《思》瑪納恆。安提阿教會的先知和教師，是教會領袖之一；也是分封王希律的朝廷親信。他曾參與差遣巴拿巴和保羅外出宣教。Manaen

Terms.Localization: a prophet and teacher in the church at Antioch

Localization.Gloss: 瑪拿西（mǎ ná xī），《思》默納協。約瑟在埃及所生的長子，是以色列的瑪拿西支族的先祖；這個支族的人擁有約旦河兩岸的土地。Manasseh

Terms.Localization: a son of Ἰωσήφ (a) and ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 瑪拿西（mǎ ná xī），《思》默納舍。耶穌家譜中的一員。猶大王，希西家的兒子。Manasseh

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 馬利亞（mǎ lì yà），《思》瑪利亞。耶穌的母親。Mary

Terms.Localization: the mother of Jesus Christ

Localization.Gloss: 馬利亞（mǎ lì yà），《思》瑪利亞。伯大尼的馬利亞，是馬大和拉撒路的姊妹。Mary

Terms.Localization: a sister of Martha and Lazarus (1)

Localization.Gloss: 馬利亞（mǎ lì yà），《思》瑪利亞。抹大拉的馬利亞，曾有七隻鬼纏住她。她得到耶穌的醫治後，就一直跟隨耶穌。Mary

Terms.Localization: Mary Magdalene, a follower of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 馬利亞（mǎ lì yà），《思》瑪利亞。雅各和約西的母親。Mary

Terms.Localization: the mother of James (4) and Joseph (7)

Localization.Gloss: 馬利亞（mǎ lì yà），《思》瑪利亞。革羅罷的妻子。Mary

Terms.Localization: the wife of Clopas

Localization.Gloss: 馬利亞（mǎ lì yà），《思》瑪利亞。約翰‧馬可的母親。Mary

Terms.Localization: the mother of John (4) Mark

Localization.Gloss: 馬利亞（mǎ lì yà），《思》瑪利亞。羅馬的馬利亞。她是在《羅馬書》16章的問安名單中出現的一個基督徒，曾為羅馬的教會辛勞工作。Mary

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞作見證，作證，作證人；證明，肯定，證實。提供有關某人或某事件的信息，所提供的信息是說話者直接取得的第一手資料。bear witness; testify; be a witness; attest; affirm; confirm

Terms.Localization: to provide information about a person or an event concerning which the speaker has direct knowledge

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞證言，見證；證據；聲望。所見證或所說的內容；根據對個人品行的評價來評論一個人。testimony, witness, evidence; reputation

Terms.Localization: the content of what is witnessed or said; that which is said about a person on the basis of an evaluation of the persons conduct

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞證言，見證；證據；作證的機會。所見證或所說的內容testimony; witness; evidence; proof; opportunity to testify

Terms.Localization: the content of what is witnessed or said

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞作證，鄭重地告訴；堅持，勸告，警告。基於假定的個人知識作出嚴肅的聲明；以加強的語氣說出觀點或願望。testify; address solemnly; insist; urge

Terms.Localization: to make a serious declaration on the basis of presumed personal knowledge; to be emphatic in stating an opinion or desire

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞空談。沒有益處的談話，因此是無聊的和無意義的。empty talk

Terms.Localization: talk which has no beneficial purpose and is thus idle and meaningless

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞空談者，說荒唐無稽的話的人。參與空談和閒聊的人。empty talker

Terms.Localization: one who engages in empty and idle talk

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞變得虛妄；變得沒有價值。變得無用，因此變得沒有價值。become worthless, become nonsense

Terms.Localization: to become useless and hence worthless

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞沒有價值，虛妄。基於是無效和沒有內容而無用的 。worthlessness; futility

Terms.Localization: quality of being useless on the basis of being futile and lacking in content

Localization.Gloss: 馬但（mǎ dàn），《思》瑪堂。《馬太福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員。以利亞撒的兒子，雅各的父親。Matthan

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 瑪達他（mǎ dá tā），《思》瑪塔塔。《路加福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員。拿單的兒子，大衞的孫子。Mattatha

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 瑪他提亞（mǎ tā tí yà），《思》瑪塔提雅。《路加福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員。亞摩斯的兒子，約瑟的父親。Mattathias

Terms.Localization: the son of Amos in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 瑪他提亞（mǎ tā tí yà），《思》瑪塔提雅。《路加福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員。西美的兒子，瑪押的父親。Mattathias

Terms.Localization: the son of Semein in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 瑪押（mǎ yā），《思》瑪哈特。《路加福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員。Maath

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 馬勒古（mǎ lè gǔ），《思》瑪耳曷。大祭司的僕人。耶穌被賣的那一夜，彼得用刀砍下他的右耳，耶穌卻醫好了他。Malchus

Terms.Localization: the high priests slave whom Peter wounded

Localization.Gloss: 馬大（mǎ dà），《思》瑪爾大。馬利亞和拉撒路的姊妹。Martha

Terms.Localization: a sister of Mary (b) and Lazarus (a) of Bethany

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞見證人；殉道者。作見證的人；因見證自己的信仰而被剝奪性命的人。witness; martyr

Terms.Localization: a person who witnesses; a person who has been deprived of life as the result of bearing witness to his beliefs

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞無價值的，虛幻的，無用的。基於是無效和沒有內容而無用的。worthless; futile; useless

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being useless on the basis of being futile and lacking in content

Localization.Gloss: 馬可（mǎ kě），《思》馬爾谷。又稱為約翰‧馬可，馬可是羅馬名字，約翰是猶太名字。教會傳統認為他就是寫馬可福音的作者。Mark

Terms.Localization: a companion of Paul who was also called John (4)

Localization.Gloss: 大能的作為；偉大的作為；大作為。一個重要和有能力的行為。mighty act, great deed

Terms.Localization: a deed of importance and power

Localization.Gloss: 至高榮耀；威嚴的榮耀。上帝的頭銜，字面意思：威嚴的榮耀。Sublime Glory, Majestic Glory

Terms.Localization: a title for God, literally majestic glory

Localization.Gloss: 至大者；至威嚴者。（上帝的頭銜，直譯：威嚴）威嚴偉大的那一位。the Majesty, the Majestic One

Terms.Localization: (a title for God, literally majesty) one who is characterized by majesty and greatness

Localization.Gloss: 米利亞（mǐ lì yà），《思》默肋阿。《路加福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員。買南的兒子，以利亞敬的父親。Melea

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 馬耳他（mă ĕr tā），《舊》米利大，《思》默里達。地中海的一個海島，位於西西里島南部。Malta

Terms.Localization: an island located south of Sicily

Localization.Gloss: 麥基洗德（mài jī xǐ dé），《思》默基瑟德。意思是「公義的王」。他是亞伯拉罕時代的撒冷王，也是至高上帝的大祭司。Melchizedek

Terms.Localization: a king of Salem and priest of the Most High God in the time of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: 麥基（mài jī），《思》默耳希。《路加福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員。雅拿的兒子，利未的父親。Melchi

Terms.Localization: the father of Levi in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 麥基（mài jī），《思》默耳希。《路加福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員。亞底的兒子，尼利的父親。Melchi

Terms.Localization: the father of Neri in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 羊皮紙；羊皮紙製成的書或卷軸。可以用筆墨在上面寫字的特製獸皮；用這種獸皮製成的書或卷軸。parchment; books made of parchment

Terms.Localization: a sheet of specially prepared animal skin on which one could write with pen and ink; books or scrolls made of such skin

Localization.Gloss: 買南（Mǎi nán）；《思》門納。耶穌家譜中的一員，是瑪達他的兒子，米利亞的父親。Menna

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞分配者，仲裁人，協調人。在衝突中擔當調停者，判斷哪一方對，哪一方錯。arbitrator

Terms.Localization: someone who mediates in a conflict and determines who is right and who is wrong

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞中間人，調解人，中保。促成或幫助各方達成協議的人，有保證協議之確定性的含義。mediator

Terms.Localization: one who causes or helps parties to come to an agreement, with the implication of guaranteeing the certainty of the arrangement

Localization.Gloss: 美索不達米亞（měi suǒ bù dá mǐ yà），《舊》米所波大米，《思》美索不達米亞。舊約指的是哈蘭平原，在幼發拉底河和底格里斯河上游之間的區域。也稱作「新月形肥沃區」。Mesopotamia

Terms.Localization: the valley of the Euphrates and Tigris rivers

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞半空中，在高空。天空中的一個點或區域，就在地球的上方。midheaven, midair, high in the sky

Terms.Localization: a point or region of the sky directly above the earth

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞分隔的牆。把一個區域與另一個區域分隔開的牆壁或籬笆。dividing wall

Terms.Localization: a wall or fence which separates one area from another

Localization.Gloss: 彌賽亞（mí sài yà），《思》默西亞。（直譯：受膏者；等同於希伯來文的彌賽亞）在《新約》中，這是耶穌作為彌賽亞的頭銜，但在許多經文中，尤其是不帶定冠詞的時候，「基督」成為了耶穌名字的一部分。Messiah

Terms.Localization: (literally one who has been anointed) in the NT, title for Jesus as the Messiah, but in many contexts, and especially without an article, Χριστός becomes a part of the name of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞懊悔，後悔；改變主意。改變自己對某事的想法，可能有後悔的含義。change one's mind; repent; regret

Terms.Localization: to change one's mind about something, with the probable implication of regret

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞悔改；懊悔；改變行事方式。一個人由於對罪和義的想法及態度徹底改變了，因此改變自己的生活方式。repent

Terms.Localization: to change one's way of life as the result of a complete change of thought and attitude with regard to sin and righteousness

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞悔改，心靈改變，轉離罪惡，生活方式改變。一個人由於對罪和義的想法及態度徹底改變了，因此改變自己的生活方式的過程。repentance

Terms.Localization: the process of changing one's way of life as the result of a complete change of thought and attitude with regard to sin and righteousness

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞分享，參加；分擔；屬於。共享某物的所有權，包括一頓飯；屬於某個團體的成員。partake, participate; belong to

Terms.Localization: to share in the possession of something, including a meal; to be included in the membership of a group

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞合伙關係，合作。有著共同目的和活動的關係。partnership, sharing

Terms.Localization: a relationship involving shared purposes and activity

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞溫和待人，體諒人。態度溫和地對待某人。deal gently

Terms.Localization: to be gentle in one's attitude toward someone

Localization.Gloss: 墨水。用於書寫或標記的深色液體。ink

Terms.Localization: a dark liquid used in writing or marking

Localization.Gloss: 同伴；夥伴；同工。在生意或事業上與人合夥的人。partner; companion; partaker

Terms.Localization: one who shares with someone else as an associate in an enterprise or undertaking

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞羊皮；羊毛。經過鞣酸處理的、帶羊毛的綿羊皮。sheepskin; fleece

Terms.Localization: the tanned hide of sheep with the hair adhering

Localization.Gloss: 米底亞人（mǐ dǐ yà rén），《思》瑪待人。（Μηδία「米底亞」的衍生詞，原詞没有出現在《新約》中）米底亞的本地人，在米底亞出生或居住的人。Mede

Terms.Localization: (derivative of Μηδία Media, not occurring in the NT) a person who is a native of Media

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞弄髒，污染。使某人在道德上或在禮儀上有污點或變得污穢。defile; be defiled (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to cause someone to be morally or ceremonially tainted or defiled

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞敗壞，沾污。被邪惡污染或玷污的狀態。defilement

Terms.Localization: a state of being tainted or stained by evil

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞雇工，勞工。（μισθόομαι「僱用」的衍生詞）受僱提供特定服務或工作的人。hired worker; hired person

Terms.Localization: (derivative of μισθόομαι to hire) a person who has been hired to perform a particular service or work

Localization.Gloss: 米推利尼（mǐ tuī lì ní），《思》米提肋乃。羅馬帝國的自由城，愛琴海東面的萊斯博斯島東岸的主要城市。在今日土耳其西部海岸。Mitylene

Terms.Localization: the chief city on the island of Lesbos in the Aegean Sea

Localization.Gloss: 米迦勒（mǐ jiā lè），《思》彌額爾。天使長的名字。他曾經幫助上帝的百姓對抗波斯和希臘的魔君和惡勢力；也曾為摩西的屍首跟魔鬼爭辯。Michael

Terms.Localization: the name of the chief angel

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞敗壞，沾污。被邪惡污染或玷污的狀態。defilement

Terms.Localization: a state of being tainted or stained by evil

Localization.Gloss: 米利都（mǐ lì dū），《思》米肋托。古代小亞細亞西岸的希臘港口城市，位於以弗所以南，今天仍保留此名。Miletus

Terms.Localization: a seaport city on the west coast of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞雇工，勞工。（μισθόομαι「僱用」的衍生詞）受僱提供特定服務或工作的人 。hired worker; hired person

Terms.Localization: (derivative of μισθόομαι to hire) a person who has been hired to perform a particular service or work

Localization.Gloss: 拿孫（ná sūn），《思》木納松。塞浦路斯人，住在耶路撒冷的基督徒。他在保羅第三次宣教旅程結束返回耶路撒冷時，接待了保羅和他的外邦同伴。Mnason

Terms.Localization: a Christian from Cyprus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞（一個）金幣，《和》（十錠）銀子，《思》米納。彌拿，希臘硬幣，值 100 得拿利 [δηνάρια] 或六十分之一他連得 [τάλαντον]。 quantity of money; one hundred denarii

Terms.Localization: a Greek monetary unit worth one hundred denarii

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞墳墓；紀念碑。為紀念死去的人而立的石碑。monument; memorial

Terms.Localization: a monument built as a memorial to someone who has died

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞訂婚，許配。和某人訂下婚約。be engaged (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to promise a person for marriage

Localization.Gloss: 墳墓；墓穴。為埋葬死人而建的墓穴；通常是天然的洞穴，也可能是從基岩開鑿而成。grave; tomb

Terms.Localization: a construction for the burial of the dead; often a natural cave or hewn out of bedrock

Localization.Gloss: 淫婦。通姦的女人。adulteress

Terms.Localization: a woman who commits adultery

Localization.Gloss: 不忠；淫亂。（名詞 μοιχαλίς「淫婦」的引申義）指不忠於自己早期的真實的信仰。unfaithful, adulterous

Terms.Localization: (a figurative extension of meaning of the substantive μοιχαλίς adulteress) pertaining to being unfaithful to one's earlier and true beliefs

Localization.Gloss: 犯姦淫；通姦。已婚男子和別人的妻子發生性行為；或已婚女子與別人的丈夫發生性行為。commit adultery

Terms.Localization: (for a man) to have sexual intercourse with a married woman other than his own spouse; (for a married woman) to have sexual intercourse with a man other than her own spouse

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞淫亂，通姦。已婚男子和別人的妻子發生性行為。adultery

Terms.Localization: sexual intercourse between a man and a married woman who is not his wife

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞犯姦淫；通姦。已婚男子和別人的妻子發生性行為；或已婚女子與別人的丈夫發生性行為。commit adultery

Terms.Localization: (for a man) to have sexual intercourse with a married woman other than his own spouse; (for a married woman) to have sexual intercourse with a man other than her own spouse

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞行淫者，犯姦淫的人。通姦的人，特指男性，在一般情況下也包括女性。adulterer

Terms.Localization: a person who commits adultery, specifically referring to males, but also including females in generic contexts

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞污穢。污穢的狀態，包括宗教和道德兩方面。defilement

Terms.Localization: a state of defilement, involving both religious and moral aspects

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞弄髒，沾污。使某物變髒或被弄污。to soil; be defiled (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to cause something to become dirty or soiled

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞做牛犢偶像；塑造牛犢形像的偶像。製作牛犢形像的偶像。make a calf-idol; shape an idol in the form of a calf

Terms.Localization: to make an idol in the form of a calf

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞籃子；盒子。盛載乾物的容器，容量約為八升（約兩加侖）。basket; box

Terms.Localization: a container for dry matter with a capacity of about eight liters (about two gallons)

Localization.Gloss: 摩洛；《思》摩肋客。一個迦南神的名字。Moloch

Terms.Localization: the name of a Canaanite god

Localization.Gloss: 牛犢。牛的幼崽。calf

Terms.Localization: the young of cattle

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞碾磨器的。μύλος「碾磨器」的衍生詞，指與用來磨碎穀物的石磨有關的。of a mill

Terms.Localization: (derivatives of μύλος "mill") pertaining to a stone mill for grinding grain

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞用香膏塗抹；為安葬而膏抹。μύρον「香膏」的衍生詞，意思是澆上香油或香膏，通常與喪葬有關。anoint with perfume; anoint for burial

Terms.Localization: (derivative of μύρον perfume) to anoint with perfumed oil or ointment, often in connection with burial

Localization.Gloss: 每西亞（měi xī yà），《思》米息雅。羅馬帝國的一個省份，位於小亞細亞西北面。Mysia

Terms.Localization: a province in northwest Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 磨的。（μύλος「磨」的衍生詞）與磨穀的石磨相關的。of a mill

Terms.Localization: (derivatives of μύλος "mill") pertaining to a stone mill for grinding grain

Localization.Gloss: 磨。由兩塊扁石構成的用具，只要轉動上磨石，便可以把穀物磨成麵粉。mill

Terms.Localization: a construction of two flat stones between which grain was ground into flour by rotating the top stone

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞磨石。一種大的圓扁石，無論是上磨石還是下磨石，用來碾磨穀粒。millstone

Terms.Localization: a large, round, flat stone, either upper or lower, used in grinding grain

Localization.Gloss: 每拉（měi lā），《思》米辣。羅馬帝國呂家省的省會城市，是古代良港，位於小亞細亞西南面。Myra

Terms.Localization: a city on the south coast of Lycia in Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞香膏，香水，香油。一種十分芳香和昂貴的膏油。perfume; perfumed oil

Terms.Localization: a strongly aromatic and expensive ointment

Localization.Gloss: 摩西（mó xī），《思》梅瑟。字義是「從水裡拉出來」。摩西是以色列民族的第一位領袖，帶領以色列人離開埃及，並向以色列人頒佈上帝的律法。Moses

Terms.Localization: the leader of the Israelites out of Egypt and the lawgiver

Localization.Gloss: 拿順（ná shùn），《思》納赫雄。耶穌家譜中的一員。亞米拿達的兒子，撒門的父親。Nahshon

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 拿該（ná gāi），《思》納革。耶穌家譜中的一員。瑪押的兒子，以斯利的父親。Naggai

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 拿撒勒（ná sā lè），《思》納匝肋。加利利中南部山區的一個小鎮，距離耶路撒冷約140公里。Nazareth

Terms.Localization: a town in the south central part of Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 拿撒勒人（ná sā lè rén）／拿撒勒的（ná sā lè de），《思》納匝肋人／納匝肋的。拿撒勒本地的人，在拿撒勒出生或居住的人；來自拿撒勒的。Nazarene

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Nazareth

Localization.Gloss: 拿撒勒人（ná sā lè rén）／拿撒勒的（ná sā lè de），《思》納匝肋人。Ναζαρηνός的另一種拼寫法；拿撒勒本地的人，在拿撒勒出生或居住的人。來自拿撒勒的。Nazarene

Terms.Localization: an alternative form of Ναζαρηνός

Localization.Gloss: 拿但業（ná dàn yè），《思》納塔乃耳。耶穌的門徒，來自加利利的迦拿。耶穌稱他為「地道的以色列人」，因為他心裡毫無詭詐。Nathanael

Terms.Localization: a disciple of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 拿單（ná dān），《思》納堂。耶穌家譜中的一員。大衛的兒子，瑪達他的父親。Nathan

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 乃幔（nǎi màn），《思》納阿曼。以利沙時代敍利亞國的元帥。他患了痲瘋病，向以利沙求醫，結果得到醫治。耶穌以他為例，證明上帝的恩典臨到外邦人。Naaman

Terms.Localization: a Syrian army commander healed by Elisha

Localization.Gloss: 拿因（ná yīn），《思》納因。加利利南面的一座城。Nain

Terms.Localization: a city in southern Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 拿鴻（ná hóng），《思》納洪。耶穌家譜中的一員，是以斯利的兒子，亞摩斯的父親。Nahum

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞聖殿；至聖所，聖所。人們在其中敬奉神明的建築物（至於耶路撒冷的聖殿，則也被視為上帝的住處）。temple; sanctuary

Terms.Localization: a building in which a deity is worshiped (in the case of the Temple in Jerusalem, a place where God was also regarded as dwelling)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞神廟模型或神龕。神殿或神龕的小型複製品或模型。replica temple; model of a shrine

Terms.Localization: a small replica or model of a temple or shrine

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞船。用來運送貨物或載人的大型遠洋船。ship

Terms.Localization: a larger ocean-going vessel used for transporting cargo and people

Localization.Gloss: 拿鶴（ná hè），《思》納曷爾。耶穌家譜中的一員。亞伯拉罕的祖父，他拉的父親。Nahor

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞哪噠香膏（液）。從一種稱為甘松（哪噠）的植物提取的芳香油。oil of nard; perfume of nard

Terms.Localization: an aromatic oil extracted from a plant called nard

Localization.Gloss: 拿其數（ná qí shù），《思》納爾基索。在《羅馬書》16章的問安名單中出現的一個基督徒，保羅問候他一家信主的弟兄們。Narcissus

Terms.Localization: a person whose household is greeted in |sROM.16:11|s*

Localization.Gloss: 拿弗他利（ná fú tā lì），《思》納斐塔里。雅各十二個兒子之一，他是拿弗他利支族的祖先。Naphtali

Terms.Localization: a son of Jacob and ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 拿弗他利（ná fú tā lì），《思》納斐塔里。拿弗他利支族的領土，在加利利海的西北部。Naphtali

Terms.Localization: the territory of the tribe of Naphtali

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞守殿者；廟宇的守護者。負責照管和守護聖殿或廟宇的人。guardian of the temple

Terms.Localization: one who had responsibility to tend to and to guard a temple

Localization.Gloss: 尼亞坡里（ní yà pō lǐ），《思》乃阿頗里。位於馬其頓的腓立比的一個海港。Neapolis

Terms.Localization: the harbor of Philippi in Macedonia

Localization.Gloss: 尼利亞（ní lì yà），《思》乃勒烏。在《羅馬書》16章的問安名單中出現的一個基督徒。Nereus

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 尼利（ní lì），《思》乃黎。麥基的兒子，撒拉鐵的父親。《路加福音》記載的耶穌家譜中的一員。Neri

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞禁食。在一段時間內不進食，藉此履行宗教責任。fasting; fast

Terms.Localization: the act of going without food for a set time as a religious duty

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞禁食。在一段時間內不進食，藉此履行宗教責任。fast

Terms.Localization: to go without food for a set time as a religious duty

Localization.Gloss: 尼迦挪（ní jiā nuó），《思》尼加諾爾。早期耶路撒冷教會選出的七個人之一，幫助使徒管理教會的膳食安排。Nicanor

Terms.Localization: one of the seven helpers in the church in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 《現》尼哥拉派（ní gē lā pài），《和》尼哥拉黨（ní gē lā dǎng），《思》尼苛勞黨。在以弗所和別迦摩的一個宗派，教會認為他們是安提阿人尼哥拉的跟從者。啟示錄的作者指責他們吃祭偶像之物和行姦淫。Nicolaitan

Terms.Localization: a follower of Nicolaus (a)

Localization.Gloss: 尼哥德慕（ní gē dé mù），《舊》尼哥底母，《思》尼苛德摩。法利賽人，是猶太人的領袖和教師。他曾夜裡來找耶穌談話。他也是議會的成員，曾為耶穌辯護。耶穌死後，他和亞利馬太人約瑟一同安葬耶穌。Nicodemus

Terms.Localization: a member of the Sanhedrin who spoke with Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 尼哥拉（ní gē lā），《思》尼苛勞。早期耶路撒冷教會選出的七個人之一，幫助使徒管理教會的膳食安排。Nicolas

Terms.Localization: one of the seven helpers in the church in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 尼哥坡里（ní gē pō lǐ），《思》尼苛頗里。新約時代的城市，當時最少可指九個不同的地方。保羅可能是指雅典西北方的一個城市，那是奧古斯都在公元前31年所建的。Nicopolis

Terms.Localization: a city on the west coast of Greece

Localization.Gloss: 尼尼微人（ní ní wēi rén），《思》尼尼微人。Νινευή的衍生詞，原詞未出現於新約。尼尼微人是尼尼微城的本地人，或居住在該城的人。尼尼微是古代亞述帝國的首都，位於底格里斯河上游東岸，是美索不達米亞地區最古老的大城市之一。Ninevite

Terms.Localization: (derivative of Νινευή Nineveh, not occurring in the NT) a person who lives in or is a native of Nineveh

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞洗滌盆。一種海碗，通常用黏土製成，用於洗手、洗臉和洗腳。washbasin

Terms.Localization: a large bowl, normally made of clay, used for washing of hands, face, and feet

Localization.Gloss: 《現》黑漢（hēi hàn），《和》尼結（ní jiē），《思》尼革爾。西面的別名，他是安提阿教會的先知和教師。「尼結」這個名字的意思是「黑色」，暗示他可能來自北非。Niger

Terms.Localization: an additional name of Συμεών Simeon(d), the prophet

Localization.Gloss: 法律教師，經學教師，律師。解釋宗教律法的專家；或民法專家。teacher of the law; lawyer

Terms.Localization: (n) one who is an expert in interpreting religious law; or, a specialist in civil law.

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞合法地，合宜地，按規則地。根據規則和條例是正確的。lawfully; according to the rules

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being correct according to rules and regulations

Localization.Gloss: 法律教師；教法師；律法專家。精通於教導和解釋律法的人（《新約》中的律法是指舊約律法）。teacher of the law; expert in the law

Terms.Localization: A person who is skilled in the teaching and interpretation of the law (in the NT referring to the law of the OT)

Localization.Gloss: 頒佈律法；賜下律法。頒佈或制定律法。giving of a law

Terms.Localization: the act of establishing a law

Localization.Gloss: 頒佈律法；賜下律法。頒佈或制定律法。enact laws; be enacted (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to give or to establish a law

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞立法者。頒布律法或制定律法的人。lawgiver

Terms.Localization: one who gives or enacts laws

Localization.Gloss: 幼鳥，雛鳥。任何在鳥巢中孵化的小鳥。young birds, nestlings

Terms.Localization: the young of any bird hatched in a nest

Localization.Gloss: 雛鳥；小雞。任何鳥類的幼鳥。young bird, chick

Terms.Localization: the young of any bird

Localization.Gloss: 錢幣。通用的官方貨幣。coin

Terms.Localization: common and official currency

Localization.Gloss: 法律，條例；（摩西）律法。規定人們的行事準則的正式規則（或一套規則）。law; Law (of Moses)

Terms.Localization: a formalized rule (or set of rules) prescribing what people must do

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞結婚禮堂。比較大的房間，常常用作婚禮場地。wedding hall

Terms.Localization: a relatively large room, often serving as a place for a wedding

Localization.Gloss: 寧法（níng fǎ），《思》寧法。老底嘉教會的一份子，她的家設有家庭教會。保羅曾寫信問候她和她家裡的教會。（也有可能是男性。）Nympha; Nymphas

Terms.Localization: a Christian woman or man

Localization.Gloss: 挪亞（nuó yà），《思》諾厄。他是當時唯一的義人，向人傳悔改的道，當洪水淹沒大地以前，他遵照上帝的指示建造一條大船。Noah

Terms.Localization: Old Testament figure who built an ark (boat) to escape the flood that covered the earth

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞住處，房間，客房。供離家出門的人暫住的地方。guestroom; lodging for guest; place to stay

Terms.Localization: a place of temporary lodging for a person away from home

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞瓶，罐，壺。（從拉丁文 sextarius 而來的借用詞，是一種羅馬的測量標準，約等於半公升，一品脫）一種小水壺或罐子。pitcher; jar

Terms.Localization: (a borrowing based on Latin sextarius, a Roman measure equal to about a half liter, one pint) a kind of small pitcher or jar

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞木的。（ξύλον「木」的衍生詞）指木製的或由木頭組成的。of wood; wooden

Terms.Localization: (derivative of ξύλον[a] wood) pertaining to being made or consisting of wood

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞木。指木這種物質。wood

Terms.Localization: wood as a substance

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞木柴。用作燃燒發熱的木材。firewood

Terms.Localization: wood as a substance used to burn for heat

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞樹。多年生木本植物，通常有一根長得很高的樹幹，從其上長出次生樹枝 。tree

Terms.Localization: a woody perennial plant, usually with a single trunk growing to a considerable height with branches that extend from the central trunk to the sides some distance from the ground

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞棒。用來打架的大木棍。club

Terms.Localization: a heavy stick used in fighting

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞足枷，木狗。一種用兩塊厚重木頭造成的刑具，可以牢牢地拴緊被放在木塊之間的雙腳。stocks

Terms.Localization: an instrument consisting of heavy blocks of wood through which the legs were placed and then securely fastened

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞十字架。（ξύλον「木」的引申義）一種死刑的刑具。cross

Terms.Localization: (a figurative extension of meaning of ξύλον[a] wood) an instrument of execution

Localization.Gloss: （隱喻）生活方式，道路。人們按照上帝的旨意應有的生活方式。(metaphorical) way to live, path

Terms.Localization: the manner in which people should lead their lives according to the Lord's will

Localization.Gloss: （上帝）的道。上帝的本性，作為。way (of the Lord, of God)

Terms.Localization: God's nature, actions

Localization.Gloss: 道。路加在《使徒行傳》中描述基督教運動所用的詞。the Way

Terms.Localization: Luke's term in Acts for the Christian movement

Localization.Gloss: 烏西雅；《和》烏西亞；《思》烏齊雅。耶穌家譜中的一員，是南國猶大的王。Uzziah

Terms.Localization: a Hebrew king in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞被單；亞麻布。一大塊布，很可能是亞麻布。sheet; linen sheet

Terms.Localization: a large piece of cloth, probably of linen

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞細麻布。一種用亞麻植物的莖製成的高品質布料，以其堅韌耐磨和涼爽而聞名。linen cloth

Terms.Localization: a high quality cloth made from the stems of the flax plant, known for its strength and coolness

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞親人，家人。屬於某個家庭或大家庭的人。household; member of household

Terms.Localization: one who belongs to a particular household or extended family

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞家僕，僕人。一個家庭的僕人。slave; household servant

Terms.Localization: a servant in a household

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞房屋；家；住處。人所居住的建築物或地方。house; home; dwelling; residence

Terms.Localization: a building or place where one dwells

Localization.Gloss: 建築物；建築。任何圍蔽一個區域的建築物或結構，但該區域可以是露天的，如圓形的露天劇場或競技場。building; structure

Terms.Localization: any type of building or structure which encloses an area, but the area may be open to the sky, as in the case of amphitheaters

Localization.Gloss: 建立；建造；建築物；房屋。建造某物，重點在建造起來的過程，或在建造帶來的結果。building up, strengthening

Terms.Localization: the construction of something, with focus on the event of building up or on the result of such an event

Localization.Gloss: 管家職責。一項涉及管理和組織的任務。stewardship

Terms.Localization: a task involving management and organization

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞管家；管理財務者，（城市的）司庫。對某事物有權力和責任的人。manager, steward, treasurer

Terms.Localization: one who has the authority and responsibility for something

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞上帝的聖殿，上帝的家。即耶路撒冷的聖殿。house (of God)

Terms.Localization: house (of God), i.e. the temple in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞世界；人類居住的地方。人類居住的地面，對比於上面的天空和下面的世界。world; inhabited earth; inhabited world

Terms.Localization: the surface of the earth as the dwelling place of mankind, in contrast with the heavens above and the world below

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞憐憫，慈愛，同情。表示憐憫和關心，有體恤和同情的含意。mercy; tender compassion

Terms.Localization: mercy and concern, with the implication of sensitivity and compassion

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞仁慈的，憐憫的。οἰκτίρω「憐憫」的衍生詞，指表示仁慈或憐憫。compassionate; merciful

Terms.Localization: (derivative of οἰκτίρω to have mercy) pertaining to showing mercy or compassion

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞憐憫，體恤。表示憐憫和關心，有體恤和同情的含意。have mercy; show compassion

Terms.Localization: to show mercy and concern, with the implication of sensitivity and compassion

Localization.Gloss: 房間；住處。人可以逗留的房間或住處（通常是屋子的一部分）。room; quarters

Terms.Localization: a room or quarters where one may stay (normally a part of a house)

Localization.Gloss: 酒。用葡萄汁製成的發酵飲料。wine

Terms.Localization: a fermented beverage made from the juice of grapes

Localization.Gloss: 新酒；葡萄汁。固定短語，指新近壓榨的葡萄汁，未發酵的，或在發酵的初始階段。new wine; grape juice

Terms.Localization: a set phrase referring to newly pressed grape juice, unfermented or in the initial stages of fermentation

Localization.Gloss: 小信。指相對缺乏信心。having little faith

Terms.Localization: pertaining to having relatively little faith

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞灰心的，喪志的。達到某個目標的動機有限或減弱。faint-hearted, discouraged

Terms.Localization: pertaining to having limited or diminished motivation for the attainment of some goal

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞完全的燒化祭，燔祭。獻給上帝並在祭壇上完全燒盡的祭牲。whole burnt offering

Terms.Localization: an animal which has been sacrificed to God and completely burned up on the altar

Localization.Gloss: 阿林巴（ā lín bā），《思》敖林帕。在《羅馬書》16章的問安名單中出現的一個基督徒。Olympas

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 驢駒；小驢。驢子的幼崽foal; colt

Terms.Localization: the young of a donkey

Localization.Gloss: 阿尼色弗（ā ní sè fú），《思》敖乃息佛洛。保羅和提摩太認識的基督徒，熱心事奉以弗所教會，並且殷勤服侍在羅馬被囚的保羅。Onesiphorus

Terms.Localization: a Christian mentioned in 2 Timothy

Localization.Gloss: 阿尼西謀（ā ní xī móu），《舊》阿尼西母，《思》敖乃息摩。這名字的意義是「有用的」。他是腓利門的奴隸，保羅的助手，也是歌羅西教會的一份子。Onesimus

Terms.Localization: a slave of Philemon

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞成熟的果子。植物的成熟果子（即已經可以食用的果子）。ripe fruit

Terms.Localization: the mature fruit of plants (that is, fruit which is ready for use)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞誓言，發誓。斷言陳述的真實性，如有不實，即呼籲神明來予以制裁。oath

Terms.Localization: declaration that affirms the truth of a statement by calling on a divine being to execute sanctions against a person if the statement in question is not true

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞神聖，聖潔。聖潔的品質，表達與人性品質相對比的神性品質。holiness; sanctity

Terms.Localization: the quality of holiness as an expression of the divine in contrast with the human

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞聖潔的；純潔的；神聖的。聖潔的，意思是具有高超的道德品格，並且擁有一些本質上神聖的品格，與人的品格相對。holy, pure, divine

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being holy in the sense of superior moral qualities and possessing certain essentially divine qualities in contrast with what is human

Localization.Gloss: 災難；災禍；遭殃；有禍。極度艱苦或痛苦的狀態。disaster; horror

Terms.Localization: a state of intense hardship or distress

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞從天上。所暗示的活動來源於天上，或是從天上而來。from heaven

Terms.Localization: the sky as a source or as a location from which implied movement takes place

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞天上；天空。地面以上的空間，包括從一個地平線橫跨至另一個地平線，拱懸於地面以上的穹蒼，也包括太陽、月亮和星辰。heaven; sky

Terms.Localization: space above the earth, including the vault arching high over the earth from one horizon to another, as well as the sun, moon, and stars

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞天上的，在天上的，從天上來的。與天堂有關的或位於天上的。heavenly

Terms.Localization: related to or located in heaven

Localization.Gloss: 《現》耳巴努（ěr bā nǔ），《和》耳巴奴（ěr bā nú），《思》吳爾巴諾。名字可以拼寫為 Urbane。他是在《羅馬書》16章的問安名單中出現的一個基督徒。Urbanus

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 烏利亞（wū lì yà），《思》烏黎雅。大衛忠心的勇士，拔示巴的丈夫。他的妻子是耶穌家譜中的一員。Uriah

Terms.Localization: a man whose wife is referred to in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 債務人；欠債人。欠債的人。debtor

Terms.Localization: a person who is in debt

Localization.Gloss: 罪人；冒犯者。犯了罪因而欠了道德債的人。sinner, offender

Terms.Localization: one who commits sin and thus incurs a moral debt

Localization.Gloss: 有義務去做的人；必須去做的人。有義務做某事的人。one who is under an obligation, one who must

Terms.Localization: one who is obligated to do something

Localization.Gloss: 債務；債。所欠的東西。debt

Terms.Localization: that which is owed

Localization.Gloss: 某人應該做的事，本分，責任。作為責任或社會義務而應該做的事。what one should do, duty

Terms.Localization: that which ought to be done as a matter of duty or social obligation

Localization.Gloss: 義務；本分；責任。出於責任感或由於承諾而必須做的事。obligation

Terms.Localization: that which one must do out of a sense of duty or as the result of commitment

Localization.Gloss: 罪；過犯；罪孽。因犯罪而欠下的道德債。wrong; sin; guilt

Terms.Localization: the moral debt incurred as the result of sin

Localization.Gloss: 欠；虧欠。由於先前接受了有價值的東西而有付款的義務。owe

Terms.Localization: to be under obligation to make a payment as the result of having previously received something of value

Localization.Gloss: 必須；必要；應該；有義務的。是必須的或不可缺少的，暗示那是有可能發生的事；鑒於道德上或法律上的要求而有義務去做。ought; must; be obligated; be bound (to an oath)

Terms.Localization: to be necessary or indispensable, with the implication of a contingency; to be obligatory in view of some moral or legal requirement

Localization.Gloss: 犯罪；得罪。對某人犯了罪，因而欠了道德債。 sin against; wrong

Terms.Localization: to commit a sin against someone and thus to incur moral debt

Localization.Gloss: 眼前的服侍，只是做給人看的。為了討好別人而服侍。eye-service

Terms.Localization: the act of serving with a view to impressing others

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞要塞，堡壘。stronghold

Terms.Localization: a strong military fortification

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞魚。用作食物的魚，或魚的肉用作食物。(cooked) fish

Terms.Localization: fish intended for food or the flesh of fish as food

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞未熟的無花果，晚造的無花果。無花果樹的果實，夏季末才長成（而且往往在成熟之前便掉下來）。late fig

Terms.Localization: fruit of the fig tree, produced late in the summer season (and often falling off before it ripens)

Localization.Gloss: 名字；人 ；……的種類；……的類型。一個人的名字或一個物件的名稱；引申義：可能暗指一個存在的實體，或與名字相關的個人；根據對一類實體的隱含指稱而產生的種類或類別。name; person, people; category of, being of the type that...

Terms.Localization: the proper name of a person or object; by extension, a person, possibly implying existence or relevance as individuals; category or kind, based on an implied designation for a class of entities

Localization.Gloss: 驢。家畜，與馬同科，但體型較小，耳朵較長；顏色從深褐色到淺褐色到灰色不等，偶爾也有白色的；用於乘騎，運載重物，或做其他工作。donkey; ass

Terms.Localization: domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; Equus Asinus africanus; used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞酸酒，葡萄酒醋。便宜的酸酒，顯然是窮人特別喜歡的飲料，有較好的解渴效果。sour wine, wine vinegar
