Terms.Localization: a cheap, sour wine (evidently a favorite beverage of poorer people and relatively effective in quenching thirst)

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞工具，器具。任何類型的工具或器具。tool; instrument; means

Terms.Localization: any type of tool or instrument

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞武器，兵器。打鬥用的兵器，可以是攻擊性還是防禦性的。weapon

Terms.Localization: an instrument used in fighting, whether offensive or defensive

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞誓言，發誓。斷言陳述的真實性，如有不實，即呼籲神明來予以制裁。oath

Terms.Localization: declaration that affirms the truth of a statement by calling on a divine being to execute sanctions against a person if the statement in question is not true

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞鳥。任何種類的鳥，野生的或家養的。bird

Terms.Localization: any kind of bird, wild or domestic

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞鳥。任何種類的鳥，野生的或家養的。bird

Terms.Localization: any kind of bird, wild or domestic

Localization.Gloss: 聖潔的；敬虔的。聖潔的，意思是具有高超的道德品格，並且擁有一些本質上神聖的品格，與人的品格相對。holy, devout

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being holy in the sense of superior moral qualities and possessing certain essentially divine qualities in contrast with what is human

Localization.Gloss: 聖者。上帝或彌賽亞。Holy One

Terms.Localization: God or the Messiah as the Holy One

Localization.Gloss: 蛇。無足的長形爬行動物；沒有眼瞼和外耳；通過蠕動或滑動來前行；有些品種有毒牙；象徵潛在和意想不到的危險；令人聯想到謊言、欺騙和迷惑人的教導。snake

Terms.Localization: long legless reptile; no eyelids or external ears; moves by wriggling or gliding; some species have a poisonous bite; symbol of lurking, unexpected danger; associated with lies, deception, and misleading teaching

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞羅網，陷阱，圈套。主要用於誘捕或網羅雀鳥的裝置。trap; snare

Terms.Localization: an object used for trapping or snaring, principally of birds

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞婢女，使女，女奴。女奴隸，可能作貼身女僕，因此帶有親切關懷的含義。maid; maidservant; woman servant; servant girl

Terms.Localization: a female slave, possibly serving as a personal servant and thus with the implication of kindly regard

Localization.Gloss: 孩童。少年人，通常指青春期之前，不區分性別。child

Terms.Localization: a young person, normally below the age of puberty and without distinction as to sex

Localization.Gloss: 奴僕。奴僕，可能是貼身的僕人，因而說的比較親切。servant; man servant

Terms.Localization: a slave, possibly serving as a personal servant and thus with the implication of kindly regard

Localization.Gloss: 新世界，新時代。一個世界更新的時代（特指彌賽亞的時代）。new world, new age

Terms.Localization: an era involving the renewal of the world (with special reference to the time of the Messiah)

Localization.Gloss: 旁非利亞（páng fēi lì yà），《思》旁非里雅。小亞細亞南部的一個省，新約時代羅馬帝國；在現今土耳其南部的海岸地區。Pamphylia

Terms.Localization: a province in the southern part of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 小旅店，客棧。供旅客住宿的地方。inn

Terms.Localization: a place for the lodging of travellers

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞客棧主人。負責管理客棧的人；人們只要付出一定的價格便可以在客棧裡獲得膳宿的安排。innkeeper; manager of a hotel

Terms.Localization: one who manages an inn as a place where people may obtain board and room at a price

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞武器和盔甲；全副軍裝。進攻或防禦戰爭中使用的全副軍裝（但通常強調防御性的裝備，包括頭盔、盾牌和胸甲）。weapons and armor

Terms.Localization: a complete set of instruments used in defensive or offensive warfare (usually, however, with emphasis upon defensive armament, including helmet, shield, breastplate)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞全能者。上帝的頭銜，字面意思：全能的。Almighty

Terms.Localization: a title for God, literally: all powerful

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞比喻，格言；表象，象徵。具有象徵意義的相對簡短的敘述。parable, allegory, figure of speech

Terms.Localization: a relatively short narrative with symbolic meaning

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞傳統。傳統教訓的內容。teaching; tradition

Terms.Localization: the content of traditional instruction

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞懇求，敦促；要求；請求；邀請，召喚。懇切而有禮地發出請求。ask for (earnestly); request; plead for; appeal to

Terms.Localization: to ask for something earnestly and with propriety

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞鼓勵，勸勉；安慰，鼓舞。用言語或非言語的方式使某人得著鼓勵或安慰。encourage; console

Terms.Localization: to cause someone to be encouraged or consoled, either by verbal or non-verbal means

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞違犯，不遵守，違背法律。違反既定的習俗或法律，有故意為之的含義。disobey, break the law, violate the law

Terms.Localization: to act contrary to established custom or law, with the implication of intent

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞觀察。密切注意。observation

Terms.Localization: the act of watching closely or diligently

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞樂園。義人死後可以幸福地生活的居所（通常相等於ὐρανός「天堂」）。paradise

Terms.Localization: a dwelling place of the righteous dead in a state of blessedness (generally equated with οὐρανός heaven)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞懇求；要求。懇切而有禮地發出請求。earnest request; appeal

Terms.Localization: asking for something earnestly and with propriety

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞鼓勵。用言語或非言語的方式使某人得著鼓勵或安慰。encouragement

Terms.Localization: causing someone to be encouraged or consoled, either by verbal or non-verbal means

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞慰助者，保惠師，代求者。可以被要求提供幫助或協助的人。Helper, Encourager, Advocate

Terms.Localization: one who may be called upon to provide help or assistance

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞罪，過錯。一個人在違背上帝旨意和律法時所犯的錯誤或失敗。transgression; trespass

Terms.Localization: what a person has done in transgressing the will and law of God by some false step or failure

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞徽號；裝飾船頭的像。用以識別的標誌，可能是船頭的雕飾。emblem; figurehead

Terms.Localization: an identifying emblem, possibly a carved figurehead at the prow of a ship

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞軍營，營房。士兵集中暫住的營地或兵營。soldiers quarters; barracks

Terms.Localization: a camp or barracks for soldiers

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞處女，年輕女子。青春期後為結婚和仍是處女的年輕女子（但在某些經文中，童貞並不是字詞意義的焦點所在）。virgin, maiden, young woman

Terms.Localization: A female person beyond puberty but not yet married and a virgin (though in some contexts virginity is not a focal component of meaning)

Localization.Gloss: 巴米拿（bā mǐ ná），《思》帕爾默納。早期教會選出的七人之一，幫助使徒管理教會的膳食問題。教會歷史傳說他在羅馬皇帝他雅努統治期間，在腓立比殉道。Parmenas

Terms.Localization: one of the seven helpers in the church in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞盤子，碟子。較淺的碟子，可能比 πίναξ 小一點；用陶土或金屬製成。plate; dish

Terms.Localization: a relatively flat dish, probably somewhat smaller than a πίναξ; made of baked clay or metal

Localization.Gloss: 父；父親。（上帝的頭銜，字面意思：父親）把超自然權威與關心自己子民兩方面結合在一起的那一位。Father

Terms.Localization: (title for God, literally: father) one who combines aspects of supernatural authority and care for his people

Localization.Gloss: 八羅巴（bā luó bā），《思》帕特洛巴。在《羅馬書》16章的問安名單中出現的一個基督徒。Patrobas

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 保羅（bǎo luó），《思》保祿。初期小亞細亞和希臘教會的建立者，自稱是外邦的使徒。保羅是他的希臘名字，他的猶太名字是掃羅。Paul

Terms.Localization: an apostle of Jesus Christ whose Hebrew name was Saul

Localization.Gloss: 保羅（bǎo luó），《思》保祿。塞浦路斯的總督，聖經稱他是個「通達人」。他在帕弗請了保羅、巴拿巴和馬可來傳講上帝的道，是《使徒行傳》中第一位聽福音的羅馬官員。Paul

Terms.Localization: Sergius Paulus, the governor of Cyprus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞豹。指兩種大型貓科動物：1. 金錢豹：身長約兩米，黃棕色，有花環狀的黑色斑點遍佈全身和尾巴；愛圍捕獵物；2. 獵豹：有斑點，體型比金錢豹略小，但腿較長；速度極快；象徵兇殘危險或速度。leopard

Terms.Localization: refers to two members of the large cat family: Panthera pardus - leopard; about 2 m in length and yellowish brown with black spots arranged in rosettes all over the body and tail; hunts by stalking prey; and Acinonyx jubatus - cheetah; spotted but are slightly smaller and have longer legs than leopards; extremely fast; symbol of violent danger or of speed (cheetah)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞寬容，放過。故意不理會或不關注某些東西或事件。passing over; leaving unpunished

Terms.Localization: the act of intentionally not regarding or being concerned about certain objects or events

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞逾越節。紀念猶太人從埃及的奴役中得釋放的猶太節日。Passover

Terms.Localization: the Jewish festival commemorating the deliverance of the Jews from Egypt

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞逾越節的羊羔。一隻特別挑選的羊羔（或這種羊羔的集合名詞），要在逾越節被殺和被吃，藉以記念以色列人離開埃及的事件。Passover lamb

Terms.Localization: a specially selected lamb (or a collective for all such lambs) killed and eaten during the festival commemorating the departure of Israel from Egypt

Localization.Gloss: 帕大喇（pà dà lǎ），《思》帕塔辣。保羅在第三次傳道旅程所經之地，位於小亞細亞西南角海邊的港口，在呂家省的南岸。Patara

Terms.Localization: a city in Lycia on the southwest coast of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 拔摩（海島）（bá mó (hăi dăo)），《思》帕特摩（海島）。愛琴海上一個細小的岩島。約翰被囚禁在這島上，看見異象，寫下啟示錄。Patmos

Terms.Localization: a small, rocky island in the Aegean Sea

Localization.Gloss: 帕弗（pà fú），《思》帕佛。在塞浦路斯的西南海岸，是羅馬帝國在當地的首府城市。Paphos

Terms.Localization: a city on the southwest coast of the island of Cyprus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞試探，誘惑，試驗。竭力或試圖使某人犯罪的行為。temptation

Terms.Localization: the act of trying to cause someone to sin

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞試探；誘捕；誘惑。竭力或試圖使某人犯罪。tempt

Terms.Localization: to endeavor or attempt to cause someone to sin

Localization.Gloss: 那試探人的。撒但就是那誘惑者。Tempter

Terms.Localization: Satan as the tempter

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞勸導，勸誘。使某人相信的方法。that which persuades; the means of convincing

Terms.Localization: the means by which someone is caused to believe

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞ 說服；使信服；勸導。說服某人相信某件事，並以該勸告為根據去行事。persuade; convince

Terms.Localization: to convince someone to believe something and to act on the basis of what is recommended

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞信靠；依靠；有（完全）信心；信心；信任。信任某事或某人，以至於完全依賴或信靠。rely on; trust in; depend on; have (complete) confidence in; confidence; trust

Terms.Localization: to believe in something or someone to the extent of placing reliance or trust in or on

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞斗篷；外套；長袍。任何類型的外衣。cloak; coat; robe

Terms.Localization: any type of outer garment

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞愛管閒事。干涉別人的事情。be a busybody

Terms.Localization: to meddle in the affairs of someone else

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞頭盔。頭部的防護裝備；用於戰爭中。helmet

Terms.Localization: protective armor covering the head; used in battle

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞生活，行事為人。按照習慣的方式去生活或行事，重點可能放在行為的連續性上。live, behave

Terms.Localization: to live or behave in a customary manner, with possible focus upon continuity of action

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞鴿子。亞洲野鴿：灰藍色的鳥，頸部羽毛有粉紅色光澤，尾尖呈黑色；大規模聚居，主要吃種子；一年有數次求偶、交配和築巢；築巢在岩石上；被用作食物和祭品；象徵迅速、溫順和純真。dove; pigeon

Terms.Localization: Asiatic Rock dove: bird with a blue-gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; Columba via; used as food and for sacrifices; regarded as swift, docile, and innocent

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞行割禮。切除男性生殖器的包皮，以此作為一種宗教儀式，表示分別為聖和種族認同。circumcise

Terms.Localization: to cut off the foreskin of the male genital organ as a religious rite involving consecration and ethnic identification

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞割禮。切除男性生殖器的包皮，以此作為一種宗教儀式，表示分別為聖和種族認同。circumcision

Terms.Localization: the act of cutting off the foreskin of the male genital organ as a religious rite symbolizing consecration and ethnic identification

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞愛管閒事的。指干涉別人的事情。being a busybody; meddling

Terms.Localization: pertaining to meddling in someone else's business

Localization.Gloss: 彼息氏（bǐ xī shì），《思》培爾息。在《羅馬書》16章的問安名單中出現的一名女信徒。Persis

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞鳥，飛禽。任何種類的鳥，野生的或家養的。bird

Terms.Localization: any kind of bird, wild or domestic

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞腳鍊，腳鐐。帶特殊鏈扣的金屬鏈，用來纏繞腳踝，限制囚犯的活動。fetter; shackle

Terms.Localization: metal chains with special links prepared to go around the ankles; used to restrict the movement of a prisoner

Localization.Gloss: 別迦摩（bié jiā mó），《思》培爾加摩。小亞細亞西北部的一個重要城市，當地教會是啟示錄作者致函的小亞細亞七個教會之一；位於今日土耳其西部，士每拿以北。Pergamum

Terms.Localization: an important city in northwest Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 別加（bié jiā），《思》培爾革。羅馬帝國旁非利亞的一個城，在小亞細亞南岸附近，位於今日土耳其南部。Perga

Terms.Localization: a city in Pamphylia, near the south coast of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 彼得（bǐ dé），《思》伯多祿。耶穌的十二門徒之一，初期教會的使徒，又稱為「西門」，亞蘭文名字是「磯法」，後者與希臘文「彼得」的意思同為「石頭」。Peter

Terms.Localization: the Greek name of the leader of the twelve apostles, who was also called Cephas and whose name was originally Simon

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞舵。位於船尾的一塊大木板，用來控制船隻航行的方向和航線。rudder

Terms.Localization: a large plank at the stern of a ship used to direct its course

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞芸香。一種芳香的常綠植物，常用作調味品。rue

Terms.Localization: an evergreen aromatic plant used for seasoning

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞口袋，旅行袋。旅行者（或乞丐）用以攜帶財物的袋子。travellers bag

Terms.Localization: a bag used by travellers (or beggars) to carry possessions

Localization.Gloss: 彼拉多（bĭ lā duō），《思》比拉多。公元26/27至36年羅馬帝國駐猶太地區的總督，主持耶穌的審判並下令把耶穌釘十字架。Pilate

Terms.Localization: a procurator of Judea who gave the order for the crucifixion of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞寫字板。細小的寫字板（通常是木製的）。tablet

Terms.Localization: a small writing tablet (normally made of wood)

Localization.Gloss: 彼西底（bǐ xī dǐ），《思》丕息狄雅。小亞細亞中部的地區，保羅和巴拿巴在傳道旅程中曾經過此地。Pisidia

Terms.Localization: a region in central Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 彼西底（bǐ xī dǐ）的，《思》丕息狄雅的。指與彼西底有關的。Pisidia

Terms.Localization: pertaining to Pisidia

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞信，相信；交託；託付（把東西託付人）。相信某事是真的，因此值得信任；委託某人照管。believe; entrust; be entrusted with (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to believe something to be true and, hence, worthy of being trusted; to entrust something to the care of someone

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞純的，真的。是純的，可能意味著有可以信賴的特質 。pure; genuine

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being pure, with the possible implication of a quality which can be trusted

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞確信。相信某事是真的。be convinced of

Terms.Localization: to come to believe something to be true

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞忠心的，信實的，值得信賴的；相信。指信靠的或被信靠。faithful, trustworthy; believer, believing

Terms.Localization: pertaining to trusting or being trusted

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞盤子，碟子。比較平的大盤子；用陶土或金屬製成。plate, platter

Terms.Localization: a relatively flat, large dish; for serving or eating food; made of clay or metal

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞信賴；信任；有信心；信仰；信靠 。相信以至於完全信任和倚靠的態度。faith; belief; pledge; fidelity

Terms.Localization: the attitude of believing to the extent of complete trust and reliance

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞確信，憑據。完全可信的事情。proof, evidence

Terms.Localization: that which is completely believable

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞版；碑。可以刻碑文的扁平石頭。tablet

Terms.Localization: a flat stone on which inscriptions could be made

Localization.Gloss: 滿心相信；絕對肯定；完全確信。完全肯定某事的真相。be fully assured, be fully convinced

Terms.Localization: to be completely certain of the truth of something

Localization.Gloss: 滿心相信；絕對肯定；完全確定。完全肯定某事的真相的態度。complete certainty, full assurance, full confidence

Terms.Localization: the attitude of being completely certain of the truth of something

Localization.Gloss: 完整地傳講。詳細敘述信息的內容。proclaim completely

Terms.Localization: to relate fully the content of a message

Localization.Gloss: 實現；成全；應驗。使事情發生，暗示要實現某個目的。to cause to happen; to make happen; to fulfill

Terms.Localization: to cause to happen, with the implication of fulfilling some purpose

Localization.Gloss: 小船。小漁船。small boat

Terms.Localization: small fishing boat

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞船。任何類型的船，小至加利利湖上的小漁船，大至大型的遠航船。boat; ship

Terms.Localization: any kind of boat, from small fishing boats as on Lake Galilee to large seagoing vessels

Localization.Gloss: 邪靈，污鬼。邪惡的超自然靈體，在禮儀上不潔淨，使人在禮儀上不潔淨。unclean spirit

Terms.Localization: an evil supernatural spirit which is ritually unclean and which causes persons to be ritually unclean

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞靈的，屬靈的。與一個人的靈性本質或靈性生命有關的。spiritual

Terms.Localization: pertaining to the spiritual nature or being of a person

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞屬靈地。與一個人的靈性本質或靈性生命有關。spiritually

Terms.Localization: pertaining to the spiritual nature or being of a person

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞ 靈；上帝的靈；聖靈。三位一體上帝第三個位格的頭銜，字面意思：靈。Spirit (of God)

Terms.Localization: a title for the third person of the Trinity, literally spirit

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞靈；邪靈，惡靈。非物質的超自然存在體，《新約》中最常見的邪靈。spirit; demon, evil spirit

Terms.Localization: a supernatural non-material being, most frequently evil in the NT

Localization.Gloss: 心靈，（人的）靈。潛在對上帝有感知和反應的非物質心理能力。(a person's) spirit

Terms.Localization: the non-material, psychological faculty which is potentially sensitive and responsive to the divine

Localization.Gloss: 聖靈。三位一體上帝第三個位格的頭銜，字面意思：靈。Holy Spirit

Terms.Localization: a title for the third person of the Trinity, literally spirit

Localization.Gloss: 惡魔；邪靈。邪惡的超自然生物或靈體。evil spirit

Terms.Localization: an evil supernatural being or spirit

Localization.Gloss: 到腳的長袍；長衣。到腳的長袍。robe reaching to the feet; long robe

Terms.Localization: a long outer garment reaching to the feet

Localization.Gloss: 羊群。指一群綿羊（πρόβατον）和／或山羊（αἴγειος）的集合名詞。flock

Terms.Localization: a collective for a group of sheep and/or goats

Localization.Gloss: 像羊群一樣的人。（ποίμνιον「羊群」的引申義，原義沒有出現在《新約》中）基督的追隨者，組成了一個定義明確、界限清晰的群組。people who are like a flock

Terms.Localization: figurative extension of the meaning "a herd of sheep or goats" to refer to the followers of Christ constituting a well-defined membership group

Localization.Gloss: 生活；行事為人。作為某個社群的一份子，與其他人相處時有恰當的行為表現，知道履行自己的義務。live; conduct

Terms.Localization: to conduct oneself with proper reference to one's obligations in relationship to others, as part of some community

Localization.Gloss: ＜副＞充滿憐憫地。有極大的愛心和憐憫的。full of compassion

Terms.Localization: pertaining to great affection and compassion

Localization.Gloss: 那惡者；邪惡的人 。那本質上是邪惡的，或在某種意義上是象徵邪惡的（魔鬼的頭銜，字面意思：那惡者）。the Evil One

Terms.Localization: the one who is essentially evil or in a sense personifies evil (title for the devil, literally: the evil one)

Localization.Gloss: 本都人；本都的。指與本都有關的。of Pontus

Terms.Localization: pertaining to Pontus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞姦淫，淫亂，不道德的性行為；不貞。fornication; sexual immorality

Terms.Localization: the act of engaging in sexual immorality of any kind, often with the implication of prostitution

Localization.Gloss: 從事不正當的性行為。任何形式的不道德性行為，經常暗示賣淫。engage in illicit sex

Terms.Localization: to engage in sexual immorality of any kind, often with the implication of prostitution

Localization.Gloss: 紫色布。紫紅色的布，用一種從骨螺取得的物質來染色；生產成本昂貴；令人聯想到財富和王權。purple cloth

Terms.Localization: a reddish-purple cloth dyed with a substance obtained from the murex shellfish; expensive to produce; associated with royalty

Localization.Gloss: 部丟利（bù diū lì），《思》頗提約里。羅馬南部、意大利沿岸的一個城，拿坡里灣中的港口，建於公元前6世紀。Puteoli

Terms.Localization: a city on the coast of Italy, south of Rome

Localization.Gloss: 布田（bù tián），《思》普登。保羅的同伴，只在《提摩太後書》的問候中提及。布田是羅馬元老院議員，在尼祿的統治下為主殉道。在公元6世紀被封為聖徒。Pudens

Terms.Localization: a Christian who sends greetings

Localization.Gloss: 《現》龐修（páng xiū），《和》本丟（bĕn diū），《思》般雀。比拉多的另一個名字。 Pontius

Terms.Localization: an additional name for Pilate

Localization.Gloss: 本都（běn dū），《思》本都。意思是「海」。小亞細亞東北部的一個地區。Pontus

Terms.Localization: a region in northeast Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 部百流（bù bǎi liú），《思》頗理約。在馬耳他島上擁有最大權力的人，是該島的島長或酋長。Publius

Terms.Localization: the person who had the principal authority on the island of Malta

Localization.Gloss: 波求（bō qiú），《思》頗爾基約。公元59年接替腓力斯就任猶太地區的總督。根據歷史家約瑟夫的記載，非斯都是一個能幹的行政官，可惜在任數年就死了。Porcius

Terms.Localization: Porcius Festus, the successor to Felix as procurator of Palestine

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞宮殿；堡壘。總督的住所。palace; fortress

Terms.Localization: a governor's official residence

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞長老團，眾長老。由眾長老組成的議會，這詞強調成熟的判斷力，過於他們的年齡。council of elders

Terms.Localization: a council of elders, with emphasis upon maturity of judgment more than mere age

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞長老。在猶太人和基督徒社群中，對社會和宗教事務有責任和權柄的人。elder

Terms.Localization: a person of responsibility and authority in matters of socio-religious concerns, both in Jewish and Christian societies

Localization.Gloss: 百基拉（bǎi jī lā），《思》普黎史拉／普黎斯加。亞居拉的妻子，兩人是一對猶太的基督徒夫婦，生在本都。當羅馬皇帝革老丟下令所有猶太人離開羅馬時，他們移居到哥林多城。Prisca

Terms.Localization: the wife of Aquila

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞以前犯罪。以前的行為違背了上帝的旨意和律法。sin previously, do wrong in the past

Terms.Localization: to have behaved previously or in the past in a way that was contrary to the will and law of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞門廊；前院。位於建築物入口前面的區域。gateway; forecourt

Terms.Localization: the area in front of an entrance to a building

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞第一個有盼望；首先有希望。預先有盼望，指事先或先於其他人有盼望。hope previously, be the first to hope

Terms.Localization: to hope in a prior manner, either beforehand or prior to someone else

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞從開始就答應，很久以前應許。提前確定地宣告將會做什麼。promise beforehand

Terms.Localization: to announce with certainty in advance as to what one will do

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞事先（早已）傳好消息。在耶穌基督出現之前已經傳講關於祂的好消息。bring the good news ahead of time

Terms.Localization: to spread the good news about Jesus Christ in advance of its happening

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞安息日前一天，星期五。安息日的前一天，是預備安息日的日子。day before the Sabbath, Friday

Terms.Localization: the day immediately before the Sabbath, a day of preparation for the Sabbath

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞禱告；祈禱。向上帝說話或祈求的行為或內容。prayer

Terms.Localization: the act or content of speaking to or making requests of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞禱告。向上帝說話或提出請求。pray

Terms.Localization: to speak to or to make requests of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞皈依猶太教者；歸信者。歸信猶太教的外邦人。Jewish convert, proselyte

Terms.Localization: a Gentile who had converted to Judaism

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞墊子，枕頭。用來枕頭的物件，通常是柔軟的。cushion; pillow

Terms.Localization: an object, usually soft, on which one may lay one's head

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞障礙；困難；使人犯罪。可能遇到的障礙或困難。obstacle, difficulty, cause for stumbling

Terms.Localization: an obstacle or difficulty which may be encountered

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞跌倒，絆倒，失足。走路時腳撞著東西，因而暫時失去平衡。stumble

Terms.Localization: to strike one's foot against something as one walks and in this way to lose one's balance temporarily

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞崇拜，敬拜；跪拜，俯拜。用態度、可能還有身體姿態來表達對神明的忠誠和尊敬。bow down; worship

Terms.Localization: to express by attitude and possibly by position one's allegiance to and regard for deity

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞敬拜者。敬拜的人。worshiper

Terms.Localization: one who worships

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞魚。作為食物的新鮮魚肉。fish

Terms.Localization: the flesh of fish as food

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞供，獻（特別是禮物與祭物）；獻祭。獻上祭物或祭品，作為一種宗教儀式。offer sacrifice; make an offering

Terms.Localization: to present a sacrifice or offering as a religious act

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞令人喜悅的，可愛的。使人喜悅某事的東西。lovely, pleasing

Terms.Localization: pertaining to that which causes people to be pleased with something

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞供獻，獻祭，禮物；供獻或獻祭的行為。offering

Terms.Localization: that which is offered to God in religious activity

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞偏袒，偏待人。對人進行不公正的區分，對待某人比對待另一個人更好。show partiality; show favoritism, be partial; partiality

Terms.Localization: to make unjust distinctions between people by treating one person better than another

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞偏待人的人。προσωπολημπτέω「偏待人」的衍生詞，指對待某個人比另一個人好的人。one who shows favoritism; respecter of persons

Terms.Localization: (derivative of προσωπολημπτέω to show favoritism) one who unjustly treats one person better than another

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞偏袒，偏待人。對待某個人比另一人好而造成的偏袒。partiality

Terms.Localization: making unjust distinctions between people by treating one person better than another

Localization.Gloss: 說預言。受上帝的靈感動說話，不管是否談及未來的事件。to prophesy

Terms.Localization: to speak under the influence of divine inspiration, with or without reference to future events

Localization.Gloss: 先知的。指上帝默示的話語。prophetic

Terms.Localization: pertaining to divinely inspired utterances

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞先知。代表上帝發言的人。prophet

Terms.Localization: one who proclaims inspired utterances on behalf of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞女先知。受聖靈感動代表上帝宣講信息的女子 。prophetess

Terms.Localization: a woman who proclaims inspired utterances on behalf of God

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞綿羊。馴養的四足食草哺乳動物；肥尾巴綿羊；用於祭祀，肉、奶、皮、毛、角都可使用。sheep

Terms.Localization: herbivorous domestic mammal with four legs; Ovis ladicaudata - fat-tailed sheep; used for sacrifice, source of meat, milk, hides, wool, and horns

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞偏見。根據不公正的偏好來做決定，暗示是過早判斷。discrimination

Terms.Localization: the act of making a decision based upon unjustified preference, with the implication of prejudging

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞絆腳石。使人絆跌的東西；引申義：使人犯罪的事情。stumbling; stumbling block

Terms.Localization: that which causes someone to stumble; or, by extension, that which causes someone to sin

Localization.Gloss: 伯羅哥羅（bó luó gē luó），《思》仆洛曷洛。早期耶路撒冷教會揀選的七個人之一，幫助使徒管理教會的膳食問題。Prochorus

Terms.Localization: one of the seven helpers in the church in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞船尾。船的尾部。stern

Terms.Localization: the back part of a boat

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞船頭。船的最前部。bow

Terms.Localization: the forepart of a boat

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞跌倒，犯錯誤，犯罪。（πταίω「跌倒」的引申義）沒有遵行律法。stumble, sin

Terms.Localization: (figurative extension of πταίω stumble) to fail to keep the law

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞小尖塔；（聖殿的）頂點。建築物的頂尖或頂點。pinnacle; summit (of the Temple)

Terms.Localization: the tip or high point of a building

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞鳥。任何種類的鳥，包括野鳥和馴養的鳥。bird

Terms.Localization: any kind of bird, wild or domestic

Localization.Gloss: 多利買（duō lì mǎi），《思》仆托肋買。是巴勒斯坦北部沿岸的重要海港，即舊約時代的「亞柯」，現今譯作「托勒密」。Ptolemais

Terms.Localization: a seaport on the coast of Palestine (called Acco in OT times)

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞簸箕。一種鏟狀的器具，用來把已脫粒的穀物揚到空中，利用風力使粗糠與穀粒分離。winnowing shovel

Terms.Localization: a fork-like shovel for throwing threshed grain into the air so that the wind may separate the chaff from the grain

Localization.Gloss: 通道；入口；門廊。與房屋入口或建築物入口相連的區域。gateway; entrance; vestibule

Terms.Localization: the area associated with the entrance into a house or building

Localization.Gloss: 城門。通過城墻進到城裡的入口。city gate

Terms.Localization: entranceway into a city through its defensive wall

Localization.Gloss: 永恆之火的懲罰。（πῦρ「火」的引申義）形容地獄中永遠的懲罰。punishment of eternal fire

Terms.Localization: (figurative extension of πῦρ fire) expression for eternal punishment in hell

Localization.Gloss: 神明的力量。一種用於占卜的超自然力量。divining power

Terms.Localization: a supernatural power of divination known as Python

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞高樓；瞭望塔。頂部有瞭望台的高樓；用石砌成；用於看守葡萄園或人們聚居的地方。tower; watchtower

Terms.Localization: a tall structure with a lookout at the top; made of stone; for guarding a vineyard or a settlement

Localization.Gloss: 畢羅斯（bì luó sī），《思》丕洛。庇哩亞人，所巴特的父親，所巴特是與保羅一起往亞西亞傳道的同伴之一。Pyrrhus

Terms.Localization: a companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 怒火；列怒之火。（πῦρ「火」的引申義）形容上帝的刑罰。fury of fire; raging fire

Terms.Localization: (figurative extension of πῦρ fire) expression for divine punishment

Localization.Gloss: 永恆之火。（πῦρ「火」的引申義）形容地獄中永遠的懲罰。eternal fire

Terms.Localization: (figurative extension of πῦρ fire) expression for eternal punishment in hell

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞小驢駒。驢子的幼崽。foal; colt

Terms.Localization: the young of a donkey

Localization.Gloss: 喇合；《思》辣哈布。耶穌家譜中的一個女性，舊約耶利哥城一名妓女，曾接待以色列的探子，後得蒙拯救；Ραχάβ的另一種拼寫法。Rahab

Terms.Localization: a woman of Jericho mentioned in the genealogy of Jesus; also known as Ῥαχάβ

Localization.Gloss: 拉比；老師。尊貴的頭銜，特指在解釋猶太聖經方面的備受認可的猶太教師和學者。Rabbi

Terms.Localization: title of respect designating a Jewish teacher and scholar recognized for expertise in interpreting the Jewish Scriptures

Localization.Gloss: 拉吳（lā wú），《思》勒伍。耶穌家譜中的一員。Reu

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 理番（lǐ fān），《思》楞番。外邦人的土星神明的巴比倫名字。Rephan

Terms.Localization: a pagan God

Localization.Gloss: 拉瑪（lā mǎ），《思》辣瑪。便雅憫支族領域內的一座城，位於以色列和猶大兩國的邊境上，在耶路撒冷以北大約8公里的地方。Ramah

Terms.Localization: a city north of Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞針。細長的縫紉工具，一端是尖的，另一端有穿線的孔，用來把線穿過布料。needle

Terms.Localization: a small, slender tool, pointed on one end and with a hole at the other end, used in passing thread through cloth in sewing

Localization.Gloss: 喇合（lǎ hé），《思》辣哈布。耶穌家譜中的一員，是耶利哥城的一個妓女。她敬畏上帝，救了約書亞派往耶利哥的兩名探子的性命。Rahab

Terms.Localization: a woman of Jericho mentioned in the genealogy of Jesus; also known as Ῥαάβ

Localization.Gloss: 《現》蕾潔（lěi jié），《和》拉結（lā jié），《思》辣黑耳。雅各偏愛的妻子，利亞的妹妹。Rachel

Terms.Localization: the wife of Jacob

Localization.Gloss: 拐杖；棍杖 。長約 1-2 米的棍杖；用於步行，放牧，驅趕野獸，打人等。stick; rod

Terms.Localization: a rod about 1-2 m. long; used for walking, herding, fighting off wild animals, beating people

Localization.Gloss: 杖。裝飾過的棍杖，通常至少有一小部分由貴金屬製成，象征統治者的權威。scepter

Terms.Localization: a decorated rod, often made at least partially of a precious metal, symbolizing the authority of the ruler

Localization.Gloss: 布塊。縫在衣物上用來修補破洞或撕裂的布塊。patch

Terms.Localization: piece of cloth or leather sewn on clothing or shoes to repair a hole or tear

Localization.Gloss: 《現》麗百加（lì bǎi jiā），《和》利百加（lì bǎi jiā），《思》黎貝加。以撒的妻子，以掃和雅各的母親。Rebecca

Terms.Localization: the wife of Isaac

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞馬車。一種四輪馬車或運貨車，供旅行和搬運重物之用。carriage; wagon

Terms.Localization: a four-wheeled carriage or wagon used for travel or the transportation of loads

Localization.Gloss: 利撒（lì sā），《思》勒撒。所羅巴伯的兒子，《路加福音》耶穌家譜中的一員。Rhesa

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 利基翁（lì jī wēng），《思》勒基雍。位於現今意大利南部一個海角上的港口城市。Rhegium

Terms.Localization: a city on a promontory in the south of Italy

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞字詞；言語；一句話；信息；陳述。最小的話語單位，通常是一個單詞；已經陳述的事情或說出的話語，焦點主要放在交流的內容上。word, saying; message, statement

Terms.Localization: a minimal unit of discourse, often a single word; that which has been stated or said, with primary focus upon the content of the communication

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞根。植物在地下的部分。root

Terms.Localization: the underground part of a plant

Localization.Gloss: 羅波安（luó bō ān），《思》勒哈貝罕。耶穌家譜中的一員，是所羅門王的兒子和繼承人。他是聯合王國的最後一位君王，也是南國猶大的第一位君王。Rehoboam

Terms.Localization: a Hebrew king in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 呂便（lǚ biàn），《舊》呂便，《思》勒烏本。這名字的意義是「有兒子」。他是雅各和利亞所生的第一個兒子，是呂便支族的祖先。Reuben

Terms.Localization: the oldest son of Jacob and ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 路得（lù dé），《思》盧德。波阿斯的妻子，以色列最偉大的君王大衛的曾祖母，耶穌家譜中的一員。Ruth

Terms.Localization: the wife of Boaz in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 魯孚（lǔ fú），《思》魯富。古利奈人西門的兒子。Rufus

Terms.Localization: a son of Simon (4) of Cyrene

Localization.Gloss: 魯孚（lǔ fú），《思》魯富。《羅馬書》16章保羅所問候的一個傑出的基督徒。Rufus

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 羅大（luó dà），《思》洛德。約翰馬可的母親馬利亞家中的女僕。Rhoda

Terms.Localization: a maidservant in the house of Μαρία Maria(6)

Localization.Gloss: 羅底（luó dǐ），《思》洛多。小亞細亞西南海岸的一個海島，位於土耳其西南角的海中。Rhodes

Terms.Localization: an island off the southwest coast of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞拯救，解救。從危險中救出來，暗示那危險是嚴重和急迫的。deliver; rescue

Terms.Localization: to rescue from danger, with the implication that the danger in question is severe and acute

Localization.Gloss: 羅馬人（luó mǎ rén）／從羅馬來的，《思》羅馬人。羅馬本地的人，或居住在羅馬的人，或羅馬帝國的公民。Roman; person from Rome

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Rome or a citizen of the Roman Empire

Localization.Gloss: 羅馬（luó mǎ），《思》羅馬。羅馬帝國的首都，也是地中海世界最大的城市。Rome

Terms.Localization: the capital city of the Roman Empire

Localization.Gloss: 《現》萬軍（的統帥）（wàn jūn (de tǒng shuài)），《和》萬軍（之主）（wàn jūn (zhī zhǔ)），《思》萬軍（的上主）。（一個希伯來語的希臘語音譯詞，意為「軍隊」，與 κύριος[a]「主」 連用，作為上帝的頭銜「萬軍之主」）指擁有難以抵擋之勢的那一位。Sabaoth

Terms.Localization: (a Greek transliteration of a Hebrew word meaning armies and used with κύριος Lord, as a title for God) pertaining to one who has overwhelming power

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞安息日的休息。一段有特別宗教意義的時期，用於休息和敬拜。Sabbath rest

Terms.Localization: a special religiously significant period for rest and worship

Localization.Gloss: 半英里；一公里；安息日可走的路程。安息日可走的路程，略超過半英里，約 1 公里。half a mile, one kilometer, Sabbath journey

Terms.Localization: a Sabbath day's journey, somewhat over half a mile and about one kilometer

Localization.Gloss: 圍網。捕魚用的長圍網。seine net

Terms.Localization: a long seine net used to catch fish

Localization.Gloss: 撒都該人（sā dū gāi rén），《思》撒杜塞人。耶穌和使徒時代耶路撒冷一個有政治影響力的猶太人政黨的成員。撒都該人的組織比法利賽人小，但經常佔著重要的政治和宗教職位。撒都該人和法利賽人的主要分歧，包括撒都該人不相信死人可以復活，以及他們只接受舊約的摩西五經。Sadducee

Terms.Localization: a member of a politically influential Jewish party in Jerusalem at the time of Jesus and the apostles, a smaller group than the Pharisees, but often in control of important political and religious positions. Their denial of the resurrection of the dead and their acceptance of only the first five books of the OT are important elements in some of the differences which arose between the Sadducees and the Pharisees

Localization.Gloss: 撒督（sā dū），《思》匝多克。耶穌家譜中的一員。Zadok

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 撒拉鐵（sā lā tiě），《思》沙耳提耳。 耶穌家譜中的一員。猶大王約雅斤（耶哥尼雅）的兒子，是猶太人被擄歸回的領袖所羅巴伯的父親。Shealtiel

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 撒拉米（sā lā mǐ），《思》撒拉米。塞浦路斯東南岸的一座城。Salamis

Terms.Localization: a city on the southeast coast of Cyprus

Localization.Gloss: 撒門（sā mén），《思》撒拉。耶穌家譜中的一員，拿順的兒子，波阿斯的父親，也是大衞和耶穌的先祖。Sala; Salmon

Terms.Localization: the father of Boaz in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 沙拉（shā lā），《思》舍拉。耶穌家譜中的一員, 希伯的父親。Sala

Terms.Localization: the father of Eber in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 撒冷（sā lěng），《思》撒林。撒瑪利亞北面的一個地方，確實位置不詳。Salim

Terms.Localization: a place in northern Samaria (location uncertain)

Localization.Gloss: 撒冷（sā lěng），《思》撒冷。字義為「平安」。麥基洗德作王的地方；βασιλεὺς Σαλήμ「撒冷之王」可以理解為「和平之王」，因此可被視為一個表示敬意的名稱。Salem

Terms.Localization: a place of which Melchizedek was king; the expression βασιλεὺς Σαλήμ king of Salem may be interpreted as king of peace, and as such it may be regarded as an honorific name

Localization.Gloss: 撒摩尼（sā mó ní），《思》撒耳摩訥。克里特島東北部的一個海角。Salmone

Terms.Localization: a promontory on the northeast corner of Crete

Localization.Gloss: 撒門（sā mén），《思》撒耳孟。耶穌家譜中的一員，拿順的兒子，波阿斯的父親，也是大衞和耶穌的先祖。Salmon

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞吹號角者，吹喇叭者。σαλπίζω「吹號角」的衍生詞，指吹號角的人。trumpeter

Terms.Localization: (derivative of σαλπίζω[a] to play the trumpet) one who plays the trumpet

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞吹號角，吹喇叭。σάλπιγξ「號角」的衍生詞。發出號角的聲音。play the trumpet, blow the trumpet

Terms.Localization: (derivative of σάλπιγξ[a] trumpet) to produce sound with a trumpet

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞吹號角，吹喇叭。發出號角的聲音（沒有明確說明有吹號的人）。sound a trumpet; a trumpet sounds

Terms.Localization: to produce the sound of a trumpet (without specification of an agent)

Localization.Gloss: 撒羅米（sā luó mǐ），《思》撒羅默。一個跟隨耶穌的加利利婦人，她目睹耶穌受難，也是發現空墳墓的人。Salome

Terms.Localization: a Galilean woman who followed Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 撒馬利亞人（sā mǎ lì yà rén）／撒馬利亞的，《舊》撒瑪利亞人，《思》撒瑪黎雅人。撒馬利亞的本地人。新約時代的撒馬利亞人是種族混合的後代。由於他們不是正統的猶太人，所以受到猶太人的歧視，兩者互不來往。他們仍然遵守許多的猶太傳統。不過，他們是在基利心山上敬拜上帝，而不在耶路撒冷。Samaritan; person from Samaria

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Samaria

Localization.Gloss: 《現》撒馬利亞女人（sā mǎ lì yà nǚ rén），《和》撒馬利亞婦人，《舊》撒瑪利亞婦人，《思》撒瑪黎雅婦人。一個撒馬利亞本地的女人。Samaritan woman; woman from Samaria

Terms.Localization: a woman who is a native of Samaria

Localization.Gloss: 撒馬利亞（sā mǎ lì yà），《舊》撒瑪利亞，《思》撒瑪黎雅。新約時代的撒馬利亞不是指一個城鎮，而是指巴勒斯坦中部的一個地區。Samaria

Terms.Localization: a region in the central part of Palestine

Localization.Gloss: 撒馬利亞（sā mǎ lì yà），《舊》撒瑪利亞，《思》撒瑪黎雅。是撒馬利亞地區主要的城市。Samaria

Terms.Localization: the principal city of Samaria

Localization.Gloss: 撒摩特喇（sā mó tè lǎ），《思》撒摩辣刻。位於愛琴海北部的一個小島。Samothrace

Terms.Localization: an island in the northern Aegean Sea

Localization.Gloss: 撒母耳（sā mǔ ěr），《思》撒慕爾。以色列的最後一個士師，早期的舊約先知，屬於以法蓮支族。Samuel

Terms.Localization: an early OT prophet

Localization.Gloss: 參孫（cān sūn），《思》三松。一位以色列士師，屬於但支族，是一個大力士，曾帶領以色列人抵抗非利士人。Samson

Terms.Localization: one of the judges of Israel in the OT

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞涼鞋。鞋類，鞋底是皮革（也可能是木），用皮带固定在腳上。sandal

Terms.Localization: a type of footwear consisting of a sole made of leather (or possibly wood) tied to the foot by means of thongs or straps

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞木板。大塊的木板或厚木板。plank

Terms.Localization: large board or plank of wood

Localization.Gloss: 掃羅（sǎo luó），《思》掃祿。使徒保羅的猶太名字。Saul

Terms.Localization: the Hebrew name of the apostle Paul

Localization.Gloss: 掃羅（sǎo luó），《思》撒烏耳。以色列的第一個王。Saul

Terms.Localization: the first king of Israel in the OT

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞筐子；大籃子。通常用草或蘆葦織成的大容器；用來攜帶各種物品，包括食品和商品，也會用來搬運泥土。basket

Terms.Localization: a large container made of woven material, usually grass or reeds; used for carrying a variety of things, including food and produce, and for moving soil from one place to another

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞屬物質的，物質上的；屬肉體的；屬血氣的。屬物質的或物質上的，可能有低一等的含意。material (things); carnal; fleshly

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being material or physical, with the possible implication of inferior

Localization.Gloss: 沙崙（shā lún），《思》沙龍。巴勒斯坦沿岸的平原，位於約帕和迦密山之間，大約有10-20公里寬，80公里長，是一塊肥沃的土地，植物生長豐茂，適合牧放。Sharon

Terms.Localization: the plain along the coast of Palestine

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞魔鬼撒但，《思》撒殫。（從希伯來文和亞蘭文而來的借用詞，字面意思：敵對者）通常是魔鬼的固有名稱。Satan

Terms.Localization: (a borrowing from Hebrew and Aramaic, literally: adversary) the usual proper name of the Devil

Localization.Gloss: 掃羅（sǎo luó），《思》掃祿。Σαούλ的另一種拼寫法，使徒保羅的希伯來名字。Saul

Terms.Localization: an alternative form of Σαούλ Saul, the Hebrew name of the apostle Paul

Localization.Gloss: 安息日；星期六。一週的第七日或最後一日（在宗教上是最重要的一日，因為這是分別為聖用來敬拜上帝的日子）。Sabbath, Saturday

Terms.Localization: the seventh or last day of the week (religiously the most important since it was consecrated to the worship of God)

Localization.Gloss: 一週；一個星期。一段長度為七天的時間。week

Terms.Localization: a period of seven days

Localization.Gloss: 粗麻布。一種厚重的布料，通常用來做麻袋；人們哀痛時會披麻，表示懺悔。sackcloth

Terms.Localization: a heavy material normally used for making sacks, but worn by persons in mourning and as a sign of repentance

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞號角，號筒，喇叭。金屬製的管樂器；常用於發信號，尤其是打仗的時候。trumpet

Terms.Localization: a musical wind instrument; made of metal; frequently used in signaling, especially in connection with war

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞喇叭聲，號角的聲音。σαλπίζω「吹號角」的衍生詞，指吹號發出的響聲。trumpet blast; trumpet sound

Terms.Localization: (derivative of σαλπίζω[a] to play the trumpet) the sound made by a trumpet

Localization.Gloss: 撒摩（sā mó），《思》撒摩。小亞細亞西海岸外的一個島嶼，與陸地相隔不遠，位於以弗所西南數公里處。Samos

Terms.Localization: an island off the west coast of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 撒非喇（sā fēi lǎ），《思》撒斐辣。耶路撒冷教會的成員，亞拿尼亞的妻子。她和丈夫隱瞞奉獻財產的數量，因欺哄上帝而受罰致死。Sapphira

Terms.Localization: the wife of Ἀνανίας Ananias(1)

Localization.Gloss: 撒狄（sā dí），《思》撒爾德。小亞細亞西部的一個城，在士每拿以東。《啟示錄》作者致函的小亞細亞七教會之一就在這裡。Sardis

Terms.Localization: a city in western Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 撒勒法（sā lè fǎ），《思》匝爾法特。地中海岸的一個腓尼基城，在西頓和泰爾之間。Zarephath

Terms.Localization: a city on the coast of Phoenicia between Tyre and Sidon

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞世俗的；屬世的，屬肉體的。屬於典型的人性行為，但是重點特別放在更基本的生理或身體慾望上。carnal; fleshly

Terms.Localization: pertaining to behavior which is typical of human nature, but with special focus upon more base physical desires

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞肉體，身體；人，人類，世人；人的，物質的本性；人性；性命。動物和人類的身體；活的物體或生命體；作為自然存在、有血有肉的人；人的本性，强調肉體方面；人性的心理層面，對比於靈性；肉體的生命。flesh; body, physical body; people, human being; physical nature, human; human nature; life

Terms.Localization: the muscles and sinews of both animals and humans; a living body; humans as physical beings; human nature, with emphasis on the physical; the psychological aspect of human nature in contrast to the spiritual nature; physical life

Localization.Gloss: 《現》莎拉（shā lā），《和》撒拉（sā lā），《思》撒辣。亞伯拉罕的妻子，以撒的母親，她原名叫撒萊。Sarah

Terms.Localization: the wife of Abraham

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞崇拜，敬奉。用態度和禮儀來表明自己對神明的效忠和尊敬。worship

Terms.Localization: to express in attitude and ritual one's allegiance to and regard for deity

Localization.Gloss: 幽暗的鎖鏈。一種用來捆綁的柔韌工具，用金屬或纖維製成；這裡指地獄的黑暗捆瑣。chains of gloom

Terms.Localization: a pliable instrument for binding, made of metal or fiber, here as a binding in the darkness of the underworld

Localization.Gloss: 西公都（xī gōng dū），《思》色貢多。帖撒羅尼迦的外邦信徒，保羅從希臘至耶路撒冷最後一次宣教旅程的同伴。Secundus

Terms.Localization: a Christian of Thessalonica who was a companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 西流基（xī liú jī），《思》色婁基雅。位於地中海的東北角，是敘利亞的港口城市。Seleucia

Terms.Localization: the port city of Antioch in Syria

Localization.Gloss: 西美（xī měi），《思》史米。耶穌家譜中的一員。Semein

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 西鹿（xī lù），《思》色魯格。耶穌家譜中的一員。Serug

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞敬拜的對象；崇拜的對象。受敬拜的對象。object of worship; object of veneration

Terms.Localization: an object which is worshiped

Localization.Gloss: 敬拜；崇拜。用態度和禮儀來表明自己對神明的效忠和尊敬。worship

Terms.Localization: to express in attitude and ritual one's allegiance to and regard for deity

Localization.Gloss: 士求；《思》色爾爵。士求·保羅，塞浦路斯的總督。Sergius

Terms.Localization: Sergius Paulus, the governor of Cyprus

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞神蹟，記號。被視為具有某種特殊意義的事件。sign

Terms.Localization: an event which is regarded as having some special meaning

Localization.Gloss: 塞特（sāi tè），《思》舍特。耶穌家譜中的一員，亞當的兒子，以挪士的父親。Seth

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 閃（shǎn），《思》閃。耶穌家譜中的一員，挪亞的兒子，亞法撒的父親。Shem

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞飛蛾。短小的棕色或灰色蛾子，會產卵在衣服或其他織物上；蛾卵孵化成非常小的毛蟲，以纖維為食；谷蛾科，可能是網衣蛾；象徵朽爛、破壞和慢慢地毀滅。moth

Terms.Localization: smallish brown or gray moth that lays eggs in clothing or other cloth; eggs hatch into very small caterpillars, which feed on the fibers; Tineidae family, probably Tineola biselliella; symbols of decay, ruin, and slow destruction

Localization.Gloss: 西頓的人（xī dùn de rén），《思》漆冬的人。西頓本地的人。Sidonian

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Sidon

Localization.Gloss: 西頓（的）（xī dùn (de)），《思》漆冬（的）。屬於西頓的。from Sidon

Terms.Localization: pertaining to Sidon

Localization.Gloss: 西頓（xī dùn），《思》漆冬。古代的腓尼基沿岸的一個城市，位於地中海東岸，大約在泰爾以北40公里的地方，是一個商業都市和港口。Sidon

Terms.Localization: a city on the coast of Phoenicia

Localization.Gloss: 西拉（xī lā），《思》息拉。初期教會的一位領導人。他和保羅同工，耶路撒冷教會選派他跟保羅和巴拿巴一同送信到安提阿教會。Silas

Terms.Localization: a Christian in the Jerusalem church and an associate of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 西拉（xī lā），《思》息拉；息耳瓦諾。通常被認為與 Σιλᾶς 是同一個人。Silvanus

Terms.Localization: generally regarded as the same person as Σιλᾶς Silas

Localization.Gloss: 西羅亞（xī luó yà），《思》史羅亞。耶路撒冷城内一個供水系統的名稱；西羅亞池子可能是這個系統中的儲水池，在舊約時代，亞述王西拿基立圍困耶路撒冷時，猶大王希西家所建造。Siloam

Terms.Localization: the name for a system of water supply in Jerusalem; the pool of Siloam was probably the basin into which the water flowed

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞圍裙。工人圍在腰部或胸部一塊布或皮革，用作保護以免弄髒衣服。apron

Terms.Localization: a cloth or piece of leather wrapped by a workman around his waist or chest to protect his clothes

Localization.Gloss: 西奈山（xī nài shān），《舊》西乃山，《思》西乃山。又稱為何烈山，或上帝的山，位於西奈曠野的一座岩石山，傳統的說法是位於西奈半島南部。(Mount) Sinai

Terms.Localization: a rocky mountain on the peninsula of Sinai

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞麻紗布。一種用亞麻植物的莖製成的高品質布料，以其堅韌耐磨和涼爽而聞名。linen cloth

Terms.Localization: a high quality cloth made from the stems of the flax plant, known for its strength and coolness

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞絲綢；綢緞。使用從蠶繭抽取的絲線製成的結實的細纖維。silk cloth

Terms.Localization: a strong fine fiber produced by silkworms and woven into cloth

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞肥的；養肥的；吃穀物長肥的。指用穀物餵飼因而長得肥胖；指圈養喂肥了用作宰殺的牛。fat; fattened; grain-fattened

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being well fed on grain and hence fattened; refers to stall-fed cattle that are being fattened for slaughter

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞穀物；食糧。σῖτος 「穀物」的指小詞，但在意義上並不表示微小；指任何穀物，但其作為食糧的意義顯而易見。grain; food

Terms.Localization: (a diminutive form of σῖτος grain, but not diminutive in meaning) any grain, but with the evident implication of its relevance as food

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞不作聲，緘默；平靜。（σιωπάω「安靜」的引申義）暴風雨過後變得平靜。become still

Terms.Localization: (a figurative extension of meaning of σιωπάω to be silent) to become calm after a storm

Localization.Gloss: 錫安（xī ān），《思》熙雍。字義是「堡壘」。錫安山，耶路撒冷城内的一座山。Zion

Terms.Localization: Mount Zion, a hill within the city of Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 錫安（城）（xī ān (chéng)），《思》熙雍。指耶路撒冷城及其居民，尤其是在詩歌體裁裡。Zion

Terms.Localization: the city of Jerusalem together with its people, particularly in poetic discourse

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞烈酒。用穀物釀造的、會使人喝醉的飲料。beer

Terms.Localization: an intoxicating fermented drink made from grain

Localization.Gloss: 西門（xī mén），《思》西滿。耶穌的十二門徒之一。他是約翰的兒子，安得烈的哥哥。耶穌給他取名為彼得（磯法），就是磐石的意思。Simon

Terms.Localization: Simon Peter, one of the twelve apostles

Localization.Gloss: 西門（xī mén），《思》西滿。耶穌的另一個門徒，屬於奮銳黨（激進黨）。Simon

Terms.Localization: Simon the Zealot, one of the twelve apostles

Localization.Gloss: 西門（xī mén），《思》西滿。耶穌的兄弟，他後來取代雅各，成為耶路撒冷教會的領袖。Simon

Terms.Localization: a brother of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 西門（xī mén），《思》西滿。亞力山大和魯孚的父親，來自古利奈，羅馬兵丁勉強他為耶穌背十字架前往各各他。Simon

Terms.Localization: Simon of Cyrene, who carried the cross of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 西門（xī mén），《思》西滿。加略人猶大的父親。Simon

Terms.Localization: the father of Judas Iscariot

Localization.Gloss: 西門（xī mén），《思》西滿。硝皮匠，彼得在約帕時曾住在他家裡。Simon

Terms.Localization: a tanner in Joppa

Localization.Gloss: 西門（xī mén），《思》西滿。撒馬利亞一個行邪術的術士。Simon

Terms.Localization: a magician of Samaria

Localization.Gloss: 西門（xī mén），《思》西滿。痲瘋病人，不過他的疾病已痊愈。在他位於伯大尼的家裡，一個婦人用一瓶極貴的香膏膏抹耶穌。Simon

Terms.Localization: a leper

Localization.Gloss: 西門（xī mén），《思》西滿。法利賽人，曾邀請耶穌到他家吃飯。Simon

Terms.Localization: a Pharisee

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞芥菜。芥子植物，較大的草本植物，以種子極其細小而著稱，有些可生長至高達三米（約十英呎）。mustard plant

Terms.Localization: mustard plant, a large herb noted for its very small seeds and in some instances growing to a height of three meters (about ten feet)

Localization.Gloss: 穀物；小麥。任何可食用的穀物，但通常指小麥；小麥植物。grain; wheat

Terms.Localization: any kind of edible grain, though generally referring to wheat; the wheat plant

Localization.Gloss: 使跌倒；使犯罪。使犯罪，可能暗示提供某種特殊的環境使犯罪發生。cause to stumble; cause to sin

Terms.Localization: to cause to sin, with the probable implication of providing some special circumstances which contribute to such behavior

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞絆腳石，使人犯罪的試探；冒犯；冒犯的事。（σκάνδαλον「陷阱」的引申義）使人犯罪的人或事情；冒犯人，從而引起敵對的事情。stumbling block, temptation to sin; offenses, offensive thing

Terms.Localization: (figurative extension of σκάνδαλον trap) that which or one who causes someone to sin; that which causes offense and thus arouses opposition

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞小船，小艇。通常放在大船上的小船，水手會用這種小船來拋錨、修理船隻，或遇暴風雨的時候用來拯救生命。small boat; skiff

Terms.Localization: a small boat which was normally kept aboard a larger ship and used by sailors in placing anchors, repairing the ship, or saving lives in the case of storms

Localization.Gloss: 士基瓦（shì jī wǎ），《思》斯蓋瓦。猶太人的大祭司，保羅第三次宣教旅程期間，在以弗所看見他的七個兒子替人趕鬼。Sceva

Terms.Localization: a Jewish high priest

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞器具；用具；裝備。指任何人工製品的集合名詞，也可以用σκεῦος「物件」來表達。things; equipment

Terms.Localization: a collective for any kind of artifact which may be referred to by σκεῦος object, thing

Localization.Gloss: 斗篷，外套，長袍。任何樣式的外衣。cloak; coat; robe

Terms.Localization: any type of outer garment

Localization.Gloss: 帳棚。一種用布和／或獸皮搭建的帳棚，用桿子撐起並用繩子繫緊在木樁上，可以拆卸，方便攜帶。tent

Terms.Localization: a portable dwelling of cloth and/or skins, held up by poles and fastened by cords to stakes

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞ 帳棚；會幕。比較大的帳棚，猶太人在聖殿建成之前，以帳棚（會幕）作為集中敬拜的地方。tent; tabernacle tent

Terms.Localization: the relatively large tent used as a central place of worship by the Jews prior to the building of the Temple

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞帳棚。在一般意義上表示一個居住的地方。tent; tabernacle tent

Terms.Localization: tent representing a dwelling-place in a more generic sense

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞住棚節。猶太人的宗教節日，紀念上帝在他們漂流曠野時供應他們的生活所需。festival of the tabernacles; celebration of the tents

Terms.Localization: a Jewish festival commemorating God's provision during the wanderings in the wilderness

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞製造帳棚的人。以製造帳棚為業的人。tentmaker

Terms.Localization: one who makes tents as an occupation

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞居住；來居住。來住在某個心理或屬靈意義上的地方。take up residence, come to dwell

Terms.Localization: to come to dwell in a place defined psychologically or spiritually

Localization.Gloss: 帳棚。在一般意義上表示一個居住的地方。tent; tabernacle tent

Terms.Localization: tent representing a dwelling-place in a more generic sense

Localization.Gloss: 身體。（σκήνωμα「臨時居所」的引申喻意）以人體作暫時的居所。body

Terms.Localization: (figurative extension of meaning of σκήνωμα temporary dwelling) temporary habitation in the human body

Localization.Gloss: 身體。（σκῆνος「帳棚」的引申喻意，原義沒有出現在《新約》中）以人體作暫時的居所。body

Terms.Localization: (figurative extension of meaning of σκῆνος tent, not occurring in the NT) temporary habitation in the human body

Localization.Gloss: 心硬；頑固。不屈服、固執的態度。hardheartedness, stubbornness

Terms.Localization: the attitude of being unyielding and obstinate

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞蝎子。陸棲的（八腿）蛛形綱動物，有鉗子，其節狀尾有毒刺，尾部可彎曲到背上；成長到大約 13 釐米長；被蝎子螫傷的痛苦和危險廣為人知，因而令人聯想到惡劣的生活條件。scorpion

Terms.Localization: terrestrial arachnid (eight-legged) with pincers and a poisonous sting at the end of its jointed tail, which it can hold curved over the back; grows to about 13 cm long; known for the pain and danger of its sting, and associated with harsh, inhospitable living conditions

Localization.Gloss: （永恆刑罰的）外邊黑暗；外面的黑暗。（習語，字面意思：外面的黑暗）黑暗和偏遠（大概是遠離義人的居所）的地方或地區，因而充當邪靈和魔鬼的住所。outer darkness (of eternal punishment)

Terms.Localization: (an idiom, literally: the outer darkness) a place or region which is both dark and removed (presumably from the abode of the righteous) and serving as the abode of evil spirits and devils

Localization.Gloss: 糞土；垃圾；廢物。被丟棄和扔掉的、無用或不需要的東西。rubbish; litter; trash

Terms.Localization: worthless or unwanted material that is rejected and normally thrown out

Localization.Gloss: 《現》未開化的，《和》西古提人（xī gŭ tí rén），《思》叔提雅人。Σκυθία「西古提」的衍生詞，原詞沒有出現在《新約》中）西古提是黑海以北的一個地區，西古提人就是當地的人，被希羅世界視為無宗教信仰和完全未開化的人。Scythian

Terms.Localization: (derivative of Σκυθία Scythia, not occurring in the NT) a person who is a native of Scythia, a region north of the Black Sea, and regarded by the GrecoRoman world as utterly pagan and uncivilized

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞被蟲咬的。被蟲子咬的（指在潰瘍組織中出現蠕蟲）。eaten by worms

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being eaten by worms (a reference to the occurrence of worms in ulcerous tissue)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞蛆蟲；蠕蟲。沒有骨頭或外殼、細小、柔軟、無腿的管狀生物。通常以過熟的水果、腐爛的肉和類似的東西為食；多半是蒼蠅或甲蟲產卵後孵化出來的幼蟲；象徵污穢、腐爛和死亡。maggot; worm

Terms.Localization: small, soft, legless, tube-shaped creatures that have no bones or shells. They typically feed on overripe fruit, rotting meat, and similar things; most are larvae that hatch from the eggs laid by flies or some beetles; symbols of uncleanness, decay, and death

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞沒藥。一種帶有香氣的樹脂。myrrh

Terms.Localization: the aromatic resin of certain bushes

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞士每拿；《思》斯米納。小亞細亞西岸的一個城。Smyrna

Terms.Localization: a city on the west coast of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 所羅門（suǒ luó mén），《思》撒羅滿。大衛的兒子和繼任人。Solomon

Terms.Localization: the son and successor of David

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞棺架，棺材；抬架。擔架或厚木板，用來把屍體抬往下葬的地方。bier

Terms.Localization: a stretcher or plank used for carrying a corpse to a place of burial

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞手巾；手帕；面巾。小塊的布，用作手巾、餐巾，或面巾。towel; napkin; handkerchief; face cloth

Terms.Localization: a small piece of cloth used as a towel, napkin, or face cloth

Localization.Gloss: 《現》蘇撒娜（sū sā nà），《和》蘇撒拿（sū sā ná），《思》蘇撒納。一個跟隨耶穌的婦人；當耶穌在加利利傳道的時候，她是一直服侍和供應祂和門徒的婦女。她可能曾患病或被鬼附，後來被耶穌治好。Susanna

Terms.Localization: a follower of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: 所多瑪（suǒ duō mǎ），《思》索多瑪。亞伯拉罕時代，位於死海南端的一座城。羅得跟亞伯拉罕分手時，選擇在這地方居住。由於當地的居民罪惡深重，上帝降火把它燒毀。Sodom

Terms.Localization: a city located at the southern part of the Dead Sea and destroyed because of its evil

Localization.Gloss: 西班牙（xī bān yá），《舊》士班雅，《思》西班牙。地中海西端的一個國家。Spain

Terms.Localization: a country at the western end of the Mediterranean Sea

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞澆奠；奠祭；倒出祭物。把祭物倒出來，作為敬拜或儀式。be poured out (as a drink offering) (pass.)

Terms.Localization: to pour out an offering as an act of worship or ritual observance

Localization.Gloss: 種子；籽粒。果實的核心部分，通常是穀粒或籽粒。seed

Terms.Localization: the kernel part of fruit, usually grain

Localization.Gloss: 動了慈心；慈愛；慈悲；憐憫；惻隱之心。對某人生發強烈的愛和憐憫。feel sympathy; feel compassion

Terms.Localization: to experience great affection and compassion for someone

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞喜歡，喜愛。慾望、意圖和感覺的心理能力。affection

Terms.Localization: the psychological faculty of desire, intent, and feeling

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞急切。急忙的活動，暗示有相應的力氣。haste

Terms.Localization: urgent or hurried movement, with the implication of associated energy

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞渴望；熱切。準備投入精力和努力。eagerness; devotion

Terms.Localization: readiness to expend energy and effort

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞海綿。用來吸收液體的多孔物料。sponge

Terms.Localization: lightweight skeleton of a porous sea animal; used for absorbing liquids

Localization.Gloss: 種子；籽粒。果實的核心部分，通常是穀粒或籽粒。seed

Terms.Localization: the kernel part of fruit, usually grain

Localization.Gloss: 筐子；大籃子。通常用草或蘆葦織成的大容器；用來攜帶各種物品，包括食品和商品；這種籃子可能比κόφινος大一點。large basket

Terms.Localization: container made of woven material, usually grass or reeds; used for carrying a variety of things, including food and produce; this basket is presumably somewhat larger than a κόφινος

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞古希臘銀幣，斯塔特。約值兩個迪德拉克瑪（didrachma）或四個得拿利（denarii）。stater; coin

Terms.Localization: a silver coin worth two didrachma or approximately four denarii

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞十字架。古代羅馬帝國用以施行死刑的刑具，是一根垂直插進地裡的柱子，上部連接一塊橫木，形成 T 字或十字形。cross

Terms.Localization: a pole stuck into the ground in an upright position with a crosspiece attached to its upper part; used as a means of execution

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞釘十字架。處死某人，把他釘在十字架上。crucify

Terms.Localization: to execute someone by nailing that person to a cross

Localization.Gloss: 葡萄；葡萄串。葡萄樹所結的果子。grape; bunch of grapes

Terms.Localization: the fruit of grapevines

Localization.Gloss: 競技場；運動場。橢圓形的露天場地（通常帶跑道），四周有為觀眾而設的階梯式座位。arena; stadium

Terms.Localization: an open, oval area (frequently including a racetrack) around which was built an enclosed series of tiers of seats for those who came to watch the spectacles

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞罐。常用來盛酒的罐，但在《新約》中，那是指用來永久存放嗎哪的罐子。jar

Terms.Localization: a jar regularly used for wine, but in the NT it refers to the jar in which manna was kept permanently

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞麥穗，穗（五穀）。小麥和大麥等穀物那尖尖的、濃密的穗子，裡面是穀物的籽粒（《新約》只用來指小麥）。ear of wheat; head of wheat

Terms.Localization: the dense spiky cluster in which the seeds of grain such as wheat and barley grow (restricted in NT contexts to references to wheat)

Localization.Gloss: 士大古；《思》斯塔輝。在《羅馬書》的問安名單中出現的基督徒。Stachys

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in |sROM.16:9|s*

Localization.Gloss: 司提法那（sī tí fǎ nà），《思》斯法特納。哥林多教會的成員，亞該亞最早歸主的信徒之一，曾受保羅的施洗。Stephanas

Terms.Localization: a Christian of Corinth

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞房頂。平頂屋的屋頂區域。roof

Terms.Localization: the (flat) roof or top of a house

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞花環，花圈。一種羊毛花環，可在其上添加花和葉，繞在一根權杖上，或編織成花環戴在頭上。garland; wreath

Terms.Localization: a wreath of wool to which leaves and flowers might be added and either wound around a staff or woven into a garland to be worn on the head

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞華冠，冠冕。用樹枝和葉子或造成枝葉形狀之貴重金屬製作的花冠；戴花冠象徵榮譽和勝利，或作為高官要職的標記。wreath; crown

Terms.Localization: a wreath consisting either of foliage or of precious metals formed to resemble foliage and worn as a symbol of honor, victory, or as a badge of high office

Localization.Gloss: 司提反；《思》斯德望。早期耶路撒冷教會揀選出來的七名執事之一，也是第一位基督徒殉道士。Stephen

Terms.Localization: one of the seven helpers in the church in Jerusalem and the first Christian martyr

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞地上的草。用來填充床墊或鋪在地上作禮儀的稻草或燈芯草。field grasses

Terms.Localization: straw or rushes used to stuff a mattress or to spread on the ground for ceremonies

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞傷痕；印記。在物體表面的東西，如線條、斑點或疤痕，沒有特殊的設計，但具有重要意義 。mark, scar

Terms.Localization: something on the surface of an object, for example, line, spot, or scar, without special design but carrying significance

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞門廊，走廊。有蓋的柱廊，通常一邊敞開，人們可以在其間站、坐，或行走，而不用日曬雨淋。porch; portico

Terms.Localization: a covered colonnade, open normally on one side, where people could stand, sit, or walk, protected from the weather and the heat of the sun

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞基本原理；基本原則；基本道理；基礎概念；淺顯的學說。某事物的性質所依據的基本原理。fundamental principles; elementary principles; fundamentals; elements

Terms.Localization: basic principles which underlie the nature of something

Localization.Gloss: 《現》斯多亞派（sī duō yà pài），《和》斯多亞門（sī duō yà mén），《思》斯多噶派。指希臘哲學家齊諾（Zeno）的哲學體系，他教導人們應當擺脫過度的歡樂或悲傷，並且無怨無悔地順從。Stoic

Terms.Localization: pertaining to the philosophical system of the Greek philosopher Zeno, who taught that people should be free from excessive joy or grief and submit without complaint to necessity

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞長袍。飄逸的長袍，一直延伸到腳跟。long robe

Terms.Localization: a long, flowing outer garment reaching to the feet

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞麻雀。細小的鳥；顏色為斑駁的褐色；麻雀屬；成群棲息和築巢；吃草的種子和穀物；令人聯想到窮人。sparrow

Terms.Localization: small bird; speckled brown in color; genus Passer; roosts and nests in groups; eats grass seeds and grain; associated with the poor

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞柱子，柱石。用於支撐建築物的垂直結構，即柱子。pillar; column

Terms.Localization: an upright shaft or structure used as a building support

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞一同參與；與……合夥；分擔困難。在一些聯合活動中有交往，在某些處境下，暗示那是頗為持久的關係。participate; become partner with someone

Terms.Localization: to be associated in some joint activity, with the implication, in some contexts, of a somewhat enduring relation

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞夥伴，同伴；同享者，分擔者，參加者。與其他人共同擁有一份財產或一個關係的人，強調大家的共同點。partaker; partner

Terms.Localization: one who shares jointly with someone else in a possession or relationship, with emphasis upon that which is in common

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞跟…住在一起，同生；跟…同活。與其他人共同活著。live with; live together

Terms.Localization: to live in association with or together with someone else

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞桑樹。一種落葉果樹，高度可達六米；樹上長出黑色漿果，果汁色紅味甜。mulberry tree

Terms.Localization: a deciduous fruit tree growing to about 6 m; produces black berries containing a sweet reddish juice

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞無花果樹。果樹；可長到 5-8 米高；弧形樹冠，扎根很深；果子柔軟清甜，大小像雞蛋，有綠、黃、紫、棕等不同顏色，取決於品種。fig tree

Terms.Localization: fruit tree; grows 5-8 m high; round crown and very deep roots; Ficus carica; fruit is about the size of a hen’s egg and can be green, yellow, purple, or brown depending on the type, and is sweet and soft

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞無花果桑樹，野桑樹。一種寬闊巨大的樹，樹高可達十五米（約五十英呎），粗壯結實的樹枝從樹幹下部長出來；果實外形像細小的無花果，但味道不太好。sycamore-fig tree

Terms.Localization: a broad, heavy tree reaching a height of some fifteen meters (about fifty feet), with large, strong branches growing out from the trunk low down on the tree; fruit has the appearance of a small fig but its taste is relatively unpleasant

Localization.Gloss: 西門（xī mén），《思》西滿。耶穌的十二門徒之一。西門是彼得的亞蘭名字。Simeon; Simon

Terms.Localization: one form of the apostle Peter's Aramaic name

Localization.Gloss: 西緬（xī miǎn），《思》西默盎。雅各跟利亞所生的第二個兒子，西緬支派的先祖。Simeon

Terms.Localization: a son of Jacob and ancestor of an Israelite tribe

Localization.Gloss: 西面（xī miàn），《思》西默盎。耶路撒冷的一名老者，是敬畏上帝的義人。Simeon

Terms.Localization: an elderly man of Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 西面（xī miàn），《思》西滿。安提阿教會的先知，又名尼結。Simeon

Terms.Localization: a Christian prophet at Antioch who was also called Niger

Localization.Gloss: 西緬（xī miǎn），《思》西默盎。耶穌家譜中的一員。Simeon; Simon

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞同情；體恤。在同情的意義上分享某人的感受。have sympathy for

Terms.Localization: to share someone's feeling in the sense of being sympathetic with

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞同情的，互相同情的。同情某人或某事的。sympathetic

Terms.Localization: pertaining to feeling sympathy for someone or something

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞會堂或基督徒聚集的地方。用於集會的建築物，與宗教活動有關（通常指猶太人舉行敬拜、教導律法的建築物，但在《雅各書》2:2中是指基督徒聚集的地方）。synagogue or Christian assembly place

Terms.Localization: a building of assembly, associated with religious activity (normally a building in which Jewish worship took place and in which the Law was taught, but in JAS 2:2 a Christian assembly place)

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞調解，使之復和。在人際關係受到擾亂或破壞後，重新建立恰當的友好關係。reconcile

Terms.Localization: to reestablish proper friendly interpersonal relations after these have been disrupted or broken

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞分享…的榮耀。與別人一起領受極大的榮譽。be honored together with

Terms.Localization: to receive great honor together with someone else

Localization.Gloss: （從死人中）復活；使……（從死人中）復活。使已經死了的人活過來。raise (from the dead); be raised (from the dead) (pass.)

Terms.Localization: cause someone who has died to rise up to life

Localization.Gloss: 是非之心；良心。能夠分辨是非對錯的心理能力。conscience

Terms.Localization: the psychological faculty that can distinguish between right and wrong

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞同工。和別人一起工作的人。co-worker

Terms.Localization: one who works together with someone else

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞末日，終局。標誌著這個世界之終結的時刻。end of the world

Terms.Localization: a point of time marking the end of this world

Localization.Gloss: 循都基（xún dū jī），《思》欣提赫。腓立比教會的女信徒。Syntyche

Terms.Localization: a Christian woman in the church of Philippi

Localization.Gloss: 敘拉古（xù lā gǔ），《思》息辣谷撒。新約時代的西西里島的首府城市，位於今日意大利西西里島東岸。Syracuse

Terms.Localization: a city on the east coast of Sicily

Localization.Gloss: 敘利亞（xù lì yà），《思》敘利亞。巴勒斯坦北部和東部的一個地區，舊約時代稱為亞蘭。Syria

Terms.Localization: a region to the north and east of Palestine and known as Aram in OT times

Localization.Gloss: 敘利亞腓尼基的婦人。敘利亞腓尼基本地的婦人。Syrophoenician

Terms.Localization: a woman who is a native of Syro-Phoenicia

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞同釘十字架。把一個人與別人一同釘十字架。crucify along with someone else

Terms.Localization: to execute someone by nailing that person to a cross along with someone else

Localization.Gloss: 敘加（xù jiā），《思》息哈爾。撒馬利亞境內的一個城。Sychar

Terms.Localization: a city in Samaria

Localization.Gloss: 示劍（shì jiàn），《思》舍根。古代以法蓮山區、撒馬利亞境內的一個城，位於耶路撒冷以北大約63公里的地方。Shechem

Terms.Localization: a city in Samaria

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞同工；同事；一同做工的。在某種活動中與另一人有緊密聯繫的人 。yoke-fellow, fellow worker

Terms.Localization: one who is closely linked with another in some activity

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞靈裡結合的，合一的。有相似的態度和心靈。joined in soul

Terms.Localization: pertaining to similarity of attitude and spirit

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞同作奴隸的人。一同作奴僕的人，或與另一奴僕在一起的奴僕。fellow-slave

Terms.Localization: one who is a fellow slave or a slave alongside another slave

Localization.Gloss: 《現》敘利亞人（xù lì yà rén），《和》敘利亞國的，《思》敘利亞的。敘利亞本地的人。Syrian

Terms.Localization: a person who is a native of Syria

Localization.Gloss: 賽耳底（sài ěr dǐ），《思》敘爾提。北非海岸線上兩個淺水而危險的地中海海灣，位於意大利的正南方。Syrtis

Terms.Localization: two shallow and treacherous Mediterranean gulfs along the north African coastline

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞同為成員。一個群體中的成員，強調與其他成員的協調關係。co-member

Terms.Localization: a person who is a member of a group, with emphasis upon his coordinate relation to other members of the group

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞無花果。無花果樹的果子。fig

Terms.Localization: the fruit of the fig tree

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞封上；加封條；使安全。用封條封上或使某物安全牢固。to seal; put a seal on; make secure

Terms.Localization: to use a seal to close or to make something secure

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞印章；圖章。有鐫刻的物件，用於做記號以標示物件的所有權，表示批准，或用作封印（封印的方法通常是用印章壓一下加熱了的蠟，這種封印一般會出現在文件或信件上）。seal; signet

Terms.Localization: an engraved object used to make a mark denoting ownership, approval, or closure of something (normally done by pressing into heated wax and usually attached to a document or letter)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞印。有印章或圖章印記的東西，用於把文件封嚴，或為了展示擁有權或表示認可。seal

Terms.Localization: the substance which bears the imprint of a seal or signet, used for sealing a document or for showing ownership or endorsement

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞記號，蓋著…的印記。圖章戒指或印章的印記，主要表示所有權。mark, seal

Terms.Localization: the impression of a signet ring or seal, primarily indicating ownership

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞印記；刻印；銘文。由印章或圖章造成的記號或印記。mark, inscription

Terms.Localization: the mark or impression made by a seal or stamp

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞印證，證明，驗證，證據。證明真實的證據。確認或證明某事物的真實性的東西。certification, validation, proof, evidence of genuineness

Terms.Localization: that which confirms or attests to the genuineness of something

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞繩子。把好幾股線搓捻或編織而成的粗繩子；用棕櫚纖維、亞麻線或蘆葦等各種不同的材料製成。cord; rope

Terms.Localization: thick cord formed by twisting or braiding several strands together; made of a variety of materials, including palm fibers, linen, or reeds

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞講堂，學校。一座專門供學習之用的建築物，老師在其中傳授知識，與學生一起討論學問。lecture hall; school

Terms.Localization: a building where teachers and students met for study and discussion

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞身體的，肉身的。與身體有關的。in body; bodily

Terms.Localization: pertaining to a physical body

Localization.Gloss: 事實上；實際上。是真實的（在實體的意義上），與象徵相對。in reality, really

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being real (in the sense of material) in contrast with being symbolic

Localization.Gloss: 所提尼，《思》索斯特乃。哥林多會堂的主管。許多學者認為 Σωσθένης-1 與 Σωσθένης-2 是同一人。Sosthenes

Terms.Localization: a leader of a synagogue in Corinth; many scholars consider (a) and (b) to be the same person

Localization.Gloss: 所提尼（suǒ tí ní），《思》索斯特乃。哥林多的基督徒，許多學者認為 Σωσθένης-1 與 Σωσθένης-2 是同一人。Sosthenes

Terms.Localization: a Christian of Corinth; many scholars consider (a) and (b) to be the same person

Localization.Gloss: 所西巴德（suǒ xī bā dé），《思》索息帕特。保羅的親屬，在《羅馬書》16章中向羅馬教會問安。保羅稱他為「親屬」，可能指他們有密切的血緣關係，或只是一個親密的基督徒同伴。他可能是「所巴特」。Sosipater

Terms.Localization: a person who sends greetings in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞拯救；救恩；得救。獲得拯救的狀態。salvation

Terms.Localization: a state of having been saved

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞救主，拯救者，救贖者；解救者。救援或拯救的人。savior

Terms.Localization: one who rescues or saves

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞拯救，救恩。人經歷上帝拯救的方法。salvation

Terms.Localization: the means by which people experience divine salvation

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞拯救的，救恩的，拯救的能力的。關於上帝的拯救。saving

Terms.Localization: pertaining to divine salvation

Localization.Gloss: 所巴特（suǒ bā tè），《思》索帕特爾。來自馬其頓城庇哩亞的基督徒。Sopater

Terms.Localization: a Christian in Beroea

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞身體。人、動物或植物的身體，無論死的還是活的。body

Terms.Localization: the physical body of persons, animals, or plants, either dead or alive

Localization.Gloss: 救，解救，拯救；醫治。從危險中救出並恢復到從前安全和幸福的狀態。save; heal

Terms.Localization: to rescue from danger and to restore to a former state of safety and well being

Localization.Gloss: 客棧。供旅客住宿的地方。inn

Terms.Localization: a place for the lodging of travellers

Localization.Gloss: 大比大（dà bǐ dà），《思》塔彼達。一名約帕女信徒的亞蘭音譯名字，希臘文譯作Δορκάς「多加」。Tabitha

Terms.Localization: the Aramaic name of a Christian woman in Joppa whose name was interpreted as Δορκάς

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞屋子，內室，密室。房屋內部的房間，通常沒有向外的窗戶。inner room

Terms.Localization: a room in the interior of a house, normally without windows opening to the outside

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞倉庫；藏寶室。保管貴重物品的房間。storeroom; treasure room

Terms.Localization: a room for the storage of valuables

Localization.Gloss: 大數人（dà shù rén），《思》塔爾索人。大數本地的人，或住在大數的人。Tarsus (person from)

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Tarsus

Localization.Gloss: 大數（dà shù），《思》塔爾索。小亞細亞東南部基利家的省會，位於地中海東北方，離地中海岸大約16公里。Tarsus

Terms.Localization: the capital of Cilicia in southeast Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞丟進地獄。被扔進塔爾塔魯斯（音譯），或使留在塔爾塔魯斯（一個折磨人的地方）。to hold in Tartarus (a place of torture or torment), to cast into hell

Terms.Localization: to cast into or to cause to remain in Tartarus (a place of torture or torment)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞牛，公牛。雄性牛科動物；有角和分蹄的大型反芻動物；用於祭祀，肉可作食物，或作為役畜，用來拉車或拉犁。bull

Terms.Localization: male bovine; large ruminant animal with horns and cloven hoofs; used for sacrifice and for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞邪術。基於迷信而行使的法術。magic; witchcraft

Terms.Localization: the use of magic based on superstition

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞他連得。希臘貨幣單位（也是重量單位），價值會變動，視乎當時所沿用的貨幣制度（銀的他連得約等於六千得拿利，金的他連得最少是這個價值的三十倍）。talent

Terms.Localization: a Greek monetary unit (also a unit of weight) with a value which fluctuated, depending upon the particular monetary system which prevailed at a particular period of time (a silver talent was worth approximately six thousand denarii with gold talents worth at least thirty times that much)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞墳墓，墳。為埋葬死人而建的墓穴；通常是天然的洞穴，也可能是從基岩開鑿而成。grave; tomb

Terms.Localization: a construction for the burial of the dead; often a natural cave or hewn out of bedrock

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞牆，城牆。極其堅固的永久結構，主要指為了保護一座城而圍繞該城建造的城牆。city wall

Terms.Localization: a particularly strong permanent wall, primarily the wall built around a city for its protection

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞稅棍，收稅的人，稅吏。為政府收稅的人。tax-collector

Terms.Localization: one who collects taxes for the government

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞稅務署；稅關。向進城賣東西的人收稅的地方。tax office

Terms.Localization: a place where taxes or revenue was collected from those entering a town to sell produce

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞稅，關稅。應當交給政府當局的款項。tax; revenue

Terms.Localization: payments customarily due a governmental authority

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞奇事；兆頭，預兆。一個不尋常的跡象，尤指在天上的，用來預示即將發生的事件。portent, wonder

Terms.Localization: an unusual sign, especially one in the heavens, serving to foretell impending events

Localization.Gloss: 德提（dé tí），《舊》德丟，《思》特爾爵。保羅的文書，為保羅代筆寫羅馬書；他在《羅馬書》16章向信徒問安。Tertius

Terms.Localization: a person who sends greetings in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 帖土羅（tiē tǔ luó），《思》特爾突羅。他是個善於詞令的律師，代猶太人的領袖向腓力斯總督控告保羅造亂生事。Tertullus

Terms.Localization: an attorney who accused Paul before Felix

Localization.Gloss: 提比哩亞（tí bǐ lǐ yà），《思》提庇黎雅。加利利湖西岸的一座城。Tiberias

Terms.Localization: a city on the west shore of the Lake of Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 提比哩亞（tí bǐ lǐ yà），《思》提庇黎雅。加利利湖的另一個名稱。Tiberias

Terms.Localization: the Lake of Tiberias, also known as the Lake of Galilee

Localization.Gloss: 提庇留（tí bì liú），《思》提庇留。羅馬皇帝提庇留·克勞第·凱撒·奧古斯都；新約時代羅馬帝國的第二位君王。他繼承奧古斯都的王位，在耶穌公開傳道的時期統治羅馬。Tiberius

Terms.Localization: the Roman emperor Tiberius Claudius Caesar Augustus

Localization.Gloss: 底買（dǐ mǎi），《思》提買。耶穌在耶利哥治好的一個討飯的瞎子巴底買的父親。Timaeus

Terms.Localization: the father of Bartimaeus

Localization.Gloss: 提摩太（tí mó tài），《思》弟茂德。保羅的同工。他的母親是猶太人，父親是希臘人。Timothy

Terms.Localization: a friend and coworker of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 提門（tí mén），《思》提孟。耶路撒冷教會所揀選出來的七個信徒之一，協助分擔使徒的工作，賙濟窮人。Timon

Terms.Localization: one of the seven helpers in the church in Jerusalem

Localization.Gloss: 提多（tí duō），《思》弟鐸。提多猶士都，哥林多的猶太歸信者，他的家靠近會堂，接待保羅居住。Titus

Terms.Localization: a Jewish proselyte in Corinth whose additional name was Justus

Localization.Gloss: 提多（tí duō），《思》弟鐸。外邦的基督徒，是保罗的朋友和在以弗所的同工，曾負責革哩底的教會。Titus

Terms.Localization: a friend and companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: 荒涼可憎的。污穢聖地、令人憎惡的物件或事件，從而導致聖地被上帝棄絕，以致荒涼。abomination of desolation

Terms.Localization: an object or an event that defiles a holy place and thus causes it to be abandoned and left desolate

Localization.Gloss: 名，名字；人；……的種類，……的類型，屬於。一個人的名字或一個物件的名稱；引申義：人，可能暗指一個存在的實體，或與名字相關的個人；根據對一類實體的隱含指稱而產生的種類或類別。name; person, people; category of, being of the type that...

Terms.Localization: the proper name of a person or object; by extension, a person, possibly implying existence or relevance as individuals; category or kind, based on an implied designation for a class of entities

Localization.Gloss: 弓。用木或其他柔韌材料做成的弧形物件，有一條繩子連著兩端，拉扯使之彎曲；用來推動一支箭（射箭）；是戰爭的武器。bow

Terms.Localization: an arch made of wood or other flexible material and bent by a string attached to its two ends; for propelling an arrow; weapon of war

Localization.Gloss: 特拉可尼（tè lā kě ní），《思》特辣曷尼。新約時代猶太王國的一個省份，位於大馬士革以南。Trachonitis

Terms.Localization: a district to the south of Damascus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞公山羊。雄性山羊。he-goat

Terms.Localization: male goat

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞孔。小孔（新約只使用這字來指針眼）。hole

Terms.Localization: a small opening (used in the NT only with reference to the so-called "eye" of a needle)

Localization.Gloss: 有刺植物；荊棘；蒺藜。任何在莖部和／或枝條上有尖刺的植物；被視為無用的；象徵艱難困苦。thorn plant; thistle; brier

Terms.Localization: any kind of plant with sharp projections on its stem and/or branches; regarded as useless; symbol of hardship

Localization.Gloss: 三樓（美式說法）；二樓（英式說法）。建築物的第三層樓，即地面層以上的第二層樓。second story (British usage); third story (American usage)

Terms.Localization: the third story of a building, that is, the second story above ground level

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞生活；行為；生活方式。生活方式，重點往往在慣常的行為。way of life

Terms.Localization: manner of living, often with focus upon customary acts

Localization.Gloss: 特羅非摩（tè luó fēi mó），《思》特洛斐摩。以弗所的基督徒，保羅的同工。Trophimus

Terms.Localization: a Christian of Ephesus and companion of Paul

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞斑鳩。一種比烏鶇略大、灰藍色的鳥，胸部呈粉色；屬候鳥，每年四月來到以色列；主要吃種子；象征和平和溫柔；潔淨；用作祭品。turtle dove

Terms.Localization: bird slightly larger than blackbird; blue-gray with a pinkish chest; migratory, arrives in Israel in April; eats seeds; Streptopelia turtur; symbol of peace and gentleness; clean, may be eaten; used for sacrifices

Localization.Gloss: 孔。小孔（在《新約》中只用來指針眼）。hole

Terms.Localization: a small opening (used in the NT only with reference to the so-called "eye" of a needle)

Localization.Gloss: 土富撒；《思》特黎佛撒。在《羅馬書》的問安名單中出現的兩個為主勞苦的婦女之一。Tryphosa

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞碟子，碗。較深的盤子，用於盛食物和各種液體，也用於烹煮；通常用陶土製成，但也有金屬製的。bowl; dish

Terms.Localization: a relatively deep concave dish used for holding or cooking food or liquids; usually made of clay, but also metals

Localization.Gloss: 孔。小孔（在《新約》中只用來指針眼）。hole

Terms.Localization: a small opening (used in the NT only with reference to the so-called "eye" of a needle)

Localization.Gloss: 土非拿；《思》特黎費納。在《羅馬書》的問安名單中出現的兩個為主勞苦的婦女之一。Tryphena

Terms.Localization: a person greeted in Romans 16

Localization.Gloss: 特羅亞（tè luó yà），《思》特洛阿。小亞細亞西北角一個城市和地區。Troas

Terms.Localization: a city and region in the northwest corner of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: 像；形像。造成人、神明、動物等形象的物件（不一定是立體的）。likeness; image

Terms.Localization: an object (not necessarily three-dimensional) which has been formed to resemble a person, god, animal, etc.

Localization.Gloss: 推喇奴；《思》提郎諾。以弗所人，保羅曾在以其命名的學房（推喇奴學房）天天與人辯論。Tyrannus

Terms.Localization: an Ephesian in whose hall Paul lectured

Localization.Gloss: 《現》泰爾的人民（tài ěr de rén mín），《和》泰爾的人，《舊》推羅的人，《思》提洛的人。泰爾的本地人或住在泰爾的人。Tyrian; person from Tyre

Terms.Localization: a person who lives in or is a native of Tyre

Localization.Gloss: 泰爾（tài ěr），《舊》推羅，《思》提洛。腓尼基海岸的一個城，擁有久遠的歷史，在西頓以南，是亞設支派地業的境界。Tyre

Terms.Localization: city on the Phoenician coast

Localization.Gloss: 推基古（tuī jī gǔ），《思》提希苛。亞細亞省的一個基督徒，是保羅的同工。Tychicus

Terms.Localization: a leader from the province of Asia who was associated with Paul

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞玻璃的，透明的。ὕαλος「玻璃」的衍生詞，指包含玻璃或與玻璃有關的。of glass; glassy

Terms.Localization: (derivative of ὕαλος glass) consisting of or pertaining to glass

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞大水罐，水缸。用於儲存和運送水或其他液體的容器；用石頭或陶土製成。pitcher; water jar

Terms.Localization: a container for storing or carrying water or other liquids; made of stone or clay

Localization.Gloss: 人子。耶穌對自己的稱謂，有以彌賽亞自居的含義。Son of Man

Terms.Localization: a title with Messianic implications used by Jesus concerning himself ‎

Localization.Gloss: 《和2010》《和》許米乃；《現》舒米乃；《思》依默納約。初期教會一個異端分子。Hymenaeus

Terms.Localization: a person who defected from true faith

Localization.Gloss: 樓上的房間。在首層以上的房間（美式用法稱為二樓，在許多其他語言中稱為一樓）。upstairs room

Terms.Localization: a room on the level above the ground floor (second story in American usage and first story in most other languages)

Localization.Gloss: 服侍；服務。藉著履行某些職責來提供幫助，通常是一些卑微或低賤的工作。serve

Terms.Localization: to render assistance or help by performing certain duties, often of a humble or menial nature

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞法官，警衛，助理，幫手，僕人。提供服務的人。official; servant; attendant

Terms.Localization: a person who renders service

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞驢子。載重的動物；役畜；騎乘動物。可以運載重物或可以乘騎的動物。pack animal; beast of burden; riding animal

Terms.Localization: an animal which can be used to carry a burden or can be ridden

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞偽善者，虛偽的人，假冒為善的人。假裝是另外一個人，與真實的自己不同。hypocrite

Terms.Localization: one who pretends to be other than he really is

Localization.Gloss: ＜動＞假裝；裝作。讓別人以為有特定的目的或動機，而實際上卻有著完全不同的目的或動機。pretend

Terms.Localization: to give an impression of having certain purposes or motivations, while in reality having quite different ones

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞壓酒池或槽。放在葡萄酒壓榨機下面的槽，用來接住壓榨出來的葡萄汁。wine trough

Terms.Localization: a trough placed beneath the wine press to receive the grape juice pressed out

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞腳凳。用來擱腳的家具。footstool

Terms.Localization: a small piece of furniture on which one may rest one's feet

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞信任；確實的信心；保證。信任或信靠之事的基礎。confidence, assurance, trust

Terms.Localization: that which provides the basis for trust and reliance

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞涼鞋，拖鞋，鞋子。任何鞋類（但通常指涼鞋而不是鞋子）。sandal; shoe

Terms.Localization: any type of footwear (though ordinarily the reference would be to a sandal rather than to a shoe)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞偽善，不誠實，假裝。一種行為或態度，讓別人以為有特定的目的或動機，而實際上卻有著完全不同的目的或動機。hypocrisy

Terms.Localization: the act or attitude of giving an impression of having certain purposes or motivations, while in reality having quite different ones

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞高。形容「高的」。high, tall

Terms.Localization: pertaining to being high

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞玻璃，水晶。玻璃（也可能是水晶，文本的重點是玻璃的透明度）。glass, crystal

Terms.Localization: glass (or possibly, crystal--the emphasis in the texts is on the transparency of glass)

Localization.Gloss: 樹林；木頭；一堆木頭。覆蓋較大地區的茂密樹林；或樹木或灌木的木質部分。forest; wood; pile of wood

Terms.Localization: a dense growth of trees covering a relatively large area, or: the woody part of trees or bushes

Localization.Gloss: 牛膝草。細小的芳香灌木，無主幹，許多分枝從底部長出，莖直而硬，有毛絨，高 50-80 釐米；猶太人在潔淨的禮儀中常用作潑灑的工具。hyssop

Terms.Localization: small aromatic bush with a shrub-like base and stems which are stiff, many-branched, hairy, and strong, 50-80 cm tall; Origanum syriacum or Majorana syriaca; used by the Jews in the ritual purification process as a sprinkling brush

Localization.Gloss: 至高。在高度的度量方面是最高的。highest

Terms.Localization: the superlative in the measurement of height

Localization.Gloss: 至高者。上帝的頭銜，字面意思：最高的：至高無上的那一位，主要指地位。Most High

Terms.Localization: a title for God, literally highest: one who is supreme, primarily a reference to status

Localization.Gloss: 高度。高度的測量。height

Terms.Localization: the measurement of height

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞母豬。豬的雌性。sow

Terms.Localization: a female pig

Localization.Gloss: 斗篷，外套，長袍。任何樣式的外衣。cloak; coat; robe

Terms.Localization: any type of outer garment

Localization.Gloss: 法内力；《思》法奴耳。女先知亞拿的父親，是亞設支族的人。Phanuel

Terms.Localization: the father of Anna the prophetess

Localization.Gloss: ＜陽＞燈籠，提燈。戶外使用便於攜帶的照明工具，有透明物料保護，可以遮擋風雨。lantern

Terms.Localization: a small fire which was carried about for the sake of its light and which had some type of protection from wind and weather

Localization.Gloss: 法老（fǎ lǎo），《思》法郎。古埃及統治者的頭銜，意思是「偉大的家族」，被用作埃及國王的專有名稱。Pharaoh

Terms.Localization: a title used as a proper name of the Egyptian king

Localization.Gloss: 法利賽人（fǎ lì sài rén），《思》法利塞人。耶穌和使徒時代一個重要的猶太宗教和政治黨派。法利賽人的群體比撒都該人大很多，而且在某些教義和行為模式上與他們很不相同。法利賽人嚴格遵守和守護舊約的律法以及無數附加的傳統規條。Pharisee

Terms.Localization: a member of an important religious and political Jewish party at the time of Jesus and the apostles. The Pharisees constituted a significantly larger group than the Sadducees and differed with them on certain doctrines and patterns of behavior. The Pharisees were strict and jealous adherents to the laws of the OT and to numerous additional traditions

Localization.Gloss: 法勒（fǎ lè），《思》培肋格。耶穌家譜中的一員。Peleg

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜中＞鬼怪，幽靈。一個人或物的超自然外表。apparition, ghost

Terms.Localization: a supernatual appearance of a person or thing

Localization.Gloss: 法勒斯（fǎ lè sī ），《思》培勒茲。耶穌家譜中的一員。Perez

Terms.Localization: a person in the genealogy of Jesus

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞飼料箱；馬槽；飼料槽。餵飼牲畜用的料箱或食槽（甚至可能是露天的餵飼地場）。feed box; manger; crib

Terms.Localization: a box or crib where animals feed (or possibly even an open feeding place under the sky)

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞馬槽；馬廐。餵飼牲口的畜欄。stall

Terms.Localization: a stall where animals are fed

Localization.Gloss: 腓力斯（féi lì sī），《思》斐理斯。公元52至60年間的羅馬行政官，統治巴勒斯坦南部的猶大地區。Felix

Terms.Localization: a procurator of Palestine

Localization.Gloss: 非斯都（fēi sī dū），《思》斐斯托。公元59年接替腓力斯就任猶太地區的總督。Festus

Terms.Localization: Porcius Festus, the successor to Felix as procurator of Palestine

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞碗。寬口的淺碗，通常用來烹飪或盛載各種液體。bowl

Terms.Localization: a broad, shallow bowl, normally used for cooking or for serving liquids

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞（基督徒之間的）兄弟愛，手足之愛。基督徒之間的手足之愛。love for one's fellow believer; affection for a fellow believer

Terms.Localization: affection for one's fellow believer in Christ

Localization.Gloss: 非拉鐵非（fēi lā tiě fēi），《思》非拉德非雅。位於小亞細亞中西部的城市，當地教會是啟示錄作者致函的小亞細亞七個教會之一。Philadelphia

Terms.Localization: a city in the west central part of Asia Minor

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞親切，友善；對人類的愛。普遍意義上對人的愛。kindness; love towards humankind

Terms.Localization: affection for people in general ‎

Localization.Gloss: ＜陰＞愛錢，貪財。貪愛錢財的狀態.love of money

Terms.Localization: the state of loving money or wealth

Localization.Gloss: ＜形＞好善的，喜愛良善的。喜愛美好事物的.liking what is good, loving what is good
